original: 010.011. apyevaitat karma tanutvaṃ parikṣayaṃ paryādānaṃ gacchet/
analyzed: api eva etat karma tanu tvam parikṣayam paryādānam gacchet
sa saṃlakṣayati na kadācid etat mayā śruta pūrvam
paśyāmi saced bhūtam bhaviṣyati
sarvam etat satyam
tena gatvā khanitam
yāvat tat sarvam tat tathā eva
tena abhiśraddadhātam
sa tasyāḥ veśyāyāḥ sakāśam upasaṃkrāntaḥ
upasaṃkramya kathayati bhagini

original: dṛṣṭāste mayā mātā pitā bhrātā bhrāturjāyā dāsī/
analyzed: dṛṣṭāḥ te mayā mātā pitā bhrātā bhrātuḥ jāyā dāsī
te kathayanti aniṣṭaḥ sya karmaṇaḥ phala vipākaḥ
virama asmāt pāpakāt asat dharmāt
sā kathayati bhoḥ puruṣa
mama mātā pitroḥ dvādaśa varṣāṇi kālagatayoḥ

original: 010.017. asti kaścit tvayā dṛṣṭaḥ paralokaṃ gatvā punarāgacchan?
analyzed: asti kaścid tvayā dṛṣṭaḥ para lokam gatvā punar āgacchan
sa kathayati eṣaḥ ham āgataḥ
sā na śraddadhāti
sa kathayati bhagini
saced na abhiśraddadhāsi

original: tava paurāṇe paitṛke vāsagṛhe catasro lohasaṃghāṭāḥ suvarṇapūrṇāstiṣṭhanti,
analyzed: tava paurāṇe paitṛke vāsagṛhe catasraḥ loha saṃghāṭāḥ suvarṇa pūrṇāḥ tiṣṭhanti
madhye ca sauvarṇa daṇḍa kamaṇḍaluḥ
te kathayanti tam uddhṛtya ātmānam samyak sukhena prīṇaya

original: āryaṃ ca mahākātyāyanaṃ kālena kālaṃ piṇḍakena pratipādaya,
analyzed: āryam ca mahākātyāyanam kālena kālam piṇḍakena pratipādaya
asmākam ca nāṃnā dakṣiṇām ādeśaya

original: 010.022. apyevaitat karma tanutvaṃ parikṣayaṃ paryādānaṃ gacchet/
analyzed: api eva etat karma tanu tvam parikṣayam paryādānam gacchet
sā saṃlakṣayati na kadācid mayā śruta pūrvam
paśyāmi saced bhūtam bhaviṣyati
sarvam etat satyam
tayā gatvā khanitam
yāvat tat sarvam tat tathā eva
tayā abhiśraddadhātam

original: 010.024. śroṇaḥ koṭikarṇaḥ saṃlakṣayati--sarvo 'yaṃ lokaḥ suvarṇasya śraddadhāti,
analyzed: śroṇaḥ koṭikarṇaḥ saṃlakṣayati sarvaḥ yam lokaḥ suvarṇasya śraddadhāti
na tu kaścid mama śraddhayā gacchati iti
tena vaipuṣpitam
śiśu tve suvarṇena daśanāḥ baddhāḥ
tayā asau pratyabhijñātaḥ

original: 010.026. syādāryaḥ śroṇaḥ koṭikarṇa eva te bhaginījanaḥ saṃjānate(?)/
analyzed: syāt āryaḥ śroṇaḥ koṭikarṇaḥ eva te bhaginī janaḥ saṃjānate
tayā gatvā tasya mātā pitṛbhyām ārocitam
amba tāta koṭikarṇaḥ bhyāgataḥ iti
anekaiḥ teṣām ārocitam
te na kasyacid śraddhayā gacchanti
te kathayanti putri tvam api asmākam utprāsayasi
yāvat asau svayam eva gataḥ
tena dvāra koṣṭhake sthitvā utkāśana śabdaḥ kṛtaḥ
hiraṇya svaraḥ sau mahātmā
tasya śabdena sarvam gṛham āpūritam
sa taiḥ svareṇa pratyabhijñātaḥ
te kaṇṭhe pariṣvajya ruditum ārabdhau
teṣām bāṣpeṇa paṭalāni sphuṭitāni
draṣṭum ārabdhau
sa kathayati amba tāta anujānīdhvam
pravrajiṣyāmi samyak eva śraddhayā

original: 011.001. tau kathayatah--putra āvāṃ tvadīyena śokena rudantāvandhībhūtau/
analyzed: tau kathayataḥ hputraḥ āvām tvadīyena śokena rudantau andhībhūtau
idānīm tvām eva āgamya cakṣuḥ pratilabdham
yāvat āvām jīvāmaḥ
tāvat na pravrajitavyam
yadā kālam kariṣyāmaḥ
tadā pravrajiṣyasi
tena āyuṣmataḥ mahākātyāyanasya antikāt dharmam śrutvā srotāpatti phalam sākṣātkṛtam
mātā pitarau ca śaraṇa gamana śikṣā padeṣu pratiṣṭhāpitau
āgama catuṣṭayam adhītam
sakṛdāgāmi phalam sākṣātkṛtam
mātā pitarau satyeṣu pratiṣṭhāpitau
apareṇa samayena tasya mātā pitarau kālagatau

original: 011.006. sa taṃ dhanajātaṃ dīnānāthakṛpaṇebhyo dattvā daridrānadaridrān kṛtvā yenāyuṣmān mahākātyāyanastenopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
analyzed: sa tam dhana jātam dīna anātha kṛpaṇebhyaḥ dattvā daridrān a daridrān kṛtvā yena āyuṣmān mahākātyāyanaḥ tena upasaṃkrāntaḥ

original: 011.007. upasaṃkramyāyuṣmato mahākātyāyanasya pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte 'sthāt/
analyzed: upasaṃkramya āyuṣmataḥ mahākātyāyanasya pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte sthāt

original: 011.008. ekānte sthitaḥ śroṇaḥ koṭikarṇa āyuṣmantaṃ mahākātyāyanamidamavocat--labheyāhamāryamahākātyāyana svākhyāte dharmavinaye pravrajyām,
analyzed: ekānte sthitaḥ śroṇaḥ koṭikarṇaḥ āyuṣmantam mahākātyāyanam idam avocat labheya aham ārya mahākātyāyana su ākhyāte dharma vinaye pravrajyām
yāvat careya aham bhagavataḥ ntike brahmacaryam
saḥ āyuṣmatā mahākātyāyanena pravrajitaḥ
tena pravrajya mātṛkā adhītā
anāgāmi phalam sākṣātkṛtam
asmāt parāntakeṣu janapadeṣu alpa bhikṣukam
kṛcchreṇa deśa vargaḥ gaṇaḥ paripūryate
sa traimāsīm śrāmaṇeraḥ dhāritaḥ

original: 011.012. dharmatā khalu yathā buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ śrāvakāṇāṃ dvau saṃnipātau bhavataḥ/
analyzed: dharmatā khalu yathā buddhānām bhagavatām śrāvakāṇām dvau saṃnipātau bhavataḥ
yat ca āṣāḍhyām varṣopanāyikāyām yat ca kārtikyām pūrṇamāsyām
tatra ye āṣāḍhyām varṣopanāyikāyām saṃnipatanti

original: te tāṃstānuddeśayogamanasikārānudgṛhya paryavāpya tāsu grāmanagaranigamarāṣṭrarājadhānīṣu varṣāmupagacchanti/
analyzed: te tān tān uddeśa yoga manasikārān udgṛhya paryavāpya tāsu grāma nagara nigama rāṣṭra rājadhānīṣu varṣām upagacchanti
ye kārtikyām paurṇamāsyām saṃnipatanti
te yathā adhigatam ārocayanti

original: uttare ca paripṛcchanti sūtrasya vinayasya mātṛkāyāḥ/
analyzed: uttare ca paripṛcchanti sūtrasya vinayasya mātṛkāyāḥ
evam eva mahāśrāvakāṇām api

original: 011.017. atha ye āyuṣmato mahākātyāyanasya sārdhaṃvihāryantevāsikā bhikṣavas tāṃstānuddeśayogamanasikāraviśeṣān
analyzed: atha ye āyuṣmataḥ mahākātyāyanasya sārdhaṃvihāri antevāsikāḥ bhikṣavaḥ tān tān uddeśa yoga manasikāra viśeṣān

original: gṛhya paryavāpya tāsu tāsu grāmanagaranigamarāṣṭrarājadhānīṣu varṣāmupagatāḥ,
analyzed: gṛhya paryavāpya tāsu tāsu grāma nagara nigama rāṣṭra rājadhānīṣu varṣām upagatāḥ

original: te trayāṇāṃ vārṣikāṇāṃ māsānāmatyayāt kṛtacīvarā niṣṭhitacīvarāḥ samādāya pātracīvaram yenāyuṣmān mahākātyāyanastenopasaṃkrāntāḥ/
analyzed: te trayāṇām vārṣikāṇām māsānām atyayāt kṛta cīvarāḥ niṣṭhita cīvarāḥ samādāya pātra cīvaram yena āyuṣmān mahākātyāyanaḥ tena upasaṃkrāntāḥ

original: 011.021. upasaṃkramyāyuṣmato mahākātyāyanasya pādau śirasā vanditvaikānte niṣaṇṇāḥ/
analyzed: upasaṃkramya āyuṣmataḥ mahākātyāyanasya pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte niṣaṇṇāḥ
ekānte niṣadya yathā adhigatam ārocayanti
uttare ca paripṛcchanti
deśa vargaḥ gaṇaḥ paripūrṇaḥ
sa tena upasampāditaḥ
tena tṛtīya piṭakam adhītam
sarva kleśa prahāṇāt arhat tvam sākṣātkṛtam

original: 011.023. arhan saṃvṛttas traidhātukavītarāgo yāvad abhivādyaśca saṃvṛttaḥ//
analyzed: arhan saṃvṛttaḥ traidhātuka vīta rāgaḥ yāvat abhivādyaḥ ca saṃvṛttaḥ
atha āyuṣmataḥ mahākātyāyanasya sārdhaṃvihāri antevāsikāḥ āyuṣmantam mahākātyāyanam
yāvat tāvat paryupāsya āyuṣmantam mahākātyāyanam idam avocan dṛṣṭaḥ smābhiḥ upādhyāyaḥ paryupāsitaḥ ca
gacchāmaḥ vayam
bhagavantam paryupāsiṣyāmahe
sa ca āha vatsāḥ evam kurudhvam

original: 011.027. draṣṭavyā eva paryupāsitavyā eva hi tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksambuddhāḥ/
analyzed: draṣṭavyāḥ eva paryupāsitavyāḥ eva hi tathāgatāḥ arhantaḥ samyaksambuddhāḥ

original: 011.027. tena khalu punaḥ samayena śroṇaḥ koṭikarṇastasyāmeva parṣadi saṃniṣaṇṇo 'bhūt saṃnipatitaḥ/
analyzed: tena khalu punar samayena śroṇaḥ koṭikarṇaḥ tasyām eva parṣadi saṃniṣaṇṇaḥ bhūt saṃnipatitaḥ

original: 011.029. athāyuṣmāñ śroṇaḥ koṭikarṇa utthāyāsanād ekāṃsamuttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā dakṣiṇaṃ
analyzed: atha āyuṣmān śroṇaḥ koṭikarṇaḥ utthāya āsanāt eka aṃsam uttarāsaṅgam kṛtvā dakṣiṇam

original: jānumaṇḍalaṃ pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya yenāyuṣmān mahākātyāyanastenāñjaliṃ kṛtvā praṇamyāyuṣmantaṃ
analyzed: jānu maṇḍalam pṛthivyām pratiṣṭhāpya yena āyuṣmān mahākātyāyanaḥ tena añjalim kṛtvā praṇamya āyuṣmantam
mahākātyāyanam idam avocat dṛṣṭaḥ mayā upādhyāya anubhāvena sa bhagavān dharmakāyena
no tu rūpa kāyena
gacchāmi upādhyāya
rūpa kāyena api tam bhagavantam drakṣyāmi
sa vatsa kuruṣva

original: 012.001. durlabhadarśanā hi vatsa tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksambuddhās tadyathā audumbarapuṣpam/
analyzed: durlabha darśanāḥ hi vatsa tathāgatāḥ arhantaḥ samyaksambuddhāḥ tat yathā audumbara puṣpam

original: 012.002. asmākaṃ ca vacanena bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vandasva,
analyzed: asmākam ca vacanena bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vandasva
alpa ābādha tām ca yāvat sukha sparśa vihāra tām ca

original: 012.003. pañca praśnāṃśca pṛccha--asmāt parāntakeṣu bhadanta janapadeṣu alpabhikṣukam/
analyzed: pañca praśnān ca pṛccha asmāt parāntakeṣu bhadanta janapadeṣu alpa bhikṣukam
kṛcchreṇa daśa varga gaṇaḥ paripūryate
tatra asmābhiḥ katham pratipattavyam
kharā bhūmī gokaṇṭakāḥ dhānāḥ

original: 012.005. asmākamaparāntakeṣu janapadeṣu idamevamrūpamāstaraṇaṃ pratyāstaraṇaṃ tadyathā avicarma gocarma cchāgacarma/
analyzed: asmākam aparāntakeṣu janapadeṣu idam evamrūpam āstaraṇam pratyāstaraṇam tat yathā avi carma go carma chāga carma

original: 012.006. tadanyeṣu janapadeṣu idamevamrūpamāstaraṇaṃ pratyāstaraṇaṃ tadyathā erako merako jandurako mandurakaḥ/
analyzed: tad anyeṣu janapadeṣu idam evamrūpam āstaraṇam pratyāstaraṇam tat yathā erakaḥ merakaḥ jandurakaḥ mandurakaḥ

original: 012.007. evamevāsmāt parāntakeṣu janapadeṣvidamevamrūpamāstaraṇaṃ pratyāstaraṇaṃ tadyathā avicarma pūrvavat/
analyzed: evam eva asmāt parāntakeṣu janapadeṣu idam evamrūpam āstaraṇam pratyāstaraṇam tat yathā avi carma pūrvavat
udakastabdhikāḥ manuṣyāḥ snāta upavicārāḥ

original: 012.008. bhikṣurbhikṣoścīvarakāni preṣayati itaścyutāni tatrāsamprāptāni kasyaitāni naiḥsargikāni/
analyzed: bhikṣuḥ bhikṣoḥ cīvarakāni preṣayati itas cyutāni tatra a samprāptāni kasya etāni naiḥsargikāni

original: 012.009. adhivāsayati āyuṣmāñchroṇaḥ koṭikarṇa āyuṣmato mahākātyāyanasya tūṣṇībhāvena/
analyzed: adhivāsayati āyuṣmān śroṇaḥ koṭikarṇaḥ āyuṣmataḥ mahākātyāyanasya tūṣṇībhāvena

original: 012.010. athāyuṣmāñchroṇaḥ koṭikarṇas tasyā eva rātreratyayāt pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaramādāya vāsavagrāmakaṃ piṇḍāya prāvikṣat/
analyzed: atha āyuṣmān śroṇaḥ koṭikarṇaḥ tasyāḥ eva rātreḥ atyayāt pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātra cīvaram ādāya vāsavagrāmakam piṇḍāya prāvikṣat
yāvat anupūrveṇa śrāvastīm anuprāptaḥ

original: 012.012. athāyuṣmāñchroṇaḥ koṭikarṇaḥ pātracīvaraṃ pratisāmayya pādau prakṣālya yena bhagavāṃstenopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
analyzed: atha āyuṣmān śroṇaḥ koṭikarṇaḥ pātra cīvaram pratisāmayya pādau prakṣālya yena bhagavān tena upasaṃkrāntaḥ
upasaṃkramya ekānte niṣaṇṇaḥ

original: 012.014. tatra bhagavānāyuṣmantamānandamāmantrayate sma--gaccha ānanda tathāgatasya śroṇasya ca koṭikarṇasyaikavihāre mañcaṃ prajñāpaya/
analyzed: tatra bhagavān āyuṣmantam ānandam āmantrayate sma gaccha ānanda tathāgatasya śroṇasya ca koṭikarṇasya eka vihāre mañcam prajñāpaya

original: 012.015. evaṃ bhadanteti āyuṣmānānandastathāgatasya śroṇasya ca koṭikarṇasya yāvat prajñāpya yena bhagavāṃstenopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
analyzed: evam bhadanta iti āyuṣmān ānandaḥ tathāgatasya śroṇasya ca koṭikarṇasya yāvat prajñāpya yena bhagavān tena upasaṃkrāntaḥ

original: 012.016. upasaṃkramya bhagavantamidamavocat--prajñapto bhadanta tathāgatasya śroṇasya koṭikarṇasya vihārastenopasaṃkrāntaḥ,
analyzed: upasaṃkramya bhagavantam idam avocat prajñaptaḥ bhadanta tathāgatasya śroṇasya koṭikarṇasya vihāraḥ tena upasaṃkrāntaḥ
yāvadvihāram praviśya niṣaṇṇaḥ
yāvat paśyati smṛtim pratimukham upasthāpya

original: 012.019. athāyuṣmānapi śroṇaḥ koṭikarṇo bahirvihārasya pādau prakṣālya vihāraṃ praviśya niṣaṇṇaḥ paryaṅkamābhujya yāvat pratimukhaṃ smṛtimupasthāpya/
analyzed: atha āyuṣmān api śroṇaḥ koṭikarṇaḥ bahis vihārasya pādau prakṣālya vihāram praviśya niṣaṇṇaḥ paryaṅkam ābhujya yāvat pratimukham smṛtim upasthāpya

original: 012.021. tāṃ khalu rātriṃ bhagavān āyuṣmāṃśca śroṇaḥ koṭikarṇa āryeṇa tūṣṇībhāvenādhivāsitavān/
analyzed: tām khalu rātrim bhagavān āyuṣmān ca śroṇaḥ koṭikarṇaḥ āryeṇa tūṣṇībhāvena adhivāsitavān

original: 012.022. atha bhagavān rātryāḥ pratyūṣasamaye āyuṣmantaṃ śroṇaṃ koṭikarṇamāmantrayate sma--pratibhātu te śroṇa dharmo yo mayā svayamabhijñāyābhisambudhyākhyātaḥ/
analyzed: atha bhagavān rātryāḥ pratyūṣa samaye āyuṣmantam śroṇam koṭikarṇam āmantrayate sma pratibhātu te śroṇa dharmaḥ yaḥ mayā svayam abhijñāya abhisambudhya ākhyātaḥ

original: 012.023. athāyuṣmāñ śroṇo bhagavatā kṛtāvakāśah asmāt parāntikayā guptikayā udānāt
analyzed: atha āyuṣmān śroṇaḥ bhagavatā kṛta avakāśaḥ asmāt parāntikayā guptikayā udānāt

original: pārāyaṇāt satyadṛṣṭaḥ śailagāthā munigāthā arthavargīyāṇi ca sūtrāṇi vistareṇa svareṇa svādhyāyaṃ karoti /
analyzed: pārāyaṇāt satya dṛṣṭaḥ śailagāthāḥ munigāthāḥ arthavargīyāṇi ca sūtrāṇi vistareṇa svareṇa svādhyāyam karoti

original: 012.025. atha bhagavāñchroṇasya koṭikarṇasya kathāparyavasānaṃ viditvā āyuṣmantaṃ śroṇaṃ koṭikarṇamidamavocat--sādhu sādhu śroṇa,
analyzed: atha bhagavān śroṇasya koṭikarṇasya kathā paryavasānam viditvā āyuṣmantam śroṇam koṭikarṇam idam avocat sādhu sādhu śroṇa
madhuraḥ te dharmaḥ bhāṣitaḥ praṇītaḥ ca
yaḥ mayā svayam abhijñāya abhisambudhya ākhyātaḥ

original: 012.028. athāyuṣmataḥ śroṇasya koṭikarṇasyaitadabhavat--ayaṃ me kālo bhagavata upādhyāyasya
analyzed: atha āyuṣmataḥ śroṇasya koṭikarṇasya etat abhavat ayam me kālaḥ bhagavataḥ upādhyāyasya
vacasā ārocayitum iti viditvā utthāya āsanāt yāvat bhagavantam praṇamya idam avocat asmāt
parāntakeṣu janapadeṣu vāsavagrāmake bhadanta mahākātyāyanaḥ prativasati
yaḥ me upādhyāyaḥ

original: 012.031. sa bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vandate alpābādhatāṃ ca pṛcchati yāvat sparśavihāratāṃ ca/
analyzed: sa bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vandate alpa ābādha tām ca pṛcchati yāvat sparśavihāra tām ca
pañca ca praśnān pṛcchati vistareṇa uccārayitavyāni

original: 012.032. atha bhagavāñcchroṇaṃ koṭikarṇamidamavocat<13>--akālaṃ te śroṇa praśnavyākaraṇāya/
analyzed: atha bhagavān śroṇam te śroṇa praśna vyākaraṇāya

original: 013.001. saṃghamelakas tatra kālo bhaviṣyati praśnasya vyākaraṇāya/
analyzed: saṃgha melakaḥ tatra kālaḥ bhaviṣyati praśnasya vyākaraṇāya

original: 013.002. atha bhagavān kālyamevotthāya purastādbhikṣusaṃghasya prajñapta evāsane niṣaṇṇaḥ/
analyzed: atha bhagavān kālyam eva utthāya purastāt bhikṣu saṃghasya prajñapte eva āsane niṣaṇṇaḥ

original: 016.003. pūrṇo dārako 'ṣṭābhyo dhātrībhyo dvābhyāmaṃsadhātībhyāṃ datto vistareṇa yāvadāśu vardhate hradasthamiva paṅkajam/

original: tadā lipyāmupanyastaḥ saṃkhyāyāṃ gaṇanāyāṃ mudrāyāmuddhāre nyāse nikṣepe vastuparīkṣāyāṃ ratnaparīkṣāyāṃ hastiparīkṣāyāmaśvaparīkṣāyāṃ kumāraparīkṣāyāṃ
analyzed: tadā lipyām upanyastaḥ saṃkhyāyām gaṇanāyām mudrāyām uddhāre nyāse nikṣepe vastu parīkṣāyām ratna parīkṣāyām hasti parīkṣāyām aśva parīkṣāyām kumāra parīkṣāyām

original: 016.006. aṣṭāsu parīkṣāsūddhaṭako vācakaḥ paṇḍitaḥ paṭupracāraḥ saṃvṛttaḥ/

original: 016.007. tato bhavena gṛhapatinā bhavilādīnāṃ putrāṇām yathānupūrvyā niveśāḥ kṛtāḥ/
analyzed: tatas bhavena gṛhapatinā bhavila ādīnām putrāṇām yathānupūrvyā niveśāḥ kṛtāḥ

analyzed: te patnībhiḥ sārdham atīva saṃraktāḥ nivṛttāḥ maṇḍana paramāḥ vyavasthitāḥ

original: 016.009. tato bhavo gṛhapatiḥ kare kapolaṃ dattvā cintāparo vyavasthitaḥ/

original: 016.011. te yūyaṃ nirastavyāpārāḥ patnīṣvatyarthaṃ saṃraktā maṇḍanaparamā vyavasthitāḥ/

original: 016.013. sa tāmavatāryadārukarṇikāṃ pinahya pratijñāmārūḍhah--na tāvat ratnakarṇikāṃ pinahyāmi yāvat suvarṇalakṣaḥ samupārjita iti/
analyzed: sa tām avatārya dāru karṇikām pinahya tāvat ratna karṇikām pinahyāmi yāvat suvarṇa lakṣaḥ samupārjitaḥ iti

original: 016.015. teṣām yāstāḥ saṃjñā bhavilo bhavatrāto bhavanandīti tā antarhitāḥ/
analyzed: teṣām yāḥ tāḥ saṃjñā bhavilaḥ bhavatrātaḥ bhavanandī iti tāḥ antarhitāḥ

te paṇyam ādāya mahā samudram saṃprasthitāḥ

aham api mahā samudram gacchāmi iti

atra eva tiṣṭha
āvāryām vyāpāram kuru

original: 016.020. pūrṇenāpi tatraiva dharmeṇa nyāyena vyavahāritāḥ sātirekāḥ suvarṇalakṣāḥ samudānītāaḥ/
analyzed: pūrṇena api tatra eva dharmeṇa nyāyena vyavahāritāḥ sa atirekāḥ suvarṇa lakṣāḥ samudānītāḥ

analyzed: bhavaḥ gṛhapatiḥ prīti saumanasya jātaḥ saṃlakṣayati puṇya maheśākhyaḥ yam sattvaḥ yena iha eva sthitena iyat suvarṇam samupārjitam iti
yāvat apareṇa samayena bhavaḥ gṛhapatiḥ glānaḥ saṃvṛttaḥ

analyzed: taiḥ nīla pīta lohita avadātaiḥ vastraiḥ śibikām alaṃkṛtya mahatā saṃskāreṇa śmaśānam nītvā dhmāpitaḥ

original: 017.009. tataste śokavinodanaṃ kṛtvā kathayanti--yadā asmākaṃ pitā jīvati,
analyzed: tatas te śoka vinodanam kṛtvā kathayanti yadā asmākam pitā jīvati

yat idānīm nirasta vyāpārāḥ tiṣṭhāmaḥ

original: 017.011. yannu vayaṃ paṇyamādāya deśāntaraṃ gacchāma iti/
analyzed: yat nu vayam paṇyam ādāya deśāntaram gacchāmaḥ iti
pūrṇaḥ kathayati yadi evam aham api gacchāmi iti
te kathayanti tvam atra eva āvāryām vyāpāram kuru
vayam eva gacchāmaḥ iti
te paṇyam ādāya deśa antaram gatāḥ
pūrṇaḥ nyasta sarva kāryaḥ tatra eva avasthitaḥ
dharmatā khalu īśvara gṛheṣu divasa parivyayaḥ dīyate
tāḥ teṣām patnyaḥ dārikāḥ parivyaya nimittam preṣayanti
pūrṇaḥ pi dhanibhiḥ śreṣṭhibhiḥ sārthavāhaiḥ anyaiḥ ca ājīvibhiḥ parivṛtaḥ vatiṣṭhate
tāḥ tu avakāśam na labhante
yadā te upasthāya prakrāntāḥ bhavanti
tadā tāsām divasa parivyayam dadāti
tāḥ dārikāḥ cira cirāt āgacchanti iti upālabhyante
tāḥ evam artham vistareṇa ārocayanti
tāḥ kathayanti evam hi teṣām bhavati
yeṣām dāsī putrāḥ kuleṣu aiśvacaryam vaśe vartayanti iti

original: 017.019. bhavilapatnyā dārikā abhihitā--tvayā kālaṃ jñātvā gantavyamiti/

śīghram labhate
anyāḥ cirayanti

original: 017.023. tāḥ saṃjātāmarṣāḥ kathayanti--evaṃ hi teṣāṃ bhavati yeṣāṃ dāsīputrāḥ kulesvaiścaryaṃ vaśe vartayantīti/
analyzed: tāḥ saṃjāta amarṣāḥ kathayanti evam hi teṣām bhavati yeṣām dāsī putrāḥ vaśe vartayanti iti

original: 017.024. yāvadapareṇa samayena bhavilo bhavatrāto bhavanandī ca sahitāḥ samagrāḥ saṃmodamānā mahāsamudrāt saṃsiddhayānapātrā āgatāḥ/
analyzed: yāvat apareṇa samayena bhavilaḥ bhavatrātaḥ bhavanandī ca sahitāḥ samagrāḥ saṃmodamānāḥ mahā samudrāt saṃsiddha yānapātrāḥ āgatāḥ

original: 017.027. te anye 'pi svāmibhyāṃ pṛṣṭe kathayatah--evaṃ hi teṣāṃ bhavati,

tad samanantaram bhavilasya putraḥ gataḥ
sa pūrṇena kāśika vastra yugena ācchāditaḥ

original: 017.030. anyābhyāṃ dṛṣṭvā svaputrāḥ preṣitā yāvat kāśikavastrāvārī ghaṭṭitā,
analyzed: anyābhyām dṛṣṭvā sva putrāḥ preṣitāḥ yāvat kāśika vastra āvārī ghaṭṭitā

original: 017.032. te dṛṣṭvā svāminoḥ kathayatah--dṛṣṭam yuvābhyāmapareṣāṃ kāśikavastrāṇi<18> dīyante,
analyzed: te dṛṣṭvā svāminoḥ kathayataḥ h dṛṣṭam yuvābhyām apareṣām dīyante

te daiva yogāt guḍa āvāryām udghāṭitāyām gatāḥ

original: 018.004. tābhistaṃ dṛṣṭvā svāminau tathā tathā bhagnau yathā gṛhavibhāgaṃ kartumārabdhau/

ekasya gṛha gatam kṣetra gatam ca

original: 018.011. tāvevaṃ saṃjalpaṃ kṛtvā bhavilasya sakāśaṃ gatau/

bhrātar vinaṣṭāḥ vayam bhājayāmaḥ gṛham iti

gṛha bhedikāḥ striyaḥ bhavanti iti

bhājayāma iti
sa kathayati yat evam
āhūyantām kulāni iti
tau kathayataḥ hpūrvam eva asmābhiḥ bhājitam
ekasya gṛha gatam kṣetra gatam ca

original: 018.029. anyatamaśca puruṣaḥ samudravelāpreritānāṃ kāṣṭhānāṃ bhāramādāya śītenābhidruto vepamāna āgacchati/
analyzed: anyatamaḥ ca puruṣaḥ samudra velā preritānām kāṣṭhānām bhāram ādāya śītena abhidrutaḥ vepamānaḥ āgacchati

analyzed: bhuktavantam viditvā dhauta hastam apanīta pātram nīcataram āsanam gṛhītvā bhagavataḥ
purastāt niṣaṇṇaḥ dharma śravaṇāya
tatas bhagavatā abhihita hmahā rāja
kasya nāṃnā dakṣiṇām ādiśāmi

original: kiṃ tava, āhosvidyena tavāntikāt prabhūtataraṃ puṇyaṃ prasūtamiti?
analyzed: kim tava āhosvit yena tava antikāt prabhūtataram puṇyam prasūtam iti
rājā saṃlakṣayati imām bhagavān piṇḍapātam paribhuṅkte

original: 054.013. ko 'nyo mamāntikāt prabhūtataraṃ puṇyaṃ prasaviṣyatīti viditvā kathayati--bhagavan yena mamāntikāt prabhūtataraṃ puṇyaṃ prasūtaṃ tasya  #
analyzed: kaḥ nyaḥ mama antikāt prabhūtataram puṇyam prasaviṣyati iti viditvā kathayati bhagavan yena mama antikāt prabhūtataram puṇyam prasūtam tasya
bhagavān dakṣiṇām ādiśatu iti

original: 054.014. tato bhagavatā kroḍamallakasya nāṃnā dakṣiṇā ādiṣṭā/
analyzed: tatas bhagavatā kroḍamallakasya nāṃnā dakṣiṇā ādiṣṭā
evam yāvat ṣaṣ divasān

original: 054.015. tato 'nyadivase rājā kare kapolaṃ dattvā cintāparo vyavasthitah--mama bhagavān piṇḍapātaṃ paribhuṅkte,
analyzed: tatas nya divase rājā kare kapolam dattvā cintā paraḥ bhagavān piṇḍapātam paribhuṅkte
kroḍamallakasya dakṣiṇām ādiśati iti
saḥ mātyaiḥ dṛṣṭaḥ

original: 054.017. te kathayanti--kimarthaṃ kare kapolaṃ dattvā cintāparo vyavasthita iti?
analyzed: te kathayanti kimartham kare kapolam dattvā cintā paraḥ vyavasthitaḥ iti
rājā kathayati bhavantaḥ
katham na cintā paraḥ tiṣṭhāmi

original: yatredānīṃ sa bhagavān mama piṇḍapātaṃ paribhuṅkte,
analyzed: yatra idānīm sa bhagavān mama piṇḍapātam paribhuṅkte
kroḍamallakasya dakṣiṇā mām ādiśati iti
tatra ekaḥ vṛddhaḥ mātyaḥ kathayati alpa utsukaḥ bhavatu

original: 054.020. vayaṃ tathā kariṣyāmo yathā śvo bhagavān devasyaiva nāṃnā dakṣiṇāmādiśatīti/
analyzed: vayam tathā kariṣyāmaḥ yathā śvas bhagavān devasya eva nāṃnā dakṣiṇām ādiśati iti

original: 054.021. taiḥ pauruṣeyāṇāmājñā dattā yataḥ śvo bhavadbhiḥ praṇīta āhāraḥ sajjīkartavyaḥ prabhūtaścaiva samudānayitavyo yathopārdhaṃ bhikṣūṇāṃ  #
analyzed: taiḥ pauruṣeyāṇām ājñā dattā yatas śvas bhavadbhiḥ praṇītaḥ āhāraḥ sajjīkartavyaḥ prabhūtaḥ ca eva samudānayitavyaḥ yathā upārdham bhikṣūṇām
pātre patati upārdham bhūmau iti

original: 054.023. amātyairaparasmin divase prabhūta āhāraḥ sajjīkṛtaḥ praṇītaśca/
analyzed: amātyaiḥ aparasmin divase prabhūtaḥ āhāraḥ sajjīkṛtaḥ praṇītaḥ ca
tatas sukha upaniṣaṇṇam buddha pramukham bhikṣu saṃgham pariveṣitum ārabdhaḥ
upārdham bhikṣūṇām pātre patati
upārdham bhūmau

original: 054.025. tataḥ kroḍamallakāḥ pradhāvitāh--bhūmau nipatitaṃ gṛhṇīma iti/
analyzed: tatas kroḍamallakāḥ pradhāvitāḥ ah bhūmau nipatitam gṛhṇīmaḥ iti
te pariveṣakaiḥ nivāritāḥ
tatas kroḍamallakaḥ kathayati yat yasya rājñaḥ prabhūtam annam
svāpateyam asti
santi anye asmadvidhāḥ duḥkhitakāḥ ākāṅkṣante
kimartham na dīyate
kim anena a paribhogam choritena iti

original: 054.027. tasya kroḍamallakasya cittavikṣepo jātah--na śakyaṃ tena tathā cittaṃ prasādayitum yathā pūrvam/
analyzed: tasya kroḍamallakasya citta vikṣepaḥ jātahna śakyam tena tathā cittam prasādayitum yathā pūrvam

original: 054.028. tato rājā buddhapramukhaṃ bhikṣuasaṃghaṃ bhojayitvā na mama nāṃnā dakṣiṇāmādiśatīti viditvā dakṣiṇāmaśrutvaiva praviṣṭaḥ/
analyzed: tatas rājā buddha pramukham bhikṣu a saṃgham bhojayitvā na mama dakṣiṇām ādiśati iti viditvā dakṣiṇām a śrutvā eva praviṣṭaḥ

original: 054.030. tato bhagavatā rājñaḥ prasenajitaḥ kauśalasya nāṃnā dakṣiṇā ādiṣṭā--
analyzed: tatas bhagavatā rājñaḥ prasenajitaḥ kauśalasya nāṃnā dakṣiṇā ādiṣṭā

original: 054.032. paśyasi(?) phalaṃ hi rūṣkikāyā alavaṇikāyāḥ kulmāṣapiṇḍikāyāḥ//5//
analyzed: paśyasi phalam hi rūṣkikāyāḥ a lavaṇikāyāḥ

original: 055.001. <55>athāyuṣmānānando bhagavantamidamavocat--bahuśo bahuśo bhadanta bhagavatā rājñaḥ prasenajitaḥ kauśalasya niveśane bhuktvā nāṃnā
analyzed: bhagavantam idam avocat bahuśas bahuśas bhadanta bhagavatā rājñaḥ prasenajitaḥ kauśalasya niveśane bhuktvā
na abhijānāmi kadācid evamrūpām dakṣiṇām ādiṣṭa pūrvām

original: 055.003. bhagavānāha--icchasi tvamānanda rājñaḥ prasenajitaḥ kauśalasyālavaṇikāṃ kulmāṣapiṇḍakāmārabhya karmaplotiṃ śrotum?
analyzed: bhagavān āha ecchasi tvam ānanda rājñaḥ prasenajitaḥ kauśalasya a lavaṇikām kulmāṣa piṇḍakām ārabhya karma plotim śrotum
etasya bhagavan kālaḥ
etasya sugata samayaḥ

original: 055.005. ayaṃ bhagavān rājñaḥ prasenajitaḥ kauśalasyālavaṇikāṃ kulmāṣapiṇḍakāmārabhya karmaplotiṃ varṇayet,
analyzed: ayam bhagavān rājñaḥ prasenajitaḥ kauśalasya a lavaṇikām kulmāṣa piṇḍakām ārabhya karma plotim varṇayet
bhagavataḥ śrutvā bhikṣavaḥ dhārayiṣyanti iti
tatra bhagavān bhikṣūn āmantrayate sma
bhūta pūrvam bhikṣavaḥ nyatamasmin karpaṭake gṛhapatiḥ prativasati
tena sadṛśāt kulāt kalatram ānītam

original: 055.008. sa tayā sārdhaṃ krīḍati ramate paricārayati/
analyzed: sa tayā sārdham krīḍati ramate paricārayati

original: 055.008. tasya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayataḥ putro jātaḥ/
analyzed: tasya krīḍataḥ ramamāṇasya paricārayataḥ putraḥ jātaḥ
saḥ unnītaḥ vardhitaḥ paṭuḥ saṃvṛttaḥ
yāvat asau gṛhapatiḥ patnīm āmantrayate bhadra
jātaḥ smākam ṛṇa hārakaḥ dhana hārakaḥ ca
gacchāmi paṇyam ādāya deśa antaram iti
sā kathayati āryaputra
etat kuruṣva iti
sa paṇyam ādāya deśa antaram gataḥ
tatra eva anayena vyasanam āpannaḥ
alpa paricchadaḥ sau gṛhapatiḥ
tasya gṛhapateḥ dhana jātam parikṣīṇam
saḥ sya putraḥ duḥkhitaḥ jātaḥ
tasya gṛhapateḥ vayasyakaḥ

original: 055.013. tena tasya dārakasya mātā abhihitā--ayaṃ tava putraḥ kṣetraṃ rakṣatu,
analyzed: tena tasya dārakasya mātā abhihitā ayam tava putraḥ kṣetram rakṣatu
aham asya sukham bhuktena yogodvahanam kariṣyāmi
evam bhavatu
sa tasya kṣetram rakṣitum ārabdhaḥ

original: 055.015. sa tasya sukhaṃ bhaktakena yogodvahanaṃ kartumārabdhaḥ/
analyzed: sa tasya sukham bhaktakena yogodvahanam kartum ārabdhaḥ
yāvat apareṇa samayena parvaṇī pratyupasthitā

original: 055.016. tasya dārakasya mātā saṃlakṣayati--adya gṛhapatipatnī suhṛtsambandhibāndhavāḥ saha śramaṇabrāhmaṇabhojanena vyagrā bhaviṣyati/
analyzed: tasya dārakasya mātā saṃlakṣayati adya gṛhapati patnī suhṛd sambandhi bāndhavāḥ saha śramaṇa brāhmaṇa bhojanena vyagrā bhaviṣyati

original: 055.017. gacchāmi sānukālaṃ tasya dārakasya bhaktaṃ nayāmi iti/
analyzed: gacchāmi sa anukālam tasya dārakasya bhaktam nayāmi iti

original: 055.018. sā sānukālaṃ gatvā gṛhapatipatnyā etamarthaṃ niveśayati/
analyzed: sā sa anukālam gatvā gṛhapati patnyai etam artham niveśayati

original: 055.018. sā ruṣitā kathayati--na tāvacchramaṇabrāhmaṇebhyo dadāmi jñātīnāṃ vā,
analyzed: sā ruṣitā kathayati na tāvat śramaṇa brāhmaṇebhyaḥ dadāmi jñātīnām vā
tāvat preṣya manuṣyāya dadāmi
adya tāvat tiṣṭhatu
śvas dviguṇam dāsyāmi iti

original: 055.020. tatastasya dārakasya mātā saṃlakṣayati--mā me putro bubhukṣitakaḥ sthāsyatīti/
analyzed: tatas tasya dārakasya mātā saṃlakṣayati mā me putraḥ bubhukṣitakaḥ sthāsyati iti
tayā ātmanaḥ rthe lavaṇikā kulmāṣa piṇḍakā saṃpāditā
sā tām ādāya gatā
tena dārakeṇa dūratas eva dṛṣṭā
sa kathayati amba
asti kiṃcid mṛṣṭam mṛṣṭam
sā kathayati putra
yat eva prātidaivasikam tat api adya na asti
mayā ātmanaḥ rthe lavaṇikā kulmāṣa piṇḍikā sādhitā
tām aham gṛhītvā āgatā
etām paribhuṅkṣva iti
sa kathayati sthāpayitvā gacchasva iti
sā sthāpayitvā prakrāntā

original: 055.026. asati buddhānāmutpāde pratyekabuddhā loke utpadyante hīnadīnānukampakāḥ prantaśayanāsanabhaktā ekadakṣiṇīyā lokasya/
analyzed: asati buddhānām utpāde pratyekabuddhāḥ loke utpadyante hīna dīna anukampakāḥ eka dakṣiṇīyāḥ lokasya
yāvat anyatamaḥ pratyekabuddhaḥ tad pradeśam anuprāptaḥ
sa tena dṛṣṭaḥ kāya prāsādikaḥ citra prāsādikaḥ ca śānta īryāpatha vartī

original: 055.028. sa saṃlakṣayati--nūnaṃ mayā evaṃvidhe sadbhūte dakṣiṇīye kārā na kṛtā,
analyzed: sa saṃlakṣayati nūnam mayā evaṃvidhe sadbhūte dakṣiṇīye kārā na kṛtā
yena me īdṛśī samavasthā
yadi ayam mama antikāt a lavaṇikām kulmāṣa piṇḍikām pratigṛhṇīyāt
aham asmai dadyām iti

original: 055.030. tato 'sau pratyekabuddhastasya daridrapuruṣasya cetasā cittamājñāya pātraṃ prasāritavān--bhadramukha,
analyzed: tatas sau pratyekabuddhaḥ tasya daridra puruṣasya cetasā cittam ājñāya pātram prasāritavān bhadra mukha
saced te parityaktam
dīyatām asmin pātre iti

analyzed: tatas tena tīvreṇa prasādena sā a lavaṇikā kulmāṣa piṇḍakā tasmai pratyekabuddhāya pratipāditā

original: eṣa evāsau rājā prasenajit kauśalastena kālena tena samayena/
analyzed: eṣaḥ eva asau rājā prasenajit kauśalaḥ tena kālena tena samayena
yat anena pratyekabuddhāya a lavaṇikā kulmāṣa piṇḍakā pratipāditā

original: tena karmaṇā ṣaṭkṛtvo deveṣu trāyastriṃśeṣu rājyaiśvaryādhipatyaṃ kāritavān,
analyzed: tena karmaṇā ṣaṣ kṛtvas deveṣu trāyastriṃśeṣu rājya aiśvarya ādhipatyam kāritavān

analyzed: tena eva ca karmaṇā avaśeṣeṇa etarhi rājā kṣatriyaḥ mūrdhnā abhiṣiktaḥ saṃvṛttaḥ

hasti aśva ratha patti yāyinaḥ bhuñjānasya puram

original: 056.007. paśyasi phalaṃ hi rūkṣikāyā alavaṇikāyā kulmāṣapiṇḍakāyāḥ// iti/
analyzed: paśyasi phalam hi rūkṣikāyāḥ a lavaṇikāyāḥ kulmāṣa piṇḍakāyāḥ iti

original: 056.008. sāmantakena śabdo visṛtah--bhagavatā rājñaḥ prasenajito 'lavaṇikāṃ kulmāṣapiṇḍakāmārabhya karmaplotirvyākṛtā iti/

rājñā api prasenajitā śrutam

analyzed: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte niṣaṇṇaḥ

original: 056.010. ekāntaniṣaṇṇaṃ rājānaṃ prasenajitaṃ kauśalaṃ bhagavān dharmyayā kathayā saṃdaraśyati samādāpayati samuttejayati saṃpraharṣayati/
analyzed: ekānta niṣaṇṇam rājānam prasenajitam kauśalam bhagavān dharmyayā kathayā saṃdaraśyati samādāpayati samuttejayati saṃpraharṣayati

original: 056.012. anekaparyāyeṇa dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśya samādāpya samuttejya saṃpraharṣya tūṣṇīm/
analyzed: aneka paryāyeṇa dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśya samādāpya samuttejya saṃpraharṣya tūṣṇīm

original: 056.012. atha rājā prasenajit kauśala utthāyāsanādekāṃsamutterāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā bhagavantamidamavocat--adhivāsayatu
analyzed: atha rājā prasenajit kauśalaḥ utthāya āsanāt eka aṃsam utteḥ āsaṅgam kṛtvā bhagavantam idam avocat adhivāsayatu
me bhagavān traimāsīm cīvara piṇḍapāta śayana āsana glāna pratyaya bhaiṣajya pariṣkāraiḥ

original: 056.015. adhivāsayati bhagavān rājñaḥ prasenajitaḥ kauśalasya tūṣṇībhāvena/
analyzed: adhivāsayati bhagavān rājñaḥ prasenajitaḥ kauśalasya tūṣṇībhāvena

original: 056.015. tato rājñā prasenajitā kauśalena buddhamukhāya bhikṣusaṃghāya traimāsyaṃ śatarasaṃ bhojanaṃ dattam/

ekaikaḥ ca bhikṣuḥ śata sahasreṇa vastreṇa ācchāditaḥ

original: 056.017. tailasya ca kumbhakoṭiṃ samudānīya dīpamālā abhyudyato dātum/

original: 056.018. tatra bhakte pūjāyāṃ ca mahān kolāhalo jātaḥ/

kim eṣaḥ ucca śabdaḥ mahā śabdaḥ iti

original: 056.020. aparaiḥ samākhyātam--rājñā prasenajitā kauśalena buddhapramukho bhikṣuasṃghastraimāsyaṃ bhojitaḥ,
analyzed: aparaiḥ samākhyātam rājñā prasenajitā kauśalena buddha pramukhaḥ bhikṣu a sṃghaḥ traimāsyam bhojitaḥ

original: tailasya kumbhakoṭiṃ ca samudānīya dīpamālā abhyudyato dātumiti/
analyzed: tailasya kumbha koṭim ca samudānīya dīpa mālāḥ abhyudyataḥ dātum iti

original: 056.022. tatastasyā nagarāvalambikāyā etadabhavat--ayaṃ tāvadrājā prasenajit kauśalaḥ puṇyairatṛpto 'dyāpi dānāni dadāti,
analyzed: tatas tasyāḥ nagara avalambikāyāḥ etat abhavat ayam tāvat rājā prasenajit kauśalaḥ puṇyaiḥ atṛptaḥ dyā api dānāni dadāti

original: 056.024. yannvahamapi kutaścit samudānīya bhagavataḥ pradīpaṃ dadyāmiti/

original: 056.025. pādayor nipatya praṇidhānaṃ kṛtam--anenāhaṃ kuśalamūlena yathāyaṃ bhagavāñ śākyamunirvarṣaśatāyuṣi prajāyāṃ śākyamunir nāma śāstā
analyzed: pādayoḥ nipatya praṇidhānam kṛtam anena aham kuśala mūlena yathā ayam bhagavām śākyamuniḥ varṣa śata āyuṣi prajāyām śākyamuniḥ nāma śāstā

original: evamahamapi varṣaśatāyuṣi prajāyāṃ śākyamunireva śāstā bhaveyam/

śuddhodanaḥ pitā
mātā mahāmāyā
rāhulabhadraḥ kumāraḥ putraḥ
yathā ayam bhagavān dhātu vibhāgam kṛtvā parinirvāsyati
evam aham api dhātu vibhāgam kṛtvā parinirvāpayeyam iti
yāvat sarve te dīpāḥ nairvāṇāḥ
sa tayā prajvalitaḥ pradīpaḥ prajvalati eva

original: 056.031. dharmatā khalu buddhānāṃ bhagavatām--na tāvadupasthāyakāḥ pratisamlīyante na yāvadbuddhā bhagavantaḥ pratisamlīnā iti/

original: tāḥ kathayanti -- yatkhalu mahāsārthavāha jānīyāh -- idaṃ maṇiratnaṃ tadeva poṣadhoṣito
analyzed: tāḥ kathayanti yat khalu mahā sārthavāha jānīyāh idam maṇi ratnam tat eva

original: dhvajāgre baddhvā āropya kṛtsne jambudvīpe ghaṇṭāvaghoṣaṇaṃ karaṇīyam -- śṛṇvantu
analyzed: dhvaja agre baddhvā āropya kṛtsne jambudvīpe ghaṇṭā avaghoṣaṇam karaṇīyam śṛṇvantu
bhavantaḥ jambudvīpa nivāsinaḥ stī manuṣyāḥ

original: yuṣmākam yo yenarthī upakaraṇaviśeṣeṇa hiraṇyena vā subarṇena vā ratnena vā annena
analyzed: yuṣmākam yaḥ yena arthī upakaraṇa viśeṣeṇa hiraṇyena vā subarṇena vā ratnena vā annena

original: vā pānena vā vastreṇa vā bhojanena vā alaṃkāraviśeṣeṇa vā dvipadena vā catuṣpadena
analyzed: vā pānena vā vastreṇa vā bhojanena vā alaṃkāra viśeṣeṇa vā dvipadena vā catuṣpadena

original: vā vāhanena vā yānena vā dhanena vā dhānyena vā sa cittamutpādayatu,
analyzed: vā vāhanena vā yānena vā dhanena vā dhānyena vā sa cittam utpādayatu
vacanam ca niścārayatu
saha citta utpādāt vā agniḥ cāraṇena ca yathā īpsitāḥ ca upakaraṇa viśeṣa asya ratnasya anubhāvāt ākāśāt avatariṣyanti

original: 074.008. ayaṃ tu prativiśeṣah -- yāni cāsya lokasya bhavanti mahābhayāni,
analyzed: ayam tu yāni ca asya lokasya bhavanti mahā bhayāni

original: tadyathā -- rājato vā cairato vā agnito vā udako vā manuṣyato vā amiṣyato vā siṃhato vā vyāghrato vā dvīpatarakṣuto vā yakṣyarākṣasapretapiśācakumbhāṇḍapūtanakaṭapūtanato
analyzed: tat yathā rājataḥ vā cairataḥ vā agnitaḥ vā udakaḥ vā manuṣyataḥ vā amiṣyataḥ vā siṃhataḥ vā vyāghrataḥ vā dvīpa tarakṣutaḥ vā yakṣya rākṣasa preta piśāca kumbhāṇḍapūtana kaṭapūtanataḥ
ītayā upadravaḥ vā
upasargaḥ vā
anāvṛṣṭiḥ vā durbhikṣa bhayāni vā

original: asminnucchrite ratnaviśeṣe ima īrayopadravā na bhaviṣyanti/
analyzed: asmin ucchrite ratna viśeṣe ime īrayā upadravāḥ na bhaviṣyanti

original: 074.012. iryuktvā tāḥ kinnarakanyāḥ supriyaṃ mahāsārthavāhaṃ saṃrādhayāmāsuh --- sādhu sādhu mahāsārthavāha,
analyzed: tāḥ kinnara kanyāḥ supriyam mahā sārthavāham saṃrādhayāmāsuḥ sādhu sādhu mahā sārthavāha
nistīrṇāni mahā samudra parvata nadī kāntārāṇi

saphalīkṛtā te śraddhā
te gopitāni indriyāṇi
sādhitā badaradvīpa mahā pattana yātrā
adhigatam te sarva jana manoratha sampādakam jambudvīpa pradhānam ratna viśeṣam
api tu yena tvam pathena āgataḥ
amanuṣyāḥ tāvat
pralayam gaccheyuḥ prāk eva manuṣyāḥ

original: 074.016. anyadeva vayaṃ sanmārgaṃ vyapadekṣyāmaḥ kṣipraṃ vārāṇasīgamanāya/
analyzed: anyat eva vayam sat mārgam vyapadekṣyāmaḥ kṣipram vārāṇasī gamanāya
tat śṛṇu manasi kuru

original: bhāṣiṣyāmah -- itaḥ paścime digbhāge sapta pratānatikramya mahāparvata uccaḥ/
analyzed: bhāṣiṣyāmah itas paścime digbhāge sapta mahā parvataḥ uccaḥ

original: 074.018. tasmin parvate lohitākṣo nāma rākṣasaḥ prativasati raudraḥ paraprāṇaharaḥ/
analyzed: tasmin parvate lohitākṣaḥ nāma rākṣasaḥ prativasati raudraḥ para prāṇa haraḥ

original: 074.019. sa ca parvato 'manuṣyavacaritaḥ kṛṣṇamandhakāraṃ savisphuliṅgaṃ vāyuṃ mokṣayati/
analyzed: sa ca parvataḥ manuṣya avacaritaḥ kṛṣṇam andhakāram sa visphuliṅgam vāyum mokṣayati

original: 074.020. tatra te etadeva ratnaṃ dhvajāgre 'varopayitvā gantavyam/
analyzed: tatra te etat eva ratnam dhvaja agre varopayitvā gantavyam
ratna prabhāvāt ca te ītayaḥ vilayam gamiṣyanti
mahā parvatam atikramya apara parvataḥ
tasmin parvate gnimukhaḥ nāgaḥ prativasati

original: 074.022. sa tava gandhamāghrāya sapta rātriṃdivasānyaśaniṃ pātayiṣyati/
analyzed: sa tava gandham āghrāya sapta rātriṃdivasāni aśanim pātayiṣyati
tatra ratna guhām samanviṣya praveṣṭavyam
sapta rātrasya ca atyayāt duṣṭa nāgaḥ svapiṣyati
śayite diṣṭa nāge parvatam adhiroḍhavyam

original: 074.023. tatra drakṣyasi samaṃ bhūmipradeśamakṛṣṭoptaṃ ca taṇḍulaphalaśālimakaṇakamatuṣaṃ śuciṃ niṣphuṭigandhikaṃ caturaṅgulaparyavanaddham/
analyzed: tatra drakṣyasi samam bhūmi pradeśam akṛṣṭa uptam ca taṇḍula phala śāli makaṇakam atuṣam śucim niṣphuṭi gandhikam catur aṅgula paryavanaddham

original: 074.025. yastamaṣṭamyāṃ panñcadaśyāṃ vā bālāho'śvarājaḥ paribhujya sukhī arogo balavān prīṇitendriyaḥ pūrvakāyamabhyunnamayyodānamudānayati  #
analyzed: yaḥ tam aṣṭamyām panñcadaśyām vā bālāha uśva rājaḥ paribhujya sukhī arogaḥ balavān prīṇita indriyaḥ pūrva kāyam abhyunnamayya udānam udānayati  /

mām pāram naya

original: 074.028. atha sa supriyo mahāsārthavāhastāḥ kinnarakanyā dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśya
analyzed: atha sa supriyaḥ mahā sārthavāhaḥ tāḥ kinnara kanyāḥ dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśya

original: samādāpya samuttejya saṃpraharṣya mātṛduhitṛvat pratisamodya yathoddiṣṭena mārgeṇa
analyzed: samādāpya samuttejya saṃpraharṣya mātṛ duhitṛ vat pratisamodya yathā uddiṣṭena mārgeṇa

kaḥ pāra gāmī

original: pratiṣṭhāpya yena bālāho 'śvarājastenānñjaliṃ praṇamya bālāhamaśvarājamidavocat -- ahaṃ pāragāmī,
analyzed: pratiṣṭhāpya yena bālāho śva rājaḥ tena anñjalim praṇamya bālāham aśva rājam id avocat aham pāra gāmī
aham pāra gāmī naya mām
svasti kṣemābhyām vārāṇasīm anuprāpaya

original: 075.003. evamukte bālāho 'śvarājaḥ supriyaṃ mahāsārthavāhamidamavocat -- na te mahāsārthavāha mama pṛṣṭhādhirūḍhena diśo nāvalokayitavyāḥ,
analyzed: evam ukte bālāho śva rājaḥ supriyam mahā sārthavāham idam avocat na te mahā sārthavāha mama pṛṣṭha adhirūḍhena diśaḥ na avalokayitavyāḥ
nimīlita akṣeṇa te stheyam
iti uktvā bālāha uśva rājaḥ pṛṣṭham upanāmayati

original: 075.005. atha supriyo mahāsārthavāho bālāhasyāśvarājasya pṛṣṭhamadhiruhya yathānuśiṣṭo 'lpaiśca kṣaṇalavamuhūrtairvārāṇasīmanuprāptaḥ/
analyzed: atha supriyaḥ mahā sārthavāhaḥ bālāhasya aśva rājasya pṛṣṭham adhiruhya yathā anuśiṣṭaḥ lpaiḥ ca kṣaṇa lava muhūrtaiḥ vārāṇasīm anuprāptaḥ
sve uyhāne vataritar

original: 075.007. avatīrya supriyo mahāsārthavāho bālāhāśvarājapṛṣṭhādbālāhāśvarājaṃ tripradakṣiṇīkṛtya pādābhivandanaṃ karoti/
analyzed: avatīrya supriyaḥ mahā sārthavāhaḥ bālāha aśva rāja pṛṣṭhāt bālāha aśva rājam tri pradakṣiṇīkṛtya pādābhivandanam karoti

original: 075.008. tato bālāho 'śvarājaḥ supriyaṃ mahāsārthavāhaṃ saṃrādhayāmāsa -- sādhu sādhu mahāsārthavāha/
analyzed: tatas bālāho śva rājaḥ supriyam mahā sārthavāham saṃrādhayāmāsa sādhu sādhu mahā sārthavāha
nistīrṇāni te mahā samudra parvata nadī kāntārāṇi

original: 075.012. athāciraprakrānte bālāhe 'śvarājani supriyo mahāsārthavāhaḥ svagṛhaṃ praviṣṭaḥ/
analyzed: atha acira prakrānte bālāhe śva rājani supriyaḥ mahā sārthavāhaḥ sva gṛham praviṣṭaḥ

original: 075.013. aśrauṣurvārāṇasīnivāsinaḥ paurā brahmadattaśca kāśirājah -- supriyo mahāsārthavāhaḥ pūrṇena varṣaśatena saṃsiddhayātraḥ pūrṇamanorathaḥ  #
analyzed: aśrauṣuḥ vārāṇasī nivāsinaḥ paurāḥ brahmadattaḥ ca kāśi rājaḥ supriyaḥ mahā sārthavāhaḥ pūrṇena varṣa śatena saṃsiddha yātraḥ pūrṇa manorathaḥ
sva gṛham anuprāptaḥ iti
śrutvā ca punar brahmadattaḥ kāśi rājaḥ ānanditaḥ
paura vargaḥ supriyam sārthavāham saṃrādhayāmāsa

original: 075.016. aśrauṣīt tat pūrvakaṃ caurasahasramanyaśca jano dhanārthī -- supriyo mahāsārthavāhaḥ saṃsiddhayātraḥ paripūrṇamanoratha āgata iti/
analyzed: aśrauṣīt tat pūrvakam caura sahasram anyaḥ ca janaḥ dhana arthī supriyaḥ mahā sārthavāhaḥ saṃsiddha yātraḥ paripūrṇa manorathaḥ āgataḥ iti

original: 075.017. srutvā ca punarupasaṃkramya supriyaṃ mahāsārthavāhamidamavocan -- parikṣīṇadhanāḥ sma iti/
analyzed: srutvā ca punar upasaṃkramya supriyam mahā sārthavāham idam avocan parikṣīṇa dhanāḥ smaḥ iti

original: 075.018. evamukte mahāsārthavāhastān sarvān maitreṇa cakṣuṣā vyavalokya vijñnāpayati -- gacchatu bhavantaḥ svakasvakeṣu vijiteṣu/
analyzed: evam ukte mahā sārthavāhaḥ tān sarvān maitreṇa cakṣuṣā vyavalokya vijñnāpayati gacchatu bhavantaḥ svaka svakeṣu vijiteṣu
yaḥ yena arthī upakaraṇa viśeṣeṇa bhavati
sa tasya arthe cittam utpādayatu
vācam ca niścārayatu
śrutvā ca punar prakrāntaḥ

original: 075.020. atha supriyo mahāsārthavāhastadeva poṣadhe panñcadaśyāṃ śiraḥsnāta upoṣadhoṣito yattatprathamalabdhaṃ maṇiratnaṃ dhvajāgre āropya  #
analyzed: atha supriyaḥ mahā sārthavāhaḥ tat eva poṣadhe panñcadaśyām śiraḥ snātaḥ upoṣadha uṣitaḥ yat tat prathama labdham maṇi ratnam dhvaja agre āropya
vācam ca niścārayati
yojana sahasra sāmantakena yathā īpsitāni sattvānām upakaraṇāni utpadyante

original: sahābhidhānacca yo yenārthī tasya tadvarṣaṃ bhavati/
analyzed: yaḥ yena arthī tasya tat varṣam bhavati

original: 075.024. taccaurasahasraṃ supriyeṇa mahāsārthavāhena daśasu kuśaleṣu karmapatheṣu pratiṣṭhāpitaḥ//
analyzed: tat caura sahasram supriyeṇa mahā sārthavāhena daśasu kuśaleṣu karma patheṣu pratiṣṭhāpitaḥ

original: 075.025. atrāntarāt kālagate brahmadatte kāśirājani paurāmātyaiḥ supriyo mahāsārthavāho rājābhiṣekeṇābhiṣiktaḥ/
analyzed: atra antarāt kālagate brahmadatte kāśi rājani paura amātyaiḥ supriyaḥ mahā sārthavāhaḥ rāja abhiṣekeṇa abhiṣiktaḥ

original: 075.026. mahābhiṣiktena supriyeṇa mahārājñnā dvitīyaṃ maṇiratnaṃ dhvajāgre āropya
analyzed: mahā abhiṣiktena supriyeṇa mahā rājñnā dvitīyam maṇi ratnam dhvaja agre āropya

saha abhidhānāt ca yaḥ yena arthī tasya tat varṣati

original: 075.028. tṛtīyena maṇiratnena yathoktena vidhinā dhvajāgrocchritena yathepsitopakaraṇaviśeṣavarṣaṇāni saṃpannāni/
analyzed: tṛtīyena maṇi ratnena yathā uktena vidhinā dhvaja agra ucchritena yathā īpsita upakaraṇa viśeṣa varṣaṇāni saṃpannāni

original: 075.030. tato 'nupūrveṇa jambudvīpaiśvaryabhūtena supriyeṇa mahārājñnā tadeva poṣadhe
analyzed: tatas nupūrveṇa jambudvīpa aiśvarya bhūtena supriyeṇa mahā rājñnā tat eva poṣadhe

original: panñcadaśyāṃ śiraḥsnātenopoṣadhoṣitena kṛtsne jambudvīpe ghaṇṭāvaghoṣaṇaṃ kṛtvā upakaraṇotpannābhilāṣiṇāṃ
analyzed: panñcadaśyām śiraḥ snātena upoṣadha uṣitena kṛtsne jambudvīpe ghaṇṭā avaghoṣaṇam kṛtvā upakaraṇa utpanna abhilāṣiṇām
strī manuṣyāṇām jambudvīpa nivāsinām yat maṇi ratnam badaradvīpa mahā pattana sarva sva bhūtam

original: 076.001. samanantaraṃ dhvajāgrāvaropite tasmiñ jambudvīpapradhānamaṇiratne kṛtsno jambudvīpanivāsī mahājanakāyo yathepsitairupakaraṇaviśeṣaiḥ
analyzed: samanantaram dhvaja agra avaropite tasmin jambudvīpa pradhāna maṇi ratne kṛtsnaḥ jambudvīpa nivāsī mahā jana kāyaḥ yathā īpsitaiḥ upakaraṇa viśeṣaiḥ

original: 076.003. upakaraṇasaṃtarpitaśca jambudvīpanivāsī janakāyaḥ supriyeṇa rājñnā daśasu kuśaleṣu karmapatheṣu pratiṣṭhāpitaḥ/
analyzed: upakaraṇa saṃtarpitaḥ ca jambudvīpa nivāsī jana kāyaḥ supriyeṇa rājñnā daśasu kuśaleṣu karma patheṣu pratiṣṭhāpitaḥ

original: 076.004. tato jyeṣṭhaṃ kumāraṃ rājyaiśvaryādhipatye partiṣṭhāpya rājarṣibrahmacaryaṃ

original: sa eṣa eva devadattastena kalena tena samayena/
analyzed: saḥ eṣaḥ eva devadattaḥ tena kalena tena samayena

original: eṣa eva māraḥ pāpīyān sa tena kalena tena samayena/
analyzed: eṣaḥ eva māraḥ pāpīyān sa tena kalena tena samayena
yaḥ ca asau bālāho śva rājaḥ
maitreyaḥ boddhisattvaḥ tena kālena tena samayena

original: 076.015. tadā tāvanmayā bhikṣavo dṛḍhapratijñnena pratijñnāpūraṇārthaṃ saptavārāṃścaurasahasrāt sārthaḥ paritrātaḥ/
analyzed: tadā tāvat mayā bhikṣavaḥ dṛḍha pratijñnena pratijñnā pūraṇa artham sapta vārān caura sahasrāt sārthaḥ paritrātaḥ
a parituṣṭān ca caurān viditvā dṛḍha pratijñnā kṛtā
kṛtvā ca anekaiḥ duṣkara śata sahasraiḥ badaradvīpa mahā pattanasya yātrām sādhayitvā

original: caurasahasrapramukhaṃ kṛtsnaṃ jambudvīpaṃ dhanena saṃtarpayitvā daśasu kuśaleṣu karmapatheṣu pratiṣṭhāpitaḥ /

original: evaṃ cāha--yatkhalu bhavanto jānīran--śramaṇo gautama ṛddhyā āhūtaḥ/
analyzed: evam ca āha yat khalu bhavantaḥ jānīran śramaṇaḥ gautamaḥ ṛddhyai āhūtaḥ

original: 094.012. sa kathayati--itaḥ saptame divase uttare manuṣyadharme riddhiprātihāryaṃ vidarśayiṣyāmīti/
analyzed: sa kathayati itas saptame divase uttare manuṣya dharme riddhi prātihāryam vidarśayiṣyāmi iti
nūnam śramaṇaḥ gautamaḥ pakṣa paryeṣaṇam kartu kāmaḥ
bhavadbhiḥ api sabrahmacāriṇām sāhāyyam karaṇīyam
saptame divase yuṣmābhiḥ śrāvastīm āgantavyam
taiḥ tathā iti pratijñātam

original: 094.015. tena khalu samayena subhadro nāma parivrājakaḥ pañcābhijñaḥ/
analyzed: tena khalu samayena subhadraḥ nāma parivrājakaḥ pañca abhijñaḥ
tasya kuśinagaryām āvasathaḥ navatapte mahā sarasi divā vihāraḥ

original: 094.016. atha raktākṣaḥ parivrājako yena subhadraḥ parivrājakastenopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
analyzed: atha raktākṣaḥ parivrājakaḥ yena subhadraḥ parivrājakaḥ tena upasaṃkrāntaḥ
upasaṃkramya etat prakaraṇam vistareṇa ārocayati

original: evaṃ cāha--yatkhalu subhadra jānīyāh--śramaṇo gautamo 'smābhih ṛddhyā āhūtaḥ/
analyzed: evam ca āha yat khalu subhadra jānīyāḥ śramaṇaḥ gautamaḥ smābhiḥ ṛddhyai āhūtaḥ

original: 094.018. sa kathayati--itaḥ saptame divase uttare manuṣyadharme riddhiprātihāryaṃ vidarśayiṣyāmīti/
analyzed: sa kathayati itas saptame divase uttare manuṣya dharme riddhi prātihāryam vidarśayiṣyāmi iti
nūnam śramaṇaḥ gautamaḥ pakṣa paryeṣaṇam kartu kāmaḥ
tvayā sabrahmacāriṇām sāhāyyam karaṇīyam
saptame divase tvayā śrāvastīm āgantavyam

original: 094.020. subhadreṇābhihitam--na śobhanaṃ bhavadbhiḥ kṛtam yadyuṣmābhiḥ śramaṇo gautamo riddhyā āhūtaḥ/
analyzed: subhadreṇa abhihitam na śobhanam bhavadbhiḥ kṛtam yat yuṣmābhiḥ śramaṇaḥ gautamaḥ riddhyai āhūtaḥ
tat kasya hetoḥ

original: mama tāvat kuśinagaryāmāvāso 'navatapte mahāsarasi divā vihāraḥ/
analyzed: mama tāvat kuśinagaryām āvāsaḥ navatapte mahā sarasi divā vihāraḥ

original: 094.022. śramaṇasya gautamasya śāriputro nāma śiṣyastasya cundo nāma śrāmaṇerakastasyāpi tatraivānavatapte mahāsarasi divā vihāraḥ/
analyzed: śramaṇasya gautamasya śāriputraḥ nāma śiṣyaḥ tasya cundaḥ nāma śrāmaṇerakaḥ tasya api tatra eva anavatapte mahā sarasi divā vihāraḥ

original: 094.024. na tathānavataptakāyikā devatā api kārān kartavyān manyante yathā tasya/
analyzed: na tathā anavatapta kāyikāḥ devatāḥ api kārān kartavyān manyante yathā tasya
ekaḥ yam samayaḥ

original: 094.025. ihāhaṃ kuśinagarīṃ piṇḍāya caritvā piṇḍapātamādāya anavataptaṃ mahāsarasaṃ gacchāmi/
analyzed: iha aham kuśinagarīm piṇḍāya caritvā piṇḍapātam ādāya anavataptam mahā sarasam gacchāmi

original: 094.026. tasya mamānavataptakāyikā devatā anavataptānmahāsarasaḥ pānīyamuddhṛtya ekānte na prayacchati/
analyzed: tasya mama anavatapta kāyikā devatā anavataptāt mahā sarasaḥ pānīyam uddhṛtya ekānte na prayacchati
cundaḥ śramaṇa uddeśaḥ pāṃśu kūlāni ādāya anavataptam mahā saraḥ gacchati

original: 094.027. tasyānavataptakāyikā devatā pāṃśukūlāni dhāvayitvā tena pānīyenātmānaṃ siñcati/
analyzed: tasya anavatapta kāyikā devatā pāṃśu kūlāni dhāvayitvā tena pānīyena ātmānam siñcati
yasya tāvat vayam śiṣya pratiśiṣyakayā api na tulyāḥ
sa yuṣmābhiḥ uttare manuṣya dharme riddhi prātihāryeṇa āhūtaḥ

original: 094.029. na śobhanaṃ bhavadbhiḥ kṛtam yacchramaṇo gautamo riddhiprātihāryeṇāhūtaḥ/
analyzed: na śobhanam bhavadbhiḥ kṛtam yat śramaṇaḥ gautamaḥ riddhi prātihāryeṇa āhūtaḥ

original: 094.030. evamahaṃ jāne yathā maharddhikaḥ śramaṇo gautamo mahānubhāva iti/
analyzed: evam aham jāne yathā maharddhikaḥ śramaṇaḥ gautamaḥ mahā anubhāvaḥ iti
raktakṣeṇa abhihitam tvam tāvat cramaṇasya gautamasya pakṣam vadasi
tvayā tāvat na gantavyam
subhadreṇa abhihitam na eva gamiṣyāmi iti

original: 095.001. <95>atha rājñaḥ prasenajitaḥ kauśalasya kālo nāṃnā bhrātā abhirūpo darśanīyaḥ prāsādikaḥ śrāddho bhadraḥ kalyāṇāśayaḥ/
analyzed: rājñaḥ prasenajitaḥ kauśalasya kālaḥ nāṃnā bhrātā abhirūpaḥ darśanīyaḥ prāsādikaḥ śrāddhaḥ bhadraḥ kalyāṇa āśayaḥ
sa rājñaḥ prasenajitaḥ kauśalasya niveśana dvāreṇa abhiniṣkrāmati

original: 095.003. anyatamayā cāvaruddhikayā prāsādatalagatayā rājakumāraṃ dṛṣṭvā sragdāmaṃ kṣiptam/
analyzed: anyatamayā ca avaruddhikayā prāsāda tala gatayā rāja kumāram dṛṣṭvā sraj dāmam kṣiptam
tat tasya upari nipatitam
mitra ari madhyamaḥ lokaḥ

original: 095.004. tai rājñe niveditam--yatkhalu deva jānīthāḥ--kālena devasyāntaḥpuraṃ prārthitam/
analyzed: taiḥ rājñe niveditam yat khalu deva jānīthāḥ kālena devasya antaḥpuram prārthitam
rājā prasenajit kauśalaḥ caṇḍaḥ rabhasaḥ kakarśaḥ
tena a parīkṣya pauruṣeyāṇām ājñā dattā āgacchantu bhavantaḥ
śīghram kālasya hasta pādān chindantu

original: 095.007. evaṃ deveti pauruṣeyai rājñaḥ prasenajitaḥ kauśalasya pratiśrutya kālasya vīthīmadhye hastapādāśchinnāḥ/
analyzed: evam deva iti pauruṣeyaiḥ rājñaḥ prasenajitaḥ kauśalasya pratiśrutya kālasya vīthī madhye hasta pādāḥ chinnāḥ
saḥ ārta svaram krandate

original: duḥkhāṃ tīvrāṃ kharāṃ kaṭukāmamanāpāṃ devanāṃ vedayate/
analyzed: duḥkhām tīvrām kharām kaṭukām amanāpām devanām vedayate
kālam rāja kumāram dṛṣṭvā mahā jana kāyaḥ vikroṣṭum ārabdhaḥ
pūraṇa ādāyaḥ ca nirgranthāḥ tam pradeśam anuprāptāḥ

original: 095.010. kālasya jñātibhirabhihitam--etamāryāḥ kālaṃ rājakumāraṃ satyābhiyācanayā yathāpaurāṇaṃ kurudhvamiti/
analyzed: kālasya jñātibhiḥ abhihitam etam āryāḥ kālam rāja kumāram satya abhiyācanayā yathāpaurāṇam kurudhvam iti
pūraṇena abhihitam eṣa śramaṇasya gautamasya śrāvakaḥ
śramaṇa dharmeṇa gautamaḥ yathāpaurāṇam kariṣyati

original: 095.012. atha kālasya rājakumārasyaitadabhavat--kṛcchrasaṃkaṭasambādhaprāptaṃ māṃ bhagavān na samanvāharatīti viditvā gāthāṃ bhāṣate--
analyzed: atha kālasya rāja kumārasya etat abhavat kṛcchra saṃkaṭa sambādha prāptam mām bhagavān na samanvāharati iti viditvā gāthām bhāṣate

original: 095.014. imāmavasthāṃ mama lokanātho na vetti saṃbādhagatasya kasmāt/
analyzed: imām avasthām mama loka nāthaḥ na vetti saṃbādha gatasya kasmāt
namaḥ stu tasmai vigata jvarāya sarveṣu
a saṃmoṣa dharmāṇaḥ buddhāḥ bhagavantaḥ

original: 095.018. tatra bhagavānāyuṣmantamānandamāmantrayate sma--gaccha tvamānanda saṃghāṭimādāya anyatamena bhikṣuṇā paścācchramaṇena yena kālo rājabhrātā
analyzed: tatra bhagavān āyuṣmantam ānandam āmantrayate sma gaccha tvam ānanda saṃghāṭim ādāya anyatamena bhikṣuṇā paścācchramaṇena yena kālaḥ rāja bhrātā

original: 095.020. upasaṃkramya kālasya rājakumārasya hastapādān yathāsthāne sthāpayitvā evaṃ
analyzed: upasaṃkramya kālasya rāja kumārasya hasta pādān yathāsthāne sthāpayitvā evam

original: vada--ye kecit sattvā apadā vā dvipadā vā bahupadā vā arūpiṇo vā rūpiṇo vā saṃjñino
analyzed: kecid sattvāḥ apadāḥ vā dvipadāḥ vā bahu padāḥ vā arūpiṇaḥ vā rūpiṇaḥ vā saṃjñinaḥ

original: vā asaṃjñino vā naivasaṃjñino vā nāsaṃjñinaḥ,
analyzed: vā asaṃjñinaḥ vā na eva saṃjñinaḥ vā na asaṃjñinaḥ
tathāgataḥ rhan samyaksambuddhaḥ teṣām sattvānām agre ākhyāyate

original: 095.023. ye kecid dharmā asaṃskṛtā vā saṃskṛtā vā,
analyzed: ye kecid dharmāḥ asaṃskṛtāḥ vā saṃskṛtāḥ vā
virāgaḥ dharmaḥ teṣām agre ākhyātaḥ

original: 095.025. anena satyena satyavākyena tava śarīram yathāpaurāṇaṃ syāt/
analyzed: anena satyena satya vākyena tava śarīram yathāpaurāṇam syāt

original: 095.025. evaṃ bhadantetyāyuṣmānānando bhagavataḥ pratiśrutya saṃghāṭīmādāyānyatamena bhikṣuṇā paścācchramaṇena yena rājabhrātā kālastenopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
analyzed: evam bhadanta iti āyuṣmān ānandaḥ bhagavataḥ pratiśrutya saṃghāṭīm ādāya anyatamena bhikṣuṇā paścācchramaṇena yena rāja bhrātā kālaḥ tena upasaṃkrāntaḥ

original: 095.027. upasaṃkramya kālasya rājakumārasya hastapādān yathāsthāne sthāpayitvā evamāha--ye kecit sattvā apadā vā dvipadā vā catuṣpadā vā bahupadā  #
analyzed: upasaṃkramya kālasya rāja kumārasya hasta pādān yathāsthāne sthāpayitvā evam āhaye kecid sattvāḥ apadāḥ vā dvipadāḥ vā catuṣpadāḥ vā bahu padāḥ
vā yāvat na eva saṃjñinaḥ na asaṃjñinaḥ
tathāgataḥ rhan samyaksambuddhaḥ teṣām sattvānām agre ākhyātaḥ

original: 095.029. ye keciddharmāḥ saṃkṛtā vā asaṃskṛtā vā,
analyzed: ye kecid dharmāḥ saṃkṛtāḥ vā asaṃskṛtāḥ vā
virāgaḥ dharmaḥ teṣām agre ākhyātaḥ

original: 095.030. ye kecit saṃghā vā gaṇā vā pūgā vā parṣado vā,
analyzed: ye kecid saṃghāḥ vā gaṇāḥ vā pūgāḥ vā parṣadaḥ vā
tathāgata śrāvaka saṃghaḥ teṣām agre ākhyātaḥ

original: 095.031. anena satyena satyavākyena tava śarīram yathāpaurāṇaṃ bhavatu/
analyzed: anena satyena satya vākyena tava śarīram yathāpaurāṇam bhavatu

original: 095.032. sahābhidhānāt kālasya rājakumārasya śarīram yathāpaurāṇaṃ saṃvṛttam,
analyzed: saha abhidhānāt kālasya rāja kumārasya śarīram yathāpaurāṇam saṃvṛttam

original: <96>yathāpi tatra buddhasya buddhānubhāvena devatānāṃ ca devatānubhāvena/
analyzed: tatra buddhasya buddha anubhāvena devatānām ca devatā anubhāvena

original: 096.001. kālena kumāreṇa tenaiva saṃvegena anāgāmiphalaṃ sākṣātkṛtam ṛddhiścāpi nirhṛtā/
analyzed: kālena kumāreṇa tena eva saṃvegena anāgāmi phalam sākṣātkṛtam ṛddhiḥ ca api nirhṛtā
tena bhagavataḥ ārāmaḥ niryātitaḥ
sa bhagavataḥ upasthānam kartum ārabdhaḥ

original: 096.003. yatrāsya śarīraṃ gaṇḍagaṇḍaṃ kṛtaṃ tasya gaṇḍaka ārāmika iti saṃjñā saṃvṛttā/
analyzed: yatra asya śarīram gaṇḍa gaṇḍam kṛtam tasya gaṇḍakaḥ ārāmikaḥ iti saṃjñā saṃvṛttā

original: 096.004. atha rājñā prasenajitā kauśalena sarvopakaraṇaiḥ sa pravāritaḥ/
analyzed: atha rājñā prasenajitā kauśalena sarva upakaraṇaiḥ sa pravāritaḥ
kālena abhihitam na mama tvayā prayojanam
bhagavataḥ eva upasthānam kariṣyāmi iti

original: 096.006. rājñā prasenajitā kauśalena antarā ca śrāvastīmantarā ca jetavanamatrāntarādbhagavataḥ prātihāryamaṇḍapaḥ kāritaḥ śatasahasrahastah  #
analyzed: rājñā prasenajitā kauśalena antarā ca śrāvastīm antarā ca jetavanam atra antarāt bhagavataḥ prātihārya maṇḍapaḥ kāritaḥ śata sahasra hastaḥ
caturṇām maṇḍapaḥ vitataḥ
bhagavataḥ siṃhāsanam prajñaptam
anya tīrthika śrāvakaiḥ api pūrṇa ādīnām nirgranthānām pratyeka pratyeka maṇḍapaḥ kāritaḥ

original: 096.009. rājñā prasenajitā kauśalena saptame divase yāvajjetavanaṃ yāvacca bhagavataḥ prātihāryamaṇḍapo 'ntarāt sarvo 'sau pradeśo 'pagatapāṣāṇaśarkarakaṭhalyo
analyzed: rājñā prasenajitā kauśalena saptame divase yāvat jetavanam yāvat ca bhagavataḥ prātihārya maṇḍapaḥ ntarāt sarvaḥ sau pradeśaḥ upagata pāṣāṇa śarkara kaṭhalyaḥ
dhūpa cūrṇa andhakāraḥ kṛtaḥ
chatra dhvaja patākā gandha udaka pariṣiktaḥ nānā puṣpa abhikīrṇaḥ ramaṇīyaḥ
antarā antarā ca puṣpa maṇḍapāḥ sajjīkṛtāḥ

original: 096.013. atha bhagavān saptame divase pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaramādāya śrāvastīṃ piṇḍāya prāvikṣat/
analyzed: atha bhagavān saptame divase pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātra cīvaram ādāya śrāvastīm piṇḍāya prāvikṣat

original: 096.014. śrāvastīṃ piṇḍāya caritvā kṛtabhaktakṛtyaḥ paścādbhaktapiṇḍapātapratikrāntaḥ pātracīvaraṃ pratiśrāmya bahirvihārasya pādau prakṣālya  #
analyzed: śrāvastīm piṇḍāya caritvā kṛta bhakta kṛtyaḥ paścāt bhakta piṇḍapāta pratikrāntaḥ pātra cīvaram pratiśrāmya bahis vihārasya pādau prakṣālya
vihāram praviṣṭaḥ pratisaṃlayanāya

original: 096.015. atha rājā prasenajit kauśalo 'nekaśataparivāro 'nekasahasraparivāro 'nekaśatasahasraparivāro yena bhagavataḥ prātihāryamaṇḍapastenopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
analyzed: atha rājā prasenajit kauśalaḥ neka śata parivāraḥ neka sahasra parivāraḥ neka śata sahasra parivāraḥ yena bhagavataḥ prātihārya maṇḍapaḥ tena upasaṃkrāntaḥ
upasaṃkramya prajñapte eva āsane niṣaṇṇaḥ
tīrthyāḥ api mahā jana kāya parivṛtāḥ yena maṇḍapaḥ tena upasaṃkrāntāḥ
upasaṃkramya pratyeka pratyekasmin āsane niṣaṇṇāḥ

original: 096.019. niṣadya rājānaṃ prasenajitaṃ kauśalamidamavocan--yatkhalu deva jānīyāh--ete vayamāgatāḥ/
analyzed: niṣadya rājānam prasenajitam kauśalam idam avocan yat khalu deva jānīyāha ete vayam āgatāḥ
kutra etarhi śramaṇaḥ gautamaḥ
tena bhavantaḥ muhūrtam āgamayata
eṣaḥ idānīm bhagavān adhigamiṣyati

original: 096.021. atha rājā prasenajit kauśala uttaraṃ māṇavamāmantrayate--ehi tvamuttara,
analyzed: atha rājā prasenajit kauśalaḥ uttaram māṇavam āmantrayate ehi tvam uttara
yena bhagavān tena upasaṃkrāma

original: 096.023. upasaṃkramyāsmākaṃ vacanena bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā alpābādhatāṃ ca pṛccha,
analyzed: upasaṃkramya asmākam vacanena bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā alpa ābādha tām ca pṛccha

original: alpātaṅkatāṃ ca laghūtthānatāṃ ca yātrāṃ ca balaṃ ca sukhaṃ ca anavadyatāṃ ca sparśavihāratāṃ ca/
analyzed: alpa ātaṅka tām ca laghu utthāna tām ca yātrām ca balam ca sukham ca anavadya tām ca sparśa vihāra tām ca

original: 096.024. evaṃ ca vada--rājā bhadanta prasenajit kauśala evamāha--ime bhadanta tīrthyā āgatā yasyedānīṃ kālaṃ manyate/
analyzed: evam ca vada rājā bhadanta prasenajit kauśalaḥ evam āha eme bhadanta tīrthyāḥ āgatāḥ yasya idānīm kālam manyate

original: 096.025. evaṃ devetyuttaro māṇavo rājñaḥ prasenajitaḥ kauśalasya pratiśrutya yena bhagavāṃstenopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
analyzed: evam deva iti uttaraḥ māṇavaḥ rājñaḥ prasenajitaḥ kauśalasya pratiśrutya yena bhagavān tena upasaṃkrāntaḥ

original: 096.026. upasaṃkramya bhagavatā sārdhaṃ saṃmukhaṃ saṃmodanīṃ saṃrañjanīṃ vividhāṃ kathāṃ vyatisārya ekānte niṣaṇṇaḥ/
analyzed: upasaṃkramya bhagavatā sārdham saṃmukham saṃmodanīm saṃrañjanīm vividhām kathām vyatisārya ekānte niṣaṇṇaḥ

original: 096.027. ekāntaniṣaṇṇa uttaro māṇavo bhagavantamidamavocat--rājā bhadanta prasenajit kauśalo bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vandate,
analyzed: ekānta niṣaṇṇaḥ uttaraḥ māṇavaḥ bhagavantam idam avocat rājā bhadanta prasenajit kauśalaḥ bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vandate

original: alpābādhatāṃ ca pṛcchati alpātaṅkatāṃ ca laghūtthānatāṃ ca yātraṃ ca balaṃ ca sukhaṃ ca anavadyatāṃ ca sparśavihāratāṃ ca/
analyzed: alpa ābādha tām ca pṛcchati alpa ātaṅka tām ca laghu utthāna tām ca yātram ca balam ca sukham ca anavadya tām ca sparśa vihāra tām ca

original: 096.030. sukhī bhavatu māṇava rājā prasenajit kauśalastvaṃ ca/
analyzed: sukhī bhavatu māṇava rājā prasenajit kauśalaḥ tvam ca

original: 096.030. rājā bhadanta prasenajit kauśala evamāha--ime bhadanta tīrthyā āgatā yasyedānīṃ bhagavān kālaṃ manyate/
analyzed: rājā bhadanta prasenajit kauśalaḥ evam āha eme bhadanta tīrthyāḥ āgatāḥ yasya idānīm bhagavān kālam manyate
evam ukte bhagavān uttaram māṇavam idam avocat māṇavaḥ eṣaḥ ham adya āgacchāmi
bhagavatā tathā adhiṣṭhitaḥ yathā uttaraḥ eva upari vihāyasā prakrāntaḥ
