original: 106.016. te kalahaṃ kṛtvā vyupaśāntāḥ parasparaṃ kathayanti--bhavantaḥ,
analyzed: te kalaham kṛtvā vyupaśāntāḥ parasparam kathayanti bhavantaḥ
pūrvam asmākam anyonyam dṛṣṭvā snehaḥ bhavati
idānīm tu dveṣaḥ
paśyadhvam kaścid anyaḥ āgataḥ syāt iti
te samanveṣitum ārabdhāḥ yāvat paśyanti svāgatam
tatra eke kathayanti bhavantaḥ
svāgataḥ praviṣṭaḥ iti
apare kathayanti na ayam svāgatāḥ
kim tu durāgataḥ
imam āgamya asmākam kaliḥ prādurbhūtaḥ iti
sa taiḥ grīvāyām gṛhītvā niṣkāsitaḥ nyatra gataḥ

original: 106.021. tasmādapi niṣkāsito yāvat kroḍamallānāṃ madhye praviṣṭaḥ/
analyzed: tasmāt api niṣkāsitaḥ yāvat kroḍamallānām madhye praviṣṭaḥ
te yatra yatra bhaikṣa arthikāḥ praviśanti
tatra nirbhartsyante niṣkāsyante ca
te nairāśyam āpannāḥ rikta hastakāḥ rikta mallakāḥ śūnya devakula maṇḍapa vṛkṣa mūlāni āgatāḥ
te nyonyam pṛcchanti bhavantaḥ

original: vayaṃ pūrve yatra yatra gacchāmastataḥ pūrṇahastāḥ pūrṇamallakā āgacchāmaḥ/
analyzed: vayam pūrve yatra yatra gacchāmaḥ tatas pūrṇa hastāḥ pūrṇa mallakāḥ āgacchāmaḥ

original: 106.024. idānīṃ ko yogo yena vayaṃ riktahastakā riktamallakā nairāśyamāpannā ihāgatā iti?
analyzed: idānīm kaḥ yogaḥ yena vayam rikta hastakāḥ rikta mallakāḥ nairāśyam āpannāḥ iha āgatāḥ iti

original: tatraike kathayanti--nūnaṃ ko 'pi mandabhāgyo 'smākaṃ madhye praviṣṭo yena vayaṃ riktahastā riktamallakā ihāgatā iti/
analyzed: tatra eke kathayanti nūnam kaḥ pi mandabhāgyaḥ smākam madhye praviṣṭaḥ yena vayam rikta hastāḥ rikta mallakāḥ iha āgatāḥ iti
apare kathayanti gatam etat
dvidhā bhūtvā praviśāmaḥ iti
te parasmin divase dvidhā praviṣṭāḥ

original: 106.028. tatra yeṣāṃ madhye svāgataste tathaiva nirbhartsitā niṣkāsitāśca nairāśyamāpannā riktahastā riktamallāśca yathānilayamāgatāḥ/
analyzed: tatra yeṣām madhye svāgataḥ te tathā eva nirbhartsitāḥ niṣkāsitāḥ ca nairāśyam āpannāḥ rikta hastāḥ rikta mallāḥ ca yathā nilayam āgatāḥ
te tu anye pūrṇa hastā pūrṇa mallakāḥ āgatāḥ

original: 106.030. ye te riktahastakā riktapātrā āgatāste bhūyo dvidhā bhūtvā praviṣṭāḥ/
analyzed: ye te rikta hastakāḥ rikta pātrāḥ āgatāḥ te bhūyas dvidhā bhūtvā praviṣṭāḥ

original: 106.030. tatra teṣāmapi yeṣāṃ madhye svāgataste tathaiva riktahastā riktamallakāścāgatāḥ/
analyzed: tatra teṣām api yeṣām madhye svāgataḥ te tathā eva rikta hastāḥ rikta mallakāḥ ca āgatāḥ

original: 106.031. te bhūyo dvidhā bhūtā evam yāvat svāgatakroḍamallakau praviṣṭau riktahastau riktamallakau āgatau/
analyzed: te bhūyas dvidhā bhūtāḥ evam yāvat svāgata kroḍa mallakau praviṣṭau rikta hastau rikta mallakau āgatau
te tu anye pūrṇa hastāḥ āgatāḥ

original: 107.001. tataste kroḍamallakāḥ sarve saṃbhūya saṃkalpaṃ kartumārabdhāh--bhavantaḥ,
analyzed: tatas te kroḍamallakāḥ sarve saṃbhūya saṃkalpam kartum ārabdhāḥ ah bhavantaḥ

original: ayaṃ mandabhāgyo 'smākaṃ madhye praviṣṭho yena vayaṃ riktahastā rikmallakāścāgatāḥ/
analyzed: ayam mandabhāgyaḥ smākam madhye praviṣṭhaḥ yena vayam rikta hastāḥ rikmallakāḥ ca āgatāḥ
niṣkāsayāmaḥ enam iti

original: 107.003. sa taiḥ prabhūtān prahārān dattvā śirasi ca mallakaṃ bhaṅktvā niṣkāsitaḥ//
analyzed: sa taiḥ prabhūtān prahārān dattvā śirasi ca mallakam bhaṅktvā niṣkāsitaḥ

original: 107.004. atrāntare yāvacchrāvasteyo vaṇijo bodhasya gṛhapatervayasyaḥ paṇyamādāya śiśumāragirimanuprāptaḥ/
analyzed: atra antare yāvat śrāvasteyaḥ vaṇijaḥ bodhasya gṛhapateḥ vayasyaḥ paṇyam ādāya śiśumāra girim anuprāptaḥ

original: 107.005. tena svāgato mallakena hastagatena pīṭhīṃ gato mukhabimbakena pratyabhijñāta uktaśca--putra tvaṃ bodhagṛhapateḥ putra iti?
analyzed: tena svāgataḥ mallakena hasta gatena pīṭhīm gataḥ mukha bimbakena pratyabhijñātaḥ uktaḥ ca putra tvam bodha gṛhapateḥ putraḥ iti
sa kathayati tāta
aham tasya putraḥ durāgataḥ iti

original: 107.006. sa muhūrtaṃ tūṣṇīṃ sthitvā aśruparyākulekṣaṇaḥ kathayati--putra,
analyzed: sa muhūrtam tūṣṇīm sthitvā aśru paryākula īkṣaṇaḥ kathayati putra
tau tava mātā pitarau kālagatau
te jñātayah

original: sa āha--teṣāmapi kecit kālagatāḥ kecidihaiva tiṣṭhanto vācamapi na prayacchanti/
analyzed: saḥ āha teṣām api kecid kālagatāḥ kecid iha eva tiṣṭhantaḥ vācam api na prayacchanti
te dāsī dās karmakara pauruṣeyāḥ
teṣām api kecid kālagatāḥ
kecid niṣpalāyitāḥ
kecid iha eva anyān āśritya avasthitāḥ vācam api na prayacchanti
yat avaśiṣṭam dhanam tat api kiṃcid agninā dagdham

original: 107.011. ye vaṇikpauruṣeyāḥ paṇyaṃ gṛhītvā dhanārthino deśāntaraṃ mahāsamudraṃ cāvatīrṇāḥ,
analyzed: ye vaṇij pauruṣeyāḥ paṇyam gṛhītvā dhana arthinaḥ deśa antaram mahā samudram ca avatīrṇāḥ
tatra api keṣāṃcid paṇyam apaṇyībhūtam
kecid tatra eva anayena vyasanam āpannāḥ
keṣāṃcid kāntāra madhya gatānām taskaiḥ adravyam apahṛtam
keṣāṃcid nagara samīpam anuprāptānām śaulkika śaulkikaiḥ dravyam vicārayadbhiḥ sāraḥ gṛhītaḥ
keṣāṃcid pattanam anuprāptānām rājñaḥ viniyuktaiḥ doṣam utpādya sarva svam apahṛtam
kecid tasya prāṇa viyogam śrutvā tatra eva avasthitāḥ

original: 107.015. sa dīrghamuṣṇaṃ ca niśvasya kathayati--putra śrāvastīṃ kiṃ na gacchasi?
analyzed: sa dīrgham uṣṇam ca niśvasya kathayati putra śrāvastīm kim na gacchasi
tāta kim tatragatasya bhaviṣyati
putra tatra anāthapiṇḍadaḥ gṛhapatiḥ
tasya putreṇa tava bhaginī pariṇītā
sā tava yogodvahanam kariṣyati iti
sa kathayati tāta
yadi evam gacchāmi iti
tena tasya dvau kārṣāpaṇau dattau
uktaḥ ca putra
ābhyām tāvat ātmānam saṃdhāraya
yāvat aham paṇyam visarjayāmi
mayā sārdham gamiṣyasi

original: 107.019. tena tau kārṣāpaṇau khustavastrānte baddhvā sthāpitau,
analyzed: tena tau kārṣāpaṇau khusta vastra ante baddhvā sthāpitau
karma vipākena vismṛtau
tathā eva asau kutaścid kiṃcid ārāgayati kiṃcid na ārāgāyati
kṣudhayā pīḍyamānaḥ vasthitaḥ

original: 107.021. yāvadasau vaṇik paṇyaṃ visarjayitvā pratipaṇyamādāya svāgataṃ vaismṛtya saṃprasthitaḥ/
analyzed: yāvat asau vaṇij paṇyam visarjayitvā pratipaṇyam ādāya svāgatam vā aismṛtya saṃprasthitaḥ
svāgataḥ pi tena sārdham saṃprasthitaḥ
yāvat te sārthakāḥ kalim kartum ārabdhāḥ
balīvardāḥ yoddhum ārabdhāḥ
sārthikāḥ kathayanti bhavantaḥ
pratyavekṣata sārtham
mā asau trāgataḥ syāt iti
taiḥ pratyavekṣamāṇaiḥ asau dṛṣṭaḥ

original: 107.024. te taṃ khaṭucapeṭādibhistāḍayitvā ardhacandrakāreṇa grīvāyāṃ gṛhītvā niṣkāsitumārabdhāḥ/
analyzed: te tam khaṭu capeṭa ādibhiḥ tāḍayitvā ardhacandrakāreṇa grīvāyām gṛhītvā niṣkāsitum ārabdhāḥ
sa niṣkāsitaḥ
niṣkramyamāṇaḥ vikroṣṭum ārabdhaḥ
sārthavāhaḥ tam kolāhala śabdam śrutvā nirīkṣitum ārabdhaḥ
yāvat paśyati tam niṣkāsyamānam
sa kathayati bhavantaḥ
mā enam niṣkāsayata
mama eṣa vayasya putraḥ bhavati iti
te kathayanti sārthavāha

original: yamāgamya bodhasya gṛhapateranekadhanasamuditaṃ sasuhṛtsambandhibāndhavaṃ gṛhaṃ vinaṣṭam,
analyzed: yam āgamya bodhasya gṛhapateḥ aneka dhana samuditam sa suhṛd sambandhi bāndhavam gṛham vinaṣṭam
katham tena sārdham gacchāmah
sarvathā tvam sārthasya svāmī
yadi eṣa gacchati
vayam na gacchāmaḥ iti
sārthavāhaḥ tam kathayati putra
mahā jana virodhaḥ tra bhavati
sārthakāḥ kṣubhitāḥ
tvam paścāt vāsaḥ uddhātikayā gaccha
aham tava arthe āhāram sthāpayāmi iti

original: 107.031. sa mātāpitṛviyogapratispardhinā pūrvakarmāparādhaprabhāveṇa duḥkhadaurmanasyena saṃtāpitamanāḥ sāśrukaṇṭhastūṣṇīmavasthitaḥ/
analyzed: sa mātā pitṛ viyoga pratispardhinā pūrva karma aparādha prabhāveṇa duḥkha daurmanasyena saṃtāpita manāḥ sa aśru kaṇṭhaḥ tūṣṇīm avasthitaḥ
saṃprasthitaḥ
saḥ pi vāsoddhātikayā gantum ārabdhaḥ

original: 108.001. sa sārthavāhastasyāhāraṃ patrapuṭake baddhvā kiṃcidbhūmau pāṃśunā praticchādya sthāpayati,
analyzed: sa sārthavāhaḥ tasya āhāram patra puṭake baddhvā kiṃcid bhūmau pāṃśunā praticchādya sthāpayati
kiṃcid vṛkṣa śākhā patraiḥ avacchādya
tatra yam bhūmau sthāpayati
sa śṛgālaiḥ anyaiḥ catuṣpādauḥ bhakṣyate
yam vṛkṣa śākhāsu
sa pakṣibhiḥ śākhāmṛgaiḥ ca bhakṣyate
tatas kiṃcid ārāgayati kiṃcid na ārāgayati

original: 108.004. asthānamanavakāśo yaccaramabhavikaḥ sattvo 'samprāpte viśeṣādhigame so 'ntarā kālaṃ kuryāt/
analyzed: asthānam anavakāśaḥ yat caramabhavikaḥ sattvaḥ samprāpte viśeṣa adhigame saḥ ntarā kālam kuryāt
sa kṛcchreṇa śrāvastīm anuprāptaḥ
bahis śrāvastyām udapāna upakaṇṭhake viśrāntaḥ

original: 108.006. yāvat tasya bhaginyāḥ santikā preṣyadārikā udakārthinī kumbhamādāya gatā/
analyzed: yāvat tasya bhaginyāḥ santikā preṣya dārikā udaka arthinī kumbham ādāya gatā
sa tayā mukha bimbakena pratyabhijñātaḥ
sā ciram nirīkṣya hīna dīna vadanā kathayati dāraka

original: tvaṃ bodhasya gṛhapateḥ śuśumāragirīyakasya putra iti?
analyzed: tvam bodhasya gṛhapateḥ śuśumāragirīyakasya putraḥ iti

original: sa kathayati--evaṃ māṃ bhaginījanaḥ saṃjānīta iti/
analyzed: sa kathayati evam mām bhaginī janaḥ saṃjānīte iti

original: 108.009. sā aśruparyākulekṣaṇā bāṣpoparudhyamānakaṇṭhā urasi prahāraṃ dattvā karuṇādīnavilambitākṣaraṃ praṣṭumārabdhā/
analyzed: sā aśru paryākula īkṣaṇā bāṣpa uparudhyamāna kaṇṭhā urasi prahāram dattvā karuṇā dīn avilambita akṣaram praṣṭum ārabdhā
tau tava mātā pitarau kālagatau kālagatau
te jñātayah
sa kathayati teṣām api kecid kālagatāḥ
kecid niṣpalāyitāḥ

original: kecit tatraiva tiṣṭhanto vācamapi na prayacchanti/
analyzed: kecid tatra eva tiṣṭhantaḥ vācam api na prayacchanti
te dāsī dāsa karmakara pauruṣeyāḥ
teṣām api kecid kālagatāḥ
kecid niṣpalāyitāḥ
kecid tatra eva anyān āśritya avasthitāḥ vācam api na prayacchanti
yat api dhana jātam tat api kiṃcid agninā dagdham

original: kiṃcidanyapauruṣeyā gṛhītvā dhanārthino deśāntaraṃ mahāsamudraṃ cāvatīrṇāḥ/
analyzed: kiṃcid anya pauruṣeyāḥ gṛhītvā dhana arthinaḥ deśa antaram mahā samudram ca avatīrṇāḥ
tatra api keṣāṃcid yānapātram vipannam
keṣāṃcid paṇyam a paṇyībhūtam
kecid tatra eva anayena vyasanam āpannāḥ
keṣāṃcid kāntāra madhya gatānām taskaraiḥ dravyam apahṛtam
keṣāṃcid nagara samīpam anuprāptānām śaulkika śaulkikaiḥ dravyam vicārayadbhiḥ sāraḥ gṛhītaḥ
keṣāṃcid pattanam anuprāptānām rāja niyuktaiḥ doṣam utpādya sarva svam apahṛtam
kecid tasya prāṇa viyogam śrutvā tatra eva avasthitāḥ

original: 108.019. sā dīrghamuṣṇaṃ ca niśvasya kathayati--ihaiva tiṣṭha yāvatte bhaginyāḥ kathayāmīti/
analyzed: sā dīrgham uṣṇam ca niśvasya kathayati iha eva tiṣṭha yāvat te bhaginyāḥ kathayāmi iti
tayā gatvā tasyāḥ prayacchannam kathitam
kīdṛśena paṇyena iti
sā kathayati kutas sya paṇyam
daṇḍam asya haste mallakaḥ ca iti
tayā tasya artham mahārhāṇi vastrāṇi dattāni

original: 108.021. kārṣāpaṇāṃśca dattvā uktā ca--sa vaktavyo yadi te bhāgineyo vā bhāgineyikā vā upasaṃkrāmati,
analyzed: kārṣāpaṇān ca dattvā uktā ca sa vaktavyaḥ yadi te bhāgineyaḥ vā bhāgineyikā vā upasaṃkrāmati
tasya eva kārṣāpaṇān dadyāḥ
mā jñātīnām pratarkyaḥ bhaviṣyati iti

original: 108.023. sā vastrāṇyādāya kārṣāpaṇāṃśca tasya sakāśaṃ gatā kathayati--imāni te vastrāṇi kārṣāpaṇāśca bhaginyā preṣitāni,
analyzed: sā vastrāṇi ādāya kārṣāpaṇān ca tasya sakāśam gatā kathayati imāni te vastrāṇi kārṣāpaṇāḥ ca bhaginyā preṣitāni

original: kathayati ca--yadi te bhāgineyo vā bhāgineyikā vā upasaṃkrāmati,
analyzed: kathayati ca yadi te bhāgineyaḥ vā bhāgineyikā vā upasaṃkrāmati
tasya etat kārṣāpaṇān dadyāḥ
mā jñātīnām pratarkyaḥ bhaviṣyasi
sa kathayati śobhanam eva bhavati
iti uktvā tūṣṇīm avasthitaḥ
dārikā prakrāntā
sa saṃlakṣayati anāthapiṇḍadaḥ gṛhapatiḥ vistīrṇa sva jana parivāraḥ
asmākam api pitā vistīrṇa parivāraḥ
teṣām am ekaikaśas vārtām pratyavekṣate
bhaginyā ciram ālāpaḥ bhaviṣyati

original: 108.029. sa ca mārgapariśramakhinnena kṣudhārtena na śakyate kartum/
analyzed: sa ca mārga pariśrama khinnena kṣudhā ārtena na śakyate kartum
purobhakṣikām tāvat karomi
tṛptaḥ sukha ālāpam udyānam gatvā śayitaḥ
ācaritam śrāvastyām udyāna moṣakāḥ puruṣāḥ pratidinam anvāhiṇḍyante
te yadi suptam puruṣam paśyanti
pādena ghaṭṭayanti
sa yadi
tam evam vadanti bhoḥ puruṣa

original: na tvayā śrutam yathā śrāvastyāmudyānamoṣakāḥ puruṣāḥ pratidinamanvāhiṇḍyante?
analyzed: na tvayā śrutam yathā śrāvastyām udyāna moṣakāḥ puruṣāḥ pratidinam anvāhiṇḍyante
te yadi suptam puruṣam paśyanti
vadanti uttiṣṭha gaccha iti
yadi na prativibudhyate
muṣitvā gacchanti
taiḥ pādena ghaṭṭitaḥ na prativibudhyate
muṣitvā prakrāntāḥ

original: 109.003. sa vigatamadyamadaḥ pratibuddho yāvat paśyati tānyevānantakāni(?)
analyzed: sa vigata madya madaḥ pratibuddhaḥ yāvat paśyati tāni eva anantakāni
prāvṛtya avasthitaḥ
bhaginī saṃlakṣayati aticirayati asau
nūnam atra kāraṇena bhavitavyam iti
tasya asau dārikā punar preṣitā a dārike gaccha
cirayati asau
paśya kimartham na āgacchati iti

original: 109.006. sā gatā yāvat paśyati muṣitakaṃ tenaiva veṣeṇāvasthitam/
analyzed: sā gatā yāvat paśyati muṣitakam tena eva veṣeṇa avasthitam
sā tvarita tvaritam gatā tasyāḥ kathayati ārye
muṣitaḥ tena eva veṣeṇa tiṣṭhati iti

original: 109.008. sā saṃlakṣayati--yamāgamya bodhasya gṛhapateranekadhanasamuditaṃ sasuhṛtsambandhibāndhavaṃ gṛhaṃ vinaṣṭam,
analyzed: sā saṃlakṣayati yam āgamya bodhasya gṛhapateḥ aneka dhana samuditam sa suhṛd sambandhi bāndhavam gṛham vinaṣṭam
yadi tam iha praveśayāmi
sthānam etat vidyate yat mayā api śvaśura gṛham anayena vyasanam āpatsyate
na asau iha praveśayitavyaḥ
iti viditvā tayā api upekṣitaḥ
tasya api pūrva karma aparādhāt vismṛtam
sa kroḍamallakānām madhye praviṣṭaḥ
te yatra yatra bhaikṣa arthinaḥ praviśanti

original: tatra tatra nirbhatsyante ca niṣkāsyante ca/
analyzed: tatra tatra nirbhatsyante ca niṣkāsyante ca
nairāśyam āpannāḥ rikta hastāḥ rikta mallakāḥ śūnya devakula maṇḍapa vṛkṣa mūlāni āgatāḥ
te nyonyam pṛcchanti bhavantaḥ

original: vayaṃ pūrvam yatra yatra gacchāmastataḥ pūrṇahastāḥ pūrṇamallakā gacchāmaḥ/
analyzed: vayam pūrvam yatra yatra gacchāmaḥ tatas pūrṇa hastāḥ pūrṇa mallakāḥ gacchāmaḥ

original: 109.014. idānīṃ ko yogo yena vayaṃ riktahastā riktamallakā nairāśyamāpannā ihāgatā iti?
analyzed: idānīm kaḥ yogaḥ yena vayam rikta hastāḥ rikta mallakāḥ nairāśyam āpannāḥ iha āgatāḥ iti

original: tatraike kathayanti--nūnaṃ ko 'pi mandabhāgyo 'smākaṃ madhye praviṣṭo yena vayaṃ riktahastā riktamallakā ihāgatā iti/
analyzed: tatra eke kathayanti nūnam kaḥ pi mandabhāgyaḥ smākam madhye praviṣṭaḥ yena vayam rikta hastāḥ rikta mallakāḥ iha āgatāḥ iti
apare kathayanti dvidhā bhūtvā praviśāmaḥ iti
te parasmin divase dvidhā bhūtvā praviṣṭāḥ
tatra yeṣām madhye svāgataḥ

original: te tathaiva nirbhartsitā niṣkāsitāśca nairāśyamāpannā riktahastā riktamallakāścāgatāḥ/
analyzed: te tathā eva nirbhartsitāḥ niṣkāsitāḥ ca nairāśyam āpannāḥ rikta hastāḥ rikta mallakāḥ ca āgatāḥ
te tu anye pūrṇa hastāḥ pūrṇa mallakāḥ
ye rikta hastāḥ rikta mallakāḥ āgatāḥ
te bhūyas dvidhā bhūtvā praviṣṭāḥ
teṣām api yeṣām madhye svāgataḥ
te tathā eva rikta hastāḥ rikta mallakāḥ ca āgatāḥ

original: 109.020. te bhūyo dvidhā bhūtā evam yāvat svāgato 'nyaśca kroḍamallakaḥ praviṣṭaḥ/
analyzed: te bhūyas dvidhā bhūtāḥ evam yāvat svāgataḥ kroḍamallakaḥ praviṣṭaḥ
tau rikta hastau rikta mallakau āgatau
te tu anye pūrṇa hastāḥ pūrṇa mallakāḥ āgatāḥ

original: 109.022. te kroḍamallakāḥ sarve saṃbhūya saṃjalpaṃ kartumārabdhāh--bhavantaḥ,
analyzed: te kroḍamallakāḥ sarve saṃbhūya saṃjalpam kartum ārabdhāḥ ah bhavantaḥ

original: ayaṃ mandabhāgyasattvo 'smākaṃ madhye praviṣṭo yena vayaṃ riktahastā riktamallakāścāgatāḥ/
analyzed: ayam mandabhāgya sattvaḥ smākam madhye praviṣṭaḥ yena vayam rikta hastāḥ rikta mallakāḥ ca āgatāḥ
niṣkāsayāmaḥ enam iti

original: 109.024. sa taiḥ prabhūtān prahārān dattvā śirasi ca mallakaṃ bhaṅktvā niṣkāsitaḥ//
analyzed: sa taiḥ prabhūtān prahārān dattvā śirasi ca mallakam bhaṅktvā niṣkāsitaḥ
atra antare nāthapiṇḍadena gṛhapatinā buddha pramukhaḥ bhikṣu saṃghaḥ ntargṛhe bhaktena upanimantritaḥ

original: 109.026. tena dauvārikāṇāmājñā dattā--na tāvat kasyacit kroḍamallakasya praveśo dātavyo yāvadbuddhapramukhena bhikṣusaṃghena bhuktam/
analyzed: tena dauvārikāṇām ājñā dattā tāvat kasyacid kroḍamallakasya praveśaḥ dātavyaḥ yāvat buddha pramukhena bhikṣu saṃghena bhuktam
paścāt tān bhojayiṣyāmi iti

original: 109.027. kroḍamallakā ye tasya gṛhaṃ pratiśaraṇabhūtāste sarve saṃnipatitāḥ praveṣṭumārabdhāḥ/
analyzed: kroḍamallakāḥ ye tasya gṛham pratiśaraṇa bhūtāḥ te sarve saṃnipatitāḥ praveṣṭum ārabdhāḥ
dauvārikeṇa virodhitāḥ
kathayanti bhoḥ puruṣa

original: asmākameva nāṃnā ayaṃ gṛhapatiḥ prajñāyate anāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatiriti/
analyzed: asmākam eva nāṃnā ayam gṛhapatiḥ prajñāyate anāthapiṇḍadaḥ gṛhapatiḥ iti
tat kim idam iti kṛtvā asmān vidhārayasi iti

original: sa kathayati--gṛhapatinā ājñādattā--na tāvat kasyacit kroḍamallakasya praveśo dātavyo yāvadbuddhapramukhena bhikṣusaṃghena bhuktam/
analyzed: sa kathayati gṛhapatinā tāvat kasyacid kroḍamallakasya praveśaḥ dātavyaḥ yāvat buddha pramukhena bhikṣu saṃghena bhuktam
paścāt tān bhojayiṣyāmi iti
te kathayanti bhavantaḥ
na kadācid vayam

original: 110.001. taṃ paśyata mā atrāryā durāgata āgato bhavediti/
analyzed: tam paśyata mā atra āryāḥ durāgataḥ āgataḥ bhavet iti

original: 110.001. te samanveṣṭitumārabdhā yāvat paśyantyekasmin pradeśe nilīyāvasthitam/
analyzed: te samanveṣṭitum ārabdhāḥ yāvat paśyanti ekasmin pradeśe nilīya avasthitam

original: 110.002. tatastaiḥ kolāhalaśabdaḥ kṛtah--ayaṃ bhavantaḥ sa durāgato nilīnastiṣṭhatīti/
analyzed: tatas taiḥ kolāhala śabdaḥ kṛta hayam bhavantaḥ sa durāgataḥ nilīnaḥ tiṣṭhati iti

original: 110.003. sa taiḥ prabhūtān prahārān datvā niṣkāsitastīvreṇa ca paryavasthānena śirasi mallakena prahāro dattaḥ/
analyzed: sa taiḥ prabhūtān prahārān da tvā niṣkāsitaḥ tīvreṇa ca paryavasthānena śirasi mallakena prahāraḥ dattaḥ
tasya śiraḥ bhagnam
sa nivartya vipralapitum ārabdhaḥ

original: 110.005. tatastairhastapādeṣu gṛhītvā saṃkārakūṭe kṣiptah--durāgata atra tiṣṭheti/
analyzed: tatas taiḥ hasta pādeṣu gṛhītvā saṃkāra kūṭe atra tiṣṭha iti
sa rudhireṇa pragharatā tasmin saṃkārakūṭe vasthitaḥ

original: 110.006. yāvadbhagavān pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaramādāya bhikṣugaṇaparivṛto bhikṣusaṃghapuraskṛto yenānāthapiṇḍadasya gṛhapater niveśanaṃ
analyzed: yāvat bhagavān pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātra cīvaram ādāya bhikṣu gaṇa parivṛtaḥ bhikṣu saṃgha puraskṛtaḥ yena anāthapiṇḍadasya gṛhapateḥ niveśanam
adrākṣīt bhagavān svāgatam paruṣa rūkṣa aṅguli dīrgha keśam rajasā avacūrṇita gātram

original: kṛśamalpasthānaṃ malinajīrṇavāsonivasitaṃ śirasā bhagnena rudhireṇa pragharatā anyaiśca vraṇaiścākīrṇaiḥ,
analyzed: kṛśam alpa sthānam malina jīrṇa vāsaḥ nivasitam śirasā bhagnena rudhireṇa pragharatā anyaiḥ ca vraṇaiḥ ca ākīrṇaiḥ
makṣikābhiḥ upadrutaiḥ saṃkāra kūṭe nipatitam

original: 110.010. dṛṣṭvā ca punarbhikṣūnāmantrayate sma--tṛpyata bhikṣavaḥ sarvabhavopapattibhyaḥ/
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā ca punar bhikṣūn āmantrayate sma atṛpyata bhikṣavaḥ sarva bhava upapattibhyaḥ
tṛpyata sarva bhava upapatti upakaraṇebhyaḥ
yatra nāma caramabhavikasya sattvasya iyam avasthā

original: 110.011. tatra bhagavāṃs taṃ svāgatamāmantrayate--ākāṅkṣase vatsa pātraśeṣam? bhagavan/
analyzed: tatra bhagavān tam svāgatam āmantrayate ākāṅkṣase vatsa pātra śeṣam bhagavan
tatra bhagavān āyuṣmantam ānandam āmantrayate svāgatasya te ānanda pātra śeṣaḥ sthāpayitavyam iti
evam bhadanta iti āyuṣmān ānandaḥ bhagavataḥ pratyaśrauṣīt
atha bhagavān yena anāthapiṇḍadasya gṛhapateḥ bhakta abhisāraḥ tena upasaṃkrāntaḥ
upasaṃkramya purastāt bhikṣu saṃghasya prajñapte eva āsane niṣaṇṇaḥ

original: 110.016. anāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatiḥ sukhopaniṣaṇṇaṃ buddhapramukhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghaṃ viditvā
analyzed: anāthapiṇḍadaḥ gṛhapatiḥ sukha upaniṣaṇṇam buddha pramukham bhikṣu saṃgham viditvā

original: praṇītena khādanīyabhojanīyena svahastena saṃtarpya saṃpravārya bhagavantaṃ bhuktavantaṃ
analyzed: praṇītena khādanīya bhojanīyena sva hastena saṃtarpya saṃpravārya bhagavantam bhuktavantam

original: viditvā dhautahastamapanītapātraṃ nīcataramāsanaṃ gṛhītvā bhagavataḥ purastānniṣaṇṇo dharmaśravaṇāya /
analyzed: viditvā dhauta hastam apanīta pātram nīcataram āsanam gṛhītvā bhagavataḥ purastāt niṣaṇṇaḥ dharma śravaṇāya
āyuṣmataḥ ānandasya tat pātra śeṣam svāgatāya vismṛtam
a saṃmoṣa dharmāṇaḥ buddhāḥ bhagavantaḥ
bhagavatā utthāpitam

original: 110.020. āyuṣmānānando bhagavataḥ pātraṃ gṛhītumārabdho yāvat paśyati tatra pātraśeṣaṃ na saṃsthāpitam/
analyzed: āyuṣmān ānandaḥ bhagavataḥ pātram gṛhītum ārabdhaḥ yāvat paśyati tatra pātra śeṣam na saṃsthāpitam
dṛṣṭvā ca smṛtiḥ utpannā
sa dharma tattvaḥ vacasā
atha roditum ārabdhaḥ
bhagavān āha kasmāt tvam ānanda rodiṣi iti

original: 110.022. sa kathayati--na mayā bhadanta bhagavataḥ kadācidājñā pratyūḍhapūrveti/
analyzed: sa kathayati na mayā bhadanta bhagavataḥ kadācid ājñā pratyūḍha pūrvā iti

original: 110.023. kiṃ kṛtam? svāgatasya pātraśeṣaṃ na sthāpitamiti/
analyzed: kim kṛtam svāgatasya pātra śeṣam na sthāpitam iti
bhagavān āhana tvayā ānanda mama ājñā pratismṛtā

original: api tu svāgatasyaiva tāni karmāṇi labdhasambhārāṇi pariṇatapratyayānyoghavatpratyupasthitānyavaśyabhāvīni yena tava vismṛtam/
analyzed: api tu svāgatasya eva tāni karmāṇi labdha sambhārāṇi pariṇata pratyayāni oghavat pratyupasthitāni avaśya bhāvīni yena tava vismṛtam
alam viṣādena
gaccha tam śabdāpaya iti
sa gatvā śabdāpayitum ārabdhaḥ
anekaiḥ prativacanam dattam

original: 110.027. svāgatasya tadapi vismṛtam yadbhagavatā pratijñātam--tava pātraśeṣaṃ sthāpayiṣyāmīti/
analyzed: svāgatasya tat api vismṛtam yat bhagavatā pratijñātam tava pātra śeṣam sthāpayiṣyāmi iti

original: 110.028. sa saṃlakṣayati--ko 'pyayaṃ puṇyakarmā bhagavatā trailokyaguruṇā samanvāhṛtaḥ śabdata iti/
analyzed: sa saṃlakṣayati kaḥ pi ayam puṇya karmā bhagavatā trailokya guruṇā samanvāhṛtaḥ śabdataḥ iti
āyuṣmatā ānandena gatvā bhagavataḥ ārocitam

original: 110.029. bhagavan svāgata ityuktvā anekaiḥ prativacanaṃ dattam/
analyzed: bhagavan svāgataḥ iti uktvā anekaiḥ prativacanam dattam
na jāne kam śabdāpayāmi iti
bhagavān āha gaccha ānanda

original: gatvā kathaya--yo bodhasya gṛhapateḥ śuśumāragirīyasya putraḥ svāgataḥ,
analyzed: gatvā bodhasya gṛhapateḥ śuśumāragirīyasya putraḥ svāgataḥ
saḥ āgacchatu iti

original: 110.031. āyuṣmatā ānandena gatvoccaiḥ śabdairuktah--yo bodhasya gṛhapateḥ śuśumāragirīyakasya putraḥ svāgataḥ,
analyzed: āyuṣmatā ānandena gatvā uccais śabdaiḥ ukta hyaḥ bodhasya gṛhapateḥ śuśumāragirīyakasya putraḥ svāgataḥ
saḥ āgacchatu iti
tena putuḥ nāma śravaṇāt ātmanaḥ nāma smṛtam
sa śanais daṇḍa viṣṭambhana yogāt utthāya gāthām bhāṣate
svāgata śabdaḥ yam kutas punar iha āgataḥ
nūnam śreyasaḥ nāśaḥ śreyasaḥ ca

original: 111.003. teṣāṃ sarvajña nātho 'si ye hi tvāṃ śaraṇaṃ gatāḥ/
analyzed: teṣām sarvajña nāthaḥ si ye hi tvām śaraṇam gatāḥ

original: 111.004. teṣāṃ svāgatamāryāṇām ye ca te śāsane ratāḥ//2//
analyzed: teṣām svāgatam āryāṇām ye ca te śāsane
aham tu bhāgya rahitaḥ sarva bandhu vivarjitaḥ

original: 111.006. śocyaḥ kaṣṭāṃ daśāṃ prāptaḥ śokaśalyasamarpitaḥ//3// iti/
analyzed: śocyaḥ kaṣṭām daśām prāptaḥ iti
atha āyuṣmān ānandaḥ tam ādāya yena bhagavān tena upasaṃkrāntaḥ
upasaṃkramya bhagavantam idam avocat ayam bhadanta svāgataḥ iti
sa bhagavatā kṣudhā saṃjanita daurmanasyaḥ samāśvāsitaḥ
uktaḥ ca putra
imam pātra śeṣam paribhuṅkṣva iti

original: 111.009. sa taṃ dṛṣṭvā saṃlakṣayati--yadyapyahaṃ bhagavatā trailokyaguruṇā daivāt samanvāhṛtaḥ,
analyzed: sa tam dṛṣṭvā saṃlakṣayati yadi api aham bhagavatā trailokya guruṇā daivāt samanvāhṛtaḥ
tat api stokaḥ pātra śeṣaḥ sthāpitaḥ
kim atra bhokṣye iti
bhagavān tasya cetasā cittam ājñāya kathayati vatsa

original: yadi tvaṃ sumerumātraiḥ piṇḍaiḥ samudrasadṛśena kuṣkiṇā paribhokṣyase,
analyzed: yadi tvam sumeru mātraiḥ piṇḍaiḥ samudra sadṛśena kuṣkiṇā paribhokṣyase
tathā api avyayam tat na parikṣayam gamiṣyati
yāvat tṛptaḥ paribhuṅkṣva yathāsukham iti

original: 111.013. tena tāvad bhuktam yāvat tṛpta iti/
analyzed: tena tāvat bhuktam yāvat tṛptaḥ iti
tad saṃtarpita indriyaḥ bhagavataḥ mukham vyavalokayitum ārabdhaḥ
bhagavān āha vatsa svāgata tṛptaḥ si
tṛptaḥ smi bhagavan
vatsa yadi evam apaścimam kavalam gṛhāṇa
antardhāsyati eṣa pātre iti
tena a paścima kavalaḥ gṛhītaḥ
saḥ antarhitaḥ
bhagavān dakṣiṇā deśanām kṛtvā prakrāntaḥ

original: 111.016. caramabhavikaḥ sa sattvo bhagavantaṃ pṛṣṭataḥ pṛṣṭataḥ samanubaddhaḥ/
analyzed: caramabhavikaḥ sa sattvaḥ bhagavantam pṛṣṭatas pṛṣṭatas samanubaddhaḥ

original: 111.017. yāvadbhagavān vihāraṃ gatvā purastādbhikṣusaṃghasya prajñapta evāsane niṣaṇṇaḥ/
analyzed: yāvat bhagavān vihāram gatvā purastāt bhikṣu saṃghasya prajñapte eva āsane niṣaṇṇaḥ

original: 111.017. so 'pi bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte niṣaṇṇaḥ/
analyzed: saḥ pi bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte niṣaṇṇaḥ
bhagavān saṃlakṣayati puṣpāṇām enam preṣayāmi
karma apanayaḥ sya kartavya
iti viditvā svāgatam āmantrayata iva sa sbāgata
santi te kārṣāpaṇāḥ
na santi bhagavan
vatsa svāgata
vastra antam nirīkṣasva

original: 111.020. vastrāntaṃ nirīkṣitumārabdho yāvat paśyati dvau kārṣāpaṇau/
analyzed: vastra antam nirīkṣitum ārabdhaḥ yāvat paśyati dvau kārṣāpaṇau
sa kathayati bhagavan
dvau kārṣāpaṇau
vatsa gaccha
gaṇḍakasya ārāmikasya sakāśāt nīlotpalāni gṛhītvā āgaccha iti
svāgataḥ tasya sakāśam gataḥ
sa tam dūrāt eva dṛṣṭvā paryavasthitaḥ
sa saṃlakṣayati āgataḥ yam dūra āgataḥ
niyatam mama anarthaḥ bhavati
iti viditvā sa paruṣam kathayati durāgata
kimartham rvam iha āgacchasi iti
sa gāthām bhāṣate

original: 111.025. nīlotpalairasti kāryaṃ me tathānyair nāpi paṅkajaiḥ/
analyzed: nīlotpalaiḥ asti kāryam me tathā anyaiḥ nā api paṅkajaiḥ
muni indrasya tu dūtaḥ ham sarvajñasya
iti uktvā pratinivartitum ārabdhaḥ
saḥ pi gāthām bhāṣate

original: 111.028. ehyehi yadi dūto 'si tasya śāntātmano muneḥ/
analyzed: ehi ehi yadi si tasya śānta ātmanaḥ muneḥ
pūjyaḥ sa naradevānām pūjyaḥ
iti uktvā sa kathayati buddha dūtaḥ tvam
buddha dūtaḥ
kimartham āgataḥ
puṣpa artham
yadi buddha dūtaḥ tvam
gṛhāṇa yathā īpsitam
nīlotpalānām bhāram ādāya bhagavataḥ sakāśam āgataḥ
bhikṣūṇām cāraya
sa bhikṣūṇām cārayitum ārabdhaḥ
bhikṣavaḥ na pratigṛhṇanti
bhagavān āha gṛhṇīdhvam bhikṣavaḥ sarva saugandham
cakṣurbhyām karma apanayaḥ sya kartavyaḥ iti
bhikṣubhiḥ gṛhītāni
gṛhītvā puṣpitāni
tena apūrvam nīlakṛtsnam utpāditam pūrvam

original: 112.003. sa vṛddhānte sthitvā tāni puṣpāṇi dṛṣṭvā sutarāṃ nirīkṣitumārabdhaḥ/
analyzed: sa vṛddhānte sthitvā tāni puṣpāṇi dṛṣṭvā sutarām nirīkṣitum ārabdhaḥ
tasya tat nīlakṛtsnam āmukhībhūtam
tatas tam bhagavān āha vatsa
kim na pravrajasi iti
sa kathayati pravrajāmi bhagavan iti
bhagavatā pravrajitaḥ upasampāditaḥ manasikāraḥ ca dattaḥ

original: 112.006. tena yujyamānena ghaṭamānena vyāyacchamānena idameva pañcagaṇḍakaṃ saṃsāracakraṃ
analyzed: tena yujyamānena ghaṭamānena vyāyacchamānena idam eva pañcagaṇḍakam saṃsāra cakram
calācalam viditvā sarva saṃskāra gatīḥ śatana patana vikiraṇa vidhvaṃsana dharmatayā parāhatya
sarva kleśa prahāṇāt arhat tvam sākṣātkṛtam
arhan saṃvṛttaḥ traidhātuka vīta rāgaḥ sama loṣṭa kāñcanaḥ ākāśa pāṇitala sama cittaḥ

original: 112.011. so 'rhattvaṃ prāpto vimuktisukhapratisaṃvedī tasyāṃ velāyāṃ gāthāṃ bhāṣate--
analyzed: saḥ ṛhat tvam prāptaḥ vimukti sukha pratisaṃvedī tasyām velāyām gāthām bhāṣate
upāya pāśaiḥ vīreṇa baddhvā aham tattva darśinā

svāgataḥ ham abhūvam prāk tatas paścāt durāgataḥ

original: 112.015. āgato 'smi purā nātha śrutvā vākyaṃ tavottamam//7//
analyzed: āgataḥ smi purā nātha śrutvā vākyam
sāmpratam svāgataḥ vyaktam saṃvṛttaḥ na durāgataḥ

original: 112.018. ratnāni pratilebhe hi svargaṃ mokṣaṃ ca kāṅkṣatām/
analyzed: ratnāni pratilebhe hi svargam mokṣam ca kāṅkṣatām

original: 112.019. śreṣṭhā kalyāṇamitrāṇāṃ sadā sevā hitaiṣiṇām//9// iti/
analyzed: śreṣṭhā kalyāṇa mitrāṇām sadā sevā iti

original: 112.020. yadā āyuṣmān svāgataḥ svākhyāte dharmavinaye pravrajitaḥ,
analyzed: yadā āyuṣmān svāgataḥ su ākhyāte dharma vinaye pravrajitaḥ

original: tadā sāmantakena śabdo visṛtah--śramaṇena gautamenāsau durāgataḥ kroḍamallakaḥ pravrajitaḥ/
analyzed: tadā sāmantakena śabdaḥ visṛtaḥ śramaṇena gautamena asau durāgataḥ kroḍamallakaḥ pravrajitaḥ

rājā ca mūrdhātaḥ tad sthānam anuprāptaḥ

original: 135.022. rājñā abhihitam--sadāmattā eva me devāḥ purojavā bhavantu/

original: 135.022. yataḥ sadāmattā devāstaiḥ sārdhaṃ devair nāgaiścāgrataḥ pradhāvitāḥ/

na asya śakyam viroddhum iti
tatas taiḥ caturbhiḥ mahārājaiḥ trāyastriṃśānām ārocitam eṣa bhavantaḥ manuṣya rājā mūrdhātaḥ āgacchati

original: 137.024. rājño mūrdhātasya deveṣu trāyastriṃśeṣu tiṣṭhataḥ ṣaṭtriṃśāścakrāścyutāḥ/
analyzed: rājñaḥ mūrdhātasya deveṣu trāyastriṃśeṣu tiṣṭhataḥ ṣaṭtriṃśāḥ cakrāḥ cyutāḥ

original: 137.024. tatra ca teṣāṃ devānāṃ devāsurasaṃgrāmaṃ bhavati/
analyzed: tatra ca teṣām devānām deva asura saṃgrāmam bhavati

paścāt asura puryām dvārāṇi badhnanti

original: 137.027. yato rājñā mūrdhātena trāyastriṃśānāmuktam--kimetadbhavanto 'tīva saṃbhramajātā devāh?
analyzed: yatas rājñā mūrdhātena trāyastriṃśānām uktam kim etat bhavantaḥ tīva saṃbhrama jātāḥ
trāyastriṃśaiḥ uktam etaiḥ asuraiḥ asmākam pañca rakṣāḥ bhagnāḥ
yatas smābhiḥ dvārāṇi baddhāni
yatas mūrdhātena rājñā uktam ātma puruṣāḥ
ānayantu bhavantaḥ dhanuḥ
yatas tasya dhanuḥ ānītam
tena paścāt dhanuḥ gṛhya guṇa śabdaḥ kṛtaḥ
tasya ca dhanuṣaḥ guṇa śabdaḥ kṛtaḥ
asuraiḥ śrutaḥ
tam śrutvā asurā kathayanti kasya eṣa guṇa śabdaḥ
taiḥ śrutam rājñaḥ mūrdhātasya eṣa guṇa śabdaḥ
te tam śabdam śrutvā vismayam āpannāḥ

original: 137.032. paścādrājā mūrdhāto nirgatastasmādevanagarāt <138>teṣāṃ devānāmasurairbhagnakānāṃ svaṃ ca kāyaṃ saṃnahya/

original: 138.004. paścāt te saṃlakṣayanti--puṇyavipākamaheśākhyo 'yaṃ sattvo yasyāsmākamuparivaihāyasaṃ ratho gacchati/

original: 138.005. jitā bhagnāḥ parājitāḥ parāpṛṣṭhīkṛtā āsurīṃ purīṃ praviṣṭāḥ/

original: 142.004. tena khalu samayena pañcamātrāṇi vaṇikśatāni bhāṇḍaṃ samudānīya anupūrveṇa grāmanigamapallīpattanarājadhānīṣu cañcūryamāṇāni mahāsamudrataṭamanuprāptāni/
analyzed: tena khalu samayena pañca mātrāṇi vaṇij śatāni bhāṇḍam samudānīya anupūrveṇa grāma nigama pallī pattana rājadhānīṣu cañcūryamāṇāni mahā samudra taṭam anuprāptāni
taiḥ nipuṇatas sāmudram yānapātram pratipāditam

original: 142.006. yato vaṇijastaṃ mahāsamudraṃ dṛṣṭvā saṃbhinnamanaso na prasahante samavataritum/
analyzed: yatas vaṇijaḥ tam mahā samudram dṛṣṭvā saṃbhinna manasaḥ na prasahante samavataritum

original: 142.007. paścāttervaṇigbhiḥ karṇadhāra uktah--uddhoṣaya naḥ puruṣo mahāsamudrasya bhūtaṃ varṇam/
analyzed: paścātteḥ vaṇigbhiḥ karṇadhāraḥ ukta huddha uṣaya naḥ puruṣaḥ mahā samudrasya bhūtam varṇam

original: 142.008. yato varṇadhāra uddhoṣayituṃ pravṛttah--śṛṇvantu bhavanto jambudvīpakā manuṣyāḥ,
analyzed: yatas varṇadhāraḥ uddhoṣayitum pravṛttaḥ śṛṇvantu bhavantaḥ jambudvīpakāḥ manuṣyāḥ

original: tadyathā--maṇayo muktā vaiḍūryaśaṅkhaśilā pravālo rajataṃ jātarūpamaśmagarbho musāragalvo lohitikā dakṣiṇāvartāḥ/

original: 142.010. ya icchati evamrūpai ratnairātmānaṃ samyaksukhena prīṇayituṃ mātāpitarau putradāraṃ dāsīdāsakarmakarapauruṣeyaṃ mitrāmātyajñātisālohitam,
analyzed: yaḥ icchati evamrūpaiḥ ratnaiḥ ātmānam samyak sukhena prīṇayitum mātā pitarau putra dāram dāsī dāsa karmakara pauruṣeyam mitra amātya jñāti sālohitam

original: kālena ca kālaṃ dakṣiṇīyebhyaḥ śramaṇabrāhmaṇebhyo dakṣiṇāṃ pratiṣṭhāpayitumūrdhvagāminīṃ saubhāgyakarīṃ sukhavipākāmāyatyāṃ svargasaṃvartanīm,
analyzed: kālena ca kālam dakṣiṇīyebhyaḥ śramaṇa brāhmaṇebhyaḥ dakṣiṇām pratiṣṭhāpayitum ūrdhvagāminīm saubhāgya karīm sukha vipākām āyatyām svarga saṃvartanīm
saḥ smin mahā samudre avataratu dhana hetoḥ

original: 142.014. evamukte ca punaḥ sarva eva sattvāḥ saṃpattikāmā vipattipratikūlāstaṃ śrutvā tasmin mahāsamudre vyavasitāḥ samavataritum/
analyzed: evam ukte ca punar sarve eva sattvāḥ saṃpatti kāmāḥ vipatti pratikūlāḥ tam śrutvā tasmin mahā samudre vyavasitāḥ samavataritum
yatas tat vahanam ati prabhūtaiḥ manuṣyaiḥ atibhāreṇa ca ākrānta tvāt tatra eva avasīdati
tatas karṇadhāreṇa uktam asahyam vahanam

original: 142.016. yato vaṇijaḥ kathayanti--kasyedānīṃ vakṣyāmo vahanāt pratyavatarasveti/
analyzed: yatas vaṇijaḥ kathayanti kasya idānīm vakṣyāmaḥ vahanāt pratyavatarasva iti
taiḥ vaṇigbhiḥ karṇadhārasya uktam mahā samudrasya bhūtam varṇam udghoṣayata

original: 142.018. tataḥ sa udghoṣayituṃ pravṛttah--śṛṇvantu bhavanto jambudvīpakā manuṣyāḥ,
analyzed: tatas saḥ udghoṣayitum pravṛttaḥ hśṛṇvantu bhavantaḥ jambudvīpakāḥ manuṣyāḥ

original: santyasmin mahāsamudre imāni evamrūpāṇi mahānti mahābhayāni,
analyzed: santi asmin mahā samudre imāni evamrūpāṇi mahānti mahā bhayāni

original: tadyathā timibhayaṃ timiṃgilabhayamūrmibhayaṃ kūrmabhayaṃ sthale utsīdanabhayaṃ jale saṃsīdanabhayamantarjalagatānāṃ parvatānāmāghaṭṭanabhayaṃ
analyzed: tat yathā timi bhayam timiṃgila bhayam ūrmi bhayam kūrma bhayam sthale utsīdana bhayam jale saṃsīdana bhayam antar jala gatānām parvatānām āghaṭṭana bhayam
caurāḥ api āgacchanti nīla vāsasaḥ dhana hāriṇaḥ

original: 142.021. yena cātmano jīvitaparityāgo vyavāsthito mātāpitarau putradāraṃ dāsīdāsakarmakarapauruṣeyaṃ mitrāmātyajñātisālohitaṃ citraṃ ca jambudvīpaṃ
analyzed: yena ca ātmanaḥ jīvita parityāgaḥ vyavāsthitaḥ mātā pitarau putra dāram dāsī dāsa karmakara pauruṣeyam mitra amātya jñāti sālohitam citram ca jambudvīpam
sa mahā samudram avataratu
alpāḥ śūrāḥ bahavaḥ kātarāḥ

original: 142.023. taṃ śrutvā tathodghuṣya tu tasmādyānapātrādavatīrṇā bahavaḥ,
analyzed: tam śrutvā tathā udghuṣya tu tasmāt yānapātrāt avatīrṇāḥ bahavaḥ
kecid avaśiṣṭāḥ
tatas taiḥ vaṇigbhiḥ vahanasya ekam varatram chinnam

original: 142.025. paścād dvau trayo yāvadanupūrveṇa sarve varatrāśchinnāḥ/
analyzed: paścāt dvau trayaḥ yāvat anupūrveṇa sarve varatrāḥ chinnāḥ

original: 142.025. tāsu cchinnāsu tadvahanaṃ mahākarṇadhārasampreritaṃ gagane mahāvātasamprerito megha iva balavadvāyusampreritaṃ kṣiprameva saṃprasthitam/
analyzed: tāsu chinnāsu tat vahanam mahā karṇadhāra sampreritam gagane mahā vāta sampreritaḥ meghaḥ iva balavat vāyu sampreritam kṣipram eva saṃprasthitam
yāvat ratna dvīpam anuprāptaḥ

original: 142.027. sa taṃ pradeśamanuprāptānāṃ karṇadhāraḥ kathayati--santyasmin ratnadvīpe kācamaṇayo ratnasadṛśāḥ,
analyzed: sa tam pradeśam anuprāptānām karṇadhāraḥ kathayati santi asmin ratna dvīpe kāca maṇayaḥ ratna sadṛśāḥ
te bhavadbhiḥ upaparīkṣya upaparīkṣya gṛhītavyāḥ
mā vaḥ paścāt jambudvīpa gatānām tāpyam bhaviṣyati

original: 142.029. tatraiva ca kroñcakumārikā nāma striyo bhavanti/

atra eva ca madanīyāni phalāni bhavanti

sa sapta rātriṃdivasān suptaḥ tiṣṭhati

original: 142.031. asminneva ca ratnadvīpe saptāhāt pareṇa amanuṣyā na sahante,
analyzed: asmin eva ca ratna dvīpe sapta ahāt pareṇa amanuṣyāḥ na sahante

original: 143.001. prāpya ca taṃ ratnadvīpaṃ prayatnamāsthāya ratnānveṣaṇaṃ kṛtvā anupūrveṇopaparīkṣya
analyzed: prāpya ca tam ratna dvīpam prayatnam āsthāya ratna anveṣaṇam kṛtvā anupūrveṇa upaparīkṣya

original: ratnānāṃ tadvahanaṃ pūritaṃ tadyathā yavānāṃ vā yavasasyānāṃ vā mudgānāṃ vā bhāṣāṇāṃ vā /
analyzed: ratnānām tat vahanam pūritam tat yathā yavānām vā yava sasyānām vā mudgānām vā bhāṣāṇām vā

original: 143.012. tasyaivaṃ carata ātmabhāvācchira evaṃ lakṣyate dūrata eva,
analyzed: tasya evam carataḥ ātma bhāvāt śiraḥ evam lakṣyate dūratas eva

original: 143.013. akṣīṇi cāsya durata eva saṃlakṣyante nabhasīvādityau/

original: 143.016. teṣāṃ vahanaṃ vegenāpahriyamāṇaṃ dṛṣṭvā ādotuadvayotpādanaṃ ca saṃlakṣya saṃvega utpannah--kiṃ bhavanto yat tacchrūyate saptādityāḥ  #
analyzed: teṣām vahanam vegena apahriyamāṇam dṛṣṭvā ca saṃlakṣya saṃvegaḥ bhavantaḥ yat tat śrūyate sapta ādityāḥ

tat eva idānīm proditāḥ syuḥ

original: 143.018. yataḥ karṇadhāreṇa teṣāṃ vimarśajātānāmuktam--yat tadbhavantaḥ śrūyate timitimiṃgila iti,

original: 143.022. paśyatha etau dūrata eva sūryavadavalokyete etau akṣitārakau/

original: yasya vo yasmin deve bhaktiḥ sa tamāyācatu/
analyzed: yasya vaḥ yasmin deve bhaktiḥ sa tam āyācatu

original: 143.025. yadi tenāpi tāvadāyācanena kāciddevatā asmākamasmānmahābhayādvimoṣkaṇaṃ kuryāt/

original: 143.028. naiva ca teṣāmāyācatāṃ tasmānmaraṇabhayāt jīvitaparitrāṇaviśeṣaḥ kaścit/

original: 143.029. tathaiva tadvahanaṃ salilavegāt bhikṣiptaṃ timiṃgilamukhadvāram yato 'pahriyate/
analyzed: tathā eva tat vahanam salila vegāt bhikṣiptam timiṃgila mukha dvāram pahriyate

original: 143.031. kiṃ tu sarva evaikaraveṇa namo buddhāyeti vadāmaḥ/

original: 143.031. sati maraṇe buddhāvalambanayā smṛtyā kālaṃ kariṣyāmaḥ/

original: 144.001. bhagavatā ca jetavanasthena sa vādaḥ śruto divyena śrotreṇa viśuddhena atikrāntamānuṣeṇa/
analyzed: bhagavatā ca jetavana sthena sa vādaḥ śrutaḥ divyena śrotreṇa viśuddhena atikrānta mānuṣeṇa

original: 144.002. śrutvā ca punarbhagavatā sa nādastathā adhiṣṭhito yathā tena timiṃgilena śrutam/
analyzed: śrutvā ca punar bhagavatā sa nādaḥ tathā adhiṣṭhitaḥ yathā tena timiṃgilena śrutam

original: 144.003. tasya taṃ namo buddhāyeti rāvaṃ śrutvā manaso 'marṣa utpanno viklavībhūtaśca--buddho bata loka utpannaḥ/
analyzed: tasya tam namaḥ buddhāya iti rāvam śrutvā manasaḥ marṣaḥ utpannaḥ viklavībhūtaḥ ca buddhaḥ bata loke utpannaḥ

original: 144.004. na mama pratirūpaṃ syāt yadahaṃ buddhasya bhagavato nāmodghoṣaṃ śrutvā āhāramāhareyam/

original: 144.005. sa cintayituṃ pravṛttah--yadyahamidanīṃ sahasaiva mukhadvāraṃ pidhāsyāmi,
analyzed: sa cintayitum sahasā eva mukha dvāram pidhāsyāmi
salila vega pratyāhatasya vahanasya vināśaḥ bhaviṣyati

original: 144.006. yannvahaṃ mṛdunopakrameṇa svairaṃ svairaṃ mukhadvāraṃ saṃpidadhyām/
analyzed: yat nu aham mṛdunā upakrameṇa svairam svairam mukha dvāram saṃpidadhyām

original: 144.007. tatastena timiṃgilenātmīyaṃ mukhadvāraṃ mṛdunopakrameṇa svairaṃ svairaṃ pihitam/
analyzed: tatas tena timiṃgilena ātmīyam mukha dvāram mṛdunā upakrameṇa svairam svairam pihitam
paścāt tat vahanam tasmāt mahā grāha mukhāt vinirmuktam anuguṇam vāyum āsādya tīram anuprāptam

original: 144.009. atha te vaṇijastīramāsādya tadbhāṇḍaṃ śakaṭoṣṭragogardabhādibhiḥ purayitvā anupūrveṇa grāmanigamapallīpattanādiṣu cañcūryamāṇāḥ śrāvastīmanuprāptāḥ/
analyzed: atha te vaṇijaḥ tīram āsādya tat bhāṇḍam śakaṭa uṣṭra go gardabha ādibhiḥ purayitvā anupūrveṇa grāma nigama pallī pattana ādiṣu cañcūryamāṇāḥ śrāvastīm anuprāptāḥ

original: 144.010. te tatra gatvā saṃlakṣayanti--dharmataiṣā yasya nāṃnā vahanaṃ saṃsiddhayānapātramāgacchati,
analyzed: te tatra gatvā saṃlakṣayanti dharmatā eṣā yasya vahanam saṃsiddha yānapātram āgacchati
tasya eva tāni ratnāni gamyāni bhavanti

original: 144.012. yannu vayametāni ratnāni buddhasya bhagavato dadyāmaḥ/

original: 147.007. sa tasyāhārasya śakaṭaṃ pūrayitvā praṇītapraṇītasya śucinaḥ sārdhaṃ sarvarūpairmitrasvajanasahāyo buddhapramukhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghaṃ bhojayiṣyāmīti  #

pṛṣṭahārya
punar bhokṣyase
sa kathayati yadi te parityaktam

punar bhokṣyase

original: 147.028. iti saṃcintya garbharūpāṇi gṛhe 'nupraveśayituṃ pravṛttah--gacchatha yūyaṃ śīghraṃ gṛhameva,

original: 147.029. sa gṛhajanaṃ visarjya maraṇabhayabhītastasmāt śakaṭādannapānaṃ gṛhītvā pariveṣayitumārabdhaḥ/
analyzed: sa gṛha janam visarjya maraṇa bhaya bhītaḥ tasmāt śakaṭāt anna pānam gṛhītvā pariveṣayitum ārabdhaḥ
sa ca svairam bhuñjati
gṛhapatinā uktam ārya
tvarita tvaritam pratīcchasva

dattvā bhaya gṛhītaḥ śrutvā tvarita tvaritam vandāmi ārya iti pṛṣṭham an avalokayamānaḥ
nagaram prasthitaḥ

original: 148.002. tasmānnagarāt piṇḍapātanirhārako bhikṣu tasyaiva piṇḍapātaṃ gṛhītvā gataḥ/

original: 148.004. tasya ca gṛhapater nagaraṃ praviśato 'bhimukhaṃ bhagavān bhikṣusaṃghaparivṛtaḥ saṃprāptaḥ/

original: ahaṃ buddhapramukhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghamuddiśya pañcānāṃ bhikṣuśatānāṃ tṛptitaḥ śakaṭamannapānasya pūrayitvā jetavanaṃ gato buddhapramyukhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghaṃ

original: 148.007. na ca me tatra bhikṣavo labdhāḥ/

original: 148.007. tena samākhyātaṃ buddhapramukhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghamantargṛham upanimantraṇaṃ praviṣṭam/

original: 148.009. yatastasya mamānupūrveṇa sarvaṃ tadannapānaṃ śakaṭaṃ dattam/

bhagavatā abhihitam gṛhapate
bhikṣuḥ sa dharmaruciḥ nāṃnā
prāmodyam utpādaya
adya sa tvadīyena annapā annena tṛptaḥ rhat tvam sākṣātkariṣyati
atha bhagavān jetavanam abhyāgataḥ

original: 148.012. bhagavān saṃlakṣayati--ko 'sau dānapatirbhaviṣyati yo 'sau dharmaruceretāvatā āhāreṇa pratidivasam yogodvahanaṃ kariṣyati?
analyzed: bhagavān saṃlakṣayati sau dānapatiḥ bhaviṣyati yaḥ sau dharmaruceḥ etāvatā āhāreṇa pratidivasam yogodvahanam kariṣyati
yatas bhagavatā abhihitam dṛṣṭaḥ tvayā dharmaruce mahā samudraḥ
sa kathayati na u bhagavan
yatas bhagavān āha gṛhāṇa madīyam cīvarakarṇikam
paścāt te ham mahā samudram darśayāmi
yatas dharmarucinā bhagavataḥ cīvarakarṇikaḥ valambitaḥ

original: paścādbhagavān vitatapakṣa iva haṃsarājaḥ sahacittotpādāt ṛddhyā dharmaruciṃ gṛhītvā samudrataṭamanuprāptaḥ/
analyzed: paścāt bhagavān vitata pakṣaḥ iva haṃsa rājaḥ saha citta utpādāt ṛddhyā dharmarucim gṛhītvā samudra taṭam anuprāptaḥ
yasmin ca asya sthāne timitimiṃgila bhūtasya asthaśakalā tiṣṭhati
tatra nītvā sthāpitaḥ
uktam ca asya gaccha vatsa
manasikāram cintaya
yatas sau dhramaruciḥ tām samīkṣitum ārabdhaḥ
kim etat kāṣṭham syāt atha asthiśakalā
atha phalakinī syāt
sa tasmāt vyaktim alabhamānaḥ paryantam anveṣitum pravṛttaḥ
vyaktim ca upalabdham

original: 148.020. sa itaścāmutaśca tasyā anupārśvanaṃ tāṃ paryeṣamāṇaḥ śramamupagataḥ/

na ca asya paryantam āsādayati
tasya etat abhavat na aham asya vyaktim jñāsyāmi kim etat iti
na ca paryantam āsādayiṣye
gacchāmi asmin arthe bhagavantam eva pṛcchāmi

original: 148.023. yato 'sau bhagavato 'ntikaṃ gatvā bhagavantaṃ pṛcchati--kiṃ tadbhagavan?

asthiśakalā eṣā

bhagavatā uktam tṛpyasva dharmaruce bhavebhyaḥ
tṛpyasva bhava upakaraṇebhyaḥ
tava eṣā asthiśakalā

original: 148.026. dharmarucistaṃ śrutvā bhagavadvaco vyākulitacetāḥ kathayati--mamaiṣedṛśī asthiśakalā?

original: 149.029. evaṃ saṃcintya bhāṇḍaṃ samudānīya grāmanigamapallīpattanarājadhānīṣvanupūrveṇa cañcūryamāṇaḥ samudramanuprāptaḥ/
analyzed: evam saṃcintya bhāṇḍam samudānīya grāma nigama pallī pattana rājadhānīṣu anupūrveṇa cañcūryamāṇaḥ samudram anuprāptaḥ
ghaṇṭā avaghoṣaṇam kṛtvā sāmudreṇa yānapātreṇa mahā samudram avatīrṇaḥ

original: 149.031. asya tasmin mahāsamudre 'vatīrṇasya kṣemaṃkaraḥ samyaksambuddhaḥ sakalambuddhakāryaṃ kṛtvā nirupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau parinirvṛtaḥ/
analyzed: asya tasmin mahā samudre vatīrṇasya kṣemaṃkaraḥ samyaksambuddhaḥ sakalambuddha kāryam kṛtvā nirupadhi śeṣe nirvāṇa dhātau parinirvṛtaḥ
tasya parinirvṛtasya vaśinaḥ bhikṣavaḥ
sapta aha parinirvṛtasya śāsanam antarhitam

original: 150.001. sa ca śreṣṭhī saṃsiddhayānapātreṇa devatāmānuṣyaparigṛhītena tasmānmahāsamudrāt tīrṇaḥ/
analyzed: sa ca śreṣṭhī saṃsiddha yānapātreṇa devatā mānuṣya parigṛhītena tasmāt mahā samudrāt tīrṇaḥ

original: 150.002. uttīrya ca taṃ bhāṇḍaṃ śakaṭairuṣṭrairgobhirgardabhaiśca cotkṣipya anupūrveṇa saṃprasthitaḥ/
analyzed: uttīrya ca tam bhāṇḍam śakaṭaiḥ uṣṭraiḥ gobhiḥ gardabhaiḥ ca ca utkṣipya anupūrveṇa saṃprasthitaḥ

original: 150.003. sa ca panthānaṃ gacchan prātipathikān pṛcchati--kiṃ bhavanto jānīdhvaṃ kṣemāvatyāṃ rājadhānyāṃ pravṛttih?
analyzed: sa ca panthānam gacchan prātipathikān pṛcchati kim bhavantaḥ jānīdhvam kṣemāvatyām rājadhānyām pravṛttiḥ
taiḥ uktam jānīmaḥ

original: 150.004. sa kathayati--asti kaścit kṣemāvatyāṃ rājadhānyāṃ kṣemaṃkaro nāma samyaksambuddhah?
analyzed: sa kathayati asti kaścid kṣemāvatyām rājadhānyām kṣemaṃkaraḥ nāma samyaksambuddhaḥ

original: te kathayanti--parinirvṛtaḥ sa bhagavān kṣemaṃkaraḥ samyaksambuddhaḥ/
analyzed: te kathayanti parinirvṛtaḥ sa bhagavān kṣemaṃkaraḥ samyaksambuddhaḥ
sa ca tat śrutvā param khedam upagataḥ
saṃmūrchitaḥ ca bhūmau patitaḥ

original: 150.007. tasmācca jalābhiṣekeṇa pratyāgataprāṇo jīvita utthāya bhūyaḥ pṛcchati--kiṃ bhavanto jānīdhvaṃ śrāvakā api tāvattasya bhagavatastiṣṭhanti?
analyzed: tasmāt ca jala abhiṣekeṇa pratyāgata prāṇaḥ jīvitaḥ utthāya bhūyas pṛcchati kim bhavantaḥ jānīdhvam śrāvakāḥ api tāvat tasya bhagavataḥ tiṣṭhanti
taiḥ ukta hte vaśinaḥ bhikṣavaḥ parinirvṛtāḥ

original: 150.009. saptāhaparinirvṛtasya ca buddhasya bhagavataḥ kṣemaṃkarasya samyaksambuddhasya kṣemeṇa rājñā caityamalpeśākhyaṃ pratiṣṭhāpitam/
analyzed: sapta aha parinirvṛtasya ca buddhasya bhagavataḥ kṣemaṃkarasya samyaksambuddhasya kṣemeṇa rājñā caityam alpeśākhyam pratiṣṭhāpitam

original: 150.010. tena ca gatvā śreṣṭhinā janapadāḥ pṛṣṭāḥ/
analyzed: tena ca gatvā śreṣṭhinā janapadāḥ pṛṣṭāḥ

original: 150.010. asti bhavantastasya bhagavato buddhasya kiṃcit stūpaṃ pratiṣṭhāpitam/
analyzed: asti bhavantaḥ tasya bhagavataḥ buddhasya kiṃcid stūpam pratiṣṭhāpitam
taiḥ uktam asti
kṣemeṇa rājñā alpeśākhyam caityam pratiṣṭhapitam

original: 150.012. tasya etadabhavat--etaṃ mayā suvarṇaṃ kṣemaṃkaraṃ samyaksambuddham uddiśyānītam/
analyzed: tasya etat abhavat itam mayā suvarṇam kṣemaṃkaram samyaksambuddham uddiśya ānītam
sa ca parinirvṛtaḥ

original: 150.013. yannvahametenaiva suvarṇena tasyaiva bhagavataścaityaṃ maheśākhyataraṃ kārayeyam/
analyzed: yat nu aham etena eva suvarṇena tasya eva bhagavataḥ caityam maheśākhyataram kārayeyam
evam vicintya kṣemam rājānam vijñāpayati mahā rāja
idam mayā suvarṇam kṣemaṃkaram samyaksambuddham uddiśya ānītam
sa ca bhagavān parinirvṛtaḥ
idānīm mahā rāja yadi tvam anujānīyāt

original: ahametenaiva suvarṇenaitat tasya bhagavataścaityaṃ maheśākhyataraṃ kārayeyam/
analyzed: aham etena eva suvarṇena etat tasya bhagavataḥ caityam maheśākhyataram kārayeyam
sa rājñā abhihita hyathā abhipretam kuru

original: 150.017. tato brāhmaṇā nagaraṃ prati nivāsinaḥ saṃbhūya sarve tasya mahāśreṣṭhinaḥ sakāśaṃ gatvā kathayanti--bho mahāśreṣṭhin,
analyzed: tatas brāhmaṇāḥ nagaram prati nivāsinaḥ saṃbhūya sarve tasya mahā śreṣṭhinaḥ sakāśam gatvā kathayanti bho mahā śreṣṭhin
yadā kṣemaṃkaraḥ buddhaḥ loke na utpannaḥ āsīt
tadā vayam lokasya dakṣiṇīyāḥ āsan
yadā tu utpannaḥ
tadā dakṣiṇīyaḥ jātaḥ

original: 150.019. idānīṃ tu tasya parinirvṛtasya vayameva dakṣiṇīyāḥ/
analyzed: idānīm tu tasya parinirvṛtasya vayam eva dakṣiṇīyāḥ
etat suvarṇam asmākam gamyam

original: 150.020. sa teṣāṃ kathayati--nāham yuṣmākametat suvarṇaṃ dāsyāmi/
analyzed: sa teṣām kathayati na aham yuṣmākam etat suvarṇam dāsyāmi
te kathayanti yadi asmākam na dāsyasi
na vayam tava kāmakāram dāsyāmaḥ
te brāhmaṇāḥ bahavaḥ
śreṣṭhī ca alpa parivāraḥ

original: 150.022. teṣāṃ tathā vyutpadyatāṃ na lebhe taccaityam yathepsitaṃ tena suvarṇena kārayitum/
analyzed: teṣām tathā vyutpadyatām na lebhe tat caityam yathā īpsitam tena suvarṇena kārayitum

original: 150.023. atha sa śreṣṭhī rājñaḥ sakāśaṃ gatvā kathayati--mahārāja,
analyzed: atha sa śreṣṭhī rājñaḥ sakāśam gatvā kathayati mahā rāja

original: taccaityaṃ na labhe brāhmaṇānāṃ sakāśādyathābhipretaṃ kārayitum/
analyzed: tat caityam na labhe brāhmaṇānām sakāśāt yathā abhipretam kārayitum
yatas sya rājñā sva puruṣaḥ dattaḥ sahasra yodhī

original: 150.025. evaṃ ca rājñā svapuruṣa ājñaptah--yadyasya mahāśreṣṭhinaḥ stūpamabhisaṃskurvataḥ kaścidapanayaṃ karoti,
analyzed: evam ca rājñā sva puruṣaḥ ājñapta hyadyasya mahā śreṣṭhinaḥ stūpam abhisaṃskurvataḥ kaścid apanayam karoti
sa tvayā mahatā daṇḍena śāsayitavyaḥ

original: 150.026. evaṃ deveti sahasrayodhī puruṣo rājñaḥ pratiśrutya nirgataḥ/
analyzed: evam deva iti sahasra yodhī puruṣaḥ rājñaḥ pratiśrutya nirgataḥ

original: 150.027. nirgamya ca tān brāhmaṇānevaṃ vadati--śṛṇvantu bhavantaḥ,
analyzed: nirgamya ca tān brāhmaṇān evam vadati śṛṇvantu bhavantaḥ

original: ahaṃ rājñāsya mahāśreṣṭhinaḥ svapuruṣo dattah--yadyasya stūpamabhisaṃskurvataḥ kaścidvighātaṃ kuryāt,
analyzed: aham rājñā asya mahā śreṣṭhinaḥ sva puruṣaḥ datta hyadyasya stūpam abhisaṃskurvataḥ kaścid vighātam kuryāt

original: sa tvayā mahatā daṇḍena śāsayitavya iti/
analyzed: sa tvayā mahatā daṇḍena śāsayitavyaḥ iti
yadi yūyam atra kiṃcid vighnam kariṣyatha
aham vaḥ mahatā daṇḍena anuśāsayiṣyāmi

original: 150.030. te brāhmaṇāḥ sahasrayodhinaḥ puruṣasyaivaṃ śrutvā bhītāḥ/
analyzed: te brāhmaṇāḥ sahasra yodhinaḥ puruṣasya evam śrutvā bhītāḥ

original: 150.030. yatastena mahāśreṣṭhinā saṃcintya yathaitat suvarṇaṃ tatraiva garbhasaṃsthaṃ
analyzed: yatas tena mahā śreṣṭhinā saṃcintya yathā etat suvarṇam tatra eva garbha saṃstham

original: syāt tathā kartavyamiti tasya stūpasya sarvaireva caturbhiḥ pārśvaiḥ pratikaṇṭhukayā
analyzed: syāt tathā kartavyam iti tasya stūpasya sarvaiḥ eva caturbhiḥ pārśvaiḥ pratikaṇṭhukayā
catvāri sopānāni ārabdhāni kārayitum

original: 150.032. yāvadanupūrveṇa<151> prathamā meḍhī tato 'nupūrveṇa dvitīyā tatastṛtīyā meḍhī yāvadanupūrveṇāṇḍam/
analyzed: prathamā meḍhī tatas nupūrveṇa dvitīyā tatas tṛtīyā meḍhī yāvat anupūrveṇa aṇḍam

original: 151.001. tathāvidhaṃ ca stūpasyāṇḍaṃ kṛtam yatra sā yūpayaṣṭirabhyantare pratipāditā/
analyzed: tathāvidham ca stūpasya aṇḍam kṛtam yatra sā yūpa yaṣṭiḥ abhyantare pratipāditā
paścāt tasya ati nava aṇḍasya upari harmikā kṛtā
anupūrveṇa yaṣṭi āropaṇam kṛtam
varṣasthāle mahā maṇi ratnāni tāni āropitāni

original: 151.004. tatra ca kriyamāṇe sahasrayodhinaḥ puruṣasyaivamutpannam--nātra kaścididānīṃ prahariṣyati/
analyzed: tatra ca kriyamāṇe sahasra yodhinaḥ puruṣasya evam utpannam na atra kaścid idānīm prahariṣyati
viśvasta manāḥ kenacid kāryeṇa janapadeṣu gataḥ

original: 151.005. tena ca mahāśreṣṭhinā tasya stūpasya caturbhiḥ pārśvaiścatvāro dvārakoṣṭhakā māpitāḥ,
analyzed: tena ca mahā śreṣṭhinā tasya stūpasya caturbhiḥ pārśvaiḥ catvāraḥ dvāra koṣṭhakāḥ māpitāḥ
caturbhiḥ pārśvaiḥ catvāri mahā caityāni kāritāni
tat yathā jātiḥ abhisambodhiḥ dharmacakra pravartanam parinirvāṇam
tat ca stūpa aṅgaṇam ratnaśilābhiḥ citam
catvāraḥ ca upāṅgāḥ caturdiśam māpitāḥ
puṣkariṇyaḥ caturdiśam anupārśvena māpitāḥ

original: 151.008. tatra ca vividhāni jalajāni mālyāni ropitāni tadyathā utpalaṃ padmaṃ kumudaṃ puṇḍarīkaṃ sugandhikaṃ mṛdugandhikam/
analyzed: tatra ca vividhāni jala jāni mālyāni ropitāni tat yathā utpalam padmam kumudam puṇḍarīkam sugandhikam mṛdugandhikam

original: 151.010. vividhāni ca puṣkariṇītīreṣu sthalajāni mālyāni ropitāni,
analyzed: vividhāni ca puṣkariṇī tīreṣu sthala jāni mālyāni ropitāni
tat yathā atimuktakam campaka pāṭalā vārṣikā mallikā sumanā yūthikā dhātuṣkārī
sarva ṛtu kālikāḥ puṣpa phalāḥ stūpa pūjā artham
sthāvarā vṛttiḥ prajñaptāḥ
stūpa dāsāḥ dattāḥ
śaṅkha paṭaha vādyāni tūryāṇi dattāni

original: 151.013. ye tasmiṃścaitye gandhairdhūpairmālyaiśca cūrṇaiḥ kārāḥ kurvanti/
analyzed: ye tasmin caitye gandhaiḥ dhūpaiḥ mālyaiḥ ca cūrṇaiḥ kārāḥ kurvanti
tasmāt ca adhiṣṭhānāt viṣayāt ca āgamya janapadāḥ gandhaiḥ mālyaiḥ dhūpaiḥ cūrṇaiḥ tasmin caitye kāram kurvanti
yadi ca dakṣiṇaḥ vāyuḥ vāti

original: dakṣiṇena vāyunā sarvapuṣpajātīnāṃ gandhena taccaityamaṅgaṇaṃ cāsya sphuṭaṃ bhavatyanubhāvitam/
analyzed: dakṣiṇena vāyunā sarva puṣpa jātīnām gandhena tat caityam aṅgaṇam ca asya sphuṭam bhavati anubhāvitam
evam paścimena vāyunā
anupūrveṇa api ca vāyunā

original: 151.016. vāyatā vāyatā taccaityāṅgaṇaṃ ca tena vividhena gandhamālyena sphuṭaṃ bhavatyanubhāvitam/
analyzed: vāyatā vāyatā tat caitya aṅgaṇam ca tena vividhena gandha mālyena sphuṭam bhavati anubhāvitam
tasmin ca stūpe sarva jāta kṛta niṣṭite sahasra yodhī abhyāgataḥ

original: 151.018. sa taṃ stūpaṃ dṛṣṭvā sarvajātakṛtaniṣṭhitaṃ kathayati--asmiṃścaitye kārāṃ kṛtvā kimavāpyate?
analyzed: sa tam stūpam dṛṣṭvā sarva jāta kṛta niṣṭhitam kathayati asmin caitye kārām kṛtvā kim avāpyate

original: yato 'sau śreṣṭhī buddhodāharaṇaṃ pravṛttaḥ kartum--evaṃ tribhirasaṃkhyeyairvīryeṇa vyāyamatā anuttarā bodhiravāpyate/
analyzed: yatas sau śreṣṭhī buddha udāharaṇam pravṛttaḥ kartum evam tribhiḥ asaṃkhyeyaiḥ vīryeṇa vyāyamatā anuttarā bodhiḥ avāpyate

original: 151.020. sa taṃ śrutvā viṣādamāpanno hīnotsāhatayā kathayati--nāhaṃ śakṣyāmi anuttarāṃ samyaksambodhiṃ samudānayitum/
analyzed: sa tam śrutvā viṣādam āpannaḥ hīna utsāha tayā kathayati na aham śakṣyāmi anuttarām samyaksambodhim samudānayitum

original: 151.021. tato 'sau śreṣṭhī pratyekabuddhodāharaṇaṃ pravṛttaḥ kartum--evaṃ sahasrayodhī
analyzed: tatas sau śreṣṭhī pratyekabuddha udāharaṇam pravṛttaḥ kartum evam sahasra yodhī

original: tasyāpi varṇodāharaṇaṃ śrutvā viṣaṇṇacetāḥ kathayati--etāmapyahaṃ pratyekabodhiṃ
analyzed: tasya api varṇa udāharaṇam śrutvā viṣaṇṇa cetāḥ kathayati etām api aham pratyeka bodhim
na śaktaḥ samudānayitum

original: 151.023. tataḥ sa mahāśreṣṭhī śrāvakavarṇodāharaṇaṃ kṛtvā kathayati--asminnapi tāvat praṇidhatsva cittam/
analyzed: tatas sa mahā śreṣṭhī śrāvaka varṇa udāharaṇam kṛtvā kathayati asmin api tāvat praṇidhatsva cittam

original: 151.024. yataḥ sahasrayodhyāha--tvayā punarmahāśreṣṭhin katamasyāṃ bodhau praṇidhānaṃ kṛtam?
analyzed: yatas sahasra yodhyā aha tvayā punar mahā śreṣṭhin katamasyām bodhau praṇidhānam kṛtam
tena mahā śreṣṭhinā uktam anuttarasyām bodhau cittam utpāditam
sahasra yodhī āha yadi tvayā anuttarasyām bodhau cittam utpāditam
aham tava eva śrāvakaḥ syām
tvayā aham samanvāhartavyaḥ
yatas sya śreṣṭhī āha bahu kilbiṣa kārī bata bhavān

original: 151.028. kiṃ tu loke yadā tvaṃ buddhotpādaśabdaṃ śrutvā smṛtiṃ pratilabhethāḥ/
analyzed: kim tu loke yadā tvam buddha utpāda śabdam śrutvā smṛtim pratilabhethāḥ

original: 151.029. sa ca śreṣṭhī taṃ caityaṃ kṛtvā nirīkṣya pādayor nipatya praṇidhānaṃ karoti--
analyzed: sa ca śreṣṭhī tam caityam kṛtvā nirīkṣya pādayoḥ nipatya praṇidhānam karoti

original: 151.030. anena dānena mahadgatena buddho bhaveyaṃ sugataḥ svayambhūḥ/
analyzed: anena dānena mahadgatena buddhaḥ bhaveyam sugataḥ svayambhūḥ
tīrṇaḥ ham tārayeyam jana oghān a tāritāḥ ye
sau atīte dhvani śreṣṭhī abhūt

original: ahameva sa tasmin samaye bodhisattvacaryāṃ vartāmi/
analyzed: aham eva sa tasmin samaye bodhisattva caryām vartāmi
yaḥ sau sahasra yodhī

original: eṣa eva dharmarucistena kālena tena samayena/
analyzed: eṣaḥ eva dharmaruciḥ tena kālena tena samayena
idam mama prathame saṃkhyeye etasya dharmaruceḥ darśanam
tat saṃdhāya kathayāmi cirasya dharmaruce
yatas dharmaruciḥ ājñāya āha cirasya bhagavan

original: 152.005. dvitīye dīpaṃkaro nāma samyaksambuddho loka utpanno vidyācaraṇasamyaksambuddhaḥ sugato lokavidanuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā  #
analyzed: dvitīye dīpaṃkaraḥ nāma samyaksambuddhaḥ loke utpannaḥ vidyā caraṇa samyaksambuddhaḥ sugataḥ loka vid anuttaraḥ puruṣa damya sārathiḥ śāstā  /

original: devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca buddho bhagavān/
analyzed: devānām ca manuṣyāṇām ca buddhaḥ bhagavān

original: 152.006. atha dīpamakaraḥ samyaksambuddho janapadeṣu cārikāṃ caran dvīpāvatīṃ rājadhānīmanuprāptaḥ/
analyzed: atha dīpamakaraḥ samyaksambuddhaḥ janapadeṣu cārikām caran dvīpāvatīm rājadhānīm anuprāptaḥ

original: 152.007. dvīpāvatyāṃ rājadhānyāṃ dvīpo nāma rājā rājyaṃ kārayati ṛddhaṃ ca sphītaṃ ca kṣemaṃ ca subhikṣaṃ ca ākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyaṃ ca/
analyzed: dvīpāvatyām rājadhānyām dvīpaḥ nāma rājā rājyam kārayati ṛddham ca sphītam ca kṣemam ca subhikṣam ca ākīrṇa bahu jana manuṣyam ca

original: 152.009. tatra dīpena rājñā dīpaṃkaraḥ samyaksambuddhaḥ sābhisaṃskāreṇa nagarapraveśenopanimantritaḥ/
analyzed: tatra dīpena rājñā dīpaṃkaraḥ samyaksambuddhaḥ sa abhisaṃskāreṇa nagara praveśena upanimantritaḥ

original: 152.010. tasya ca dīpasya rājño vāsavo nāma sāmantarājo 'bhūt/
analyzed: tasya ca dīpasya rājñaḥ vāsavaḥ nāma sāmanta rājaḥ bhūt
tena tasya dūtaḥ nupreṣita hā āgaccha

original: iha mayā dīpaṃkaraḥ samyaksambuddhaḥ sābhisaṃskāreṇa nagarapraveśenopanimantritaḥ/
analyzed: iha mayā dīpaṃkaraḥ samyaksambuddhaḥ sa abhisaṃskāreṇa nagara praveśena upanimantritaḥ
tasya pūjām kariṣyāmaḥ iti

original: 152.012. tadā ca vāsavena rājñā dvādaśavarṣāṇi yajñamiṣṭvā yajñāvasāne rājñā pañca mahāpradānāni vyavasthāpitāni,
analyzed: tadā ca vāsavena rājñā dvādaśa varṣāṇi yajñam iṣṭvā yajña avasāne rājñā pañca mahā pradānāni vyavasthāpitāni
tat yathā sauvarṇakam daṇḍa kamaṇḍalu
sauvarṇā sa pātrī
catur ratna mayī śayyā
pañca kārṣāpaṇa śatāni
kanyā ca sarva alaṃkāra vibhūṣitā

original: 152.014. tena khalu samayena anyeṣu janapadeṣu dvau māṇavakau prativasataḥ/
analyzed: tena khalu samayena anyeṣu janapadeṣu dvau māṇavakau prativasataḥ
tābhyām ca upadhyāya sakāśāt veda adhyayanam kṛtam
dharmatā ācāryasya ācārya dhanam upādhyāyasya upādhyāya dhanam pradeyam iti jñātvā cintayataḥ

original: 155.011. te ca tatra mahājanakāyena pūjārthaṃ saṃparivṛtasya bhagavata upaśleṣaṃ na labhante/
