original: 155.012. bhagavān saṃlakṣayati--bahutaraṃ sumatirmāṇavo 'smānmahājanakāyāt puṇyaprasavaṃ kariṣyati iti/
analyzed: bhagavān saṃlakṣayati bahutaram sumatiḥ māṇavaḥ smāt mahā jana kāyāt puṇya prasavam kariṣyati iti
matvā mahatīm tumulām vāta vṛṣṭim abhinirmiṇoti
yatas tena jana kāyena avakāśaḥ dattaḥ

original: 155.014. labdhāvakāśaśca sumatirmāṇavo bhagavantamasecanakadarśanaṃ dṛṣṭvā atīva prasādajātaḥ/
analyzed: labdha avakāśaḥ ca sumatiḥ māṇavaḥ bhagavantam asecanaka darśanam dṛṣṭvā atīva prasāda jātaḥ

original: 155.015. prasādajātena ca tāni pañca padmāni bhagavataḥ kṣiptāni/
analyzed: prasāda jātena ca tāni pañca padmāni bhagavataḥ kṣiptāni

original: 155.016. tāni ca bhagavatā dīpaṃkareṇa samyaksambuddhena tathā adhiṣṭhitāni,
analyzed: tāni ca bhagavatā dīpaṃkareṇa samyaksambuddhena tathā adhiṣṭhitāni
yathā śakaṭī cakra mātrāṇi vitānam buddhvā vyavasthitāni
gacchataḥ nugacchanti
tiṣṭhataḥ nutiṣṭhanti

original: 155.018. tathā dṛṣṭvā tayā dārikayā prasādajātayā dvau padmau bhagavataḥ kṣiptau/
analyzed: tathā dṛṣṭvā tayā dārikayā prasāda jātayā dvau padmau bhagavataḥ kṣiptau

original: 155.018. tau cāpi bhagavatā tathā adhiṣṭhitau yathā śakaṭīcakramātrau karṇasamīpe vitānaṃ baddhvā vyavasthitau/
analyzed: tau ca api bhagavatā tathā adhiṣṭhitau yathā śakaṭī cakra mātrau karṇa samīpe vitānam baddhvā vyavasthitau

original: 155.019. tatra ca pradeśe tumulena vātavarṣeṇa kardamo jātaḥ/
analyzed: tatra ca pradeśe tumulena vāta varṣeṇa kardamaḥ jātaḥ

original: 155.020. paścāt sumatirmāṇavo buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ sakardamaṃ pṛthivīpradeśamupagataḥ/
analyzed: paścāt sumatiḥ māṇavaḥ buddham bhagavantam sa kardamam pṛthivī pradeśam upagataḥ

original: 155.021. tasmin sakardame pṛthivīpradeśe jātaṃ saṃtīrya bhagavato bhagavataḥ purato gāthāṃ bhāṣate--
analyzed: tasmin sa kardame pṛthivī pradeśe jātam saṃtīrya bhagavataḥ bhagavataḥ puratas gāthām bhāṣate
yadi buddhaḥ bhaviṣyāmi bodhāya buddha vodhana
ākramiṣyasi me padbhyām jaṭām

original: 155.024. tatastena dīpaṃkareṇa samyaksambuddhena samyaksambuddhena tasya sumatermāṇavasya jaṭāsu pādau vyavasthāpitau/
analyzed: tatas tena dīpaṃkareṇa samyaksambuddhena samyaksambuddhena tasya sumateḥ māṇavasya jaṭāsu pādau vyavasthāpitau

original: 155.025. tasya ca sumateḥ pṛṣṭhato 'nubuddha eva matirmāṇavastiṣṭhati/
analyzed: tasya ca sumateḥ pṛṣṭhatas nubuddhaḥ eva matiḥ māṇavaḥ tiṣṭhati
tena kupitena abhihitam bhagavataḥ dīpaṃkarasya a paśya tāvat bhoḥ

original: anena dīpaṃkareṇa samyaksambuddhenāsya sumatermāṇavasya tiraścām yathā padbhyāṃ jaṭā avaṣṭabdhāḥ/
analyzed: anena dīpaṃkareṇa samyaksambuddhena asya sumateḥ māṇavasya tiraścām yathā padbhyām jaṭāḥ avaṣṭabdhāḥ

original: 155.027. paścāt dīpaṃkareṇa samyaksambuddhena sumatirmāṇavo vyākṛtah--bhaviṣyasi tvaṃ nṛbhavādvimukto mukto vimurlokahitāya śāstā/
analyzed: paścāt dīpaṃkareṇa samyaksambuddhena sumatiḥ māṇavaḥ vyākṛtah bhaviṣyasi tvam nṛ bhavāt vimuktaḥ muktaḥ vimuḥ loka hitāya śāstā

original: 155.030. śākyātmajaḥ śākyamunīti nāṃnā trilokasāro jagataḥ pradīpaḥ//4//
analyzed: śākya ātmajaḥ śākyamuni iti nāṃnā triloka sāraḥ jagataḥ

original: 156.001. <156>yadā ca sa sumatirmāṇavo dīpaṃkareṇa samyaksambuddhena vyākṛtaḥ,
analyzed: ca sa sumatiḥ māṇavaḥ dīpaṃkareṇa samyaksambuddhena vyākṛtaḥ
tad sama kālam eva vaihāyasam sapta tālān abhyudgataḥ
tāḥ ca asya jaṭāḥ śīrṇāḥ
anyāḥ praviśiṣṭatarāḥ jaṭāḥ prādurbhūtāḥ
sa vaihāyasa sthaḥ mahatā jana kāyena dṛṣṭaḥ

original: 156.003. dṛṣṭvā ca praṇidhānaṃ kṛtam--yadā anenānuttarajñānamadhigataṃ tadāsya vayaṃ śrāvakā bhavema/
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā ca praṇidhānam kṛtam yadā anena anuttara jñānam adhigatam tadā asya vayam śrāvakāḥ bhavema
sā api ca dārikā praṇidhānam karoti
praṇidhānam yatra kuryāḥ tvam buddham āsādya nāyakam
tatra te ham bhavet patnī nityam
yadā bhavasi saṃbuddhaḥ loke jyeṣṭha vināyakaḥ

original: 156.008. śrāvikā te bhaviṣyāmi tasmin kāla upasthite//6//
analyzed: śrāvikā te bhaviṣyāmi tasmin kāla

original: 156.009. khagasthaṃ māṇavaṃ dṛṣṭvā sahasrāṇi śatāni ca/
analyzed: khaga stham māṇavam dṛṣṭvā sahasrāṇi śatāni ca
śrāvaka tvam prārthayante sarve tatra
yadā bhavasi saṃbuddhaḥ loke jyeṣṭha vināyakaḥ
śrāvakāḥ te bhaviṣyāmaḥ tasmin kāle

original: 156.013. yadā ca sumatirmāṇavo dīpaṃkareṇa samyaksambuddhena vyākṛtaḥ,
analyzed: yadā ca sumatiḥ māṇavaḥ dīpaṃkareṇa samyaksambuddhena vyākṛtaḥ
tadā asya dīpena rājñā jaṭāḥ gṛhītāḥ
vāsavaḥ rājā kathayati mama etāḥ jaṭāḥ anuprayaccha
tatas tasya dīpena rājñā anupradattāḥ
tena gṛhītvā aśītiḥ vāla sahasrāṇi
tasya rājñaḥ mātyāḥ kathayanti deva
asmākam ekaikam vālam anuprayaccha
vayam eṣām caityāni kariṣyāmaḥ

original: 156.016. tena rājñā teṣāṃ bhṛtyānāmekaiko vālo dattaḥ/
analyzed: tena rājñā teṣām bhṛtyānām ekaikaḥ vālaḥ dattaḥ

original: 156.017. tairamātyaiḥ svake vijite gatvā caityāni pratiṣṭhāpitāni/
analyzed: taiḥ amātyaiḥ svake vijite gatvā caityāni pratiṣṭhāpitāni
yadā sumatiḥ māṇavaḥ nuttarāyām samyaksambuddhau vyākṛtaḥ

original: tadā dīpena rājñā vāsavena ca rājñā tairanekaiśca naigamajānapadaiḥ sarvopakaraṇaiḥ pravārito 'nāgataguṇāvekṣatayā/
analyzed: tadā dīpena rājñā vāsavena ca rājñā taiḥ anekaiḥ ca naigama jānapadaiḥ sarva upakaraṇaiḥ pravāritaḥ na āgata guṇa avekṣa tayā

original: 156.019. tataḥ sa matirmāṇava ucyate--ahamanuttarasyāṃ samyaksambodhau vyākṛtah--tvayā kutra cittamutpāditam?
analyzed: tatas sa matiḥ māṇavaḥ ucyate aham anuttarasyām samyaksambodhau kutra cittam utpāditam
sa kathayati kṣataḥ ham sumate māṇava
sa kathayati katham kṛtvā kṣataḥ si

original: tataḥ sa kathayati--yadā tava dīpaṃkareṇa samyaksambuddhena padbhyāṃ jaṭā avaṣṭabdhāḥ,
analyzed: tatas sa kathayati yadā tava dīpaṃkareṇa samyaksambuddhena padbhyām jaṭāḥ avaṣṭabdhāḥ

original: tadā kupitena vāg niścāritā--dīpaṃkareṇa samyaksambuddhena śrotriyasya jaṭā tiraścām yathā padbhyāmavaṣṭabdhāḥ/
analyzed: tadā kupitena vāc niścāritā a dīpaṃkareṇa samyaksambuddhena śrotriyasya jaṭā tiraścām yathā padbhyām avaṣṭabdhāḥ
yatas tasya sumatiḥ kathayati āgacchasva
buddhasya bhagavataḥ ntike pravrajāvaḥ

original: 156.024. tatastau sumatirmatiśca dīpaṃkarasya samyaksambuddhasya pravacane pravrajitau/
analyzed: tatas tau sumatiḥ matiḥ ca dīpaṃkarasya samyaksambuddhasya pravacane pravrajitau
sumatinā ca pravrajya piṭakāni adhītāni
dharmeṇa parṣad saṃgṛhītā

original: 156.026. sa ca sumatirmāṇavaścyutaḥ kālagatastuṣite devanikāye upapannaḥ/
analyzed: sa ca sumatiḥ māṇavaḥ cyutaḥ kālagataḥ tuṣite devanikāye upapannaḥ
matiḥ māṇavaḥ cyutaḥ kālagataḥ narakeṣu upapannaḥ

original: 156.028. bhagavānāha--yo 'sau vāsavo rājābhūt tena kālena tena samayena,
analyzed: bhagavān āha yaḥ sau vāsavaḥ rājā abhūt tena kālena tena samayena
sa rājā bimbisāraḥ

original: 156.029. yāni tānyaśītiramātyasahasrāṇi tena kālena tena samayena,
analyzed: yāni tāni aśītiḥ amātya sahasrāṇi tena kālena tena samayena
tāni etarhi aśītiḥ devatā sahasrāṇi
yaḥ sau dīpāvatīyakaḥ jana kāyaḥ
yā asau dārikā
eṣā eva sā yaśodharā
yaḥ sau sumatiḥ
aham eva tasmin samaye bodhisattva caryāyām vartāmi
yaḥ sau matiḥ
eṣaḥ eva sa dharmaruciḥ

original: 157.001. <157>etaddvitīye 'saṃkhyeye asya ca dharmarucermama ca darśanam yadahaṃ saṃdhāya kathayāmi--cirasya dharmaruce,
analyzed: saṃkhyeye asya ca dharmaruceḥ mama ca darśanam yat aham saṃdhāya kathayāmi cirasya dharmaruce
sucirassya dharmaruce

original: 157.003. tasmādapyārvāk tṛtīye 'saṃkhyeye krakucchando nāma samyaksambuddho loka
analyzed: tasmāt api ārvāk tṛtīye saṃkhyeye krakucchandaḥ nāma samyaksambuddhaḥ

original: utpanno vidyācaraṇasampannaḥ sugato lokavidanuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devamanuṣyāṇāṃ buddho bhagavān /
analyzed: utpannaḥ vidyā caraṇa sampannaḥ sugataḥ loka vid anuttaraḥ puruṣa damya sārathiḥ śāstā deva manuṣyāṇām buddhaḥ bhagavān
tasyām ca rājadhānyām anyataraḥ mahā śreṣṭhī prativasati
tena ca sadṛśāt kulāt kalatram ānītam

original: 157.006. sa ca kalatrasahāyaḥ krīḍati ramate paricārayati/
analyzed: sa ca kalatra sahāyaḥ krīḍati ramate paricārayati

original: 157.006. tasya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayataḥ putro jātaḥ/
analyzed: tasya krīḍataḥ ramamāṇasya paricārayataḥ putraḥ jātaḥ
sa ca gṛhapatiḥ śrāddhaḥ
tasya ca arhan bhikṣuḥ kula avavādakaḥ sti

original: 157.007. sa ca gṛhapatistāṃ patnīmevamāha--jāto 'smākam ṛṇadharo dhanaharaḥ/
analyzed: sa ca gṛhapatiḥ tām patnīm evam āha jātaḥ smākam ṛṇa dharaḥ dhana haraḥ
gacchāmi aham idānīm bhadre vaṇij dharmāṇām deśa antaram bhāṇḍam ādāya

original: 157.009. sa ca vaṇiglokenāvṛto dūrataraṃ gato bhāṇḍamādāya/
analyzed: sa ca vaṇij lokena āvṛtaḥ dūrataram gataḥ bhāṇḍam ādāya
yatas sya na bhūyas ciram api āgacchati

original: 157.010. sa ca dārakaḥ kālāntareṇa mahān saṃvṛtto 'bhirūpo darśanīyaḥ prāsādikaḥ/
analyzed: sa ca dārakaḥ kāla antareṇa mahān saṃvṛttaḥ bhirūpaḥ darśanīyaḥ prāsādikaḥ
tatas saḥ mātaram pṛcchati amba
kim asmākam kula artha āgatam karma
sā kathayati vatsa
pitā tava āpaṇam vāhayan āsīt
tatas sa dārakaḥ āpaṇam ārabdhaḥ vāhayitum

original: 157.012. sā ca mātā asya kleśairbādhyamānā cintayituṃ pravṛttā--ka upāyaḥ syāt yadahaṃ kleśān vinodayeyam,
analyzed: sā ca mātā asya kleśaiḥ bādhyamānā cintayitum upāyaḥ syāt yat aham kleśān vinodayeyam
na ca me kaścid jānīyāt
tayā saṃcintya evam adhyavasitam evam eva putra kāma hetoḥ tathā paricarāmi

original: yathā anenaiva me sārdhaṃ rogavinodakaṃ bhavati,
analyzed: yathā anena eva me sārdham roga vinodakam bhavati
na eva sva janasya śaṅkā bhaviṣyati

original: 157.016. tatastayā vṛddhayuvatī āhūya bhojayitvā dvis triḥ paścānnavena paṭenācchāditā/
analyzed: tatas tayā vṛddhayuvatī āhūya bhojayitvā dvis tris paścāt navena paṭena ācchāditā

original: 157.016. tasyāḥ sā vṛddhā kathayati--kena kāryeṇaiva mamānuprasādādinā upakrameṇānupravṛttiṃ karoṣi?
analyzed: tasyāḥ sā vṛddhā kathayati kena kāryeṇa eva mama anuprasāda ādinā upakrameṇa anupravṛttim karoṣi

original: sā tasyā vṛddhāyā viśvastā bhūtvā evamāha--amba,
analyzed: sā tasyāḥ vṛddhāyāḥ viśvastā bhūtvā evam āha amba
śṛṇu vijñāpyam
kleśaiḥ atīva bādhye
priya tām mama utpādya manuṣya anveṣaṇam kuru

original: yo 'bhyantara eva syānna ca śaṅkanīyo janasya/
analyzed: yaḥ bhyantare eva syāt na ca śaṅkanīyaḥ janasya

original: 157.019. vṛddhā kathayati--neha gṛhe tathāvidho manuṣyaḥ saṃvidyate,
analyzed: vṛddhā kathayati na iha gṛhe tathāvidhaḥ manuṣyaḥ saṃvidyate
na api praṇayavān kaścid praviśati
yaḥ janasya aśaṅkanīyaḥ bhavet

original: 157.021. katamaḥ sa manuṣyo bhaviṣyati yasyāhaṃ vakṣyāmi?
analyzed: katamaḥ sa manuṣyaḥ bhaviṣyati yasya aham vakṣyāmi

original: tataḥ sā vaṇikpatnī tasyā vṛddhāyāḥ kathayati--yadyanyo manuṣya evaṃvidhopakramayukto nāsti,
analyzed: tatas sā vaṇij patnī tasyāḥ vṛddhāyāḥ kathayati yadi anyaḥ manuṣyaḥ evaṃvidha upakrama yuktaḥ na asti
eṣaḥ eva me putraḥ bhavati
na eṣa lokasya śaṅkanīyaḥ bhaviṣyati

original: 157.023. tasyāstayā vṛddhayā abhihitam--kathaṃ nu putreṇa sārdhaṃ ratikrīḍāṃ gamiṣyasi?
analyzed: tasyāḥ tayā vṛddhayā abhihitam katham nu putreṇa sārdham rati krīḍām gamiṣyasi
yuktam syāt anyena manuṣyeṇa sārdham rati krīḍām anubhavitum

original: 157.024. tataḥ sā vaṇikpatnī kathayati--yadyanyo 'bhyantaro manuṣyo na saṃvidyate,
analyzed: tatas sā vaṇij patnī kathayati yadi anyaḥ bhyantaraḥ manuṣyaḥ na saṃvidyate
bhavatu eṣaḥ eva me putraḥ
tayā vṛddhayā abhihitam yathā īpsitam kuru

original: 157.026. tataḥ sā vṛddhayuvatī tasya vaṇijaḥ putrasyaivāgamya pṛcchati--vatsa,
analyzed: tatas sā vṛddhayuvatī tasya vaṇijaḥ putrasya eva āgamya pṛcchati vatsa
taruṇaḥ si rūpavān ca
kim sya arthena
tena tasyāḥ abhihitam kim etat

original: tataḥ sā vṛddhā kathayati--bhavānevamabhirūpaśca yuvā ca asmin vayasi taruṇayuvatyā sārdhaṃ śobhethāḥ krīḍan raman paricārayan/
analyzed: tatas sā vṛddhā kathayati bhavān evam abhirūpaḥ ca yuvā ca asmin vayasi taruṇa yuvatyā sārdham śobhethāḥ krīḍan raman paricārayan
kim eva kāma bhoga parihīnaḥ tiṣṭhasi
vaṇij dārakaḥ tam śrutvā lajjā vyapatrāpya samlīna cetāḥ tasyāḥ vṛddhāyāḥ tat vacanam na adhivāsayati

original: 157.030. tataḥ sā vṛddhā evaṃ dvirapi trirapi tasya dārakasya kathayati--taruṇayuvatistavārthe kleśairbādhyate/
analyzed: tatas sā vṛddhā evam dvis api tris api tasya dārakasya kathayati taruṇa yuvatiḥ tava arthe kleśaiḥ bādhyate

original: 157.031. sa vaṇigdārako dvirapi trirapyucyamānastasyā vṛddhāyāḥ kathayati--amba,
analyzed: sa vaṇij dārakaḥ dvis api tris api ucyamānaḥ tasyāḥ vṛddhāyāḥ kathayati amba
kim tasyāḥ taruṇa yuvatyāḥ saṃnimitte kiṃcid abhihitam

original: tatah <158>sā vṛddhā kathayati--uktaṃ tasyā mayā tannimittam/
analyzed: tatas vṛddhā kathayati uktam tasyāḥ mayā tat nimittam
tayā mama nimitte na pratijñātam

original: 158.001. sā ca dārikā hīvyapatrāpyagṛhītā na kiṃcidvakṣyati/
analyzed: sā ca dārikā hī vyapatrāpya gṛhītā na kiṃcid vakṣyati
na ca śarīram āvṛtam kariṣyati

original: 158.002. na tvayā tasyā vā anveṣaṇe yatnaḥ karaṇīyaḥ/
analyzed: na tvayā tasyāḥ vā anveṣaṇe yatnaḥ karaṇīyaḥ

original: 158.003. tatastena vaṇigdārakeṇa tasyā vṛddhāyā abhihitam--kutrāsmākaṃ saṃgataṃ bhaviṣyati?
analyzed: tatas tena vaṇij dārakeṇa tasyāḥ vṛddhāyāḥ abhihitam kutra asmākam saṃgatam bhaviṣyati
tayā abhihitammadīye gṛhe
tena uktam kutra avakāśe tava gṛham
tatas sya tayā vṛddhayā gṛham vyapadiṣṭam

original: 158.005. sā ca vṛddhā tasyā vaṇikpatnyāḥ sakāśaṃ gatvā kathayati--icchāpitaḥ sa vo 'yaṃ dārakaḥ/
analyzed: sā ca vṛddhā tasyāḥ vaṇij patnyāḥ sakāśam gatvā kathayati icchāpitaḥ sa vaḥ yam dārakaḥ
sā kathayati kutra avakāśe saṃgatam bhaviṣyati
madīye gṛhe

original: 158.007. sa ca dārakaḥ kāryāṇi kṛtvā gataḥ/
analyzed: sa ca dārakaḥ kāryāṇi kṛtvā gataḥ
anupūrveṇa bhuktvā tasyāḥ mātuḥ kathayati gacchāmi aham
vayasya gṛhe svapsye
tatas sya mātrā api anujñātam gaccha

original: 158.008. sa dārako labdhānujñastasyā vṛddhāyā gṛhaṃ gataḥ/
analyzed: sa dārakaḥ labdha anujñaḥ tasyāḥ vṛddhāyāḥ gṛham gataḥ

original: 158.009. tasya dārakasya tasmin gṛhe gatasya ratikrīḍākālamāgamayamānasya tiṣṭhato niśikālamapratyabhijñātam/
analyzed: tasya dārakasya tasmin gṛhe gatasya rati krīḍā kālam āgamayamānasya tiṣṭhataḥ niśi kālam a pratyabhijñātam

original: 158.010. rūpe kāle sā mātā asya vaṇigdārakasya tasminneva gṛhe ratikrīḍāmanubhavanārthaṃ tatraiva gatā/
analyzed: rūpe kāle sā mātā asya vaṇij dārakasya tasmin eva gṛhe rati krīḍām anubhavana artham tatra eva gatā

original: 158.011. gatvā ca tasmin gṛhe vikālamavyaktiṃ vibhāvyamāne rūpākṛtau nirgūḍhenopacārakrameṇa ratikrīḍāṃ putreṇa sārdhamanubhavituṃ pravṛttā
analyzed: gatvā ca tasmin gṛhe vikālam a vyaktim vibhāvyamāne rūpa ākṛtau nirgūḍhena upacāra krameṇa rati krīḍām putreṇa sārdham anubhavitum pravṛttā

original: 158.013. sā ca parikṣīṇāyāṃ rātrau anubhūtaratikrīḍā satamondhakāre kālāyāmeva rajanyāmavibhāvyamānarūpākṛtau svagṛhaṃ gacchati/
analyzed: sā ca parikṣīṇāyām rātrau anubhūta rati krīḍā sa tamaḥ ndhakāre kālāyām eva rajanyām avibhāvyamāna rūpa ākṛtau sva gṛham gacchati

original: 158.014. sa cāpi vaṇigdārako ratikrīḍāmanubhūya prabhātāyāṃ rajanyāṃ bhāṇḍāvāriṃ gatvā kuṭumbakāryāṇi karoti/
analyzed: sa ca api vaṇij dārakaḥ rati krīḍām anubhūya prabhātāyām rajanyām bhāṇḍa āvārim gatvā kuṭumba kāryāṇi karoti
evam dvis api tris api

original: 158.015. tatra vṛddhāyā gṛhe ratikrīḍāmanubhavaṃśca cirakālamevaṃ vartamānena ratikrīḍākrameṇa
analyzed: tatra vṛddhāyāḥ gṛhe rati krīḍām anubhavan ca cira kālam evam vartamānena rati krīḍā krameṇa
tasya dārakasya sā mātā cintayitum pravṛttā a kiyatkālam abyat gṛham aham evam a vibhāvyamāna rūpā
rati krīḍām anubhaviṣyāmi
yat nu aham asya etat rati krīḍā kramam tathāvidham krameṇa saṃvedayeyam
yathā iha eva gṛhe rati krīḍā bhavet

original: 158.019. iti saṃcintya tatraiva vṛddhāgṛhe gatvā ratikrīḍāṃ putreṇa sārdhamanubhūya
analyzed: iti saṃcintya tatra eva vṛddhā gṛhe gatvā rati krīḍām putreṇa sārdham anubhūya

original: rajanyāḥ kṣaye satamondhakārakāle tasya dārakasyoparimaṃ prāvaraṇaṃ nivasyātmanīyāṃ
analyzed: rajanyāḥ kṣaye sa tamaḥ ndhakāra kāle tasya dārakasya uparimam prāvaraṇam nivasya ātmanīyām
ca śira uttara paṭṭikām tyaktvā sva gṛham gatā

original: 158.021. sa ca dārakaḥ prabhāakāle tāṃ paṭṭikāṃ śirasi mañcasyāvatiṣṭhantīṃ saṃpaśyati/
analyzed: sa ca dārakaḥ prabhā akāle tām paṭṭikām śirasi mañcasya avatiṣṭhantīm saṃpaśyati

original: 158.022. ātmīyāmevopariprāvaraṇapotrīmalabhamānastatraiva tāṃ paṭṭikāṃ saṃlakṣya tyaktvā bhāṇḍāvārīṃ gatvā yugalamanyaṃ prāvṛtya svagṛhaṃ gataḥ/
analyzed: ātmīyām eva upari prāvaraṇa potrīm a labhamānaḥ tatra eva tām paṭṭikām saṃlakṣya tyaktvā bhāṇḍa āvārīm gatvā yugalam anyam prāvṛtya sva gṛham gataḥ

original: 158.023. tatra ca gataḥ saṃpaśyati tamevātmīyaṃ pravaraṇaṃ tasyā mātuḥ śirasi prāvṛtam/
analyzed: tatra ca gataḥ saṃpaśyati tam eva ātmīyam pravaraṇam tasyāḥ mātuḥ śirasi prāvṛtam
dṛṣṭvā ca tām mātaram pṛcchati amba
kutas yam śirasi prāvaraṇaḥ bhyāgataḥ
yatas tayā abhihitam adya api aham tava ambā

original: evaṃ cirakālaṃ tava mayā sārdhaṃ kāmān paribhuñjato 'dyāpyahaṃ tava saivāmbā?
analyzed: evam cira kālam tava mayā sārdham kāmān paribhuñjataḥ dyā api aham tava sā eva ambā

original: yataḥ sa vaṇigdārakastathāvidhaṃ mātṛvacanamupaśrutya saṃmūḍho vihvalacetā bhūmau nipatitaḥ/
analyzed: yatas sa vaṇij dārakaḥ tathāvidham mātṛ vacanam upaśrutya saṃmūḍhaḥ vihvala cetāḥ bhūmau nipatitaḥ
tatas tayā sa mātrā ghaṭa jala pariṣekeṇa avasiktaḥ

original: 158.027. sa jalapariṣekāvasikto dārakaścireṇa kālena pratyāgataprāṇastayā mātrā samāśvāsyate--kimevaṃ khedamupāgatastvam?
analyzed: sa jala pariṣeka avasiktaḥ dārakaḥ cireṇa kālena pratyāgata prāṇaḥ tayā mātrā samāśvāsyate kim evam khedam upāgataḥ tvam
asmadīyam vacanam upaśrutya dhīra manāḥ bhavasva
na te viṣādaḥ karaṇīyaḥ

original: 158.029. sa dārakastasyāḥ kathayati--kathamahaṃ khedaṃ na kariṣyāmi saṃmohaṃ vā,
analyzed: sa dārakaḥ tasyāḥ kathayati katham aham khedam na kariṣyāmi saṃmoham vā

original: yena mayā evaṃvidhaṃ pāpakaṃ karma kṛtam?
analyzed: yena mayā evaṃvidham pāpakam karma kṛtam

original: tataḥ sa tayābhihitah--na te manaḥśūkaṃsdminnarthe utpādayitavyam/
analyzed: tatas sa tayā abhihita hna te manaḥ śūkam sdmin arthe utpādayitavyam
panthāsamaḥ mātṛgrāmaḥ
yena evam hi yathā pitā gacchati
putraḥ pi tena eva gacchati
na ca asau panthā putrasya anugacchataḥ doṣa kārakaḥ
evam eva mātṛgrāmaḥ
tīrya samaḥ ca mātṛgrāmaḥ
yatra eva hi tīrye pitā snāti
putraḥ u pi tasmin snāti

original: na ca tīryaṃ putrasya snāyato doṣakārakaṃ bhavati/
analyzed: na ca tīryam putrasya snāyataḥ doṣa kārakam bhavati
evam eva mātṛgrāmaḥ

original: 159.002. api ca pratyanteṣu janapadeṣu dharmataivaiṣā yasyāmeva pitā asaddharmeṇābhigacchati,
analyzed: api ca pratyanteṣu janapadeṣu dharmatā eva eṣā yasyām eva pitā asat dharmeṇa abhigacchati
tām eva putraḥ u pi adhigacchati

original: 159.004. evamasau vaṇigdārako mātrā bahuvidhairanunayavacanairvinītaśokastayā mātrā tasmin pātake 'saddharme punaḥ punaratīva saṃjātarāgaḥ
analyzed: evam asau vaṇij dārakaḥ mātrā bahuvidhaiḥ anunaya vacanaiḥ vinīta śokaḥ tayā mātrā tasmin pātake saddharme punar punar atīva saṃjāta rāgaḥ
tena ca śreṣṭhinā gṛhe lekhyaḥ nupreṣitaḥ
bhadre dhīra ūrjita mahā utsāhā bhavasva
aham api lekha anupadam eva āgamiṣye

original: 159.006. sā vaṇikpatnī tathāvidhaṃ lekhārthaṃ śrutvā vaimanasyajātā cintayituṃ pravṛttā--mahāntaṃ kālaṃ mama tasyāgamanamudīkṣamāṇāyāḥ/
analyzed: sā vaṇij patnī tathāvidham lekha artham śrutvā vaimanasya jātā cintayitum pravṛttā a mahā antam kālam mama tasya āgamanam udīkṣamāṇāyāḥ
tadā na āgataḥ

original: 159.008. idānīṃ mayā evaṃvidhenopakrameṇa putraṃ ca paricaritvā sa cāgamiṣyati/
analyzed: idānīm mayā evaṃvidhena upakrameṇa putram ca paricaritvā sa ca āgamiṣyati

original: 159.008. ka upāyaḥ syāt yadahaṃ tamihāsamprāptameva jīvitāt vyaparopayeyam?
analyzed: kaḥ upāyaḥ syāt yat aham tam iha a samprāptam eva jīvitāt vyaparopayeyam

original: iti saṃcintya taṃ putramāhūya kathayati--pitrā te lekhyo 'nupreṣitah āgamiṣyatīti/
analyzed: iti saṃcintya tam putram āhūya kathayati pitrā te lekhyaḥ āgamiṣyati iti
jājase smābhiḥ idānīm kim karaṇīyam iti
gacchasva pitaram a samprāptam eva ghātaya
sa kathayati katham aham pitaram ghātayiṣye

original: yadā asau na prasahate pitṛvadhaṃ kartum,
analyzed: yadā asau na prasahate pitṛ vadham kartum

original: tadā tayā mātrā bhūyo 'nuvṛttivacanairabhihitah--tasyānuvṛttivacanairucyamānasya kāmeṣu saṃraktasyādhyavasāyo jātaḥ pitṛvadhaṃ prati/
analyzed: tadā tayā mātrā bhūyas nuvṛtti vacanaiḥ abhihita htasya anuvṛtti vacanaiḥ ucyamānasya kāmeṣu saṃraktasya adhyavasāyaḥ jātaḥ pitṛ vadham prati

original: 159.013. kāmān khalu pratisevato na hi kiṃcit pāpakaṃ karmākaraṇīyamiti vadāmi/
analyzed: kāmān khalu pratisevataḥ na hi kiṃcid pāpakam karma a karaṇīyam iti vadāmi
tatas tena uktam kena upāyena ghātayāmi
tayā abhihitam aham eva upāyam saṃvidhāsye

original: 159.015. ityuktvā viṣamādāya samitāyāṃ miśrayitvā maṇḍilakān paktvā anye 'pi ca nirviṣāḥ paktāḥ/
analyzed: iti uktvā viṣam ādāya samitāyām miśrayitvā maṇḍilakān paktvā anye ca nirviṣāḥ paktāḥ
yatas tam dārakam āhūya kathayati gacchasva
amī sa viṣāḥ maṇḍilakāḥ nirviṣāḥ ca

original: 159.017. gṛhya pitṛsakāśaṃ gatvā ca tasya viśvastasyaikatra bhuñjata etān saviṣān maṇḍilakān prayacchasva,
analyzed: gṛhya pitṛ sakāśam gatvā ca tasya viśvastasya ekatra bhuñjataḥ etān sa viṣān maṇḍilakān prayacchasva
ātmanā ca nirviṣān bhakṣaya

original: 159.018. tataḥ sa dārakastena lekhavāhikamanuṣyeṇa sārdhaṃ tān maṇḍilakān gṛhya gataḥ pitṛsakāśam/
analyzed: tatas sa dārakaḥ tena lekha vāhika manuṣyeṇa sārdham tān maṇḍilakān gṛhya gataḥ pitṛ sakāśam

original: 159.019. āgamya pitā asya atīva taṃ putraṃ dṛṣṭvā abhirūpaprāsādikaṃ maheśākhyaṃ prāmodyaṃ prāptaḥ/
analyzed: āgamya pitā asya atīva tam putram dṛṣṭvā abhirūpa prāsādikam maheśākhyam prāmodyam prāptaḥ

original: 159.020. sahyāsahyaṃ pṛṣṭvā teṣāṃ teṣāṃ vaṇijāmākhyāti--ayaṃ bhavanto 'smākaṃ putraḥ/
analyzed: sahya asahyam pṛṣṭvā teṣām teṣām vaṇijām ākhyāti ayam bhavantaḥ smākam putraḥ

original: 159.021. yadā tena dārakeṇa saṃlakṣitaṃ sarvatra ahamanena pitrā pratisaṃvedita iti,
analyzed: yadā tena dārakeṇa saṃlakṣitam sarvatra aham anena pitrā pratisaṃveditaḥ iti
tatas tam pitaram āha tāta
ambayā maṇḍilakāḥ praheṇakam anupreṣitam
tat tātaḥ paribhuñjatu

original: 159.023. paścāttena pitrā sārdhamekaphalāyāṃ bhuñjatā tasya pituḥ saviṣā maṇḍilakā dattāḥ,
analyzed: paścāt tena pitrā sārdham ekaphalāyām bhuñjatā tasya pituḥ sa viṣāḥ maṇḍilakāḥ dattāḥ
ātmanā nirviṣāḥ prabhakṣitāḥ

original: 159.024. yato 'sya pitā tān saviṣān maṇḍilakān bhakṣayitvā bhṛtaḥ/
analyzed: yatas sya pitā tān sa viṣān maṇḍilakān bhakṣayitvā bhṛtaḥ

original: 159.025. tasya ca pituḥ kāladharmaṇā yuktasya ca dārako na kenacit pāpakaṃ karma kurvāṇo 'bhiśaṅkito vā pratisaṃvedito vā/
analyzed: tasya ca pituḥ kāladharmaṇā yuktasya ca dārakaḥ na kenacid pāpakam karma kurvāṇaḥ bhiśaṅkitaḥ vā pratisaṃveditaḥ vā

original: 159.026. paścāttairiṣṭasnigdhasuhṛdbhirvaṇigbhiḥ śocayitvā yattattu kiṃcittasya vaṇijo bhaṇḍamāsīddhiraṇyasuvarṇaṃ vā,
analyzed: paścāt taiḥ iṣṭa snigdha suhṛdbhiḥ vaṇigbhiḥ śocayitvā yat tat tu kiṃcid tasya vaṇijaḥ bhaṇḍam āsīt hiraṇya suvarṇam vā
tat tasya dārakasya dattam

original: 159.028. sa dārakastaṃ bhāṇḍaṃ hiraṇyasuvarṇaṃ paitṛkaṃ gṛhya svagṛhamanuprāptaḥ/
analyzed: sa dārakaḥ tam bhāṇḍam hiraṇya suvarṇam paitṛkam gṛhya sva gṛham anuprāptaḥ

original: 159.029. tasya ca gatasya svagṛhaṃ sā mātā pracchannāsaddharmeṇa taṃ putraṃ paricaramāṇā ratiṃ nādhigacchati,
analyzed: tasya ca gatasya sva gṛham sā mātā pracchanna asat dharmeṇa tam putram paricaramāṇā ratim na adhigacchati

original: anabhiratarūpā ca taṃ putraṃ vadati--kiyatkālaṃ vayamevaṃ pracchannena krameṇa ratikrīḍāmanubhaviṣyāmah?
analyzed: an abhirata rūpā ca tam putram vadati kiyatkālam vayam evam pracchannena krameṇa rati krīḍām anubhaviṣyāmah

original: yannu vayamasmāddeśādanyadeśāntaraṃ gatvā prakāśakrameṇa niḥśaṅkā bhūtvā jāyāpatīti vikhyātadharmāṇaḥ sukhaṃ prativasema/
analyzed: yat nu vayam asmāt deśāt anya deśa antaram gatvā prakāśa krameṇa niḥśaṅkāḥ bhūtvā jāyā patī iti vikhyāta dharmāṇaḥ sukham prativasema

original: 159.032. tatastau gṛhaṃ tyaktvā <160>mitrasvajanasambandhivargānapahāya purāṇadāsīdāsakarmakarāṃstyaktvā yāvadarthajātaṃ hiraṇyasuvarṇaṃ ca  #
analyzed: tatas tau gṛham tyaktvā purāṇa dāsī dāsa karmakarān tyaktvā yāvat artha jātam hiraṇya suvarṇam ca
gṛhya anya viṣaya antaram gatau

original: 160.002. tatra gatvā janapadeṣu vikhyāpayamānau jāyāpatikamiti ratikrīḍāmanubhavamānau vyavasthitau/
analyzed: tatra gatvā janapadeṣu vikhyāpayamānau jāyā patikam iti rati krīḍām anubhavamānau vyavasthitau

original: 160.003. yāvadarhan bhikṣuḥ kenacit kālāntareṇa janapadacārikāṃ caraṃs tamadhiṣṭhānamanuprāptaḥ/
analyzed: yāvat arhan bhikṣuḥ kenacid kāla antareṇa janapada cārikām caran tam adhiṣṭhānam anuprāptaḥ

original: 160.004. tena tatra piṇḍapātamanvāhiṇḍatā vīthyāṃ niṣadya ayaṃ vaṇigdharmaṇā saṃvyavahāramāṇaḥ sa dārako dṛṣṭaḥ/
analyzed: tena tatra piṇḍapātam anvāhiṇḍatā vīthyām niṣadya ayam vaṇij dharmaṇā saṃvyavahāramāṇaḥ sa dārakaḥ dṛṣṭaḥ
dṛṣṭvā ca ārogyayitvā ca abhibhāṣya ukta hmātuḥ te kuśalam

original: sa ca dārakastamarhantaṃ tathā abhivadamānamupaśrutya saṃbhinnacetāḥ svena duścaritena karmaṇā śaṅkitamanāścintayituṃ pravṛttaḥ/
analyzed: sa ca dārakaḥ tam arhantam tathā abhivadamānam upaśrutya saṃbhinna cetāḥ svena duścaritena karmaṇā śaṅkita manāḥ cintayitum pravṛttaḥ
sa vicintya mātṛ sakāśam gatvā saṃvedayati yatiḥ abhyāgataḥ
yaḥ sau asmad gṛham upasaṃkrāmati

original: eṣa sa ihādhiṣṭhāne pratisaṃvedayiṣyati eṣā asya dārakasya māteti/
analyzed: eṣa saḥ iha adhiṣṭhāne pratisaṃvedayiṣyati eṣā asya dārakasya mātā iti
vayam ca iham jāyā patikam iti khyātau
katham eṣa śakyam ghātayitum

original: tatastayoḥ saṃcintya taṃ gṛhamenamupanimantrayitvā bhuñjānaṃ ghātayāmaḥ/
analyzed: tatas tayoḥ saṃcintya tam gṛham enam upanimantrayitvā bhuñjānam ghātayāmaḥ
tatas tayoḥ evam saṃcintya saḥ rhan bhikṣuḥ antargṛham upanimantrayitvā bhojayitum ārabdhaḥ

original: 160.011. sa dārako gūḍhaśastro bhūtvā arhantaṃ bhojayituṃ mātrā saha nirjanaṃ gṛhaṃ kṛtvā sa cārhadbhikṣubhuktvā tasmādgṛhādviśrabdhacārakrameṇa
analyzed: sa dārakaḥ gūḍha śastraḥ bhūtvā arhantam bhojayitum mātrā saha nirjanam gṛham kṛtvā sa ca arhat bhikṣu bhuktvā tasmāt gṛhāt viśrabdha cāra krameṇa
tatas tena jīvitāt vyaparopayati
kāmāḥ ca lavaṇa udaka sadṛśāḥ
yathā yathā sevyanti
tathā tathā tṛṣṇā vṛddhim upayāti

original: 160.015. tasya dārakasya sā mātā taṃ putramasaddharmeṇānuvartamānā tasminnevādhiṣṭhāne śreṣṭhiputreṇa sārdhaṃ pracchannakāmā asaddharmeṣu saktacittā
analyzed: tasya dārakasya sā mātā tam putram asat dharmeṇa anuvartamānā tasmin eva adhiṣṭhāne śreṣṭhi putreṇa sārdham pracchanna kāmā asat dharmeṣu sakta cittā
tasya dārakasya tathāvidhaḥ upakramaḥ pratisaṃviditaḥ
tasya dārakasya tathāvidhaḥ upakramaḥ pratisaṃviditaḥ
tatas tena tasya mātuḥ uktam amba nivartasva īdṛśāt doṣāt

original: 160.018. sā ca tasmiñ śreṣṭhiputre saṃraktacittā dvirapi trirapyucyamānā na nirvartate/
analyzed: sā ca tasmin śreṣṭhi putre saṃrakta cittā dvis api tris api ucyamānā na nirvartate

original: 160.018. tatastena niṣkoṣamāsiṃ kṛtvā sā mātā jīvitādvyaparopitā/
analyzed: tatas tena niṣkoṣam asim kṛtvā sā mātā jīvitāt vyaparopitā
yadā tasya trīṇi ānantaryāṇi paripūrṇāni
tadā devatābhiḥ janapadeṣu ārocitam pāpaḥ eṣa pitṛ ghātakaḥ rhat dhātakaḥ mātṛ ghātakaḥ ca
trīṇi anena ānantaryāṇi naraka karma saṃvartanīyāni karmāṇi kṛtāni upacitāni
tatas tena adhiṣṭhāna janena tat śrutvā tad adhiṣṭhānāt nirvāsitaḥ

original: 160.022. sa yadā nirvāsitastasmādadhiṣṭhānāt tadā cintayituṃ pravṛttah--asti cāsya buddhaśāsane kaścidevānunayah?
analyzed: sa yadā nirvāsitaḥ tasmāt adhiṣṭhānāt tadā cintayitum pravṛtta hasti ca asya buddha śāsane kaścid eva anunayaḥ
evam manasi kṛtam gacchāmi
idānīm pravrajāmi iti

original: 160.024. sa ca vihāraṃ gatvā bhikṣusakāśamupasaṃkramya evaṃ kathayati--ārya,
analyzed: sa ca vihāram gatvā bhikṣu sakāśam upasaṃkramya evam kathayati ārya
pravrajeyam
tatas tena bhikṣuṇā uktam mā tāvat pitṛ ghātakaḥ si
tena bhikṣuḥ abhihita hasti mayā ghātitaḥ pitā
tatas punar tāvat mātṛ ghātakaḥ si
tena uktam ārya
ghātitā mayā mātā
sa bhūyas pṛṣṭa hmā tāvat arhat vadhaḥ te kṛtah

original: 164.005. te nirmite cittamabhiprasādya tannarakavedanīyaṃ karma kṣapayitvā devamanuṣyeṣu pratisaṃdhiṃ gṛhṇanti yatra satyānāṃ bhājanabhūtā
analyzed: te nirmite cittam abhiprasādya tad naraka vedanīyam karma kṣapayitvā deva manuṣyeṣu pratisaṃdhim gṛhṇanti yatra satyānām bhājana bhūtā

original: 164.016. atha tā arciṣastrisāhasramahāsāhasraṃ lokadhātumanvāhiṇḍya bhagavantameva pṛṣṭhataḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ samanugacchanti/

original: siṃha iva daṃṣṭagaṇaparivṛto haṃsarāja iva haṃsagaṇaparivṛtaḥ suparṇīva parikṣagaṇaparivṛto
analyzed: siṃhaḥ iva daṃṣṭa gaṇa parivṛtaḥ haṃsa rājaḥ iva haṃsa gaṇa parivṛtaḥ suparṇī iva parikṣa gaṇa parivṛtaḥ

original: vipra iva śiṣyagaṇaparivṛtaḥ suvaidya ivāturagaṇaparivṛtaḥ śūra iva yodhagaṇaparivṛto

original: deśika ivādhvagaṇaparivṛtaḥ sārthavāha iva vaṇiggaṇaparivṛtaḥ śreṣṭhīva paurajanaparivṛtaḥ
analyzed: deśikaḥ iva adhva gaṇa parivṛtaḥ sārthavāhaḥ iva vaṇij gaṇa parivṛtaḥ śreṣṭhī iva paura jana parivṛtaḥ
koṭṭarājaḥ iva mantri gaṇa parivṛtaḥ cakravartī iva putra sahasra parivṛtaḥ candraḥ iva

original: nakṣatragaṇaparivṛtaḥ sūrya iva raśmisahasraparivṛto dhṛtarāṣṭra iva gandharvagaṇaparivṛto

original: virūḍhaka iva kumbhāṇḍagaṇaparivṛto brahmeva brahmakāyikaparivṛtaḥ stimita iva jalanidhiḥ

original: sajala iva jaladharo vimada iva gajapatiḥ sudāntairindrayairasaṃkṣobhiteryāpathapracāro dvātriṃśatā
analyzed: sa jalaḥ iva jaladharaḥ vimadaḥ iva gajapatiḥ su dāntaiḥ indrayaiḥ a saṃkṣobhita īryāpatha pracāraḥ dvātriṃśatā

original: sūryasahasrātirekaprabho jaṅgama iva ratnaparvataḥ samantato bhadrako daśabhirbalaiścaturbhirvaiśāradyaistribhirāveṇikaiḥ
analyzed: sūrya sahasra atireka prabhaḥ jaṅgamaḥ iva ratna parvataḥ samantataḥ bhadrakaḥ daśabhiḥ balaiḥ caturbhiḥ vaiśāradyaiḥ tribhiḥ āveṇikaiḥ

original: parivṛto 'nyena ca mahatā bhikṣusaṃghena anekaiśca prāṇiśatasahasraiḥ śītavanaṃ mahāśmaśānaṃ saṃprasthitaḥ /

original: 165.026. aṣṭādaśānuśaṃsā buddhacārikāyāmityanekāni devatāśatasahasrāṇi bhagavataḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ pṛṣṭhato 'nubaddhāni/

śītavana anuguṇāḥ ca vāyavaḥ vāyitum ārabdhāḥ

pratipattavyam iti

original: 167.003. tasya coparipadmakarṇikāyāṃ kumāro niṣaṇṇo 'bhirūpo darśanīyaḥ prāsādikaḥ/

original: 167.004. taṃ dṛṣṭvā anekāni prāṇiśatasahasrāṇi paraṃ vismayamupagatāni/
analyzed: tam dṛṣṭvā anekāni prāṇi śata sahasrāṇi param vismayam upagatāni

sarveṇa sarvam na bhaviṣyasi iti

original: 167.008. tatra bhagavāñ jīvakaṃ kumārabhūtamāmantrayate--gṛhāṇa jīvaka kumārakamiti/

tena nirviśaṅkena citām vigāhya gṛhītaḥ
vigāhataḥ tasya jina ājñayā citām pratigṛhṇataḥ ca agni gatam kumārakam

original: sa kathayati--rājakule 'haṃ bhadanta jāto rājakule vṛddhaḥ/

original: 167.017. tatra bhagavān subhadraṃ gṛhapatimāmantrayate--gṛhāṇedānīṃ gṛhapate kumāramiti/

kārṣāpaṇa sahasreṇa dātavyā
no ced a pattanam ghoṣayitvā anyatra gantavyam iti

original: 171.004. so 'pattanaṃ ghoṣayitvā tām yamalīṃ chatradaṇḍe prakṣipya sārthena sārdhaṃ rājagṛhaṃ saṃprasthito yāvadanupūrveṇa śulkaśālāmanuprāptaḥ/
analyzed: saḥ pattanam ghoṣayitvā tām yamalīm chatra daṇḍe prakṣipya sārthena sārdham rājagṛham saṃprasthitaḥ yāvat anupūrveṇa śulka śālām anuprāptaḥ
śulkāśālikena sārthaḥ śulkitaḥ
sa śulkam dattvā saṃprasthitaḥ
ghaṇṭā raṭitum ārabdhā
śailkikāḥ kathayanti bhavantaḥ
yathā iyam ghaṇṭā raṇati
nūnam sārthaḥ na nipuṇam śulkitaḥ
bhūyas śulkayāmaḥ iti
taiḥ asau sārthaḥ punar pratinivartya śulkitaḥ
na asti kiṃcid aśulkitam
ghaṇṭā raṭati eva
taiḥ asau sārthaḥ bhūyas pratinivartya pratyavekṣitaḥ
na asti eva kiṃcid

original: 171.010. sārthikā avadhyātumārabdhāh--kim yūyamasamān bhūṣitukāmā yena bhūyo bhūyaḥ pratinivartayadhvamiti?
analyzed: sārthikāḥ avadhyātum ārabdhāḥ āh kim yūyam asamān bhūṣitu kāmāḥ yena bhūyas bhūyas pratinivartayadhvam iti
taiḥ asau dvidhā kṛtvā muktaḥ
yeṣām madhye sa brāhmaṇaḥ na asti
te tikrāntāḥ

original: 171.012. anyeṣāṃ gacchatāṃ sā ghaṇṭā tathaiva raṭitumārabdhā/

sa kathayati pratyavekṣata yadi mama kiṃcid asti iti

sā ghaṇṭā raṭati eva
taiḥ asau brāhmaṇaḥ pratinivartya ukta hbho brāhmaṇa kathaya

original: 171.016. kiṃ tu devasyaiva sānnidhyaṃ jñātaṃ bhavatīti/

original: 171.018. brāhmaṇaḥ kathayati--yūyaṃ kathayatha śulkaṃ na dāpayāma iti/

sa taiḥ śabditaḥ
jyotiṣkeṇa ukta hbho brāhmaṇa
kimartham tvam a pattanam ghoṣayasi
gṛhapate asyāḥ yamalyāḥ kārṣāpaṇa sahasram mūlyam

tena upadarśitā

ekam a paribhuktakam
yat a paribhuktam

asya ardhatṛtīyāni
brāhmaṇaḥ kathayati kim etat evam bhaviṣyati

paśya iti

paribhuktaḥ kṣiptaḥ

analyzed: sa tasya sakāśam gataḥ śiraḥpraṇāmam kṛtvā kathayati tvayā eva etāni pañca kārṣāpaṇa śatāni dattāani

original: 189.014. asmākaṃ gṛhe na bhāṇḍopaskaro nāpi śayanāsanam/
analyzed: asmākam gṛhe na bhāṇḍa upaskaraḥ na api śayana āsanam
tat arhasi mama anukampayā bhaktam sajjīkartum
aham āgatya sva hastena buddha pramukham bhikṣu saṃgham bhojayiṣyāmi iti

original: 189.016. gṛhapatiḥ saṃlakṣayati--mamedaṃ gṛhamacirotthitaṃ buddhapramukhena bhikṣusaṃghena paribhuktaṃ bhaviṣyati,
analyzed: gṛhapatiḥ saṃlakṣayati mama idam gṛham acira utthitam buddha pramukhena bhikṣu saṃghena paribhuktam bhaviṣyati
pratijāgarmi
iti viditvā kathayati putra śobhanam
sthāpayitvā kārṣāpaṇān gaccha
śvas buddha pramukham bhikṣu saṃgham upanimantraya
aham āhāram sajjīkaromi iti

original: 189.019. sa saṃjātasaumanasyaḥ śiraḥpraṇāmaṃ kṛtvā prakrānto yena bhagavāṃstenopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
analyzed: sa saṃjāta saumanasyaḥ śiraḥpraṇāmam kṛtvā prakrāntaḥ yena bhagavān tena upasaṃkrāntaḥ

original: 189.020. upasaṃkramya vṛddhānte sthitvā kathayati--so 'haṃ buddhapramukhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghamupanimantrayāmīti/
analyzed: upasaṃkramya vṛddhānte sthitvā kathayati saḥ ham buddha pramukham bhikṣu saṃgham upanimantrayāmi iti
adhivāsayati bhagavān tasya gṛhapati putrasya tūṣṇībhāvena

original: 189.021. atha sa gṛhapatiputro bhagavatastūṣṇībhāvenādhivāsanāṃ viditvā bhagavato 'ntikāt prakrāntaḥ//
analyzed: atha sa gṛhapati putraḥ bhagavataḥ tūṣṇībhāvena adhivāsanām viditvā bhagavataḥ ntikāt prakrāntaḥ

original: 189.023. tenāpi gṛhapatinā tāmeva rātriṃ śuciṃ praṇītaṃ khādanīyaṃ bhojanīyaṃ samudānīya kālyamevotthāya gṛhaṃ saṃmārjitam/
analyzed: tena api gṛhapatinā tām eva rātrim śucim praṇītam khādanīyam bhojanīyam samudānīya kālyam eva utthāya gṛham saṃmārjitam
sukumārī gomaya kārṣī dattā
āsana prajñaptiḥ kāritā
udaka maṇayaḥ pratiṣṭhāpitāḥ

original: 189.025. tenāpi gṛhapatiputreṇa gatvā bhagavata ārocitam--samayo bhadanta,
analyzed: tena api gṛhapati putreṇa gatvā bhagavataḥ ārocitam samayaḥ bhadanta

original: sajjaṃ bhaktam yasyedānīṃ bhagavān kālaṃ manyate iti/
analyzed: sajjam bhaktam yasya idānīm bhagavān kālam manyate iti

original: 189.026. atha bhagavān pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaramādāya bhikṣugaṇaparivṛto bhikṣusaṃghapuraskṛto yena tasya gṛhapater niveśanaṃ tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
analyzed: atha bhagavān pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātra cīvaram ādāya bhikṣu gaṇa parivṛtaḥ bhikṣu saṃgha puraskṛtaḥ yena tasya gṛhapateḥ niveśanam tena upasaṃkrāntaḥ

original: 189.027. ṣaḍvargīyāḥ pṛcchanti--kenāayaṃ buddhapramukho bhikṣusaṃgha upanimantrita iti?
analyzed: ṣaḍvargīyāḥ pṛcchantikena aayam buddha pramukhaḥ bhikṣu saṃghaḥ upanimantritaḥ iti
apare kathayanti amukena gṛhapati putreṇa iti
te parasparam saṃjalpam kurvanti nanda upananda
bhṛtaka puruṣaḥ saḥ
kim asau dāsyati

original: gacchāma kulopakagṛheṣu gatvā purobhaktakāṃ karma iti/
analyzed: gacchāma kulopaka gṛheṣu gatvā purobhaktakām karma iti
te kulopaka gṛhāṇi upasaṃkrāntāḥ
taiḥ ukta āhārya
purobhaktakām kuruta iti
te kathayanti evam kurmaḥ iti
taiḥ purobhaktakā kṛtā

original: 189.031. bhagavāṃstasya gṛhapater niveśane purastādbhikṣusaṃghasya prajñapta evāsane niṣaṇṇaḥ/
analyzed: bhagavān tasya gṛhapateḥ niveśane purastāt bhikṣu saṃghasya prajñapte eva āsane niṣaṇṇaḥ
ṣaḍvargīyāḥ api purobhaktakām kṛtvā niṣaṇṇaḥ

original: 190.001. atha sa gṛhapatipurtaḥ sukhopaniṣaṇṇaṃ buddhapramukhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghaṃ viditvā śucinā praṇītena khādanīyabhijanīyena svahastaṃ saṃtarpayati
analyzed: atha sa gṛhapati purtaḥ sukha upaniṣaṇṇam buddha pramukham bhikṣu saṃgham viditvā śucinā praṇītena khādanīya bhijanīyena sva hastam saṃtarpayati

original: 190.002. satatapariveṣaṇaṃ kurvāṇaḥ paśyti ṣaḍvargīyān na satkṛtya parimuñjānān/
analyzed: satata pariveṣaṇam kurvāṇaḥ paśyati ṣaḍvargīyān na satkṛtya parimuñjānān

original: 190.003. dṛṣṭvā ca punarbhagavantaṃ viditvā dhautahastamapanītapātraṃ bhagavataḥ purastāt sthitvā kathayati--bhagavan,
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā ca punar bhagavantam viditvā dhauta hastam apanīta pātram bhagavataḥ purastāt sthitvā kathayati bhagavan
kaiścid atra āryakaiḥ na satkṛtya paribhuktam āhāram
deveṣu na upapatsye iti
bhagavān āha vatsa
śayana āsana paribhogena tāvat tvam deveṣu upapadyethāḥ prāk eva anna pāna paribhogena iti

original: 190.006. atha bhagavāṃstaṃ gṛhapatiputraṃ ca dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśya samādāpya samuttejya saṃpraharṣyotthāyāsanāt prakrāntaḥ//
analyzed: atha bhagavān tam gṛhapati putram ca dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśya samādāpya samuttejya saṃpraharṣya utthāya āsanāt prakrāntaḥ

original: 190.008. atrāntare pañcamātrāṇi vaṇikśatāni mahāsamudrāt saṃsiddhayānapātrāṇni rājagṛhamanuprāptāni/
analyzed: atra antare pañca mātrāṇi vaṇij śatāni mahā samudrāt saṃsiddha yānapātrāṇni rājagṛham anuprāptāni

original: 190.009. rājagṛhe ca parva pratyupasthitamiti na kiṃcit krayeṇāpi labhyate/
analyzed: rāja gṛhe ca parva pratyupasthitam iti na kiṃcid krayeṇa api labhyate
tatra ekaḥ vaṇij bhikṣu gocarikaḥ
sa kathayati bhavantaḥ

original: āgamayata kasyādya gṛhe buddhapramukhena bhikṣusaṃghena bhaktam,
analyzed: āgamayata kasya adya gṛhe buddha pramukhena bhikṣu saṃghena bhaktam
tatra avaśyam kiṃcid utsadana dharmakam bhavati iti
te śravaṇa paramparayā ca anveṣamāṇāḥ tasya gṛhapateḥ sakāśam upasaṃkrāntāḥ
kathayanti gṛhapate

original: tavādya buddhapramukhena bhikṣusaṃghena bhukte iha parva pratyupasthitamiti na kiṃcit krayeṇāpi labhyate/
analyzed: tava adya buddha pramukhena bhikṣu saṃghena bhukte iha parva pratyupasthitam iti na kiṃcid krayeṇa api labhyate
yadi kiṃcid utsadana dharmakam asti
mūlyena dīyatām iti
na mama etat bhaktam
api tu tasya etat gṛhapati putrasya bhaktam
enam yācadhvam iti
te tasya sakāśam upasaṃkramya kathayanti gṛhapati putra
dīyatām asmākam bhukta śeṣam yat asti
mūlyam prayacchāmaḥ iti
sa kathayati na aham mūlyena anuprayacchāmi
api tu evam eva prayacchāmi iti

original: 190.016. te tenānnapānena saṃtarpitā gṛhapatergatvā kathayanti--tasya te gṛhapate lābhāḥ sulabdhā yasya te niveśane buddhapramukho bhikṣusaṃgho  #
analyzed: te tena anna pānena saṃtarpitāḥ gṛhapateḥ gatvā kathayanti tasya te gṛhapate lābhāḥ su labdhāḥ yasya te niveśane buddha pramukhaḥ bhikṣu saṃghaḥ
anna pānena saṃtarpitaḥ
imāni ca pañca vaṇij śatāni iti
sa kathayati anena gṛhapati putreṇa lābhāḥ su labdhāḥ

original: 190.019. anena buddhapramukho bhikṣusaṃgho 'nnapānena saṃtarpito na mayeti/
analyzed: anena buddha pramukhaḥ bhikṣu saṃghaḥ nna pānena saṃtarpitaḥ na mayā iti
te pṛcchanti katarasya ayam gṛhapateḥ putra
amukasya sārthavāhasya
sārthavāhaḥ kathayati bhavantaḥ
mama eṣa vayasya putraḥ bhavati
tasya pitā mahā samudram avatīrṇaḥ nayena vyasanam āpannaḥ
śakyam bahubhiḥ ekaḥ samuddhartum
na tu eva ekena bahavaḥ

original: 190.022. tadayaṃ paṭakaṃ prajñapto yena vo yat parityaktam,
analyzed: tat ayam paṭakam prajñaptaḥ yena vaḥ yat parityaktam
saḥ smin paṭake nuprayacchatu iti

original: 190.023. te pūrvamevābhiprasannāḥ sārthavāhena ca protsāhitā iti tairyathāsambhāvyena maṇimuktādīni ratnāni dattāni/
analyzed: te pūrvam eva abhiprasannāḥ sārthavāhena ca protsāhitāḥ iti taiḥ yathāsambhāvyena maṇi muktā ādīni ratnāni dattāni
mahān rāśiḥ saṃpannaḥ
sārthavāhaḥ kathayati putra gṛhāṇa iti
sa kathayati tāt
na mayā mūlyena dattam iti
sārthavāhaḥ kathayati putra
na vayam tava mūlyam prayacchāmaḥ
yadi ca mūlyam gaṇyate
ekena ratnena īdṛśānām bhaktānām anekāni śatāni saṃvidyante

original: 190.027. kiṃ tu vayaṃ tavābhiprasannāḥ prasannādhikāraṃ kurmaḥ, gṛhāṇeti/
analyzed: kim tu vayam tava abhiprasannāḥ prasanna adhikāram kurmaḥ gṛhāṇa iti
sa kathayati tāt

original: mayā buddhapramukho bhikṣusaṃgho bhojito deveṣūpapatsye iti/
analyzed: mayā buddha pramukhaḥ bhikṣu saṃghaḥ bhojitaḥ deveṣu upapatsye iti
tasmāt avaśiṣṭam yuṣmabhyam dattam
yadi grahīṣyāmi
sthānam etat vidyate yat deveṣu na upapatsye
sārthavāha hputra
abhiśraddadhāsi tvam bhagavataḥ
tāt abhiśraddadhe
gaccha bhagavantam pṛccha
sa yena bhagavān tena upasaṃkrāntaḥ

original: 190.031. upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte niṣaṇṇaḥ/
analyzed: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte niṣaṇṇaḥ
sa gṛhapati putraḥ bhagavantam idam avocat bhagavan

original: mayā buddhapramukhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghaṃ bhojayitvā yadannapānamavaśiṣṭam <191>tadviṇijāṃ dattam/
analyzed: mayā buddha pramukham bhikṣu saṃgham bhojayitvā yat anna pānam avaśiṣṭam dattam
te mama prasannaḥ prasanna adhikāram kurvanti

original: 191.001. kiṃ kalpate tanmama grahītumāhosvinna kalpata iti?
analyzed: kim kalpate tat mama grahītum āhosvit na kalpate iti
bhagavān āha yadi prasannāḥ prasanna adhikāram kurvanti gṛhāṇa
bhagavat mā deveṣu na utpapatsye
bhagavān āha vatsa
puṣpam etat
phalam anyat bhaviṣyati

original: 191.003. tena bhagavadvacanābhisampratyayāt parituṣṭena gatvā ratnāni gṛhītāni//
analyzed: tena bhagavat vacana abhisampratyayāt parituṣṭena gatvā ratnāni gṛhītāni
atrā antare rājagṛhe putraḥ śreṣṭhī kālagataḥ

original: 191.005. tato rājagṛhanivāsinaḥ paurāḥ saṃnipatya saṃjalpaṃ kurvanti--bhavantaḥ,
analyzed: tatas rājagṛha nivāsinaḥ paurāḥ saṃnipatya saṃjalpam kurvanti bhavantaḥ
śreṣṭhī kālagataḥ
kam śreṣṭhinam abhiṣañcāmaḥ iti
tatra eke kathayanti yaḥ puṇya maheśākhyaḥ iti
apare kathayanti katham asmābhiḥ jñātavyam iti
te kathayanti nānā varṇāni bījāni pakka kumbhe prakṣipāmaḥ
yaḥ eka varṇāni uddhariṣyati
tam śreṣṭhinam abhiṣiñcāmaḥ iti
taiḥ nānā varṇāni bījāni pakka kumbhe prakṣiptāni
ārocitam cabhavantaḥ
yaḥ eka varṇāni bījāni etasmāt kumbhāt uddharet
sa śreṣṭhī abhiṣicyate
yasya vaḥ śreṣṭhi tvam abhipretam ca
uddharatu iti
te uddhartum ārabdhāḥ
sarvaiḥ nānā varṇāni uddhṛtāni
tena tu gṛhapati putreṇa eka varṇāni uddhṛtāni
paura jānapadāḥ kathayanti bhavantaḥ
ayam puṇya maheśākhyaḥ
sarve enam śreṣṭhinam abhiṣiñcāmaḥ
tatra eke kathayanti bhavantaḥ
ayam bhṛtaka puruṣaḥ
katham enam śreṣṭhinam abhiṣiñcāmaḥ iti
apare kathayanti punar api tāvat jijñāsāmaḥ
tena yāvat tris api eka varṇāni uddhṛtāni
te kathayanti bhavantaḥ
manuṣyakāḥ api asya sa ākṣepam anuprayacchanti
āgacchataḥ enam eva abhiṣiñcāmaḥ iti
sa taiḥ śreṣṭhī abhiṣiktaḥ

original: 191.016. sa gṛhapatiḥ saṃlakṣayati--yadapyanena mama bhṛtikayā karma kṛtam,
analyzed: sa gṛhapatiḥ saṃlakṣayati yat api anena mama bhṛtikayā karma kṛtam
tathā api ayam puṇya maheśākhyaḥ sattvaḥ
saṃgrahaḥ usya kartavyaḥ iti

original: 191.017. tena tasya sarvālaṃkāravibhūṣitā duhitā bhāryārthaṃ dattā/
analyzed: tena tasya sarva alaṃkāra vibhūṣitā duhitā bhāryā artham dattā
tat ca gṛham
prabhūtam svāpateyam

original: 191.018. sahasaivaṃ bhogairabhyudgata iti tasya sahasodgato gṛhapatiḥ sahasodgato gṛhapatiriti saṃjñā saṃvṛttā//
analyzed: sahasā evam bhogaiḥ abhyudgataḥ iti tasya sahasā udgataḥ gṛhapatiḥ sahasā udgataḥ gṛhapatiḥ iti saṃjñā saṃvṛttā
sa saṃlakṣayati yā kācid asmākam śrī saubhāgya sampad
sarvā asau buddham bhagavantam āgamya

original: 191.021. yannvahaṃ punarapi buddhapramukhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghamantargṛhe upanimantrya bhojayeyam/
analyzed: yat nu aham punar api buddha pramukham bhikṣu saṃgham antargṛhe upanimantrya bhojayeyam
iti viditvā yena bhagavān tena upasaṃkrāntaḥ

original: 191.022. upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte niṣaṇṇaḥ/
analyzed: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte niṣaṇṇaḥ

original: 191.022. ekāntaniṣaṇṇaṃ sahasodgataṃ gṛhapatiṃ bhagavān dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśayati samādāpayati samuttejayati saṃpraharṣayati/
analyzed: ekānta niṣaṇṇam sahasā udgatam gṛhapatim bhagavān dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśayati samādāpayati samuttejayati saṃpraharṣayati

original: 191.024. anekaparyāyeṇa dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśya samādāpya samuttejya saṃpraharṣya tūṣṇīm/
analyzed: aneka paryāyeṇa dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśya samādāpya samuttejya saṃpraharṣya tūṣṇīm

original: 191.025. atha sahasodgato gṛhapatirutthāyāsanādekāṃsamuttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā yena bhagavāṃstenāñjaliṃ
analyzed: atha sahasā udgataḥ gṛhapatiḥ utthāya āsanāt eka aṃsam uttarāsaṅgam kṛtvā yena bhagavān tena añjalim

original: praṇamya bhagavantamidamavocat--adhivāsayatu bhagavāñ śvo 'ntargṛhe bhaktena sārdhaṃ bhikṣusaṃgheneti /
analyzed: praṇamya bhagavantam idam avocat adhivāsayatu bhagavām śvas ntargṛhe bhaktena sārdham bhikṣu saṃghena iti
adhivāsayati bhagavān sahasā udgatasya gṛhapateḥ tūṣṇībhāvena

original: 191.027. atha sahasodgato gṛhapatirbhagavatastūṣṇībhāvenādhivāsanāṃ viditvā bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā bhagavato 'ntikāt prakrāntaḥ/
analyzed: atha sahasā udgataḥ gṛhapatiḥ bhagavataḥ tūṣṇībhāvena adhivāsanām viditvā bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā bhagavataḥ ntikāt prakrāntaḥ

original: 191.028. atha sahasodgato gṛhapatistāmeva rātriṃ śuciṃ praṇītaṃ khādanīyaṃ bhojanīyaṃ
analyzed: atha sahasā udgataḥ gṛhapatiḥ tām eva rātrim śucim praṇītam khādanīyam bhojanīyam

original: samudānīya kālyamevotthāya āsanāni prajñapyodakamaṇīn pratiṣṭhāpya bhagavato dūtena
analyzed: samudānīya kālyam eva utthāya āsanāni prajñapya udaka maṇīn pratiṣṭhāpya bhagavataḥ dūtena
kālam ārocayati samayaḥ bhadanta

original: sajjaṃ bhaktam yasyedānīṃ bhagavān kālaṃ manyata iti/
analyzed: sajjam bhaktam yasya idānīm bhagavān kālam manyate iti

original: 191.031. atha bhagavān pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaramādāya bhikṣugaṇaparivṛto yena sahasodgatasya gṛhapater niveśanaṃ tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
analyzed: atha bhagavān pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātra cīvaram ādāya bhikṣu gaṇa parivṛtaḥ yena sahasā udgatasya gṛhapateḥ niveśanam tena upasaṃkrāntaḥ
upasaṃkramya prajñapte eva āsane niṣaṇṇaḥ

original: 192.001. atha sahasodgato gṛhapatiḥ sukhopaniṣaṇṇaṃ buddhapramukhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghaṃ viditvā śucinā praṇītena khādanīyena bhojanīyena svahastaṃ  #
analyzed: atha sahasā udgataḥ gṛhapatiḥ sukha upaniṣaṇṇam buddha pramukham bhikṣu saṃgham viditvā śucinā praṇītena khādanīyena bhojanīyena sva hastam

original: 192.002. anekaparyāyeṇa śucinā praṇītena khādanīyena bhojanīyena svahastaṃ saṃtarpya
analyzed: aneka paryāyeṇa śucinā praṇītena khādanīyena bhojanīyena sva hastam saṃtarpya

original: saṃpravārya bhagavantaṃ bhuktavantaṃ viditvā dhautahastamapanītapātraṃ nīcataramāsanaṃ
analyzed: saṃpravārya bhagavantam bhuktavantam viditvā dhauta hastam apanīta pātram nīcataram āsanam

original: tvaṃ bhagavatā nirdiṣṭo vaiṣaśataparinirvṛtasya mamopagupto nāma bhikṣurbhaviṣyatyalakṣaṇako buddhaḥ,
analyzed: tvam bhagavatā nirdiṣṭaḥ vaiṣa śata parinirvṛtasya mama upaguptaḥ nāma bhikṣuḥ bhaviṣyati alakṣaṇakaḥ buddhaḥ
yaḥ mama varṣa śata parinirvṛtasya buddha kāryam kariṣyati iti

original: 222.008. eṣo 'gro me ānanda śrāvakāṇāmavavādakānām yaduta upagupto bhikṣuḥ/
analyzed: eṣaḥ graḥ me ānanda śrāvakāṇām avavādakānām yat uta upaguptaḥ bhikṣuḥ
idānīm vatsa śāsana hitam kuruṣva iti
upaguptaḥ uvāca evam astu iti
tatas sa dharma śravaṇe dhīṣṭaḥ

original: 222.010. mathurāyāṃ ca śabdo visṛtah--upagupto nāmālakṣaṇako buddho 'dya dharmaṃ deśayiṣyatīti/
analyzed: mathurāyām ca śabdaḥ nāma alakṣaṇakaḥ buddhaḥ dharmam deśayiṣyati iti
śrutvā ca anekāni prāṇi śata sahasrāṇi nirgatāni
yāvat sthavira upaguptaḥ samāpadya avalokayati katham tathāgatena pariṣaṇṇā
paśyati ca ardhacandra ākāreṇa parṣad avasthitā
yāvat avalokayati katham tathāgatena dharma deśanā kṛtā

original: paśyati pūrvakālakaraṇīyāṃ kathāṃ kṛtvā satyasamprakāśanā kṛtā/
analyzed: paśyati pūrva kāla karaṇīyām kathām kṛtvā satya samprakāśanā kṛtā

original: 222.014. so 'pi pūrvakālakaraṇīyāṃ kathāṃ kṛtvā satyasamprakāśanāṃ kartumārabdhaḥ/
analyzed: saḥ pi pūrva kāla karaṇīyām kathām kṛtvā satya samprakāśanām kartum ārabdhaḥ
māreṇa ca tasyām parṣadi muktā hāra varṣam utsṛṣṭam
vaineyānām manāṃsi vyākulīkṛtāni
ekena api satya darśanam na kṛtam
yāvat sthavira upaguptaḥ vyavalokayati kena ayam vyākṣepaḥ kṛtaḥ
paśyati māreṇa
yāvat dvitīye divase bahutarakaḥ jana kāyaḥ nirgataḥ
upaguptaḥ dharmam deśayati
muktā hāram ca varṣa upavarṣitam iti

original: 222.018. yāvat dvitīye 'pi divase sthaviropaguptena pūrvakālakaraṇīyāṃ kathāṃ kṛtvā satyasamprakāśanāyāmārabdhāyāṃ māreṇa cāsyāṃ parṣadi suvarṇavarṣamutsṛṣṭam,
analyzed: yāvat dvitīye divase sthavira upaguptena pūrva kāla karaṇīyām kathām kṛtvā satya samprakāśanāyām ārabdhāyām māreṇa ca asyām parṣadi suvarṇa varṣam utsṛṣṭam
vaineyānām manāṃsi saṃlakṣobhitāni
ekena api satya darśanam na kṛtam
yāvat sthavira upaguptaḥ vyavalokayati kena ayam vyākṣepaḥ kṛtaḥ
paśyati māreṇa pāpīyasā iti

original: 222.021. yāvat tṛtīye śivase bahutarako janakāyo nirgataḥ/
analyzed: yāvat tṛtīye śivase bahutarakaḥ jana kāyaḥ nirgataḥ
upaguptaḥ dharmam deśayati
muktā varṣam suvarṇa varṣam ca patati iti

original: 222.023. yāvat tṛtīye 'pi divase sthaviropaguptaḥ pūrvakālakaraṇīyāṃ kathāṃ kṛtvā satyā nyārabdhaḥ saṃprakāśayitum/
analyzed: yāvat tṛtīye divase sthavira upaguptaḥ pūrva kāla karaṇīyām kathām kṛtvā satyā nyārabdhaḥ saṃprakāśayitum
māreṇa ca na atidūre nāṭakam ārabdham
divyāni ca vādyāni saṃpravāditāni
divyāḥ ca apsarasaḥ nāṭayitum pravṛttāḥ

original: 222.025. yāvadvītarāgo janakāyo divyāni rūpāṇi dṛṣṭvā divyāṃśca śabdāñ śrutvā māreṇākṛṣṭaḥ/
analyzed: yāvat vīta rāgaḥ jana kāyaḥ divyāni rūpāṇi dṛṣṭvā divyān ca śabdān śrutvā māreṇa ākṛṣṭaḥ
atas māreṇa upaguptasya parṣad ākṛṣṭā

original: 222.026. praītimanasā māreṇa sthaviropaguptasya śirasi mālā buddhā/
analyzed: praīti manasā māreṇa sthavira upaguptasya śirasi mālā buddhā
yāvat sthavira upaguptaḥ samanvāharitum ārabdha hkaḥ yam
paśyati māraḥ

original: 222.028. tasya buddhirutpannā--ayaṃ māro bhagavacchāsane mahāntaṃ vyākṣepaṃ karoti/
analyzed: tasya buddhiḥ utpannā ayam māraḥ bhagavat śāsane mahāntam vyākṣepam karoti
kimartham ayam bhagavatā na vinītaḥ
paśyati mama ayam vineyaḥ

original: 222.029. tasya ca vinayāt sattvānugrahādahaṃ bhagavatā alakṣaṇako buddho nirdiṣṭaḥ/
analyzed: tasya ca vinayāt sattva anugrahāt aham bhagavatā alakṣaṇakaḥ buddhaḥ nirdiṣṭaḥ

original: 222.030. yāvat sthaviropaguptaḥ samanvāharati--kimasya vinayakāla upasthita āhosvinneti?
analyzed: yāvat sthavira upaguptaḥ samanvāharati kim asya vinaya kālaḥ upasthitaḥ āhosvit na iti
paśyati vinaya kāle upasthitaḥ

original: 222.031. tataḥ sthaviropaguptena trayaḥ kuṇapā gṛhītāh--ahikṛṇapaṃ kurkurakuṇapaṃ manuṣyakuṇapam/
analyzed: tatas sthavira upaguptena trayaḥ kuṇapāḥ gṛhītāḥ ahahikṛṇapam kurkura kuṇapam manuṣya kuṇapam
ṛddhyā ca māra sakāśam abhigataḥ

original: 223.001. dṛṣṭvā ca mārasya prītirutpannā--upagupto 'pi mayā ākṛṣṭa iti/
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā ca mārasya prītiḥ utpannā aupaguptaḥ pi mayā ākṛṣṭaḥ iti
tatas māreṇa sva śarīram upanāmitam
sthavira upaguptaḥ svayam eva badhnāti
tatas sthavira upaguptena ahi kuṇapam mārasya baddham
kurkura kuṇapam grīvāyām
karṇa avasaktam manuṣya kuṇapam ca
tatas samālabhya uvāca

original: 223.005. bhikṣujanapratikūlā mālā baddhā yathaiva me bhavatā/
analyzed: bhikṣu jana pratikūlā mālā baddhā yathā eva me bhavatā
kāmi jana pratikūlam tava kuṇapam idam mayā

original: 223.007. yatte balaṃ bhavati tatpratidarśayasva buddhātmajena hi sahādya samāgato 'si/
analyzed: yat te balam bhavati tat pratidarśayasva buddha ātmajena hi saha adya samāgataḥ si
udvṛttam api anila bhinna taraṃga vakram vyāvartane malaya kukṣiṣu
atha māraḥ tam kuṇapam apanetum ārabdhaḥ

original: 223.011. paramapi ca svayamanupraviśya pipīlika ivādrirājamapanayituṃ na śaśāka/
analyzed: param api ca svayam anupraviśya pipīlikaḥ iva adrirājam apanayitum na śaśāka
asamarthaḥ vaihāyasam utpatya uvāca

original: 223.013. yadi moktuṃ na śakyāmi kaṇṭhāt śvakuṇapaṃ svayam/
analyzed: yadi moktum na śakyāmi kaṇṭhāt śva kuṇapam svayam
anye devāḥ api mokṣyante mattaḥ
sthaviraḥ uvāca

original: 223.016. brahmāṇaṃ śaraṇaṃ śatakratuṃ vā dīptaṃ vā praviśa hutāśamarṇavaṃ vā/
analyzed: brahmāṇam śaraṇam śatakratum vā dīptam vā praviśa hutāśam arṇavam vā

original: 223.018. na kledaṃ na ca pariśoṣaṇaṃ na bhedaṃ kaṇṭhasthaṃ kuṇapamidaṃ tu yāsyatīha//21//
analyzed: na kledam na ca pariśoṣaṇam na bhedam kaṇṭha stham kuṇapam idam tu
samahendra rudra upendra draviṇa īśvara yama varuṇa kubera vāsava dīnām devānām abhigamya a kṛtārthaḥ eva brahmāṇam abhigataḥ
tena ca ukta hma ṛṣaya vatsa
śiṣyeṇa daśabalasya svayam ṛddhyā kṛtānta maryādā
kaḥ tām bhettum śaktaḥ velām
api padma nāla sūtraiḥ baddhvā himavantam uccharet kaścid
na tu tava kaṇṭha āsaktam

original: 223.026. kāmaṃ mamāpi mahadasti balaṃ tathāpi nāhaṃ tathāgatasutasya balena tulyaḥ/
analyzed: kāmam mama api mahat asti balam tathā api na aham tathāgata sutasya balena tulyaḥ

original: 223.028. tejasvināṃ na khalu na jvalane 'sti kiṃ tu nāsau dyutirhutavahe ravimaṇḍale yā//24//
analyzed: tejasvinām na khalu na jvalane sti kim tu nā asau dyutiḥ hutavahe ravi maṇḍale
bravīt kim idānīm ājñāpayasi
kam śaraṇam vrajāmi iti
brahmā abravīt

original: 224.002. śaghrīṃ tameva śaraṇaṃ vraja yaṃ sametya bhraṣṭo hi yaḥ kṣititale bhavatīha janturuttiṣṭhati kṣitimasāvavalambya bhūyaḥ//25//
analyzed: śaghrīm tam eva śaraṇam vraja yam sametya bhraṣṭaḥ hi yaḥ kṣiti tale bhavati iha jantuḥ uttiṣṭhati kṣitim asau avalambya
atha māraḥ tathāgata śiṣya sāmarthyam upalabhya cintayāmāsa
brahmaṇā pūjyate yasya śiṣyāṇām api śāsanam

original: 224.008. tasya buddhasya sāmarthya pramātuṃ ko nu śaknuyāt//26//
analyzed: tasya buddhasya sāmarthya pramātum kaḥ nu
kartu kāmaḥ bhaviṣyatkām śiṣṭim sa mama suvrataḥ
yām na akariṣyat kṣāntyā tu
kim bahunā
adya avaimi muneḥ mahā karuṇa tām tasya ati maitrī ātmanaḥ sarva upadrava vipramukta manasaḥ cāmīkara adri dyuteḥ

original: 224.014. mohāndhena hi tatra tatra sa mayā taistair nayaiḥ kheditastenāhaṃ ca tathāpi nāma balinā naivāpriyaṃ śrāvitaḥ//28//
analyzed: moha andhena hi tatra tatra sa mayā taiḥ taiḥ nayaiḥ kheditaḥ tena aham ca tathā api nāma balinā nā eva apriyam

original: 224.016. atha kāmadhātvadhipatirmāro nāstyanyā gatiranyatropaguptakādeveti jñātvā sarvamutsṛjya sthaviropaguptasamīpamupetya pādayor nipatyovāca--bhadanta,
analyzed: atha kāmadhātu adhipatiḥ māraḥ na asti anyā gatiḥ anyatra upaguptakāt eva iti jñātvā sarvam utsṛjya sthavira upagupta samīpam upetya pādayoḥ nipatya uvāca bhadanta

original: kimaviditametadbhadantasya yathā bodhimūlamupādāya mayā bhagavato vipriyaśatāni kṛtāni? kutah?
analyzed: kim aviditam etat bhadantasya yathā bodhi mūlam upādāya mayā bhagavataḥ vipriya śatāni kṛtāni kutas
śālāyām brāhmaṇa grāme mām āsādya sa gautamaḥ
bhakta chedam api prāpya nā akārṣāt mama
gauḥ bhūtvā sarpa vat sthitvā kṛtvā śākaṭika ākṛtim

original: 224.022. sa mayāyāsito nātho na cāhaṃ tena hiṃsitaḥ//30//
analyzed: sa mayā āyāsitaḥ nāthaḥ na ca aham tena
tvayā punar aham vīra tyaktvā tu
sahajām dāyām

original: 224.026. kiṃ sarṣapeṇa samatāṃ nayasīha meruṃ khadyotakena raviṃ maṇḍalinā samudram/

analyzed: anyā hi sā daśabalasya kṛpā prajāsu na śrāvakasya hi mahā karuṇā asti

original: 225.009. tvaṃ nāpriyamiha proktaḥ priyāṇyeva tu lambhitaḥ//35//

original: 225.012. saṃkṣepādyatkṛtaṃ te vṛjinamiha mune mohāndhamanasā sarvaṃ prakṣālitaṃ tattava hṛdayagataiḥ śraddhāmbuvisaraiḥ//36//

sthaviraḥ uvāca samayataḥ vimokṣyāmi iti

māraḥ bravīt na viheṭhayiṣye
kam aparam ājñāpayasi iti

kim ājñāpayasi
sthaviraḥ bravīt svayam avagacchasi yat aham varṣa śata parinirvṛte bhagavati pravrajitaḥ

original: 225.029. trailokyanāthasya kāñcanādrinibhastasya na dṛṣṭo rūpakāyo me/

original: 226.003, priyamadhikamato hi nāstiṃ me daśabalarūpakutūhalo hyāham//39//

original: 226.005. māra uvāca--tena hi mamāpi samayaḥ śrūyatām/

original: 226.010. kā śaktirmama vītarāgavihitāṃ soḍhuṃ praṇāmakriyāṃ hastanyāsamivodvahanti na gajasyairaṇḍavṛkṣāṅkurāḥ//41//
analyzed: kā śaktiḥ mama vīta rāga vihitām soḍhum praṇāma kriyām hasta nyāsam iva udvahanti na

original: 226.014. śūraṃ vañcayituṃ purā vyavasitenottaptahemaprabhaṃ bauddhaṃ rūpamacintyabuddhivibhavādāsīnmayā yatkṛtam/
analyzed: śūram vañcayitum purā vyavasitena uttapta hema prabham bauddham rūpam acintya buddhi vibhavāt āsīt mayā yat kṛtam

original: 226.016. kṛtvā rūpamahaṃ tadeva nayanaprahlādikaṃ dehināmeṣo 'pyarkamayūkhajālamamalaṃ bhāmaṇḍalenākṣipan//42//
analyzed: kṛtvā rūpam aham tat eva nayana prahlādikam dehinām eṣa u pi arka mayūkha jālam amalam

original: 226.018. atha sthavirah evamastu ityuktvā taṃ kuṇapamapanīya tathāgatarūpadarśanotsuko 'vasthitaḥ/
analyzed: atha sthaviraḥ evam astu iti uktvā tam kuṇapam apanīya tathāgata rūpa darśana utsukaḥ vasthitaḥ

original: 226.019. māraśca vanagahanamanupraviśya buddharūpaṃ kṛtvā naṭa iva suruciranepathyastasmādvanagahanādārabdho nikṣramitum/

original: dakṣiṇe pārśve sthaviraśāradvatīputraṃ vāmapārśve sthaviramahāmaudgalyāyanaṃ pṛṣṭhataścāyuṣmantamānandaṃ

iti śrutvā ca ruṣitaḥ bhyāgataḥ
tvaritam ca tasmāt deśāt āgataḥ

original: 235.007. aśokenāpi pāṭaliputre nagare ekasmin dvāre eko nagnaḥ sthāpitaḥ,
analyzed: aśokena api pāṭaliputre nagare ekasmin dvāre ekaḥ nagnaḥ sthāpitaḥ
dvitīye dvitīyaḥ
tṛtīye rādhaguptaḥ
pūrva dvāre svayam eva rājā aśokaḥ vasthitaḥ

original: 235.009. rādhaguptena ca pūrvasmin dvāre yantramayo hastī sthāpitaḥ/
analyzed: rādhaguptena ca pūrvasmin dvāre yantra mayaḥ hastī sthāpitaḥ

original: 235.009. aśokasya ca pratimāṃ parikhāṃ khanayitvā khadirāṅgāraiśca pūrayitvā tṛṇenācchādya pāṃśunākīrṇā/
analyzed: aśokasya ca pratimām parikhām khanayitvā khadira aṅgāraiḥ ca pūrayitvā tṛṇena ācchādya pāṃśunā ākīrṇā
susīmaḥ ca abhihita hi adi śakyase śokam ghātayitum rājā iti
sa yāvat pūrva dvāram gatahaśokena saha yotsyāmi iti
aṅgāra pūrṇāyām parikhāyām patitaḥ
tatra eva ca anayena vyasanam āpannaḥ
yadā ca susīmaḥ praghātitaḥ
tasya api mahānagnaḥ bhadrāyudhaḥ nāṃnā aneka sahasra parivāraḥ
sa bhagavat śāsane pravrajitaḥ rhan saṃvṛttaḥ

original: 235.014. yadā aśoko rājye pratiṣṭhitaḥ sa tairamātyairavajñayā dṛśyate/
analyzed: yadā aśokaḥ rājye pratiṣṭhitaḥ sa taiḥ amātyaiḥ avajñayā dṛśyate
tena amātyānām abhihitam bhavantaḥ
puṣpa vṛkṣān phala vṛkṣān ca chittvā kaṇṭaka vṛkṣān paripālayatha
amātyāḥ āhuḥ hdevena kutra dṛṣṭam

original: api tu kaṇṭakavṛkṣāṃś chittvā puṣpavṛkṣān phalavṛkṣāṃśca paripālayitavyam/
analyzed: api tu kaṇṭaka vṛkṣān chittvā puṣpa vṛkṣān phala vṛkṣān ca paripālayitavyam

original: tato rājñā ruṣitena asiṃ niṣkośaṃ kṛtvā pañcānāmamātyaśatānāṃ śiraṃsi cchinnāni/
analyzed: tatas rājñā ruṣitena asim niṣkośam kṛtvā pañcānām amātya śatānām śiraṃsi chinnāni

original: 235.018. yāvadrājā aśoko 'pareṇa samayenāntaḥpuraparivṛto vasantakālasamaye puṣpitaphaliteṣu pādapeṣu pūrvanagarasyodyānaṃ gataḥ/
analyzed: yāvat rājā aśoko pareṇa samayena antaḥpura parivṛtaḥ vasanta kāla samaye puṣpita phaliteṣu pādapeṣu pūrva nagarasya udyānam gataḥ

analyzed: tatra ca paribhramatā aśoka vṛkṣaḥ su puṣpitaḥ dṛṣṭaḥ

original: 235.020. tato rājño mamāpi sahanāmā ityanunayo jātaḥ/
analyzed: tatas rājñaḥ mama api sahanāmā iti anunayaḥ jātaḥ
sa ca rājā aśokaḥ duḥsparśa gātraḥ
tāḥ yuvatayaḥ tam na icchanti spraṣṭum
yāvat rājā śayitaḥ

original: tasyāntaḥpureṇa roṣeṇa tasmādaśokavṛkṣāt puṣpāṇi śākhāśca cchinnāḥ/
analyzed: tasya antaḥpureṇa roṣeṇa tasmāt aśoka vṛkṣāt puṣpāṇi śākhāḥ ca chinnāḥ
yāvat rājñā pratibuddhena saḥ śoka vṛkṣaḥ dṛṣṭaḥ
pṛṣṭaḥ cakena tat chinnam
te kathayanti deva
antaḥpurikābhiḥ iti

original: 235.023. śrutvā ca rājñā amarṣajātena pañca strīśatāni kiṭikaiḥ saṃveṣṭya dagdhāni/

original: 235.024. tasyemānyaśubhānyālokya caṇḍo rājā caṇḍāśoka iti vyavasthāpitaḥ/

na sadṛśam svayam eva īdṛśam akāryam kartum

original: 235.026. api tu devasya vadhyaghātakāḥ puruṣāḥ sthāpayitavyāḥ,
analyzed: api tu devasya vadhya ghātakāḥ puruṣāḥ sthāpayitavyāḥ
ye devasya vadhya karaṇīyam śodhayiṣyanti
yāvat rājñā rāja puruṣāḥ prayuktāḥ āhvadhya ghātam me mārgadhva iti
yāvat tatra na atidūre pūrvata pāda mūle karvaṭakam
tatra tantravāyaḥ prativasati
tasya putraḥ jātaḥ
girikaḥ iti nāmadheyam kṛtam

original: 235.029. caṇḍo duṣṭātmā mātaraṃ pitaraṃ ca paribhāṣate,

analyzed: pipīlikān makṣikān mūṣikān matsyān ca jālena baḍiśena praghātayati

original: 235.031. caṇḍo dārakastasya caṇḍagirika iti nāmadheyaṃ kṛtam/
analyzed: caṇḍaḥ dārakaḥ tasya caṇḍagirikaḥ iti nāmadheyam kṛtam
yāvat rāja puruṣaiḥ dṛṣṭaḥ pāpe karmaṇi pravṛttaḥ
sa taiḥ abhihitaḥ śakyase rājñaḥ śokasya vadhya karaṇīyam kartum
sa jambudvīpasya vadhya karaṇīyam sādhayiṣyāmi iti
yāvat rājñaḥ niveditam
rājñā abhihitam ānīyatām iti
sa ca rāja puruṣaiḥ abhihita hā āgaccha
rājā tvām āhvayati iti
tena abhihitam āgamayata
yāvat aham māta pitarau avalokayāmi iti
yāvat mātā pitarau uvāca amba tāta
anujānīdhvam
yāsyāmi aham śokasya vadhya karaṇīyam sādhayitum
tābhyām ca sa nivāritaḥ
tena tau jīvitāt vyaparopitau
evam yāvat rāja puruṣaiḥ abhihita hkimartham cireṇa abhyāgataḥ si
tena ca etat prakaraṇam vistareṇa ārocitam
sa taiḥ yāvat rājñaḥ śokasya upanāmitaḥ
tena rājñaḥ bhihitam mama arthāya gṛham kārayasva iti
yāvat rājñā gṛham kārapitam parama śobhanam dvāra mātra ramaṇīyam
tasya ramaṇīyakam bandhanam iti saṃjñā vyavasthāpitā
saḥ āha deva varam me prayaccha

original: yastatra praviśettasya na bhūyo nirgama iti/

analyzed: yāvat naraka pālāḥ gṛhītvā ayaḥ mayyām bhūmau ādīptāyām pradīptāyām saṃprajvalitāyām eka jvāli bhūtāyām uttānakān

original: 237.004. yāvat śrāvastyāmanyatamaḥ sārthavāhaḥ patnyā saha mahāsamudramavatīrṇaḥ/

dārakaḥ jātaḥ
tasya samudraḥ iti nāmadheyam kṛtam
yāvat vistareṇa dvādaśabhiḥ varṣaiḥ mahā samudrāt uttīrṇaḥ
sa ca sārthavāhaḥ pañcabhiḥ dhūrta śataiḥ muṣitaḥ

original: 237.007. sa ca samudraḥ sārthavāhaputro bhagavacchāsane pravrajitaḥ/

original: 237.008. sa pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaramādāya pāṭaliputraṃ piṇḍāya praviṣṭaḥ/
analyzed: sa pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātra cīvaram ādāya pāṭaliputram piṇḍāya praviṣṭaḥ
saḥ nabhijña tayā ca ramaṇīyakam bhavanam praviṣṭaḥ
tat ca dvāra mātra ramaṇīyam abhyantaram naraka bhavana sadṛśam pratibhayam
dṛṣṭvā ca punar nirgantu kāmaḥ ca ṇḍairikena avalokitaḥ
gṛhītvā ca ukta hi ha te te
vistareṇa kāryam
tatas bhikṣuḥ śoka ārtaḥ bāṣpa kaṇṭaḥ saṃvṛttaḥ
tena ucyate kim idam bāla dārakaḥ iva rudasi iti
sa bhikṣuḥ prāha
na śarīra vināśam hi śocāmi sarvaśas

original: 237.015. durlabhaṃ prāpya mānuṣyaṃ pravrajyāṃ ca sukhodayām/

śākyasiṃham ca śāstāram punar tyakṣyāmi

dhīraḥ bhava
na asti te mokṣaḥ iti

original: 237.017. tataḥ sakaruṇairvacanaistaṃ bhikṣuḥ kramam yācati sma māsam yāvat/
analyzed: tatas sa karuṇaiḥ vacanaiḥ tam bhikṣuḥ kramam yācati sma māsam yāvat

analyzed: atha saptame divase śokasya rājñaḥ ntaḥpurikām kumāreṇa saha saṃraktām

original: nirīkṣamāṇāṃ saṃlapantīṃ ca dṛṣṭvā sahadarśanādeva ruṣitena rājñā tau dvāvapi taṃ
analyzed: nirīkṣamāṇām saṃlapantīm ca dṛṣṭvā saha darśanāt eva ruṣitena rājñā tau dvau api tam

tatra musalaiḥ ayaḥ droṇyām asthi avaśeṣau kṛtau
tatas bhikṣuḥ tau dṛṣṭvā saṃvignaḥ prāha
aho kāruṇikaḥ śāstā samyak āha mahā muniḥ

original: 237.025. kva tadvadanakāntitvaṃ gātraśobhā kva sā gatā/

dhik astu ayam saṃsāraḥ ramante yatra
idam ālambanam prāptam cārake vasatā mayā

original: 237.029. tena tāṃ rajanīṃ kṛtsnāam yujyatā buddhaśāsane/
analyzed: tena tām rajanīm kṛtsnāam yujyatā buddha śāsane
sarva samyojanam chittvā
sa bhikṣuḥ caṇḍagirikeṇa ucyate bhikṣo
nirgatā rātriḥ
uditaḥ ādityaḥ
kāraṇā kālaḥ tava iti
tatas bhikṣuḥ āha dīrgha āyuḥ
mama api nirgatā rātriḥ
uditaḥ ādityaḥ
para anugraha kāle iti
yatheṣṭam vartatām iti
caṇḍagirikaḥ prāhana avagacchāmi
vistīryatām vacanam etat iti
tatas bhikṣuḥ āha
mama api hṛdayāt horā nirgatā moha śarvatī
pañca āvaraṇa saṃchannā
uditaḥ jñāna sūryaḥ ca manaḥ nabhasi me śubhaḥ
prabhayā yasya paśyāmi trailokyam iha
para anugraha kālaḥ me śāstuḥ vṛtta anuvarinaḥ

original: 238.011. tatastena nirghṛṇena dāruṇahṛdayena paralokanirapekṣeṇa roṣāviṣṭena bahūdakāyāṃ sthālyāṃ nararudhiravasāmūtrapurīṣasaṃkulāyāṃ mahālohyāṃ
analyzed: tatas tena nirghṛṇena dāruṇa hṛdayena para loka nirapekṣeṇa roṣa āviṣṭena bahu udakāyām sthālyām nara rudhira vasā mūtra purīṣa saṃkulāyām mahā lohyām

yadā tadā api na prajvalati
tatas vicārya tām lohīm
paśyati tam bhikṣum pādmasya upari paryaṅkena upaviṣṭam

original: 263.014. śriyā vivṛddhe hi sukhānukūle paśyāmi netre 'dya vinaśyamāne//113//
analyzed: śriyā vivṛddhe hi sukha anukūle paśyāmi netre
idam puram svargām iva prahṛṣṭam kumāra saṃdarśana jāta harṣam

original: 263.018. puraṃ vipanne nayane tu tasya bhaviṣyati śokaparītacetāḥ//114//
analyzed: puram vipanne nayane tu tasya bhaviṣyati
anupūrveṇa takṣaśilām anuprāptaḥ

original: 263.020. śrutvā ca takṣaśilāpaurā ardhatrikāṇi yojanāni mārgaśobhāṃ nagaraśobhāṃ ca kṛtvā pūrṇakumbhaiḥ pratyudgatāḥ/
analyzed: śrutvā ca takṣaśilā paurāḥ ardhatrikāṇi yojanāni mārga śobhām nagara śobhām ca kṛtvā pūrṇa kumbhaiḥ pratyudgatāḥ
vakṣyati ca
śrutvā takṣaśilā pauraḥ ratna pūrṇa ghaṭa ādikān
gṛhya pratyujjagāma āśu bahu mānyaḥ
pratyudgamya kṛtāñjaliḥ uvāca na vayam kumārasya viruddhāḥ
na rājñaḥ śokasya
api tu duṣṭa ātmānaḥ mātyāḥ āgatya asmākam apamānam kurvanti
yāvat kuṇālaḥ mahatā saṃmānena takṣaśilām praveśitaḥ
rājñaḥ ca aśokasya mahān vyādhiḥ utpannaḥ
tasya mukhāt uccāraḥ nirgantma ārabdhaḥ
sarva romakūpebhyaḥ ca aśuci pragharati
na ca śakyate cikitsitum
tatas rājñā abhihitam kuṇālam ānayata
rājye pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmi iti
kim mama īdṛśena jīvitena prayojanam

original: śrutvā ca tiṣyarakṣitā cintayati--yadi kuṇālaṃ rājye pratiṣṭhāsyati,
analyzed: śrutvā ca tiṣyarakṣitā cintayati yadi kuṇālam rājye pratiṣṭhāsyati
na asti mama jīvitam
tayā abhihitam aham te svastham kariṣyāmi
kim tu vaidyānām praveśaḥ pratiṣidhyatām
yāvat rājñā vaidyānām praveśaḥ pratiṣiddhaḥ

original: 263.032. tatastiṣyarakṣitayā vaidyānāmabhihitam--yadi kaścidīdṛśena<264> vyādhinā spṛṣṭaḥ strī vā puruṣo vā āgacchati,
analyzed: tatas tiṣya rakṣitayā vaidyānām abhihitam yadi vyādhinā spṛṣṭaḥ strī vā puruṣaḥ vā āgacchati
mama darśayitavyaḥ
anyatamaḥ ca ābhīraḥ tādṛśena eva vyādhinā spṛṣṭaḥ
tasya patnyā vaidyāya vyādhiḥ niveditaḥ
vaidyena abhihitam saḥ eva āgacchatu āturaḥ
vyādhim dṛṣṭvā bhaiṣajyam upadekṣyāmi
yāvat ābhīraḥ vaidya sakāśām abhigataḥ
vaidyena ca tiṣyarakṣitāyāḥ samīpam upanītaḥ
tatas tiṣya rakṣitayā pratigupte pradeśe jīvitāt vyaparopitaḥ

original: 264.005. jīvitād vyaparopya kukṣiṃ pāṭayitvā paśyati ca tasya pakvāśayasthāne antrāyāṃ kṛmirmahān prādurbhūtaḥ/
analyzed: jīvitāt vyaparopya kukṣim pāṭayitvā paśyati ca tasya pakvāśaya sthāne antrāyām kṛmiḥ mahān prādurbhūtaḥ
yadi ūrdhvam gacchati tena aśucīni pragharati
atha adhas gacchati
adhas pragharati

original: 264.007. yāvat tatra maricān peṣayitvā dattaṃ na ca mriyate/
analyzed: yāvat tatra maricān peṣayitvā dattam na ca mriyate
evam pippalī śṛṅgaveram ca
vistareṇa yāvat palāṇḍuḥ dattaḥ
spṛṣṭaḥ ca mṛtaḥ uccāra mārgeṇa nirgataḥ

original: 264.008. etacca prakaraṇaṃ tayā rajñe niveditam--deva pālāṇḍuṃ parimuṅkṣva,
analyzed: etat ca prakaraṇam tayā rajñe niveditam deva pālāṇḍum parimuṅkṣva
svāsthyam bhaviṣyati
rājā āha devi
aham kṣatriyaḥ
katham palāṇḍum paribhakṣayāmi
devī uvāca deva
paribhoktavyam jīvitasya arthe
bhaiṣajyam etat
rājñā paribhuktam
sa ca kṛmiḥ mṛtam uccāra mārgeṇa nirgataḥ
svasthībhūtaḥ ca rājā

original: 264.012. tena parituṣṭena tiṣyarakṣitā vareṇa pravāritā--kiṃ te varaṃ prayacchāmi?
analyzed: tena parituṣṭena tiṣyarakṣitā vareṇa pravāritā akim te varam prayacchāmi
tayā abhihitam sapta aham devaḥ rājyam prayacchatu
rājā āha aham kaḥ bhaviṣyāmi
devī uvāca saptāhasya atyayāt devaḥ eva rājā bhaviṣyati
yāvat rājñā tiṣyarakṣitāyāḥ sapta aham rājyam dattam

original: 264.014. tasyā buddhirutpannā--idānīṃ mayā asya kuṇālasya vairaṃ niryātitavyam/
analyzed: tasyāḥ buddhiḥ utpannā adānīm mayā asya kuṇālasya vairam niryātitavyam

original: 264.015. tayā kapaṭalekho likhitastakṣaśilakānāṃ paurāṇām--kuṇālasya nayanaṃ vināśayitavyamiti/
analyzed: tayā kapaṭa lekhaḥ likhitaḥ takṣaśilakānām paurāṇām kuṇālasya nayanam vināśayitavyam iti
āha ca

original: 264.017. rājā hyaśoko balavān pracaṇḍa ājñāpayattakṣaśilājanaṃ hi/
analyzed: rājā hi aśokaḥ balavān pracaṇḍaḥ ājñāpayat takṣaśilā janam hi

original: 264.019. uddhāryatāṃ locanamasya śatrormauryasya vaṃśasya kalaṅka eṣaḥ//116//
analyzed: uddhāryatām locanam asya śatroḥ mauryasya vaṃśasya kalaṅka
yatra kāryam āśu pariprāpyam bhavati
danta mudrayā mudrayati

original: 264.021. yāvat tiṣyarakṣitā śayitasya rājñastaṃ lekhaṃ dantamudrayā mudrayiṣyāmīti rājñaḥ sakāśamabhigatā/
analyzed: yāvat tiṣyarakṣitā śayitasya rājñaḥ tam lekham danta mudrayā mudrayiṣyāmi iti rājñaḥ sakāśam abhigatā
rājā ca bhītaḥ pratibuddhaḥ
devī kathayati kim idam iti
rājā kathayati devi
svapnam me śobhanam dṛṣṭam
paśyāmi dvau gṛdhrau kuṇālasya nayanam utpāṭayitum icchataḥ
devī kathayati svāsthyam kumārasya iti

original: 264.025. evaṃ dvirapi rājā bhītaḥ pratibuddhaḥ kathayati--devi,
analyzed: evam dvis api rājā bhītaḥ pratibuddhaḥ kathayati devi

original: svapno me na śobhano dṛṣṭa iti/
analyzed: svapnaḥ me na śobhanaḥ dṛṣṭaḥ iti
tiṣyarakṣitā kathayati kīdṛśaḥ svapnaḥ iti
rājā āha paśyāmi kuṇālam dīrgha keśa nakha śmaśruḥ puram praviṣṭaḥ
devī āha svāsthyam kumārasya iti

original: 264.027. yāvat tiṣyarakṣitayā rājñaḥ śayitasya sa lekho dantamudrayā mudrayitvā takṣaśilāṃ preṣitaḥ/
analyzed: yāvat tiṣyarakṣitayā rājñaḥ śayitasya sa lekhaḥ danta mudrayā mudrayitvā takṣaśilām preṣitaḥ

original: 264.028. yāvadrājñā śayitena svapne dṛṣṭaṃ dantā viśīrṇāḥ/
analyzed: yāvat rājñā śayitena svapne dṛṣṭam dantāḥ viśīrṇāḥ

original: 264.029. tato rājā tasyā eva rātreratyaye naimittikānāhūya kathayati--kīdṛśa eṣāṃ svapnānāṃ vipāka iti?
analyzed: tatas rājā tasyāḥ eva rātreḥ atyaye naimittikān āhūya kathayati kīdṛśaḥ eṣām svapnānām vipākaḥ iti
naimittikāḥ kathayati deva
yaḥ īdṛśa svapnāni paśyati
āha ca

original: 264.031. dantā yasya viśīryante svapnānte prapatanti ca/
analyzed: dantāḥ yasya viśīryante svapna ante prapatanti ca

original: 264.032. cakṣurbhedaṃ ca putrasya putranāśaṃ ca paśyati//117//
analyzed: cakṣuḥ bhedam ca putrasya putra nāśam ca
ca aśokaḥ tvaritam utthāya āsanāt kṛtañjaliḥ caturdiśam devatām yācayitum ārabdhaḥ
āha ca

original: 265.003. yā devatā śāsturabhiprasannā dharme ca saṃghe ca gaṇapradhāne/
analyzed: yā devatā śāstuḥ abhiprasannā dharme ca saṃghe ca gaṇa pradhāne

original: 265.005. ye cāpi loke ṛṣayo variṣṭhā rakṣantu te 'smattanayaṃ kuṇālam//118//
analyzed: ye ca api loke ṛṣayaḥ variṣṭhāḥ rakṣantu te smad tanayam
sa ca lekhaḥ nupūrveṇa takṣaśilām upanītaḥ

original: 265.007. atha takṣaśilāḥ paurajānapadā lekhadarśanāt kuṇālasya guṇavistaratuṣṭā notsahante tadaptiyaṃ niveditum/
analyzed: atha takṣaśilāḥ paura jānapadāḥ lekha darśanāt kuṇālasya guṇa vistara tuṣṭāḥ na utsahante tat aptiyam niveditum

original: 265.008. ciraṃ vicārayitvā rājā duṣṭaśīlaḥ svaputrasya na marṣayati,
analyzed: ciram vicārayitvā rājā duṣṭa śīlaḥ sva putrasya na marṣayati
prāk eva asmākam marṣayati
āha ca
yasya dveṣaḥ kumārasya kasya anyasya
taiḥ yāvat kuṇālasya niveditam
lekhaḥ ca upanītaḥ

original: 265.012. tataḥ kuṇālo vācayitvā kathayati--viśrabdham yathātmaprayojanaṃ kriyatāmiti/
analyzed: tatas kuṇālaḥ vācayitvā kathayati viśrabdham yathā ātma prayojanam kriyatām iti
yāvat caṇḍālāḥ upanītāḥ āhkuṇālasya nayanam utpāṭayatha iti
te ca kṛta añjali puṭāḥ ūcuḥ hna utsāhayāmaḥ
kṛtah
yaḥ hi candramasaḥ kāntim mohāt abhyuddharet naraḥ
sa candra sadṛśāt vaktrāt tava netre
tatas kumāreṇa makuṭam dattam
anayā dakṣiṇayā utpāṭayatha iti
tasya tu karmaṇaḥ vaśyam vipattavyam
puruṣaḥ hi vikṛta rūpaḥ ṣṭādaśābhiḥ daurvarṇikaiḥ samanvāgataḥ bhyāgataḥ
sa kathayati aham utpāṭayiṣyāmi iti
yāvat kuṇālasya samīpam nītaḥ
tasmin ca samaye kuṇālasya sthavirāṇām vacanam āmukhībhūtam
sa tat vacanam anusmṛtya uvāca
imām vipattim vijñāya taiḥ uktam tattva vādibhiḥ

original: 265.022. paśyānityamidaṃ sarvaṃ nāsti kaścid dhruve sthitaḥ//121//
analyzed: paśya anityam idam sarvam na asti kaścid dhruve
kalyāṇa mitrāḥ te mahyam sukha kāmāḥ hita eṣiṇaḥ
yaiḥ ayam deśitaḥ
anitya tām saṃparipaśyataḥ me guru upadeśāt manasi prakurvataḥ

original: 265.027. utpāṭane 'haṃ na bibhemi saumya netradvayasyāsthiratāṃ hi paśye//123//
analyzed: utpāṭane ham na bibhemi saumya netra dvayasya asthira tām hi

original: 265.029. utpāṭe vā na vā netre yathā vā manyate nṛpaḥ/
analyzed: utpāṭe vā na vā netre yathā vā manyate nṛpaḥ
gṛhīta sāram cakṣuḥ me

original: 265.031. tataḥ kuṇālastaṃ puruṣamuvāca--tena hi bhoḥ puruṣa,
analyzed: tatas kuṇālaḥ tam puruṣam uvāca tena hi bhoḥ puruṣa
ekam tāvat nayanam utpāṭya mama haste nuprayaccha

original: 265.032. yāvat sa puruṣaḥ kuṇālasya nayanamutpāṭayituṃ pravṛttaḥ/
analyzed: yāvat sa puruṣaḥ kuṇālasya nayanam utpāṭayitum pravṛttaḥ
tatas nekāni prāṇi śata sahasrāṇi vikroṣṭum ārabdhāni kaṣṭam bhoḥ
hi nirmalā jyotsnā gaganāt patate śaśī
puṇḍarīkavanāt ca api śrīman utpaṭyate

original: 266.003. teṣu prāṇiśatasahasreṣu rudatsu kuṇālasyaiva nayanamutpāṭya haste dattam/
analyzed: teṣu prāṇi śata sahasreṣu rudatsu kuṇālasya eva nayanam utpāṭya haste dattam
tatas kuṇālaḥ tat nayanam gṛhya uvāca

original: 266.005. rūpāṇi kasmānna nirīkṣase tvam yathāpurā prākṛta māṃsapiṇḍa/
analyzed: rūpāṇi kasmāt na nirīkṣase tvam yathā purā prākṛta māṃsa piṇḍa

original: 266.007. te vañcitāste ca vigarhaṇīyā ātmeti ye tvāmabudhāḥ//126//
analyzed: te vañcitāḥ te ca vigarhaṇīyāḥ ātmā iti ye
sāmagra jam budbada saṃnikāśam su durlabham nirviṣam asvatantram

original: 266.011. evaṃ pravīkṣanti sadāpramattā ye tvāṃ na te duḥkhamanuprayānti//127//
analyzed: evam pravīkṣanti sadā apramattāḥ ye tvām na te
evam anuvicintayatā tena sarva bhāveṣu anitya tām
srotāpatti phalam prāptam jana kāyasya

original: 266.015. tataḥ kuṇālo dṛṣṭasatyastaṃ puruṣamuvāca--idānīṃ dvitīyaṃ viśrabdhaṃ nayanamutpāṭya haste datta/
analyzed: tatas kuṇālaḥ dṛṣṭa satyaḥ tam puruṣam uvāca edānīm dvitīyam viśrabdham nayanam utpāṭya haste datta

original: 266.016. atha kuṇālo māṃsacakṣuṣyuddhṛte prajñācakṣuṣi ca viśuddhe kathayati--
analyzed: atha kuṇālaḥ māṃsa cakṣuṣi uddhṛte prajñā cakṣuṣi ca viśuddhe kathayati
uddhṛtam māṃsacakṣuḥ me yadi api etat su durlabham
prajñācakṣuḥ viśuddham me
parityaktaḥ ham nṛpatinā yadi aham putra saṃjñayā
dharmarājasya putra tvam upetaḥ smi
eśvaryāt yadi aham bhraṣṭam śoka duḥkha nibandhanāt
dharma aiśvaryam avāptam me
yāvat kuṇālena tātasya aśokasya karma

original: api tu tiṣyarakṣitāyā ayaṃ prayoga iti/
analyzed: api tu tiṣya rakṣitāyāḥ ayam prayogaḥ iti
śrutvā ca kuṇālaḥ kathayati

original: 266.025. ciraṃ sukhaṃ caiva sā tiṣyanāṃnī āyurbalaṃ pālayate ca devī/
analyzed: ciram sukham ca eva sā āyuḥ balam pālayate ca devī

original: 266.027. saṃpreṣito 'yaṃ hi yayā prayogo yasyānubhāvena kṛtaḥ svakārtham//132//
analyzed: saṃpreṣitaḥ yam hi yayā prayogaḥ yasya anubhāvena kṛtaḥ
tatas kāñcanamālayā śrutam kuṇālasya nayanāni utpāṭitāni iti

original: 266.029. śrutvā ca bhartṛtayā kuṇālasamīpamupasaṃkramya parṣadamavagāhya kuṇālamuddhṛtanayanaṃ rudhirāvasiktagātraṃ dṛṣṭvā sūrcchitā bhūmau
analyzed: śrutvā ca bhartṛ tayā kuṇāla samīpam upasaṃkramya parṣadam avagāhya kuṇālam uddhṛta nayanam rudhira avasikta gātram dṛṣṭvā sūrcchitā bhūmau
yāvat jala sekam kṛtvā utthāpitā
tatas kathaṃcid saṃjñām upalabhya sa svaram prarudantī uvāca

original: 267.001. <267>netrāṇi kāntāni manoharāṇi ye māṃ nirīkṣañjanayanti tuṣṭim/
analyzed: kāntāni manoharāṇi ye mām nirīkṣan janayanti tuṣṭim

original: 267.003. te me vipannā hyanirīkṣaṇīyāstyajanti me prāṇasamāḥ śarīram//133//
analyzed: te me vipannāḥ hi a nirīkṣaṇīyāḥ tyajanti me prāṇa samāḥ
tatas kuṇālaḥ bhāryām anunayan uvāca alam ruditena
na arhasi śokam āśrayitum
svayaṃkṛtānām iha karmaṇām phalam upasthitam
āha ca

original: 267.007. karmātmakaṃ lokamidaṃ viditvā duḥkhātmakaṃ cāpi janaṃ hi matvā/
analyzed: karma ātmakam lokam idam viditvā duḥkha ātmakam ca api janam hi matvā

original: 267.009. matvā ca lokaṃ priyaviprayogaṃ kartuṃ priye nārhasi bāṣpamokṣam//134//
analyzed: matvā ca lokam priya viprayogam kartum priye nā arhasi

original: 267.011. tataḥ kuṇālo bhāryayā saha takṣaśilāyā niṣkāsitaḥ/
analyzed: tatas kuṇālaḥ bhāryayā saha takṣaśilāyāḥ niṣkāsitaḥ
sa garbhādānam upādāya parama sukumāra śarīraḥ
na kiṃcid utsahate karma kartum
kevalam vīṇām vādayati gāyati ca
tatas bhaikṣyam labhate
kuṇālaḥ patnyā saha bhuṅkte
tatas kāñcanamālā yena mārgeṇa pāṭaliputrāt ānītā
tam eva mārgam anusmarantī bhartṛ dvitīyā pāṭaliputram gatā
yāvat aśokasya gṛham ārabdhā praveṣṭum
dvārapālena ca nivāritau
yāvat rājñaḥ śokasya yāna śālāyām avasthitau

original: 267.016. tataḥ kuṇālo rātryāḥ pratyūṣasamaye vīṇāṃ vādayitumārabdhaḥ/
analyzed: tatas kuṇālaḥ rātryāḥ pratyūṣa samaye vīṇām vādayitum ārabdhaḥ
yathā nayanāni utpāṭitāni
satya darśanam ca kṛtam
tad anurūpam hitam ca gītam prārabdham
āha ca
cakṣuḥ ādīni yaḥ prājñaḥ paśyati āyatanāni ca
jñāna dīpena śuddhena sa

original: 267.020. yadi tava bhavaduḥkhapīḍitā bhavati doṣaviniśritā matiḥ/
analyzed: yadi tava bhava duḥkha pīḍitā bhavati doṣa viniśritā matiḥ

original: 267.022. sukhamiha ca yadīcchasi dhruvaṃ tvaritamihāyatanāni saṃtyajasva//136//
analyzed: sukham iha ca yadi icchasi dhruvam tvaritam iha āyatanāni
tasya gīta śabdaḥ rājñā aśokena śrutaḥ
śrutvā ca rājā prīta manāḥ uvāca

original: 267.025. gītaṃ kuṇālena mayi prasaktaṃ vīṇāsvaraṃ caiva śrutiścireṇa/
analyzed: gītam kuṇālena mayi prasaktam vīṇā svaram ca eva śrutiḥ cireṇa

original: 267.027. abhyāgato 'pīha gṛhaṃ nu kaṃcinna cecchati draṣṭumayaṃ kumāraḥ//137//
analyzed: abhyāgataḥ u pi iha gṛham nu kaṃcid na ca icchati draṣṭum ayam
atha rājā aśokaḥ nyatama puruṣam āhūya uvāca puruṣa lakṣyate

original: 267.030. na khalveṣa kiṃ gītasya kuṇālasadṛśo dhvaniḥ/
analyzed: na khalu eṣa kim gītasya kuṇāla sadṛśaḥ dhvaniḥ
karmaṇi adhairya tām ca eva sūcayan iva
tat anena asmi śabdena dhairyāt ākampitaḥ bhṛśam
kalabhasya iva naṣṭasya pranaṣṭa kalabhaḥ
kuṇālam ānayasva iti
yāvat puruṣaḥ yāna śālām gataḥ
paśyati kuṇālam uddhṛta nayanam vāta ātapa paridagdha gātram
a pratyabhijñāya ca rājānam aśokam abhigamya uvāca eva
na hi eṣa kuṇālaḥ

original: 268.003. andhaka eṣa vanīpakaḥ patnyā saha devasya yānaśālāyamavasthitaḥ/

original: 268.003. śrutvā ca rājā saṃvignaścintayāmāsa--yathā mayā svapnānyaśobhanāni dṛṣṭāni,
