original: 284.004. tato rājñā suvarṇapiṭakaṃ dhvajāgre baddhvā svavijite ghaṇṭāvaghoṣaṇaṃ kāritam--ya uttarapāñcālarājaviṣayājjanmacitrakaṃ nāma nāgapotakamānayati,
analyzed: tatas rājñā suvarṇa piṭakam dhvaja agre baddhvā sva vijite ghaṇṭā avaghoṣaṇam uttara pāñcāla rāja viṣayāt janmacitrakam nāma nāga potakam ānayati
tasya imam suvarṇa piṭakam dāsyāmi
mahatā ca satkāreṇa satkariṣyāmi iti
yāvat anyatamaḥ hituṇḍikaḥ mātyānām sakāśam gatvā kathayati mama idam suvarṇa piṭakam anuprayacchata
aham janmacitram nāma nāga pitakam apahṛtya ānayāmi iti
amātyāḥ kathayanti eṣa gṛhāṇa
sa kathayati yaḥ yuṣmākam śraddhayitaḥ pratyayitaḥ ca
tasya haste tiṣṭhatu
ānīte janmacitre nāga potake grahīṣyāmi iti
evam kuruṣva iti

original: 284.010. tato 'sau ahituṇḍikaḥ pratyayitasya puruṣasya haste suvarṇapiṭakaṃ sthāpayitvā hastināpuraṃ gataḥ/
analyzed: tatas sau ahituṇḍikaḥ pratyayitasya puruṣasya haste suvarṇa piṭakam sthāpayitvā hastināpuram gataḥ
tena asau hradaḥ samantataḥ vyavalokitaḥ

original: 284.012. nimittīkṛtah--asau jñmacitro nāgapotaka etasmin pradeśe tiṣṭhatīti/
analyzed: nimittīkṛta hasau jñmacitraḥ nāga potakaḥ etasmin pradeśe tiṣṭhati iti
tatas bali upahāra nimittam punar pratyāgataḥ
amātyānām kathayati bali upahāram enam prayacchata
saptame divase tam nāga potakam apahṛtya ānayāmi iti
sa ca ahituṇḍikaḥ tena saṃlakṣita hmam asau apaharaṇāya āgataḥ
saptame divase mām apahariṣyati
mātā pitṛ viyoga jam me duḥkham bhaviṣyati iti
kim karomi kim śaraṇam prapadyeyam iti

original: 284.016. tasya hradasya nātidūre dvau lubdhakau prativasataḥ,
analyzed: tasya hradasya na atidūre dvau lubdhakau prativasataḥ
sārakaḥ halakaḥ
tau hradam āśritya jīvikām kalpayataḥ
ye sthala gatāḥ prāṇinaḥ mṛga śarabha sūkara ādayaḥ tam hradam upasarpanti
tān praghātayataḥ
ye pi jala gatāḥ matsya kacchapa maṇḍūka ādayaḥ
tatra sārakaḥ kālagataḥ
halakaḥ jīvati

original: 284.019. janmacitro nāgapotaḥ saṃlakṣayati--ko 'nyo 'sti mama śaraṇamṛte halakāt lubdhakāt?
analyzed: janma citraḥ nāga potaḥ saṃlakṣayati kaḥ sti mama śaraṇam ṛte halakāt lubdhakāt

original: tato manuṣyaveṣamāsthāya halakasya lubdhakasya sakāśaṃ gataḥ/
analyzed: tatas manuṣya veṣam āsthāya halakasya lubdhakasya sakāśam gataḥ
gatvā kathayati bhoḥ puruṣa

original: kiṃ tvaṃ jānīṣe kasyānubhāvāddhanasya rājño janapadā ṛddhāśca sphītāśca subhikṣākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyāśca
analyzed: kim tvam jānīṣe kasya anubhāvāt dhanasya rājñaḥ janapadāḥ ṛddhāḥ ca sphītāḥ ca subhikṣa ākīrṇa bahu jana manuṣyāḥ ca
praśānta kali kalaha ḍimba ḍamara taskara durbhikṣa roga apagatāḥ śāli ikṣu go mahiṣī sampannāḥ iti

original: sa kathayati--jāne sa rājā dhārmiko dharmeṇa rājyaṃ kārayati,
analyzed: sa kathayati jāne sa rājā dhārmikaḥ dharmeṇa rājyam kārayati
maitra cittaḥ hita cittaḥ nukmpā cittaḥ ca rāṣṭram pālayati iti

original: 284.025. asmin pradeśe janmacitrako nāma nāgapitakaḥ prativasati/
analyzed: asmin pradeśe janmacitrakaḥ nāma nāga pitakaḥ prativasati
sa kālena kālam samyak vāri dhārām anuprayacchati
atīva śasya sampattiḥ bhavati
śasyavatī vasumatī
subhikṣa anna pānaḥ ca deśaḥ iti
janmacitraḥ kathayati tam nāga potakam itas viṣayāt apaharet
tasya nāga potakasya kim syāt
na śobhanam syāt
mātā pitṛ viyoga jam duḥkham syāt rājñaḥ rāṣṭrasya ca
yaḥ upaharati
tasya kim tvam kuryāḥ
saḥ āha jīvitāt vyaparopayeyam

original: 284.030. jānīṣe tvaṃ kataro 'sau nāgapotaka iti? na jāne/
analyzed: jānīṣe tvam kataraḥ asau nāga potakaḥ iti na jāne
aham eva asau nāgaḥ
dakṣiṇa pāñcāla vaiṣayikena ahituṇḍikena apahṛtya nīyeta
sa bali upahāra vidhāna artham gataḥ
saptame divase āgamiṣyati

original: 285.001. <285>āgatya asya hradasya catasṛṣu dikṣu khadiraśalākānnikhanya nānāraṅgaiḥ sūtrairveṣṭayitvā mantrānāvartayiṣyati/
analyzed: asya hradasya catasṛṣu dikṣu khadira śalākān nikhanya nānā raṅgaiḥ sūtraiḥ veṣṭayitvā mantrān āvartayiṣyati
tatra tvayā pracchanne saṃnikṛṣṭe sthātavyam
yadā tena ayam evamrūpaḥ prayogaḥ kṛtaḥ bhavati

original: tadā hradamadhyāt kvathamānaṃ pānīyamutthāsyati ahaṃ cotthāsyāmi/
analyzed: tadā hrada madhyāt kvathamānam pānīyam utthāsyati aham ca utthāsyāmi

original: 285.003. tadā tvayāsau ahituṇḍikaḥ śareṇa marmaṇi tāḍayitavyaḥ,
analyzed: tadā tvayā asau ahituṇḍikaḥ śareṇa marmaṇi tāḍayitavyaḥ
āśu ca upasaṃkramya vaktavya hmantrān upasaṃhara

original: 285.004. mā te utkṛttamūlaṃ śiraḥ kṛtvā pṛthivyāṃ nipātayiṣyāmīti/
analyzed: mā te utkṛtta mūlam śiraḥ kṛtvā pṛthivyām nipātayiṣyāmi iti
yadi asau mantrān an upasaṃhṛtya prāṇaiḥ viyokṣyate
mṛtam te ham yāvajjīvam mantra pā śabddhaḥ syām iti
lubdhakaḥ prāha yadi tava ekasya evam guṇaḥ syāt
tathā api aham evam kuryām
prāk eva sa rājakasya rāṣṭrasya
gaccha aham te trātā iti
tatas tena nāga potakena tasya eka pārśve gupta sthānam upadarśitam

original: 285.008. yāvadasau lubdhakaḥ saptame divase pratigupte pradeśe ātmānaṃ gopayitvā avasthitaḥ/
analyzed: yāvat asau lubdhakaḥ saptame divase pratigupte pradeśe ātmānam gopayitvā avasthitaḥ
sa ca ahituṇḍikaḥ āgatya bali upahāram kartum ārabdhaḥ

original: 285.010. tena catasṛṣu dikṣu catvāraḥ khadirakīlakā nikhātāḥ/
analyzed: tena catasṛṣu dikṣu catvāraḥ khadira kīlakāḥ nikhātāḥ
nānā raṅgaiḥ sūtraiḥ veṣṭayitvā mantrāḥ āvartitāḥ
pānīyam kvathitum ārabdham
lubdhakena ca śareṇa marmaṇi tāḍitaḥ
niṣkośam ca asim kṛtvā abhihita htvam asmad viṣaya nivāsinam nāga potam apaharasi

original: 285.013. mā te utkṛttamūlaṃ śiraḥ kṛtvā pṛthivyāṃ nipātayāmīti/
analyzed: mā te utkṛtta mūlam śiraḥ kṛtvā pṛthivyām nipātayāmi iti
tatas hituṇḍikena duḥkha vedanā abhibhūtena maraṇa bhaya bhītena mantrāḥ vyāvartitāḥ
tad samanantaram ca lubdhakena jīvitāt vyaparopitaḥ

original: 285.015. tato nāgo mantrapāśavinirmukto hradādabhyudgamya lubdhakaṃ pariṣvaktavān,
analyzed: tatas nāgaḥ mantra pāśa vinirmuktaḥ hradāt abhyudgamya lubdhakam pariṣvaktavān
evam ca ahatvam me mātā
tvam me pitā
yat mayā tvām āgamya mātā pitṛ viyoga jam duḥkham na utpannam
āgaccha bhavanam gacchāmaḥ
tena asau bhavanam nītaḥ
nānāvidhena ca anna pānena saṃtarpitaḥ
ratnāni ca upadarśitāni
mātā pitroḥ ca niveditaḥ
amba tāta eṣa me suhṛd śaraṇam bāndhavaḥ

original: 285.019. asyānubhāvādyuṣmābhiḥ saha viyogo na jāta iti/
analyzed: asya anubhāvāt yuṣmābhiḥ saha viyogaḥ na jātaḥ iti

original: 285.019. tābhyāmasau vareṇa pravārito vividhāni ca ratnāni dattāni/
analyzed: tābhyām asau vareṇa pravāritaḥ vividhāni ca ratnāni dattāni
sa tāni ādāya tasmāt hradāt vyuthitaḥ

original: 285.020. tasya ca hradasya nātidūre puṣpaphalasalilasampanne nānāśakunikūjite ṛṣeragramāśramapadam/
analyzed: tasya ca hradasya na atidūre puṣpa phala salila sampanne nānā śakuni kūjite ṛṣeḥ agram āśrama padam

original: 285.021. tatra ca nāgapotakena sārdhaṃ vṛttakaṃ tatsarvaṃ vistareṇa samākhyātam/
analyzed: tatra ca nāga potakena sārdham vṛttakam tat sarvam vistareṇa samākhyātam

original: 285.022. tata ṛṣiḥ kathayati--kiṃ ratnaiḥ kiṃ vā te suvarṇena?
analyzed: tatas ṛṣiḥ kathayati kim ratnaiḥ kim vā te suvarṇena
tasya bhavane moghaḥ nām pāśaḥ tiṣṭhati
tam yācasva

original: 285.023. tato lubdhako 'moghapāśe saṃjātatṛṣṇah ṛṣivacanamupaśrutya punarapi nāgabhavanaṃ gataḥ/
analyzed: tatas lubdhakaḥ mogha pāśe saṃjāta tṛṣṇaḥ ṛṣi vacanam upaśrutya punar api nāga bhavanam gataḥ
yāvat paśyati bhavana dvāre tam amogha pāśam

original: 285.025. tasyaitadabhavat--eṣa sa pāśo yo mayā prārthanīyaḥ/
analyzed: tasya etat abhavat eṣa sa pāśaḥ yaḥ mayā prārthanīyaḥ
iti viditvā nāga bhavanam praviṣṭaḥ

original: 285.025. tato janmacitreṇa nāgapotakena anyaiśca nāgaiḥ sasambhramaiḥ pratisaṃmodito ratnaiśca pravāritaḥ/
analyzed: tatas janmacitreṇa nāga potakena anyaiḥ ca nāgaiḥ sa sambhramaiḥ pratisaṃmoditaḥ ratnaiḥ ca pravāritaḥ
sa kathayati alam mama ratnaiḥ
kim tu etam amogha pāśam prayacchatha iti
sa nāgaḥ āhatavan anena kim prayojanam
yadā garutmatā upadrutāḥ bhavāmaḥ
tadā anena ātmānam rakṣāmaḥ

original: 285.028. lubdhaka āha--yuṣmākameṣa kadācit karhicit garutmatopadrutānāmupayogaṃ gacchati/
analyzed: lubdhakaḥ āha yuṣmākam eṣa kadācid karhicit garutmatā upadrutānām upayogam gacchati
mama tu anena satatam eva prayojanam
yat asti kṛtam upakṛtam ca
anuprayaccha iti
janma citrasya nāga potakasya etat abhavat mama anena bahu upakṛtam
mātā pitarau avalokya dadāmi iti

original: 285.031. ten mātāpitarau avalokya sa pāśo dattaḥ/
analyzed: tena mātā pitarā avalokya sa pāśaḥ dattaḥ

original: 285.032. tato 'sau lubdhakaḥ pṛthivīlabdhaprakhyena sukhasaumanasyenāpyāyitamanā amoghapāśamādāya nāgabhavanādabhyudgamya svagṛhaṃ gataḥ//
analyzed: tatas sau lubdhakaḥ pṛthivī labdha prakhyena sukha saumanasyena āpyāyita manāḥ amogha pāśam ādāya nāga bhavanāt abhyudgamya sva gṛham gataḥ

original: 286.001. <286>yāvadapareṇa samayena dhano rājā devyā sārdhaṃ krīḍati ramate paricārayati/
analyzed: samayena dhanaḥ rājā devyā sārdham krīḍati ramate paricārayati

original: 286.001. tasya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayato na putro na duhitā/
analyzed: tasya krīḍataḥ ramamāṇasya paricārayataḥ na putraḥ na duhitā

original: 286.002. sa kare kapolaṃ dattvā cintāparo vyavasthitah--anekadhanasamuditaṃ me gṛham/
analyzed: sa kare kapolam dattvā cintā paraḥ vyavasthita han eka dhana samuditam me gṛham
na me putraḥ na duhitā

original: 286.003. mamātyayātsvakulavaṃśacchede rāṣṭrāpahāraḥ sarvasantasvāpateyamaputramiti kṛtvā anyarājavidheyo bhaviṣyatīti/
analyzed: mama atyayāt sva kula vaṃśa chede rāṣṭra apahāraḥ sarva santa svāpateyam aputram iti kṛtvā anya rāja vidheyaḥ bhaviṣyati iti
sa śramaṇa brāhmaṇa suhṛd sambandhi bāndhavaiḥ ucyate id eva
kim asi cintā parah
saḥ etat prakaraṇam vistareṇa ārocayati
te kathayati devatā ārādhanam kuru
putraḥ te bhaviṣyati iti
saḥ putraḥ putra abhinandī śiva varuṇa kubera vāsava ādīn anyān ca devatā viśeṣān āyācate
tat yathā ārāma devatāḥ vana devatā catvara devatā śṛṅgāṭaka devatāḥ bali pratigrāhikāḥ

original: 286.008. sahajāḥ sahadharmikā nityāvubaddhā api devatā āyācate/
analyzed: sahajāḥ sahadharmikāḥ nitya avubaddhāḥ api devatāḥ āyācate

original: 286.009. asti caiṣa loke pravādo yadāyācanahetoḥ putrā jāyante duhitaraśceti/
analyzed: asti ca eṣa loke pravādaḥ yadā āyācana hetoḥ putrāḥ jāyante duhitaraḥ ca iti
tat ca na iivam
yadi evam abhaviṣyat
ekaikasya putra sahasram abhaviṣyat
tat yathā rājñaḥ cakravartinaḥ

original: 286.010. api tu trayāṇāṃ sthānānāṃ saṃmukhībhāvātputrā jāyante duhitaraśca/
analyzed: api tu trayāṇām sthānānām saṃmukhībhāvāt putrāḥ jāyante duhitaraḥ ca
katameṣām trayāṇām
mātā pitarau raktau bhavataḥ saṃnipatitau

original: 286.012. mātā cāsya kalyā bhavati ṛtumatī ca/
analyzed: mātā ca asya kalyā bhavati ṛtumatī ca
gandharvaḥ pratyupasthitaḥ bhavati

original: 286.013. eṣā trayāṇāṃ sthānānāṃ saṃmukhībhāvātputrā jāyante duhitaraśca/
analyzed: eṣā trayāṇām sthānānām saṃmukhībhāvāt putrāḥ jāyante duhitaraḥ ca
sa ca evam āyācana paraḥ tiṣṭhati
anyatamaḥ ca bhadra kalpikaḥ bodhisattvaḥ tasya agra mahiṣyāḥ avakrāntaḥ
pañcāveṇīyāḥ dharmāḥ ekatye paṇḍita jātīye mātṛgrāme
katame pañca
raktam puruṣam jānāti viraktam jānāti
kālam jānāti kratum jānāti
garbham avakrāntam jānāti
yasya sakāśāt garbham avakrāmati tam api jānāti
dārakam jānāti
dārikām jānāti
saced dārakaḥ bhavati
dakṣiṇam kukṣim niśritya tiṣṭhati
saced dārikā bhavati
vāmam kukṣim niśritya tiṣṭhati

original: 286.018. sā āttamanāḥ svāminn ārocayati--diṣṭyā vardhasva āryaputra/
analyzed: sā ātta manāḥ svāmin ārocayati diṣṭyā vardhasva āryaputra
āpannasattvā asmi saṃvṛttā

original: 286.019. yathā ca me dakṣiṇaṃ kukṣiṃ niśritya tiṣṭhati,
analyzed: yathā ca me dakṣiṇam kukṣim niśritya tiṣṭhati

original: 286.020. so 'pyāttamanāttamanāḥ pūrvaṃ kāyamunnamayya dakṣiṇaṃ bāhumabhiprasārya udānamudānayati--apyevāhaṃ cirakālābhilaṣitaṃ putramukhaṃ
analyzed: saḥ pi ātta manāḥ ātta manāḥ pūrvam kāyam unnamayya dakṣiṇam bāhum abhiprasārya udānam udānayati api eva aham cira kāla abhilaṣitam putra mukham
jātaḥ me syāt na avajātaḥ
kṛtyāni me kurvīt
pratibharet
dāyādyam me pratipadyeta
kula vaṃśaḥ me cirasthitikaḥ syāt

original: 286.023. asmākaṃ cāpyatītakālagatānāmalpaṃ vā prabhūtaṃ vā dānāni datvā puṇyāni kṛtvā asmākaṃ nāṃnā dakṣiṇāmādekṣyati--idaṃ tayoryatratatropapannayorgacchatoranugacchatu
analyzed: asmākam ca api atīta kāla gatānām alpam vā prabhūtam vā dānāni da tvā puṇyāni kṛtvā asmākam dakṣiṇām ādekṣyati idam tayoḥ yatra tatra upapannayoḥ gacchatoḥ anugacchatu
āpannasattvām viditvā upari prāsāda tala gatām a yantritām dhārayati tikta amla lavaṇa madhuḥ kaṭu kaṣāya vivarjitaiḥ āhāraiḥ
hāra ardhahāra vibhūṣita gātrīm apsarasam iva nandana vana cāriṇīm mañcāt mañcam pīṭhāt pīṭham an avatarantīm adharimām bhūmim

original: 286.027. na cāsyāḥ kiṃcidamanojñaśabdaśravaṇam yāvadeva garbhasya paripākāya/
analyzed: na ca asyāḥ kiṃcid amanojña śabda śravaṇam yāvat eva garbhasya paripākāya

original: 286.028. sā aṣṭānāṃ vā navānāṃ vā māsānāmatyayātprasūtā/
analyzed: sā aṣṭānām vā navānām vā māsānām atyayāt prasūtā

original: 286.029. dārako jāto 'bhirūpo darśanīyaḥ prāsādiko gauraḥ kanakavarṇaśchatrākāraśirāḥ pralambabāhurvistīrṇalalāṭa uccaghoṇaḥ saṃgatabhrūstuṅganāsaḥ
analyzed: dārakaḥ jātaḥ bhirūpaḥ darśanīyaḥ prāsādikaḥ gauraḥ kanaka varṇaḥ chatra ākāra śirāḥ pralamba bāhuḥ vistīrṇa lalāṭaḥ ucca ghoṇaḥ saṃgata bhrūḥ tuṅga nāsaḥ
tasya jātau ānanda bheryaḥ tāḍitāḥ
śrutvā rājā kathayati kim etat iti
antaḥpurikābhiḥ rājñe niveditam deva
diṣṭyā vardhasva
putraḥ te jātaḥ iti
tatas rājñā tam sarvam nagaram apagata pāṣāṇa śarkara kaṭhallam
candana vāri siktam ucchrata dhvaja patākam surabhi dhūpa ghaṭikā upanibuddham nānā puṣpa abhikīrṇa ramaṇīyam
ājñā ca dattā āśramaṇa brāhmaṇa kṛpaṇa vanīpakebhyaḥ dānam prayacchata
sarva bandhana mokṣam ca kuruta iti

original: 287.003. tasyaivaṃ trīṇi saptakānyekaviṃśatidivasān vistareṇa jātakarma karoti/
analyzed: tasya evam trīṇi saptakāni ekaviṃśati divasān vistareṇa jātakarma karoti

original: 287.004. tasya jātimahaṃ kṛtvā nāmadheyaṃ vyavasthāpitumārabdham--kiṃ bhavatu dāraksya nāmeti?
analyzed: tasya jāti maham kṛtvā nāmadheyam vyavasthāpitum ārabdham kim bhavatu dāraksya nāma iti

original: amātyāḥ kathayanti--ayaṃ dārako dhanasya rājñaḥ putraḥ,
analyzed: amātyāḥ kathayanti ayam dārakaḥ dhanasya rājñaḥ putraḥ
bhavatu dārakasya sudhanaḥ nāma iti
tasya sudhanaḥ iti nāmadheyam vyavashtāpitam

original: 287.006. sudhano dārako 'ṣṭābhyo dhātrībhyo 'nudatto dvābhyāmaṃsadhātrībhyāṃ kṣīradhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ maladhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ krīḍanikābhyāṃ
analyzed: sudhanaḥ dārakaḥ ṣṭābhyaḥ dhātrībhyaḥ nudattaḥ dvābhyām aṃsadhātrībhyām kṣīradhātrībhyām dvābhyām maladhātrībhyām dvābhyām krīḍanikābhyām

original: 287.007. so 'ṣṭābhirdhātrībhirunnīyate vardhyate kṣīreṇa dadhnā navatītena sarpiṣā sarpimaṇḍairvā anyaiścottaptottaptairupakaraṇaviśeṣaiḥ/
analyzed: saḥ u ṣṭābhiḥ dhātrībhiḥ unnīyate vardhyate kṣīreṇa dadhnā navatītena sarpiṣā sarpimaṇḍaiḥ vā anyaiḥ ca uttapta uttaptaiḥ upakaraṇa viśeṣaiḥ

original: 287.010. sa yadā mahān saṃvṛttastadā lipyāmupanyastaḥ saṃkhyāyāṃ gaṇanāyāṃ mudrāyāmuddhāre
analyzed: sa yadā mahān saṃvṛttaḥ tadā lipyām upanyastaḥ saṃkhyāyām gaṇanāyām mudrāyām uddhāre

original: nyāse nikṣepe vastuparīkṣāyāṃ kumāraparīkṣāyāṃ kumārikāparīkṣāyāṃ dāruparīkṣāyāṃ
analyzed: nyāse nikṣepe vastu parīkṣāyām kumāra parīkṣāyām kumārikā parīkṣāyām dāru parīkṣāyām
ratna parīkṣāyām vastra parīkṣāyām

original: 287.012. sa yāni tāni bhavanti rājñāṃ kṣatriyāṇāṃ mūrdhābhiṣiktānāṃ janapadaiśvaryamanuprāptānāṃ
analyzed: sa yāni tāni bhavanti rājñām kṣatriyāṇām mūrdhābhiṣiktānām janapada aiśvaryam anuprāptānām

original: tasyathā--hastigrīvāyāmaśvapṛṣṭhe rathe tsarau dhanuṣi apayāne niryāṇe 'ṅkuśagrahe
analyzed: tasya thā hasti grīvāyām aśva pṛṣṭhe rathe tsarau dhanuṣi apayāne niryāṇe ṅkuśa grahe

original: pāśagrahe chedye bhedye muṣṭibandhe padabandhe dūravedhe śabdavedhe marmavedhe 'kṣuṇṇavedhe dṛḍhaprahāritāyām /
analyzed: pāśa grahe chedye bhedye muṣṭibandhe padabandhe dūravedhe śabdavedhe marmavedhe kṣuṇṇavedhe dṛḍha prahāri tāyām

haimantikam graiṣmikam vārṣikam

original: 287.019. tataḥ sudhanakumāra upariprāsādatalagato niṣpuruṣeṇa tūryeṇa krīḍati ramate paricārayati//
analyzed: tatas sudhana kumāraḥ upari prāsāda tala gataḥ niṣpuruṣeṇa tūryeṇa krīḍati ramate paricārayati

original: 287.021. yāvadapareṇa samayena halako lubdhako mṛgayāmanveṣamāṇastena tenānuvicarannanyatamaṃ parvatamanuprāptaḥ/
analyzed: yāvat apareṇa samayena halakaḥ lubdhakaḥ mṛgayām anveṣamāṇaḥ tena tena anuvicaran anyatamam parvatam anuprāptaḥ

original: 287.022. tasya ca parvatasyādhastādṛṣerāśramapadaṃ paśyati puṣpaphalasampannaṃ nānāpakṣigaṇavicāritam/
analyzed: tasya ca parvatasya adhastāt ṛṣeḥ āśrama padam paśyati puṣpa phala sampannam nānā pakṣi gaṇa vicāritam
mahāntam ca hradam utpala kumuda puṇḍarīka saṃchannam haṃsa kāraṇḍava cakravāka upaśobhitam
sa tam āśrama padam paribhramitum ārabdhaḥ
yāvat tam ṛṣim paśyati dīrgha keśa śmaśru nakha romāṇam vāta apakarṣita śarīram cīvara valkala dhāriṇam anyatama vṛkṣa mūla āśraya tṛṇa kuṭikā kṛta nilayam

original: 287.025. dṛṣṭvā ca punaḥ pādābhivandanaṃ kṛtvā kṛtāñjalipuṭaḥ papraccha--bhagavan,
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā ca punar pāda abhivandanam kṛtvā kṛta añjali puṭaḥ papraccha bhagavan
kiyat ciram asmin pradeśe tava prativasataḥ
catvāriṃśat varṣāṇi

original: 287.027. asti tvayā iyatā kālenāsmin pradeśe kaścidāścaryādbhutadharmo dṛṣṭaḥ śruto vā?
analyzed: asti tvayā iyatā kālena asmin pradeśe kaścid āścarya adbhuta dharmaḥ dṛṣṭaḥ śrutaḥ vā
praśānta ātmā ṛṣiḥ mandam mandam uvāca bhadra mukha
dṛṣṭaḥ te yam hradah
dṛṣṭaḥ bhagavan

original: 287.029. eṣā brahmasabhā nāma puṣkiriṇī utpalapadmakumudapuṇḍarīkasaṃchannā nānāpakṣigaṇaniṣevitā himarajatatuṣāragaurāmbusampūrṇā surabhikusumapūrṇatoyā/
analyzed: eṣā brahmasabhā nāma puṣkiriṇī utpala padma kumuda puṇḍarīka saṃchannā nānā pakṣi gaṇa niṣevitā hima rajata tuṣāra gaura ambu sampūrṇā surabhi kusuma pūrṇa toyā

original: 287.030. asyāṃ puṣkiriṇyāṃ pañcadaśamyāṃ manoharā nāma drumasya kinnararājasya duhitā pañcakinnarīśataparivārā nānāvidhasnānodvartanairāgatya
analyzed: asyām puṣkiriṇyām pañcadaśamyām manoharā nāma drumasya kinnara rājasya duhitā pañca kinnarī śata parivārā nānāvidha snāna udvartanaiḥ āgatya
snāna kāle ca asyāḥ madhura gīta vādita śabdena mṛga pakṣiṇaḥ vahriyante

original: 288.001. ahamapi taṃ śabdaṃ śrutvā mahatā prītisaumanasyena saptāhamatināmayāmi/
analyzed: aham api tam śabdam śrutvā mahatā prīti saumanasyena sapta aham atināmayāmi
etat āścaryam bhadra mukha mayā dṛṣṭam iti

original: 288.002. atha halakasya lubdhakasyaitadabhavat--śobhano 'yaṃ mayā amoghaḥ pāśo nāgāllabdho manoharāyāḥ kinnaryāḥ kṣepsyāmīti/
analyzed: atha halakasya lubdhakasya etat abhavat śobhanaḥ yam mayā amoghaḥ pāśaḥ nāgāt labdhaḥ manoharāyāḥ kinnaryāḥ kṣepsyāmi iti

original: 288.003. so 'pareṇa samayena pūrṇapañcadaśyāmamoghaṃ pāśamādāya hradatīrasamīpe puṣpaphalaviṭapagahanamāśritya avadhānatatparo 'vashtitaḥ/
analyzed: saḥ pareṇa samayena pūrṇa pañcadaśyām amogham pāśam ādāya hrada tīra samīpe puṣpa phala viṭapa gahanam āśritya avadhāna tatparaḥ

original: 288.004. yāvanmanoharā kinnarī pañcaśataparivāritā tādṛśyaiva vibhūtyā brahmasabhāṃ puṣkiriṇīmavatīrṇā snātum/
analyzed: yāvat manoharā kinnarī pañca śata parivāritā tādṛśyā eva vibhūtyā brahmasabhām puṣkiriṇīm avatīrṇā snātum

original: 288.005. tatsamantaraṃ ca halakena lubdhakena amoghaḥ pāśaḥ kṣiptaḥ,
analyzed: tad samantaram ca halakena lubdhakena amoghaḥ pāśaḥ kṣiptaḥ
yena manoharā kinnarī baddhā

original: 288.006. tayā amoghapāśaśritayā hrade mahāhatanādaḥ kṛto bhīṣaṇaśca śabdo niścāritaḥ,
analyzed: tayā amogha pāśa śritayā hrade mahā hata nādaḥ kṛtaḥ bhīṣaṇaḥ ca śabdaḥ niścāritaḥ

original: yaṃ śrutvā pariśiṣṭaḥ kinnarigaṇa itaścāmutaśca saṃbhrānto manoharāṃ nirīkṣitumārabdhaḥ/
analyzed: yam śrutvā pariśiṣṭaḥ kinnari gaṇaḥ itas ca amutas ca saṃbhrāntaḥ manoharām nirīkṣitum ārabdhaḥ
paśyanti baddhām
dṛṣṭvā ca punar bhītāḥ niṣpalāyitāḥ
adrākṣīt sa lubdhakaḥ tām parama rūpa darśanīyām

sā āhahā hatā asmi
hā mandabhāgyā
mama udṛśīm avasthām āptām

original: 288.011. mā naiṣīstvaṃ hi mā sprākṣīr naitattva suceṣṭitam/
analyzed: mā naiṣīḥ tvam hi mā sprākṣīḥ na etattva su ceṣṭitam

original: 288.012. rājabhogyā surūpāhaṃ na sādhu grahaṇaṃ tava//1// iti/
analyzed: rāja bhogyā surūpā aham na sādhu grahaṇam iti
lubdhakaḥ prāha yadi tvām na gṛhṇāmi
niṣpalāyase
sā kathayati na aham niṣpalāye
yadi na śraddadhāsi
imam cūḍāmaṇim gṛhāṇa
asya anubhāvena aham upari vihāyasā gacchāmi iti
lubdhakaḥ kathayati katham jāne
tayā śira sthaḥ cūḍāmaṇiḥ dattaḥ uktaḥ ca eṣa cūḍāmaṇiḥ yasya haste
tasya aham vaśā bhavāmi
tatas lubdhakena asau cūḍāmaṇiḥ gṛhītaḥ
pāśa baddhām ca enām saṃprashtitaḥ
tena khalu samayena sudhana rāja kumāraḥ mṛgayā nirgataḥ

original: 288.017. adrākṣītsa lubdhakaḥ sudhanaṃ rājakumāramabhirūpaṃ darśanīyaṃ prāsādikam/
analyzed: adrākṣīt sa lubdhakaḥ su dhanam rāja kumāram abhirūpam darśanīyam prāsādikam
dṛṣṭvā ca punar asya etat abhavat ayam ca rāja kumāraḥ
iyam ca parama darśanīyā
yadi enām drakṣyati
balāt grahīṣyati
yat nu aham enām prābhṛta nyāyena svayam eva upanayeyam
tatas tām pāśa bddhām ādāya yena rāja kumāraḥ tena upasaṃkrāntaḥ

original: 288.020. upasaṃkramya pādayor nipatya kathayati--idaṃ mama devasya strīratnaṃ prābhṛtamānītam,
analyzed: upasaṃkramya pādayoḥ nipatya kathayati idam mama devasya strī ratnam prābhṛtam ānītam
pratigṛhyatām iti
adrākṣīt sudhana kumāraḥ manoharām kinnarīm abhirūpām darśanīyām prāsādikām
parama śubha varṇa puṣkala tayā samanvāgatām sarva guṇa samuditām aṣṭādaśābhiḥ strī lakṣaṇaiḥ
samalaṃkṛtām janapada kalyāṇām kāñcana kalaśa kūrma pīna unnata kaṭhina sahita sujāta vṛtta pragalbhamāna stanīm abhinīla rakta aṃśuka visṛta āyata nava kamala sadṛśa nayanām
su bhruvam āyata tuṅga nāsām vidrūma maṇi ratna viṃva phala saṃsthāna sadṛśa adharoṣṭhīm su dṛḍha paripūrṇa gaṇḍa pārśvām atyartha rati kara kapola tilaka anupūrva caritām
saṃgata bhruva aravinda vikaca sadṛśa paripūrṇa vimala śaśi vapuṣam
pralamba bāhum gambhīra tivalika saṃtata madhyām stana bhāra avanāmyamāna pūrva ardhām ratha aṅga saṃsthita sujāta jaghanām
kadalī garbha sadṛśa kara anupūrva avasthita sujāta karabha ūrum su nigūḍha su racita sarva aṅga sundara śirām
sahita maṇi pīḍā samrakta kara tala praharṣa nūpura valayām
hāra ardhahāra nirghoṣa vimala śita gatim āyata nīla sūkṣma keśīm sa cīvara prabhraṣṭa kāñcī guṇām nūpura avacchādita pādām kṣāma udarīm

original: 288.030. tāṃ pratikīrṇahārāmuttaptajāmbūnadacārupūrṇāṃ dṛṣṭvā kumāraḥ sahasā papāta viddho dṛḍharāgaśareṇa/
analyzed: tām pratikīrṇa hārām uttapta jāmbūnada cāru pūrṇām dṛṣṭvā kumāraḥ sahasā papāta viddhaḥ dṛḍha rāga śareṇa
tatra sa rāga varāha dava dahana pataṅga sadṛśena jala candra cañcala vimala ujjvala svabhāvena
durgrāhyatareṇa nadī taraṅga jñaṣa makara surabhi gamanena

original: 289.007. tatsnehamanmathavilāsasamudbhavena sadyaḥ sa cetasi nu rāgaśareṇa viddhaḥ//2//
analyzed: tad sneha manmatha vilāsa samudbhavena sadyas sa cetasi nu rāga śareṇa
sa tām ati manoharām gṛhītvā hastināpuram gataḥ

original: 289.010. tataḥ sudhano rājakumāro manoharayā rūpayauvanaguṇena sughanaḥ kumāronekaiścopacāraśataistathā apahṛto yathā muhūrtamapi tāṃ na jahāti/
analyzed: tatas sudhanaḥ rāja kumāraḥ manoharayā rūpa yauvana guṇena sughanaḥ kumāraḥ ūnekaiḥ ca upacāra śataiḥ tathā apahṛtaḥ yathā muhūrtam api tām na jahāti
yāvat apareṇa samayena jetavanāt dvau brāhmaṇau abhyāgatau
tatra ekaḥ rājānām saṃśritaḥ
dvitīyaḥ sudhanam kumāram
yaḥ rājānam saṃśritaḥ

original: sa rājñā purohitaḥ sthāpito bhogaiśca saṃvibhaktaḥ/
analyzed: sa rājñā purohitaḥ sthāpitaḥ bhogaiḥ ca saṃvibhaktaḥ
yaḥ tu su dhanam kumāram
sa bhoga mātreṇa saṃvibhaktaḥ

original: 289.014. sa kathayati--yathā tava sahāyo brāhmaṇo mama pitrā paurohitye 'vasthāpitaḥ,
analyzed: sa kathayati yathā tava sahāyaḥ brāhmaṇaḥ mama pitrā paurohitye vasthāpitaḥ
evam aham tvām api paurohitye sthāpayāmi iti

original: 289.016. eṣa ca vṛttāntastena brāhmaṇena karṇaparamparayā śrutaḥ/

tasya etat abhavat aham tathā kariṣye

original: yāvadapareṇa samayena tasya rājño vijite 'nyatamaḥ kārvaṭikaḥ prativiruddhaḥ,
analyzed: yāvat apareṇa samayena tasya rājñaḥ vijite nyatamaḥ kārvaṭikaḥ prativiruddhaḥ

ye daṇḍāḥ preṣitāḥ
te pi hasta vidhvastāḥ pratyāgatāḥ

original: 289.022. brāhmaṇa purohitaḥ saṃlakṣayati--ayaṃ sa kumārasya vadhopāyakāla iti/
analyzed: brāhmaṇa purohitaḥ saṃlakṣayati ayam sa kumārasya vadha upāya kālaḥ iti
tena rājā
na evam asau śakyaḥ saṃnāmayitum
rājā kathayati kim mayā svayam gantavyam

ayam su dhanaḥ kumāraḥ yuvā bala darpa yuktaḥ
eṣa daṇḍa sahāyaḥ preṣyatām iti
rājā kathayati evam astu iti
tatas rājā kumāram āhūya kathayati gaccha kumāra
daṇḍa sahāyaḥ kārvaṭikam saṃnāmaya

original: 289.026. evaṃ deveti sudhanaḥ kumāro rājñaḥ pratiśrutya antaḥpuraṃ praviṣṭaḥ/
analyzed: evam deva iti sudhanaḥ kumāraḥ rājñaḥ pratiśrutya antaḥpuram praviṣṭaḥ
manohara adarśanāt ca asya sarvam vismṛtam
punar api rājñā abhihitaḥ punar api tad darśanāt sarvam vismṛtam
purohitena ca abhihita hdeva

original: sudhanaḥ kumāro manoharayā atīva sakto na śakyate preṣayitum/
analyzed: sudhanaḥ kumāraḥ manoharayā atīva saktaḥ na śakyate preṣayitum
rājā kathayati sādhanam sajjam kriyatām

original: 289.029. nirgataḥ kumāro 'ntaḥpurāt preṣayitavyo yathā manoharāyāḥ sakāśaṃ na prativasatīti/
analyzed: nirgataḥ kumāraḥ ntaḥpurāt preṣayitavyaḥ yathā manoharāyāḥ sakāśam na prativasati iti

original: 289.030. evaṃ deveti amātyai rājñaḥ pratiśrutya balaugho hastyaśvarathapadātisampanno 'nakapraharaṇopakaraṇayuktaḥ sajjīkṛtaḥ/
analyzed: evam deva iti amātyaiḥ rājñaḥ pratiśrutya bala oghaḥ hasti aśva ratha padāti sampannaḥ naka praharaṇa upakaraṇa yuktaḥ sajjīkṛtaḥ
tatas kumāraḥ nirgataḥ uktaḥ gaccha kumāra
sajjaḥ bala oghaḥ iti
sa kathayati deva
gamiṣyāmi dṛṣṭvā
rājā kathayati kumāra na draṣṭavyā
kālaḥ u tivartate
sa kathayati tāvat yadi evam
mātaram dṛṣṭvā gacchāmi
gaccha kumāraḥ avalokya jananīm
sa manohara santakam cūḍāmaṇim ādāya mātuḥ sakāśam upasaṃkrāntaḥ
pādayoḥ nipatya kathayati amba
aham kārvaṭikam saṃnāmanāya gacchāmi
duhitā śakra kalpasya kinnara indrasya māninī
pālyā viraha śoka ārtā
ayam cūḍāmaṇi su guptam sthāpayitavyaḥ

original: 290.008. sa evaṃ mātaraṃ pitaraṃ saṃdiśya abhivādya ca nānāyodhabalaughatūryanir nāditaiḥ saṃprasthitaḥ/
analyzed: saḥ evam mātaram pitaram saṃdiśya abhivādya ca nānā yodha bala ogha tūrya niḥ nāditaiḥ saṃprasthitaḥ

original: 290.009. anupūrveṇa janapadānatikramya tasya kārvaṭikasya nātidūre 'nyataṃ vṛkṣamūlaṃ niśritya vāsamupagataḥ/
analyzed: anupūrveṇa janapadān atikramya tasya kārvaṭikasya na atidūre vṛkṣa mūlam niśritya vāsam upagataḥ
tena khalu samayena vaiśravaṇaḥ mahā rājaḥ neka yakṣa parivāraḥ neka yakṣa śata sahasra parivāraḥ

original: 290.011. tasya tena pathā gacchataḥ khagapathena yānamavasthitam/
analyzed: tasya tena pathā gacchataḥ khaga pathena yānam avasthitam
tasya etat abhavat bahuśas ham anena pathā samatikrāntaḥ
na ca me kadācid yānam pratihatam
kaḥ tra hetuḥ yena idānīm pratihataḥ iti
paśyati su dhanam kumāram
tasya etat abhavat ayam bhadra kalpikaḥ bodhisattvaḥ khedam āpatsyati yuddhāya abhiprasthitaḥ
sāhāyyam asya karaṇīyam
kārvaṭikaḥ saṃnāmayitavyaḥ

original: 290.015. na ca kasyacitprāṇinaḥ pīḍā karaṇīyeti viditvā pāñcikaṃ mahāyakṣasenāpatimāmantrayate--ehi tvaṃ pāñcika,
analyzed: na ca kasyacid prāṇinaḥ pīḍā karaṇīyā iti viditvā pāñcikam mahā yakṣa senāpatim āmantrayate ehi tvam pāñcika
sudhanasya kumārasya kārvaṭikam ayuddhena saṃnāmaya

original: 290.017. na ca te kasyacitprāṇinaḥ pīḍā kartavyeti/
analyzed: na ca te kasyacid prāṇinaḥ pīḍā kartavyā iti

original: 290.017. tatheti pāñcikena yakṣasenāpatinā vaiśravaṇasya mahārājasya pratiśrutya divyaścaturaṅgo balakāyo nirmitah--tālamātrapramāṇāḥ puruṣaḥ,
analyzed: tathā iti pāñcikena yakṣa senāpatinā vaiśravaṇasya mahā rājasya pratiśrutya divyaḥ catur aṅgaḥ balakāyaḥ nirmita htāla mātra pramāṇāḥ puruṣaḥ
parvata pramāṇāḥ hastinaḥ
hasti pramāṇāḥ aśvāḥ

original: 290.019. tato nānāvidhakhaṅgamuśalatomarapāśacakraśaraparaśvadhādiśastraviśeṣeṇa nānāvāditrasaṃkṣobheṇa ca mahābhayamupadarśayan mahatā balaudhena  #
analyzed: tatas nānāvidha khaṅga muśala tomara pāśa cakra śara paraśvadha ādi śastra viśeṣeṇa nānā vāditra saṃkṣobheṇa ca mahā bhayam upadarśayan mahatā bala odhena
pāñcikaḥ nuprāptaḥ
hasti aśva ratha nirghoṣāt nānā vāditra nidvanāt
yakṣāṇām sva prabhāvāt ca prākāraḥ prapapāta

original: 290.023. tataste karvaṭanivāsinastaṃ balaughaṃ dṛṣṭvā tacca prākārapatanaṃ paraṃ viṣādamāpannāḥ papracchuh--kuta eṣa balaugha āgacchatīti?
analyzed: tatas te karvaṭa nivāsinaḥ tam bala ogham dṛṣṭvā tat ca prākāra patanam param viṣādam āpannāḥ papracchuḥ kutas eṣa bala oghaḥ āgacchati iti
te kathayanti śīghram dvārāṇi muñcata
eṣa pṛṣṭhatas kumāraḥ āgacchati

original: 290.025. tasya ca balaugho yadi ciraṃ vidhārayiṣyatha,
analyzed: tasya ca bala oghaḥ yadi ciram vidhārayiṣyatha
sarvathā na bhaviṣyatha iti
te kathayanti

original: 290.027. vyutpannā na vayaṃ rājño na kumārasya dhīmataḥ/
analyzed: vyutpannāḥ na vayam rājñaḥ na kumārasya dhīmataḥ
nṛpa pauruṣakebhyaḥ sma bhītāḥ
taiḥ dvārāṇi muktāni

original: 290.029. tata ucchritadhvajapatākāpūrṇakalaśā nānāvidhatūryanir nāditaiḥ sudhanaṃ kumāraṃ pratyudgatāḥ/
analyzed: tatas ucchrita dhvaja patākā pūrṇa kalaśāḥ nānāvidha tūrya niḥ nāditaiḥ sudhanam kumāram pratyudgatāḥ
tena ca samāśvāsitāḥ
tad abhiprāyaḥ ca rāja bhaṭaḥ sthāpitaḥ
nipakāḥ ca nigṛhītāḥ
kara pratyāyāḥ ca nibaddhāḥ
tatas tam karvaṭakam sphītīkṛtya sudhana kumāraḥ

original: 291.001. dhanena ca rājñā tāmeva rātriṃ svapno dṛṣṭah--gṛdhreṇāgatya rājña udaraṃ sphoṭayitvā antrāṇyākṛṣya sarvaṃ tannagaramantrairveṣṭitam,
analyzed: dhanena ca rājñā tām eva rātrim svapnaḥ dṛṣṭaḥ gṛdhreṇa āgatya rājñaḥ udaram sphoṭayitvā antrāṇi ākṛṣya sarvam tat nagara mantraiḥ veṣṭitam
sapta ratnāni gṛham praveśyamānāni dṛṣṭāni

original: 291.002. tato rājā bhītastrastaḥ saṃvigna āhṛṣṭaromakūpo laghukadhvevotthāya mahāśayane
analyzed: tatas rājā bhītaḥ trastaḥ saṃvignaḥ āhṛṣṭa romakūpaḥ laghu kadhvā iva utthāya mahā śayane

original: niṣadya kare kapokaṃ dattvā cintāparo vyavasthitah--mā haiva me atonidānaṃ rājyaccyutirbhaviṣyati,
analyzed: niṣadya kare kapokam dattvā cintā paraḥ vyavasthita hmā ha eva me atonidānam rājya cyutiḥ bhaviṣyati
jīvitasya vai antarāyaḥ iti

original: 291.005. sa prabhātāyāṃ rajanyāṃ svapnaṃ brāhmaṇāya purohitāya nivedayāmāsa/
analyzed: sa prabhātāyām rajanyām svapnam brāhmaṇāya purohitāya nivedayāmāsa
sa saṃlakṣayati yādṛśaḥ devena svapnaḥ dṛṣṭaḥ
niyatam kumāreṇa karvaṭakaḥ nirjitaḥ
vitatha nirdeśaḥ karaṇīyaḥ
iti kṛtvā kathayati deva
na śobhanaḥ svapnaḥ
niyatam atonidānam rājyāt cyutiḥ bhaviṣyati
jīvitasya antarāyaḥ iti
kevalam tu atra asti pratikāraḥ
sa ca brāhmaṇaka mantreṣu dṛṣṭaḥ
kaḥ sau pratikārah
deva udyāne puṣkariṇī puruṣa pramāṇikā kartavyā
tata sudhayā praleptavyā
su saṃmṛṣṭām kṛtvā kṣudra mṛgāṇām rudhireṇa pūrayitavyā

original: 291.010. tato devena snānaprayatena tāṃ puṣkariṇīmekena so 'ānenāvataritavyam,
analyzed: tatas devena snāna prayatena tām puṣkariṇīm ekena
ekena avatīrya dvitīyena uttaritavyam
dvitīyena uttīrya tṛtīyena avataritavyam
tṛtīyena avatīrya caturthena uttaritavyam
tatas caturbhiḥ brāhmaṇaiḥ veda vedāṅga pāragaiḥ devasya pādayoḥ jihvayā nirleḍhavyam
kinnara vasayā ca dhūpaḥ deyaḥ
evam devaḥ vidhūta pāpaḥ ciram rājyam pālayiṣyati iti
rājā kathayati sarvam etat śakyam yat idam kinnaram edam atīva durlabham
purohitaḥ kathayati deva
yat eva durlabham tat eva sulabham
rājā kathayati yathā katham
purohitaḥ kathayati deva
nanu iyam manoharā kinnarī
rājā kathayati purohita
mā mā evam vada
kumārasya atra prāṇāḥ pratiṣṭhitāḥ
sa kathayati nanu devena śrutam
tyajet ekam kulasya arthe grāmasya arthe kulam tyajet
grāmam janapadasya arthe ātma arthe pṛthivīm
dṛḍhena addhi ātmanā
rājyam kumārasya asya dhīmataḥ

original: 291.021. śakṣyasi hyaparāṃ kartuṃ ghātayaināṃ manoharām//7// iti/
analyzed: śakṣyasi hi aparām kartum ghātaya enām iti

original: 291.022. ātmābhinandino na kiṃcinna pratipadyanta iti tenādhivāsitam/
analyzed: ātma abhinandinaḥ na kiṃcid na pratipadyante iti tena adhivāsitam
tatas yathā upadiṣṭam purohitena kārayitum ārabdham
puṣkariṇī khātā sudhayā upaliptā kṣudra mṛga rudhiram upāvartāyitum ārabdham
sa ca prayogaḥ sudhanasya antaḥpura janena upalabdhaḥ
tāḥ prīti manasaḥ saṃvṛtta āhvayam rūpa yauvana sampannāḥ
idānīm asmākam sudhanaḥ kumāraḥ paricārayiṣyati iti

original: 291.026. tāḥ pramuditā dṛṣṭvā manoharā pṛcchati--kim yūyamatīva praharṣitā iva?
analyzed: tāḥ pramuditā dṛṣṭvā manoharā pṛcchati kim yūyam atīva praharṣitāḥ iva

original: yāvadaparayā sa vṛttānto vistareṇa manoharāyā niveditaḥ/
analyzed: yāvat aparayā sa vṛttāntaḥ vistareṇa manoharāyāḥ niveditaḥ

original: 291.027. tato manoharā saṃjātaduḥkhadaurmanasyā yena sudhanasya kumārasya jananī tenopasaṃkrāntā/
analyzed: tatas manoharā saṃjāta duḥkha daurmanasyā yena sudhanasya kumārasya jananī tena upasaṃkrāntā
upasaṃkramya pādayoḥ nipatya karuṇa dīna vilambitaiḥ akṣaraiḥ etam artham nivedayāmāsa
sā kathayati yadi evam svāgatam idam kuru vicārayiṣyāmi iti
manoharayā āgamya punar api samākhyātam
tayā api vicāritam
paśyati bhūtam

original: 291.030. tatastayā sa cūḍāmaṇirvastrāṇi ca manoharāyai dattāni,
analyzed: tatas tayā sa cūḍāmaṇiḥ vastrāṇi ca manoharāyai dattāni
uktā caputrike
prāpte kāle āgantavyam
evam mama upālambhaḥ na bhavati iti

original: 291.032. tato rājā yathādiṣṭena krameṇa snānaprayato rudhirapūrṇāṃ puṣkiriṇimavatīryottīrṇah<292>/
analyzed: tatas rājā yathā ādiṣṭena krameṇa snāna prayataḥ rudhira pūrṇām
tatas sya brāhmaṇaiḥ jihvayā pādau nilīḍhau
avasthita hānīya tām kinnarī iti ca samādiṣṭam
tad samanantaram eva manoharā gagana talam utplutya gāthām bhāṣate
sparśa saṃgamanam mahyam ramitam ca me

original: 292.004. nāgīva bandhanānmuktā eṣā gacchāmi sāmpratam//8// iti/
analyzed: nāgī iva bandhanāt muktā eṣā gacchāmi iti
rājñā dṛṣṭā vāyupathena gacchantī
sa bhītaḥ purohitam āmantrayata iyat artham kṛtaḥ yatnaḥ
sa na saṃpannaḥ
manoharā kinnarī niṣpalāyitā iti
purohitaḥ kathayati deva
siddhārtha upagata pāpaḥ devaḥ sāmpratam iti

original: 292.007. tato manoharāyāḥ khagapathena gacchantyā etadabhavat--yadahametāmavasthāṃ prāptā,
analyzed: tatas manoharāyāḥ khaga pathena gacchantyāḥ etat abhavat yat aham etām avasthām prāptā
tat tasya ṛṣeḥ byapadeśāt
yadi tena na ākhyātam abhaviṣyat
na aham abhaviṣyat

original: 292.009. tena hi yasyāmi tāvadasyaiva ṛṣeḥ sakāśāmiti/
analyzed: tena hi tāvat asya eva ṛṣeḥ
sā tasya āśrama padam gatā
pāda abhivandanam kṛtvā tam ṛṣim uvāca mahā ṛṣe
tava vyapadeśāt aham grahaṇam gatā
manuṣyasya saṃsparśaḥ ca saṃprāptaḥ
jīvita antarāyaḥ ca etad saṃvṛttaḥ

original: 292.011. tadvijñāpayāmi--yadi yadā kadācitsudhanaḥ kumāra āgacchati māṃ samanveṣamāṇaḥ,
analyzed: tat vijñāpayāmi yadi yadā kadācid sudhanaḥ kumāraḥ āgacchati mām samanveṣamāṇaḥ
tasya imām aṅguli mudrām dātuḥ mahasi
evam ca vaktavyam kumāra
viṣamāḥ panthānaḥ durgamāḥ
khedam āpatsyase
nirvatasva iti
yadi nirvāyamāṇaḥ na riṣṭhet
tasya mārgam vyapadeṣṭum arhasi kumāra
manoharayā samākhyātam uttare digbhāge trayaḥ kālaparvatāḥ
tān atikramya apare trayaḥ
tān api atikramya apare trayaḥ
tān atikramya himavān parvata rājaḥ
tasya uttareṇa utkalaka parvataḥ

original: tata utkūlako jalapatha ekadhārako vajrakaḥ kāmarūpī/
analyzed: tatas utkūlakaḥ jala pathaḥ eka dhārakaḥ vajrakaḥ kāmarūpī
tatra khadirake parvate guhā
praveśaḥ eka dhārake tu kīlakāḥ
vajrake pakṣirājena praveśaḥ
ebhiḥ upāyaiḥ te parvatāḥ atikramaṇīyāḥ
yantrāṇi ca bhuṅktavyāni

original: 292.019. ajavaktrameṇḍhakaḥ puruṣo rākṣasarūpī piṅgalāguhāyāṃ lālāsrotasā mahānajagaro vegena pradhāvati/
analyzed: aja vaktra meṇḍhakaḥ puruṣaḥ rākṣasa rūpī piṅgalā guhāyām lālā srotasā mahān ajagaraḥ vegena pradhāvati
sa te vikrameṇa hantavyaḥ
ara antara gatām nābhīm yatra paśyet tatra kiṭibhakaḥ ca

original: 292.022. ayaṃ bhuktena bāṇena hantavyo mama kāraṇāt/
analyzed: ayam bhuktena bāṇena hantavyaḥ mama kāraṇāt
yatra paśyet dvau meṣau saṃghaṭṭantau parasparam
tayoḥ śṛṅgam ekam bhaṅktvā mārgam
āyasau puruśau dṛṣṭvā śastra pāṇī mahā bhayau
tayoḥ ekam pādayitvā mārgam
saṃkocayantīm prasārayantīm rākṣasīm āyasam mukham

original: 292.028. yadā paśyettatra kīlakaṃ lalāṭe tasyā nikhānayet//11//
analyzed: yadā paśyet tatra kīlakam lalāṭe tasyāḥ
śūlāvartaḥ tadā kūpaḥ vilaṅghyaḥ te ṣaṣṭi hastakaḥ
hari piṅgala keśa akṣaḥ dāruṇaḥ yatra
kārmukam maṇḍalam kṛtvā hantavyaḥ ca durāsadaḥ
nadyaḥ ca bahavaḥ tāryā

original: 293.001. <293>raṅgā pataṅgā tapanī citrā rudantī hasantī āśīviṣā vetranadī ca/

analyzed: raṅgāyām rākṣasī kopaḥ pataṅgāyām amanuṣyakāḥ
tapantyām grāha bahula tvam citrāyām
rudantyām kinnarī ceṭyaḥ hasantyām kinnara snuṣā

original: 293.005. āśīviṣāyāṃ nānāvidhāḥ sarpā vetranadyāṃ tu śālmaliḥ//15//
analyzed: āśīviṣāyām nānāvidhāḥ sarpāḥ vetra nadyām tu
raṅgāyām dhairya karaṇam pataṅgāyām parākramaḥ
tapantyām grāha mukha bandham citrāyām
rudantyām saumanasye samuttāram
hasantyām tūṣṇībhāva yogena
aśīviṣāyām sarpa viṣa mantra yogena
vetra nadyām tīkṣṇa śastra sampāta yogena samuttāraḥ
nadīḥ samatikramya pañca yakṣa śatāni gulmakam
tat dhairyam āsthāya vidrābyam
tatas drumasya kinnara rājasya bhavanam iti

original: 293.010. tato manoharā tam ṛṣimevamuktvā pādābhivandanaṃ kṛtvā prakrāntā//
analyzed: tatas manoharā tam ṛṣim evam uktvā pādābhivandanam kṛtvā prakrāntā

original: 293.012. yāvatsudhanaḥ kumārastaṃ karvaṭakaṃ saṃnāmya gṛhītaprābhṛto hastināpuramanuprāptaḥ/
analyzed: yāvat sudhanaḥ kumāraḥ tam karvaṭakam saṃnāmya gṛhīta prābhṛtaḥ hastināpuram anuprāptaḥ
śrutvā ca rājā parām prītim upagataḥ

original: 293.013. tataḥ kumāro mārgaśramaṃ prativinodya pituḥ sakāśaṃ gataḥ/
analyzed: tatas kumāraḥ mārga śramam prativinodya pituḥ sakāśam gataḥ
praṇāmam kṛtvā purastāt niṣaṇṇaḥ
rājñā paramayā saṃtoṣaṇayā saṃbhāṣitaḥ
uktaḥ ca kumāra
śivena tvam āgatah
deva tava prasādāt karvaṭakaḥ saṃnāmitaḥ
nipakāḥ gṛhītāḥ
cintakaḥ sthāpitaḥ
ime tu kara pratyayāḥ
paṇya āgāraḥ ca sthāpyatām iti
rājā kathayati kumāra tiṣṭha
prābhṛtam sahitāḥ eva bhokṣyāmaḥ
deva gacchāmi
ciram dṛṣṭā me manoharā
alam kumāra adya gamanena
tiṣṭha śvas gāmiṣyasi iti
saḥ nava budhyamānaḥ evam āha tāta
adyā eva mayā avaśyam gantavyam
rājā tūṣṇīm avasthitaḥ
tatas kumāraḥ sva gṛham gataḥ
yāvat paśyati śriyā varjitam antaḥpura dvāram

original: 293.020. sa cintāparaḥ praviśya manoharāṃ na paśyati/
analyzed: sa cintā paraḥ praviśya manoharām na paśyati

original: 293.021. itaścāmutaśca saṃbhrāntaḥ śūnyahṛdayaḥ śabdaṃ kartumārabdhah--manohare manohare iti/
analyzed: itas ca amutas ca saṃbhrāntaḥ śūnya hṛdayaḥ śabdam kartum ārabdha hmanohare manohare iti
yāvat antaḥpuram saṃnipatitam
tāḥ striyaḥ kṣepam kartum ārabdhāḥ
viddhaḥ u sau hṛdaya śalyena sutarām praṣṭum ārabdhaḥ
tābhiḥ yathābhūtam samākhyātam
sa śokena saṃpramuhyate
tāḥ striyaḥ kathayanti deva
asmin antaḥpure tad praviśiṣṭatarāḥ striyaḥ santi
kimartham śokaḥ kriyate
sa pituḥ nairguṇyam upaśrutya kṛtaghna tām ca
mātuḥ sakāśam upasaṃkrāntaḥ
pādayoḥ nipatya kathayati amba
manoharām na paśyāmi manoratha guṇaiḥ yutām
sādhu rūpa samāyuktā kva gatā me
manasā saṃpradhāvāmi manaḥ me saṃpramuhyate

original: 293.029. hṛdayaṃ dahyate caiva rahitasya tayā bhṛśam//18//
analyzed: hṛdayam dahyate ca eva rahitasya tayā

original: 293.030. manobhirāmā ca manoharā ca manonukūlā ca manoratiśca/
analyzed: manobhirāmā ca manoharā ca manonukūlā ca manoratiḥ ca

original: 294.001. <294>saṃtaptadeho 'smi manoharāṃ vinā kuto mamedaṃ vyasanaṃ samāgatam//19// iti/
analyzed: smi manoharām vinā kutas mama idam vyasanam iti
sā kathayati putra
kṛcchra saṃkaṭa sambādha prāptā manoharā iti mayā pratimuktā
amba yathā katham
tayā yathāvṛttam vistareṇa samākhyātam

original: 294.004. sa pitur nairguṇyamakṛtajñatāṃ ca jñātvā kathayati--kutra gatā katareṇa vā patheti?
analyzed: sa pituḥ nairguṇyam akṛtajña tām ca jñātvā kathayati kutra gatā katareṇa vā pathā iti
sā kathayati
eṣa u sau parvata śailaḥ ṛṣi saṃgha niṣevitaḥ

original: 294.007. uṣito dharmarājena yatra yātā manoharā//20// iti/
analyzed: uṣitaḥ dharmarājena yatra yātāḥ iti
sa manoharā viyoga duḥkha ārtaḥ kṛcchram vilalāpa
karuṇam paridevate
manoharām na paśyāmi manoratha guṇaiḥ yutām
sādhu rūpa samāyuktā kva gatā me
manasā saṃpradhāvāmi manaḥ me saṃpramuhyate

original: 294.012. hṛdayaṃ dahyate caiva rahitasya tayā bhṛśam//22//
analyzed: hṛdayam dahyate ca eva rahitasya tayā

original: 294.013. manobhirāmā ca manoharā ca manonukūlā ca manoratiśca/
analyzed: manobhirāmā ca manoharā ca manonukūlā ca manoratiḥ ca

original: 294.015. saṃtaptadeho 'smi manoharāṃ vinā kuto mamedaṃ vyasanaṃ samāgatam//23// iti/
analyzed: saṃtapta dehaḥ smi manoharām vinā kutas mama idam vyasanam iti
tatas mātrā abhihitaḥ putra
santi asmin antaḥpure tad viśiṣṭatarāḥ striyaḥ
kimartham śokaḥ triyate iti
kumāraḥ kathayati kutas me ratiḥ anuprāpyatām iti

original: sa tayā samāśvāsyamāno 'pi śokasaṃtāpasaṃtaptastasyāḥ pravṛttiṃ samanveṣamāṇa itaścāmutaśca paribhramitumārabdhaḥ/

original: 307.002. ekasmin samaye bhagavāñ śrāvastyāṃ viharati sma jetavane 'nāthapiṇḍadasyārāme mahatā bhikṣusaṃghena sārdhamardhatrayodaśabhirbhikṣuśataiḥ/

original: 307.003. satkṛto bhagavān gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito bhikṣubhibhikṇyupāsakopāsikai rājñā
analyzed: satkṛtaḥ bhagavān gurukṛtaḥ mānitaḥ pūjitaḥ bhikṣu bhi bhikṇī upāsaka upāsikaiḥ rājñā
rājamātraiḥ nānā vaṇij śramaṇa brāhmaṇa parivrājaka naigama janapadaiḥ nāgaiḥ yakṣaiḥ gandharvaiḥ asuraga tuḍa kinnara mahoragaiḥ

original: 307.005. lābhī ca bhagavān prabhutānāṃ praṇītānāṃ cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārāṇāṃ divyānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca,
analyzed: lābhī ca bhagavān prabhutānām praṇītānām cīvara piṇḍapāta śayana āsana glāna pratyaya bhaiṣajya pariṣkārāṇām divyānām ca manuṣyāṇām ca
taiḥ ca bhagavān an upaliptaḥ padmam iva vāriṇā

original: 307.007. tena khalu punaḥ samayena ayameva bhagavato 'nurūpa udāraḥ kalyāṇakīrtiśabda
analyzed: tena khalu punar samayena ayam eva bhagavataḥ nurūpaḥ udāraḥ kalyāṇa kīrti śabda
ślokaḥ bhyudgata hitī api sa bhagavān tathāgataḥ rhan samyaksambuddhaḥ vidyā caraṇa sampannaḥ

original: sugato lokavidanuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devānāṃ ca buddho bhagavān /
analyzed: sugataḥ loka vid anuttaraḥ puruṣa damya sārathiḥ śāstā devānām ca buddhaḥ bhagavān

original: 307.010. sa imāṃ sadevakaṃ samārakaṃ sabrahmakaṃ saśramaṇabrāhmaṇīṃ prajāṃ sadevamanuṣīṃ svayamabhijñāya sākṣātkṛtvopasampadya viharati/
analyzed: saḥ imām sa devakam sa mārakam sa brahmakam sa śramaṇa brāhmaṇīm prajām sa deva manuṣīm svayam abhijñāya sākṣātkṛtvā upasampadya viharati

original: 307.011. sa dharmaṃ deśayatyādau kalyāṇaṃ madhye kalyāṇāṃ paryavasāne kalyāṇam/
analyzed: sa dharmam deśayati ādau kalyāṇam madhye kalyāṇām paryavasāne kalyāṇam

original: 307.012. svarthaṃ suvyañjanaṃ kevalaṃ paripūrṇaṃ pariśuddhaṃ paryavadātaṃ brahmacaryaṃ saṃprakāśayati sma/
analyzed: su artham su vyañjanam kevalam paripūrṇam pariśuddham paryavadātam brahmacaryam saṃprakāśayati sma

original: 307.013. tatra bhagavān bhikṣūnāmantrayate sma--evaṃ ca bhikṣavaḥ sattvā jānīyuh--dānaṃ dānaphalaṃ dānasaṃvibhāgasya ca vipākam,
analyzed: tatra bhagavān bhikṣūn āmantrayate sma evam ca bhikṣavaḥ sattvāḥ jānīyuḥ dānam dāna phalam dāna saṃvibhāgasya ca vipākam

original: apīdānīm yo 'sau caramaḥ kavalaḥ paścima ālopaḥ,
analyzed: api idānīm yaḥ sau caramaḥ kavalaḥ paścimaḥ ālopaḥ
tam api na a saṃvibhajya pariṣva ātmanā vā paribhuñjīran

original: na cotpannaṃ mātsaryaṃ cittaṃ paryādāya tiṣṭheyuḥ/
analyzed: na ca utpannam mātsaryam cittam paryādāya tiṣṭheyuḥ

original: 307.016. yasmāttarhi bhikṣavaḥ sattvā na jānanti dānasya phalaṃ dānasaṃvibhāgasya ca phalavipākam yathāhaṃ jāne dānasya phalaṃ dānasaṃvibhāgasya  #
analyzed: yasmāt tarhi bhikṣavaḥ sattvāḥ na jānanti dānasya phalam dāna saṃvibhāgasya ca phala vipākam yathā aham jāne dānasya phalam dāna saṃvibhāgasya
ca phala vipākam

original: tasmātsattvā yo 'sau caramaḥ kavalaḥ paścima ālopaḥ,
analyzed: tasmāt sattvāḥ sau caramaḥ kavalaḥ paścimaḥ ālopaḥ
tam eva a dattvā imam a saṃvibhajya pareṣu ātmanā vā paribhuñjate

original: utpannaṃ cauṣāṃ mātsaryamalaṃ cittaṃ paryādāya tiṣṭhati//
analyzed: utpannam ca oṣām mātsarya malam cittam paryādāya tiṣṭhati

original: 307.020. bhikṣavaḥ sarvasaṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayānāṃ chettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantamapṛcchan--āścaryaṃ bhadanta yāvacca bhagavata etarhi yācakāḥ
analyzed: bhikṣavaḥ sarva saṃśaya jātāḥ sarva saṃśayānām chettāram buddham bhagavantam apṛcchan āścaryam bhadanta yāvat ca bhagavataḥ etarhi yācakāḥ
na bhikṣavaḥ etarhi mama
yathā atīte pi adhvani yācanakāḥ priyāḥ
tat crūyatām

original: 307.023. bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'tīte 'dhvanyuttarāpatheṣu janapadeṣu utpalāvatī nāṃ nagarī rājadhānī babhūva ṛddhā ca sphaītā ca kṣemā ca ākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyā
analyzed: bhūta pūrvam bhikṣavaḥ tīte dhvani uttarāpatheṣu janapadeṣu utpalāvatī nām nagarī rājadhānī babhūva ṛddhā ca sphaītā ca kṣemā ca ākīrṇa bahu jana manuṣyā

original: 307.024. athāpareṇa samayena utpalāvatyāṃ nagararājadhānyāṃ durbhikṣamabhūd durjīvaṃ durlabhapiṇḍaṃ nasukaramapatāne pragrahaṇe yāpayitum/
analyzed: atha apareṇa samayena utpalāvatyām nagara rājadhānyām durbhikṣam abhūt durjīvam durlabha piṇḍam nasukaram apatāne pragrahaṇe yāpayitum

original: 307.026. tena khalu samayenotpalāvatyāṃ rājadhānyāṃ rūpāvatī nāma strī babhūva abhirūpā darśanīyā prāsādikā śubhavarṇapuṣkalanayā samanvāgatā/
analyzed: tena khalu samayena utpalāvatyām rājadhānyām rūpāvatī nāma strī babhūva abhirūpā darśanīyā prāsādikā śubha varṇa puṣkala nayā samanvāgatā

original: 307.027. atha rūpāvatī strī svānniveśanānniṣkramya utpalāvatyāṃ rājadhānyāṃ jaṅghāvihāramanukrāmati/
analyzed: atha rūpāvatī strī svāt niveśanāt niṣkramya utpalāvatyām rājadhānyām jaṅghāvihāram anukrāmati
anyatarat apavarakam prāviśat

original: 307.028. tasmin khalu samaye tasminnapavarake strī prasūtā,
analyzed: tasmin khalu samaye tasmin apavarake strī prasūtā

original: dārakaṃ prajātā abhirūpaṃ prāsādikaṃ śubhavarṇapuṣkalatayā samanvāgatam/
analyzed: dārakam prajātāḥ abhirūpam prāsādikam śubha varṇa puṣkala tayā samanvāgatam

original: 307.030. taṃ sā strī kṣutkṣāmaparītā raikṣacittā dārakaṃ gṛhṇāti,
analyzed: tam sā strī kṣudh kṣāma parītā raikṣa cittā dārakam gṛhṇāti
icchati ca svāni putra māṃsāni bhikṣayitum

original: 307.031. tāṃ dṛṣṭvā rūpāvatī strī etadavovat--kimidaṃ bhagini kartukāmāsi?
analyzed: tām dṛṣṭvā rūpāvatī strī etat avovat kim idam bhagini kartu kāmā asi
sā āha jighatsitā asmi bhagini
icchāmi svakāni putra māṃsāni

original: 308.001. rūpāvatī āha--tenabhagini niveśane kiṃcitsaṃvidyate 'nnaṃ vā pānaṃ vā bhojanaṃ vā svādanīyaṃ vā?
analyzed: rūpāvatī niveśane kiṃcid saṃvidyate nnam vā pānam vā bhojanam vā svādanīyam vā
durlabhaḥ putra śabdaḥ lokasya

original: 308.002. na me bhagini kiṃcitsaṃvidyate niveśane annaṃ vā pānaṃ vā khādyaṃ vā bhojanaṃ vā svādanīyaṃ vā lehyaṃ vā/
analyzed: na me bhagini kiṃcid saṃvidyate niveśane annam vā pānam vā khādyam vā bhojanam vā svādanīyam vā lehyam vā
durlabham jīvitam lokasya
rūpāvati āhatena hi bhagini muhūrtam āgamaya
yāvat aham niveśanam gatvā tava arthāya bhojanam ānayiṣyāmi
sā āha yat khalu bhagini jānīyāt kukṣiḥ me lupyati
pṛthivī me sphuṭati
hṛdayam me dhūmāyati
diśaḥ me na pratibhānti

original: 308.006. na tāvattvaṃ dvāraśālāyā nirgatā bhaviṣyasi yāvanme vāyava ākramiṣyanti/
analyzed: na tāvat tvam dvāra śālāyāḥ nirgatā bhaviṣyasi yāvat me vāyavaḥ ākramiṣyanti

original: 308.007. yathā rūpāvatyā etadabhavat--yadi dārakaṃ gṛhītvā gamiṣyāmi,
analyzed: yathā rūpāvatyāḥ etat abhavat adi dārakam gṛhītvā gamiṣyāmi
eṣā strī kṣudh kṣāma parītā kālam kariṣyati
atha dārakam apahāya yāsyāmi
niyatam dārakam bhakṣayiṣyati
yathā katham punar mama kurvantyāḥ dvayoḥ jīvita lābhaḥ syāt

original: tasyā etadabhavat--anaparādhyāśayavati saṃsāre bahūni duḥkhānyanubhūtāni asakṛ nnarakeṣvasakṛttiryakṣvasakṛd
analyzed: tasyāḥ etat abhavatan apara adhyāśayavati saṃsāre bahūni duḥkhāni anubhūtāni asakṛt narakeṣu asakṛt tiryakṣu asakṛt

original: yamaloke 'sakṛ nmanuṣyalokeṣu hastacchedāḥ pādacchedāḥ karṇacchedā karṇanāsācchedā
analyzed: yama loke sakṛt n manuṣya lokeṣu hasta chedāḥ pāda chedāḥ karṇa chedā karṇa nāsā chedā
aṅga pratyaṅga chedāḥ tathā anyāni vividhāni bahūni

original: 308.012. ko mayā tenārtho 'nuprāpto yadā āhamātmanaḥ sthāmaṃ ca balaṃ ca vīryaṃ ca saṃjanayitvā imāṃ striyaṃ svena rudhireṇa māṃsena saṃtarpya  #
analyzed: kaḥ mayā tena arthaḥ nuprāptaḥ yadā ā aham ātmanaḥ sthāmam ca balam ca vīryam ca saṃjanayitvā imām striyam svena rudhireṇa māṃsena saṃtarpya
imam dārakam parimocayeyam

original: 308.014. rūpāvatī pṛcchati--asti te bhagini niveśane śastram?
analyzed: rūpāvatī pṛcchati asti te bhagini niveśane śastram
sā strī āha asti iti
tena hi yatra bhavati
tat upadarśaya
sā tam pradeśam upadarśayāmāsa

original: 308.016. tato rūpāvatyā svayameva śastraṃ tīkṣṇaṃ gṛhītvā tau stanau cchittvā tāṃ striyaṃ svakena māṃsarudhireṇa saṃtarpayati sma/
analyzed: tatas rūpāvatyā svayam eva śastram tīkṣṇam gṛhītvā tau stanau chittvā tām striyam svakena māṃsa rudhireṇa saṃtarpayati sma

original: 308.017. saṃtarpya ca tāṃ striyametadavocat--yatkhalu bhagini jānīyāh--ayaṃ dārako mayā svakena māṃsarudhireṇa krītaḥ/
analyzed: saṃtarpya ca tām striyam etat avocat yat khalu bhagini jānīyāha yam dārakaḥ mayā svakena māṃsa rudhireṇa krītaḥ

original: 308.018. sāhaṃ tava nikṣepamanuprayacchāmi--mā bhūyo dārakaṃ bhakṣayiṣyasi,
analyzed: sā aham tava nikṣepam anuprayacchāmi imāḥ bhūyas dārakam bhakṣayiṣyasi
yāvat aham niveśanam gatvā tava arthāya bhojanam ānayiṣyāmi
sā āha adya tāvan bhūyas

original: 308.020. atha rūpāvatī strī rudhireṇoddharatā yena svaṃ niveśanaṃ tenopasaṃkrāntā/
analyzed: atha rūpāvatī strī rudhireṇa uddharatā yena svam niveśanam tena upasaṃkrāntā
adrākṣīt rūpāvatyāḥ striyāḥ svāmī rūpāvatīm

original: strīṃ rudhireṇoddharatā pradharatā dūrata eva agacchantīm/
analyzed: strīm rudhireṇa uddharatā pradharatā dūratas eva a gacchantīm

original: 308.022. dṛṣṭvā ca punā rūpāvatīmetadavocat--kenedamevamrūpaṃ rūpāvati viprakāraṃ kṛtam?
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā ca punar rūpāvatīm etat avocat kena idam evam rūpam rūpāvati viprakāram kṛtam
sautām prakṛtim vistareṇa ārocayati sma

original: 308.023. ārocayitvā etadavocat--prajñapaya āryaputra tasyā striyā bhaktam/
analyzed: ārocayitvā etat avocat prajñapaya āryaputra tasyāḥ striyāḥ bhaktam
saḥ āha prajñapaya ārya duhitar tasyāḥ bhaktam
api tu satya vacanam tāvat kariṣyāmi

original: 308.024. yenāryaduhitaḥ satyena satyavacanena ayamevamrūpa āścaryādbhuto dharmo na kadācid dṛṣṭo vā śruto vā,
analyzed: yena ārya duhitar satyena satya vacanena ayam evamrūpaḥ āścarya adbhutaḥ dharmaḥ na kadācid dṛṣṭaḥ vā śrutaḥ vā

original: tena satyena satyavacanena ubhau tava stanau yathāpaurāṇau prādurbhavetām/
analyzed: tena satyena satya vacanena ubhau tava stanau yathāpaurāṇau prādurbhavetām

original: 308.026. sahakṛtenāsminnevamrūpe satyavacane tasyā asminneva kṣaṇe ubhau stanau yathāpaurāṇau prādurbhūtau//
analyzed: sahakṛtena asmin evamrūpe satyavacane tasyāḥ asmin eva kṣaṇe ubhau stanau yathāpaurāṇau prādurbhūtau

original: 308.028. atha śakrasya devānāmindrasyaitadabhavat--atityāgo 'tityāgagauravatā yā rūpāvatyā striyā kṛtaḥ/
analyzed: atha śakrasya devānām indrasya etat abhavata tityāgo tityāga gauravatā yā rūpāvatyā striyā kṛtaḥ

original: 308.029. mā haiva sā rūpāvatī strī ataḥ śakrabhavanāccyāvayet/
analyzed: mā ha eva sā rūpāvatī strī atas śakra bhavanāt cyāvayet
yat nu aham enām mīmāṃseyam
atha śakraḥ deva indraḥ udāra brāhmaṇa rūpam ātmānam abhinirmāya sauvarṇa daṇḍa kamaṇḍalum ādāya

original: suvarṇadaṇḍena maṇivālavyajanena vījyamānastadyathā balavān puruṣaḥ saṃmiñjitaṃ bāhuṃ
analyzed: suvarṇa daṇḍena maṇi vāla vyajanena vījyamānaḥ tat yathā balavān puruṣaḥ saṃmiñjitam bāhum
prasārayet prasāritam saṃmiñjayet

original: evameva śakro devānāmindro deveṣu trāyastriṃśeṣvantarhita utpalāvatyām <309>rājadhānyāṃ pratyasthāt/
analyzed: evam eva śakraḥ devānām indraḥ deveṣu trāyastriṃśeṣu antarhitaḥ utpalāvatyām pratyasthāt

original: 309.001. atha śakro devānāmindra utpalāvatyāṃ rājadhānyāṃ bhaikṣyamanvāhiṇḍan yana rūpāvatyāḥ striyā niveśanaṃ tenopasaṃkramya dvāri sthitvā
analyzed: atha śakraḥ devānām indraḥ utpalāvatyām rājadhānyām bhaikṣyam anvāhiṇḍan rūpāvatyāḥ striyāḥ niveśanam tena upasaṃkramya dvāri sthitvā

original: 309.002. tato rūpāvatī strī bhaikṣamādāya yena sa brāhmaṇaveṣadharaḥ śakraḥ,
analyzed: tatas rūpāvatī strī bhaikṣam ādāya yena sa brāhmaṇa veṣa dharaḥ śakraḥ
tena upasaṃkramya bhaikṣam upanāmayate

original: 309.003. atha sa śakro devānāmindro rūpāvatīṃ striyametadvocat--satyaṃ te rūpāvari dārakasyārthāyobhau stanau parityaktau?
analyzed: atha sa śakraḥ devānām indraḥ rūpāvatīm striyam etat vocat satyam te rūpāvari dārakasya arthāya ubhau stanau parityaktau
sā āhaārya brāhmaṇa satyam

original: 309.005. sa tāmāh--evaṃ te rūpāvatī ubhau stanau parityajāmīti parityajantyāḥ parityajya vā abhūccittasya vipratisārah?
analyzed: sa tām āha ivam te rūpāvatī ubhau stanau parityajāmi iti parityajantyāḥ parityajya vai abhūt cittasya vipratisāraḥ

original: sā āha--na me ubhau stanau parityajantyā abhūccittasya vipratisāraḥ/
analyzed: sā āhana me ubhau stanau parityajantyāḥ abhūt cittasya vipratisāraḥ
śakra aha atra kaḥ śraddhāsyati
rūpāvatyā ahatena hi brāhmaṇa satya vacanam kariṣyāmi

original: 309.008. yena satyena brahman satyavacanenobhau stanau parityajāmīti parityajantyāḥ parityajya vā nābhūccittasyānyathātvam,
analyzed: yena satyena brahman satya vacanena ubhau stanau parityajāmi iti parityajantyāḥ parityajya vā na abhūt cittasya anyathātvam
na abhūt cittasya vipratisāraḥ

original: api ca brahman yena satyena mayā dārakasyārthāyobhau stanau parityaktau,
analyzed: api ca brahman yena satyena mayā dārakasya arthāya ubhau stanau parityaktau

original: na rājyārthaṃ na bhogārthaṃ na śakrārthaṃ na rājñāṃ cakravartināṃ viṣayārthaṃ nānyatrāhamanuttarāṃ samyaksambodhimabhisambudhya adāntān damayeyam,
analyzed: na rājya artham na bhoga artham na śakra artham na rājñām cakravartinām viṣaya artham na anyatra aham anuttarām samyaksambodhim abhisambudhya a dāntān damayeyam
a muktān mocayeyam
an āśvastā an āśvāsayeyam
a parinirvṛtān parinirvāpayeyam

original: tena satyena satyavacanena mama strīndriyamantardhāya puruṣendriyaṃ prādurbhavet/
analyzed: tena satyena satya vacanena mama strī indriyam antardhāya puruṣa indriyam prādurbhavet
tasyāḥ tasmin eva kṣaṇe strī indriyam antarhitam
puruṣa indriyam prādurbhūtam

original: 309.014. atha khalu śakro devendrastuṣṭa udagra āttamanāḥ pramuditaḥ prītisaumanasyajātas tata eva ṛddhyā vaihāyasamabhyudgamyodānamudānayati--rūpāvatyāḥ
analyzed: atha khalu śakraḥ deva indraḥ tuṣṭaḥ udagraḥ ātta manāḥ pramuditaḥ prīti saumanasya jātaḥ tatas eva ṛddhyā vaihāyasam abhyudgamya udānam udānayati rūpāvatyāḥ
puruṣa indriyam prādurbhūtam

original: 309.016. rūpāvatyāḥ striyo rūpāvataḥ kumāra iti saṃjñā utpāditā//
analyzed: rūpāvatyāḥ striyaḥ rūpāvataḥ kumāraḥ iti saṃjñā utpāditā

original: 309.018. athāpareṇa samayenopalāvatyāṃ rājadhānyāṃ nagaryāṃ rājā aputraḥ kālagataḥ/
analyzed: atha apareṇa samayena upalāvatyām rājadhānyām nagaryām rājā aputraḥ kālagataḥ

original: 309.018. tatra piṇḍatajātīyānāṃ mahāmātrāṇāmetadabhūt--yannu vayamutpalāvatyāṃ rāhadhānyāṃ rāhānaṃ sthāpayema/
analyzed: tatra piṇḍata jātīyānām mahāmātrāṇām etat abhūti annu vayam utpalāvatyām rāhadhānyām rāhānam sthāpayema
teṣām etat abhūt na anyatra rūpāvata kumārāt kṛta puṇyāt kṛta kuśalāt

original: 309.020. te rūpāvataṃ kumāramutpalāvatyāṃ rājadhānyāṃ rājānaṃ sthāpayanti/

original: 334.021. kṛttikā bhoḥ puṣkarasārin nakṣatraṃ ṣaṭtāraṃ kṣurasaṃsthānaṃ triṃśanmuhūrtayogaṃ dadhyāhāramagnidaivataṃ vaiśyāyanīyaṃ gotreṇa/

original: 334.022. rohiṇīnakṣatraṃ pañcatārakaṃ śakaṭākṛtisaṃsthānaṃ pañcacatvāriṃśanmuhūrtayogaṃ mṛgamāṃsāhāraṃ prajāpatidaivataṃ bhāradvājaṃ gotreṇa/
analyzed: rohiṇī nakṣatram pañca tārakam śakaṭa ākṛti saṃsthānam pañcacatvāriṃśat muhūrta yogam mṛga māṃsa āhāram prajāpati daivatam bhāradvājam gotreṇa

original: 334.023. mṛgāśirānakṣatraṃ tritāraṃ mṛgaśīrṣasaṃsthānaṃ triṃśanmuhūrtayogaṃ phalamūlāhāraṃ somadaivataṃ mṛgāyaṇīyaṃ gotreṇa/
analyzed: mṛgāśirā nakṣatram tri tāram mṛgaśīrṣa saṃsthānam triṃśat muhūrta yogam phala mūla āhāram soma daivatam mṛgāyaṇīyam gotreṇa

original: 334.024. ārdrānakṣatramekatāraṃ tilakasaṃsthānaṃ pañcadaśamuhūrtayogaṃ sarpirmaṇḍāhāraṃ sūryadaivataṃ hārītāyanīyaṃ gotreṇa/
analyzed: ārdrā nakṣatram eka tāram tilaka saṃsthānam pañcadaśa muhūrta yogam sarpiḥ maṇḍa āhāram sūrya daivatam hārītāyanīyam gotreṇa

original: 334.026. punarvasunakṣatraṃ dvitāraṃ padasaṃsthānaṃ pañcacatvāriṃśanmuhūrtayogaṃ madhyāhāram aditidaivataṃ vāsiṣṭhaṃ gotreṇa/
analyzed: punarvasu nakṣatram dvi tāram pada saṃsthānam pañcacatvāriṃśat muhūrta yogam madhyāhāram aditi daivatam vāsiṣṭham gotreṇa

original: 334.027. puṣyanakṣatraṃ tritāraṃ vardhamānasaṃsthānaṃ triṃśanmuhūrtayogaṃ madhumaṇḍāhāraṃ bṛhaspatidaivatam aupamanyavīyaṃ gotreṇa/
analyzed: puṣya nakṣatram tri tāram vardhamāna saṃsthānam triṃśat muhūrta yogam madhumaṇḍa āhāram bṛhaspati daivatam aupamanyavīyam gotreṇa

original: 334.028. āśleṣānakṣatramekatāraṃ tilakasaṃsthānaṃ pañcadaśamuhūrtayogaṃ pāyasabhojanaṃ sarpadaivataṃ maitrāyaṇīyaṃ gotreṇa/

original: 335.001. pūrvaphalgunīnakṣatraṃ dvitāraṃ padakasaṃsthānaṃ triṃśanmuhūrtayogaṃ bilvabhojanaṃ bhavadaivataṃ gautamīyaṃ gotreṇa/

original: 335.002. uttaraphalgunīnakṣatraṃ dvitāraṃ padakasaṃsthānaṃ pañcacatvāriṃśanmuhūrtayogaṃ godhūmamatsyāhāramaryamādaivataṃ kauśikaṃ gotreṇa/
analyzed: uttara phalgunī nakṣatram dvi tāram padaka saṃsthānam pañcacatvāriṃśat muhūrta yogam godhūma matsya āhāram aryamā daivatam kauśikam gotreṇa

original: 335.003. hastanakṣatraṃ pañcatāraṃ hastasaṃsthānaṃ triṃśanmuhūrtayogaṃ śyāmākabhojanaṃ sūryadaivataṃ kāśyapaṃ gotreṇa/

original: 335.004. citrānakṣatramekatāraṃ tilakasaṃsthānaṃ triṃśanmuhūrtayogaṃ mudgakṛsaraghṛtapūpāhāraṃ tvaṣṭṛdaivataṃ kātyāyanīyaṃ gotreṇa/
analyzed: citrā nakṣatram eka tāram tilaka saṃsthānam triṃśat muhūrta yogam mudga kṛsara ghṛta pūpa āhāram tvaṣṭṛ daivatam kātyāyanīyam gotreṇa

analyzed: svātī nakṣatram eka tāram tilaka saṃsthānam pañcadaśa muhūrta yogam mudga kṛsara phala āhāram vāyu daivatam kātyāyanīyam gotreṇa

original: 335.007. viśākhānakṣatraṃ dvitāraṃ viṣāṇasaṃsthānaṃ pañcacatvāriṃśanmuhūrtayogaṃ tilapuṣpāhāramindrāgnidaivataṃ śākhāyanīyaṃ gotreṇa/
analyzed: viśākhā nakṣatram dvi tāram viṣāṇa saṃsthānam pañcacatvāriṃśat muhūrta yogam tila puṣpa āhāram indra agni daivatam śākhāyanīyam gotreṇa
iti etāni bhoḥ puṣkarasārin sapta nakṣatrāṇi dakṣiṇa dvārakāṇi

original: 335.009. anurādhānakṣatraṃ catustāraṃ ratnāvalīsaṃsthānaṃ triṃśanmuhūrtayogaṃ surāmāṃsāhāraṃ mitradaivatamālambāyanīyaṃ gotreṇa/
analyzed: anurādhā nakṣatram catur tāram ratnāvalī saṃsthānam triṃśat muhūrta yogam surā māṃsa āhāram mitra daivatam ālambāyanīyam gotreṇa

original: 335.010. jyeṣṭhānakṣatraṃ tritāram yavamadhyasaṃsthānaṃ pañcadaśamuhūrtayogaṃ śāliyavāgūbhojanamindradaivataṃ dīrghakātyāyanīyaṃ gotreṇa/
analyzed: jyeṣṭhā nakṣatram tri tāram yava madhya saṃsthānam pañcadaśa muhūrta yogam śāli yavāgū bhojanam indra daivatam dīrghakātyāyanīyam gotreṇa

original: 335.011. mūlanakṣatraṃ saptatāraṃ vṛścikasaṃsthānaṃ triṃśanmuhūrtayogaṃ mūlaphalāhāraṃ nairṛtidaivataṃ kātyāyanīyaṃ gotreṇa/
analyzed: mūlanakṣatram sapta tāram vṛścika saṃsthānam triṃśat muhūrta yogam mūla phala āhāram nairṛti daivatam kātyāyanīyam gotreṇa

original: 335.012. pūrvāṣāḍhānakṣatraṃ catustāraṃ govikramasaṃsthānaṃ triṃśanmuhūrtayogaṃ nyagrodhakaṣāyāhāraṃ toyadaivataṃ darbhakātyāyanīyaṃ gotreṇa/
analyzed: pūrvāṣāḍhā nakṣatram catur tāram govikrama saṃsthānam triṃśat muhūrta yogam nyagrodha kaṣāya āhāram toya daivatam darbhakātyāyanīyam gotreṇa

original: 335.013. uttarāṣāḍhānakṣatraṃ catustāraṃ gajavikramasaṃsthānaṃ pañcacatvāriṃśanmuhūrtayogaṃ madhulājāhāraṃ viśvadaivataṃ maudgalāyanīyaṃ gotreṇa/
analyzed: uttara āṣāḍhā nakṣatram catur tāram gajavikrama saṃsthānam pañcacatvāriṃśat muhūrta yogam madhula aja āhāram viśva daivatam maudgalāyanīyam gotreṇa

original: 335.015. abhijinnakṣatraṃ tritāraṃ gośīrṣasaṃsthānaṃ ṣaṇmuhūrtayogaṃ vāyvāhāraṃ brahmadaivataṃ brahmāvatīyaṃ gotreṇa/
analyzed: abhijit nakṣatram tri tāram gośīrṣa saṃsthānam ṣaṣ muhūrta yogam vāyu āhāram brahma daivatam brahmāvatīyam gotreṇa

original: 335.016. śravaṇānakṣatraṃ tritāram yavamadhyasaṃsthānaṃ triṃśanmuhūrtayogaṃ pakṣimāṃsāhāraṃ viṣṇudaivataṃ kātyāyanīyaṃ gotreṇa/
analyzed: śravaṇā nakṣatram tri tāram yava madhya saṃsthānam triṃśat muhūrta yogam pakṣi māṃsa āhāram viṣṇu daivatam kātyāyanīyam gotreṇa

original: 335.017. ityetāni bhoḥ puṣkarasārin sapta nakṣatrāṇi paścimadvārakāṇi//
analyzed: iti etāni bhoḥ puṣkarasārin sapta nakṣatrāṇi paścima dvārakāṇi

original: 335.019. dhaniṣṭhānakṣatraṃ catustāraṃ śakunasaṃsthānaṃ triṃśanmuhūrtayogaṃ kulatthapūpāhāraṃ vasudaivataṃ kauṇḍinyāyanīyaṃ gotreṇa/
analyzed: dhaniṣṭhā nakṣatram catur tāram śakuna saṃsthānam triṃśat muhūrta yogam kulattha pūpa āhāram vasu daivatam kauṇḍinyāyanīyam gotreṇa

original: 335.020. śatabhiṣānakṣatramekatāraṃ tilakasaṃsthānaṃ pañcadaśamuhūrtayogam yavāgubhojanaṃ varuṇadaivataṃ tāṇḍyāyanīyaṃ gotreṇa/
analyzed: śatabhiṣā nakṣatram eka tāram tilaka saṃsthānam pañcadaśa muhūrta yogam yavāgu bhojanam varuṇa daivatam tāṇḍyāyanīyam gotreṇa

original: 335.021. pūrvabhādrapadānakṣatraṃ dvitāraṃ padakasaṃsthānaṃ triṃśanmuhūrtayogaṃ māṃsarudhirāhāramahirbudhnyadaivataṃ jātūkarṇyaṃ gotreṇa/
analyzed: pūrvabhādrapadā nakṣatram dvi tāram padaka saṃsthānam triṃśat muhūrta yogam māṃsa rudhira āhāram ahirbudhnya daivatam jātūkarṇyam gotreṇa

original: 335.022. uttarabhādrapadānakṣatraṃ dvitāraṃ padakasaṃsthānaṃ pañcacatvāriṃśanmuhūrtayogaṃ māṃsāhāram aryamādaivataṃ dhyānadrāhyāyaṇīyaṃ gotreṇa/
analyzed: uttara bhādrapada nakṣatram dvi tāram padaka saṃsthānam pañcacatvāriṃśat muhūrta yogam māṃsa āhāram aryamā daivatam dhyānadrāhyāyaṇīyam gotreṇa

original: 335.024. revatīnakṣatramekatāraṃ tilakasaṃsthānaṃ triṃśanmuhūrtayogaṃ madhupāyasabhojanaṃ gandharvadaivataṃ maitrāyaṇīyaṃ gotreṇa/
analyzed: revatī nakṣatram eka tāram tilaka saṃsthānam triṃśat muhūrta yogam madhu pāyasa bhojanam gandharva daivatam maitrāyaṇīyam gotreṇa

original: 335.026. bharaṇīnakṣatraṃ tritāraṃ bhagasaṃsthānaṃ triṃśanmuhūrtayogaṃ tilataṇḍulāhāram yamadaivataṃ bhārgavīyaṃ gotreṇa/
analyzed: bharaṇī nakṣatram tri tāram bhaga saṃsthānam triṃśat muhūrta yogam tila taṇḍula āhāram yama daivatam bhārgavīyam gotreṇa

original: 335.027. ityetāni bhoḥ puṣkarasārin sapta nakṣatrāṇi uttaradvārakāṇi//
analyzed: iti etāni bhoḥ puṣkarasārin sapta nakṣatrāṇi uttara dvārakāṇi

original: 335.028. amīṣāṃ bhoḥ puṣkarasārinn aṣṭaviṃśatīnāṃ nakṣatrāṇāṃ ṣaṇnakṣatrāṇi pañcacatvāriṃśanmuhūrtayogāni/

analyzed: caityāḥ yatra prakampante hasanti ca namanti ca
sa rāṣṭraḥ kṣitipaḥ tatra
śrāvaṇe kampate bhūmiḥ pūrvabhādrapada āsthite

original: 374.008. sadā parājito rājā caurai rāṣṭre ca vadhyate//456//
analyzed: sadā parājitaḥ rājā cauraiḥ rāṣṭre ca
kārtike kṣiti kampena yadā caityam viśīryate

original: 374.010. dvāraṃ vā nagarasyātha bhūyiṣṭhaṃ naśyate prajā//457//
analyzed: dvāram vā nagarasya atha bhūyiṣṭham naśyate

original: 374.011. vāme vā dakṣiṇe cendoḥ śṛṅge tiṣṭhed bṛhaspatiḥ/
analyzed: vāme vā dakṣiṇe ca indoḥ śṛṅge tiṣṭhet bṛhaspatiḥ
mahā bhogāḥ vinaśyeyuḥ prakāśāḥ
sūryācandramasoḥ śṛṅge lohita aṅgaḥ yadā āruhet
śrūra akṣa mantrikāt pīḍām pratyantānām
śanaiścaraḥ yadā śṛṅge somasya abhiruhet tadā

original: 374.016. jñeyaṃ rogabhayaṃ ghoraṃ durbhikṣaṃ cātra nirdiśet//460//
analyzed: jñeyam roga bhayam ghoram durbhikṣam ca atra
rāhuṇā nigṛhītaḥ tu ca ulkayā hanyate śaśī
ṣaṣ māsa abhyantarāt tatra rājñaḥ

original: 374.019. yasya caivātha nakṣare śaśī sūryo vigṛhyate/
analyzed: yasya ca eva atha nakṣare śaśī sūryaḥ vigṛhyate
rāhuṇā kṣitipaḥ rājyaiḥ saha

original: 374.021. rājño vai cātha nakṣatre candraṃ keturyadā viśet/
analyzed: rājñaḥ vai ca atha nakṣatre candram ketuḥ yadā viśet
pratyanta rājabhiḥ sārdham śastra mūrcchām
candra madhya gataḥ śukraḥ phālgunyā atha maghā yadā
sarva dhānyāni śuṣyeyuḥ tadā rogam
bṛhaspatiḥ ca śukraḥ ca lohitāṅgaḥ śanaiścaraḥ
likhyanti somaśṛṅgasya tadā
dhūmaketuḥ mahābhāgaḥ puṣyam āruhya tiṣṭhati
caturdiśam tadā vidyāt para cakraiḥ

original: 374.029. maghāyāṃ lohitāṅgo vā śravaṇe vā bṛhaspatiḥ/
analyzed: maghāyām lohita aṅgaḥ vā śravaṇe vā bṛhaspatiḥ
tiṣṭhet saṃvatsaraḥ trīṇi bhayam
rohiṇyām jyeṣṭhe māse kathaṃcana
vyākuryāt niyatam atra kṣatriyāṇām

original: 375.002. somo vā raviṇā sārdhaṃ paracakrabhayaṃ tadā//469//
analyzed: somaḥ vā raviṇā sārdham para cakra bhayam

original: 375.003. kākāḥ śyenāśca gṛdhrāśca vaseyuḥ sahitā mudā/
analyzed: kākāḥ śyenāḥ ca gṛdhrāḥ ca vaseyuḥ sahitāḥ mudā

original: 375.004. maithunaṃ vāritaṃ veyuḥ paraiḥ saha raṇastadā//470//
analyzed: maithunam vāritam vā iyuḥ paraiḥ saha
śyenaḥ hasti nivāse vā abhirohet punar punar

original: 375.006. paracakreṇa yuddhaṃ tu bhaveccāpi punaḥ punaḥ//471//
analyzed: para cakreṇa yuddham tu bhavet ca api punar
kanyā prasūyate yatra catur hastā catur stanī
strīṇām eva bhavet tatra maraṇam

original: 375.009. garbhasthā dārakā yatra hasanti ca vadanti ca/
analyzed: garbha sthāḥ dārakāḥ yatra hasanti ca vadanti ca
tasya deśasya jānīyāt vināśam
eka pādān tri pādān ca catur aṅgān tathā eva ca
nāryaḥ yatra prasūyante rājñaḥ
sūyante vikṛtān garbhān saṃtānān bhaya vyañjanān

original: 375.014. pramadā yatra deśe tu rājā tatra vinaśyati//475//
analyzed: pramadā yatra deśe tu rājā tatra
laghu hasta śīrṣa mukhān mānuṣam kāyam āśritān

original: 375.016. pramadā yatra sūyante rāṣṭraṃ tatra vinaśyati//476//
analyzed: pramadāḥ yatra sūyante rāṣṭram tatra
kharāḥ ca mahiṣāḥ ca api tathāvidhāḥ

original: 375.018. dvitriśīrṣāḥ prasūyante deśe yatra sa naśyati//477//
analyzed: dvi tri śīrṣāḥ prasūyante deśe yatra sa
śṛgāla śvāna makara haya rūpāḥ ca mānavāḥ

original: 375.020. jāyante yatra deśe tu sa deśo laghu naśyati//478//
analyzed: jāyante yatra deśe tu sa deśaḥ laghu
pādau ubhau yadā vaiśyā gurviṇī saṃprasūyate
deśasya vilayam brūyāt para cakreṇa
pūrva ardhaḥ pakṣi narayoḥ garbhaḥ yatra prasūyate

original: 375.024. rājā vā rājāmātyo vā saha deśena naśyati//480//
analyzed: rājā vā rāja amātyaḥ vā saha deśena
kumbhāṇḍaḥ jāyate yatra caturmukhaḥ
tri netraḥ tri mukhaḥ vā api vidyāt tatra

original: 375.027. saukareṇa tu vaktreṇa śarīraṃ mānuṣam yadi/
analyzed: saukareṇa tu vaktreṇa śarīram mānuṣam yadi

original: 375.028. sūtaṃ caturdiśaṃ rāṣṭraṃ hanyāttatra na saṃśayaḥ//482//
analyzed: sūtam caturdiśam rāṣṭram hanyāt tatra na

original: 375.029. ādityasya tu rūpeṇa mānuṣo yatra jāyate/
analyzed: ādityasya tu rūpeṇa mānuṣaḥ yatra jāyate
vibhramāt sakalam rāṣṭram
bālaḥ tu deśe yatra dvijottamaḥ

original: 376.002. dṛṣṭaḥ pravyāharan vedān kṣipraṃ deśo vinaśyati//484//
analyzed: dṛṣṭaḥ pravyāharan vedān kṣipram

original: 376.003. kukṣiṃ bhittvā yadā bālo garbhānniṣkramate svayam/
analyzed: kukṣim bhittvā yadā bālaḥ garbhāt niṣkramate svayam

original: 376.004. atrāṇāṃ mātaraṃ kṛtvā sa deśo naśyate laghu//485//
analyzed: atrāṇām mātaram kṛtvā sa deśaḥ naśyate
garbha sthāḥ sūkarāḥ uṣṭrāḥ sarpāḥ ca śakuniḥ tathā
strīṇām garbhāt prasūyante deśe tu
pauruṣam gārdabham ca atha saukaram ca artha vigraham
gāvaḥ yatra prasūyante
nārī gṛhṇāti garbham vai adṛṣṭa stana rūpiṇī
vināśam tasya deśasya sa nṛpasya
jaṭī dīrgha nakhaḥ yatra su kṛṣṇaḥ paruṣa chaviḥ

original: 376.012. sa jano jāyate yatra rāṣṭraṃ sādhipatiṃ dahet//489//
analyzed: sa janaḥ jāyate yatra rāṣṭram sa adhipatim
agrīvāḥ danta sahitāḥ jāyante yatra bālakāḥ

original: 376.014. śuṣyeta sakalaṃ śasyaṃ janaśca vilayaṃ vrajet//490//
analyzed: śuṣyeta sakalam śasyam janaḥ ca vilayam
garbhaḥ yatra prasūyate

original: 376.016. svayaṃ kṣubhyeta tadrāṣṭraṃ vinaśyeta na saṃśayaḥ//491//
analyzed: svayam kṣubhyeta tat rāṣṭram vinaśyeta na

original: 376.017. phale phalam yadā paśyetpuṣpe vā puṣpamāśritam/
analyzed: phale phalam yadā paśyet puṣpe vā puṣpam āśritam
garbhāḥ sraveyuḥ nārīṇām yuvarājaḥ ca

original: 376.019. akāle pādapā yatra puṣpyanti ca phalanti ca/
analyzed: akāle pādapāḥ yatra puṣpyanti ca phalanti ca

original: 376.020. latā gulmo 'tha vallī vā deśe tatra bhayaṃ bhavet//493//
analyzed: latā vallī vā deśe tatra bhayam
vṛkṣa upariṣṭāt paśyet vā sravantam ātma śoṇitam
kūjamānam pataṅgam vā tadā

original: 376.023. vṛkṣāṇāṃ maṇḍapānāṃ vā chāyā na parivartate/
analyzed: vṛkṣāṇām maṇḍapānām vā chāyā na parivartate
catur varṇa bhayam tatra kali karma ca
puṣpyeyuḥ pādapāḥ yatra vividhāḥ puṣpa jātayaḥ
kalpavṛkṣa prakṛtayaḥ tatas

original: 376.027. anāvartam yadā puṣpaṃ phalaṃ cāpi pradṛśyate/
analyzed: anāvartam yadā puṣpam phalam ca api pradṛśyate

original: 376.028. vināśaṃ tasya deśasya durbhikṣaṃ kalahaṃ vadet//497//
analyzed: vināśam tasya deśasya durbhikṣam kalaham
sthāna asthānam gatāḥ vṛkṣāḥ dṛśyeyuḥ yatra kutracid
pūrva pratiṣṭhitaḥ rājā nacireṇa
ca saṃgrāmam paśyet adbhuta darśanam
śastram mūrcchayate tatra taskaraiḥ ca api

original: 377.003. kampate rudate śāstā gacchan vā yatra dṛśyate/
analyzed: kampate rudate śāstā gacchan vā yatra dṛśyate
para cakrāt tadā vidyāt atyartham

original: 377.005. devatā yatra deśe tu nṛtyanti ca hasanti ca/
analyzed: devatāḥ yatra deśe tu nṛtyanti ca hasanti ca
aśrūṇi pātayeyuḥ vā tadā

original: 377.007. devatā yatra krīḍanti jvalanti nimiṣanti vā/
analyzed: devatāḥ yatra krīḍanti jvalanti nimiṣanti vā
caleyuḥ athavā yatra
śiva liṅgam yadā kampet gagane vā atha dṛśyate

original: 377.010. nimajjate dharaṇyāṃ vā dhruvaṃ rājavadho bhavet//503//
analyzed: nimajjate dharaṇyām vā dhruvam rāja vadhaḥ
pratimāḥ parivartante dhūmāyante rudanti ca
prasvidyeyuḥ pradhāveyuḥ anyaḥ rājā
acalaḥ vā calet sthānāt calam vā api acalam bhavet

original: 377.014. amātyo hanti rājānaṃ kalahaṃ cātra nirdiśet//505//
analyzed: amātyaḥ hanti rājānam kalaham ca atra

original: 377.015. vamanti rudhiraṃ kanyā namante vā diśo daśa/
analyzed: vamanti rudhiram kanyāḥ namante vā diśaḥ daśa
a yuktāḥ vā pravartante kṣatriyāṇām
varṣate kusumam yatra rakta bindum atha api vā
prāṇinaḥ vividhān vā api vidyāt caura bhayam
yūpāḥ purāṇāḥ nigamāḥ devāgārāṇi cetiyāḥ
nagarāṇi atha dhūmyante kṣipram rājā

original: 377.021. indurvā dīpavṛkṣo vā dīpo yatra na dīpyate/
analyzed: induḥ vā dīpavṛkṣaḥ vā dīpaḥ yatra na dīpyate
rājya kāmaḥ kumāraḥ vā kṣubhyet viṭapakaḥ pi
antaḥpure yadā nīḍam kurvate madhumakṣikāḥ

original: 377.024. astraṃ vāpi gṛhaṃ dahyād rājño vyasanamādiśet//510//
analyzed: astram vā api gṛham dahyāt rājñaḥ
patet antaḥpure vidyut vṛkṣaḥ vā api āśrame tathā

original: 377.026. puri caityacchāyāyāṃ vā rājārthe patitā hi sā//511//
analyzed: puri caitya chāyāyām vā rāja arthe patitā hi
prākāre vā āyudhāgāre gopura āsthānakeṣu vā

original: 377.028. vāyasaḥ kurute nīḍaṃ sāmātyo dhvaṃsate nṛpaḥ//512//
analyzed: vāyasaḥ kurute nīḍam sa amātyaḥ dhvaṃsate
anāhatebhyaḥ tūryebhyaḥ svayam śabdaḥ viniścaret
sva cakra kṣobha doṣeṇa sarvam rāṣṭram
vā patra puṣpa phalāni vā
yadā abhivarṣet tat varṣam cakraiḥ rāṣṭram
madhu phāṇita puṣpāṇi gandha varṣāṇi atha api vā
diśaḥ dāhāḥ ca
meghaḥ samantataḥ garjet upavarṣet sa cātakam
śoṇitam sa karakam syāt tadā

original: 378.007. vidyucca patate ghorā karakāṇāṃ ca varṣaṇam/
analyzed: vidyut ca patate ghorā karakāṇām ca varṣaṇam
gandharvanagaram ca atha dṛṣṭvā
śaśī śoṇita saṃkāśaḥ madhye kṛṣṇaḥ vivarṇavān
sāmantakena pīḍyate vidyā drāṣṭre
pradīpita agni saṃkāśaḥ yadā dṛśyeta candramāḥ

original: 378.012. gaganaṃ dahyate tatra lokapīḍā jvareṇa ca//519//
analyzed: gaganam dahyate tatra loka pīḍā jvareṇa
yadā gairika saṃkāśaḥ kṣipram eva upaśāmyati
varṣaṇasya āgamaḥ vidyāt yadi vāyuḥ
saṃdhyāyām dṛśyeta induḥ ca bhāskaraḥ
vicchinnaḥ brahma rūpeṇa varṣam tatra

original: 378.017. nāpsu majjati nāpyagnau pūrvavacca na dṛśyate/
analyzed: na apsu majjati na api agnau pūrvavat ca na dṛśyate
agniḥ utpatsyate tatra koṣṭhāgāram daheta
dhvaja agre vāyasaḥ yatra lamba pakṣaḥ vidhāvate
udakam saṃharet kṣipram agnitaḥ

original: 378.021. jalaṃ jājvalyamānaṃ tu matsyo nirdahati svayam/
analyzed: jalam jājvalyamānam tu matsyaḥ nirdahati svayam

original: 378.022. anāvṛṣṭiṃ tadā brūyād durbhikṣaṃ ca mahadbhayam//524//
analyzed: anāvṛṣṭim tadā brūyāt durbhikṣam ca
pura dvāre yadā āgacchet svayam āraṇyakaḥ mṛgaḥ

original: 378.024. cakradvaye 'pi durbhikṣaṃ rāṣṭre rogaṃ ca nirdiśet//525//
analyzed: cakra dvaye durbhikṣam rāṣṭre rogam ca

original: 378.025. triśīrṣaḥ pañcaśīrṣo vā yadā sarpo 'tha dṛśyate/
analyzed: tri śīrṣaḥ pañca śīrṣaḥ vā yadā dṛśyate
anāvṛṣṭyā tadā vidyāt sarva śasyam
kuśūlaḥ yatra dṛśyeta kampayaḥ tu vasuṃdharām
koṣṭhāgārāṇi naśyeyuḥ ye ca anye
sarpaḥ udyata śīrṣaḥ tu yudhyate puruṣaiḥ saha
cakra dvayāt rogataḥ ca vidyāt tatra
ekatra bahavaḥ sarpāḥ su pariveṣṭitāḥ
śastra mṛtyum tadā vidyāt kṣatriyāṇām
niścaranti avadhānena khaḍgāḥ prajvalitāḥ yadā
tatas tam nacirāt paśyet saṃgrāmam

original: 379.005. kākaḥ śyenaśca gṛdhro vā yasya nīyeta mūrdhani/
analyzed: kākaḥ śyenaḥ ca gṛdhraḥ vā yasya nīyeta mūrdhani
ṣaṣ māsa abhyantare rājā mriyate
prāsādāḥ ca prakampante śaraṇāni gṛhāṇi ca
mahā balam ca vadhyeta rāṣṭrasya
vajra uddhṛtāḥ diśaḥ sarvāḥ kṛṣṇa pakṣe caturdiśam
varṣeyuḥ śoṇitam yatra kṣitipālo tra
sūryasya udaya kāle tu mahā ulkā nipatet yadā
rāja putra shasrāṇām bhūmiḥ pāsyati
vṛkṣāḥ sarpāḥ prakampeyuḥ mucyeyuḥ tvacaḥ vā tathā
sarvasmin eva rāṣṭre tu vidyāt śatru bhayam
dine hi ulkā prayuktiḥ vā jvalantī yadi dṛśyate
rakta utpādam tadā vidyāt saṃgrāmam
asim prajvalitam praśyet tomaram cakram eva ca
vidyāt paśyanti śastrāṇi saṃgrāmam
dīrgham ucchvasate aśrūṇi ca nipātayet

original: 379.020. pādena karṣate śīghram yuddhe rājavadho dhruvam//538//
analyzed: pādena karṣate śīghram yuddhe rāja vadhaḥ

original: 379.021. kākaśced gṛhamāruhya hā putra iti vāśati/
analyzed: kākaḥ ced gṛham āruhya hā putraḥ iti vāśati
sarvaḥ praṇaśyate

original: 379.023. anagnau jāyate dhūmaḥ sthale padmāni vā yadā/
analyzed: anagnau jāyate dhūmaḥ sthale padmāni vā yadā
vināśam tasya deśasya
āravanti yadā ghoram meghāḥ vṛka mṛgāḥ tathā
vināśam tasya deśasya
chinna srotāḥ bhavet nadyaḥ cira kāla vahāḥ api
gṛhāḥ śūnya udakena api śuṣkāḥ tatra bhayam
pratisrotā yadā nadyaḥ vahanti aprativāritāḥ
nitya udvignāḥ janapadāḥ nirdiśet ca
dhūmāyanti jvalanti ca
anyat vā api praharaṇam parebhyaḥ jāyate
mayūragrīva saṃkāśaḥ pariveśaḥ niśākare
vidyāt rāja sahasrāṇām mahī pāsyati

original: 380.005. narāṇāṃ pramadānāṃ ca ratiharṣo na jāyate/
analyzed: narāṇām pramadānām ca rati harṣaḥ na jāyate

original: 380.006. sarvatra śokacintā vā mahattatra bhayaṃ bhavet//546//
analyzed: sarvatra śoka cintā vā mahat tatra bhayam
nirgranthāḥ ṛṣayaḥ santaḥ deśāt prakrameyuḥ yatas

original: 380.008. nadīṃ bhittvā nikuñjān vā sa deśo naśyate 'cirāt//547//
analyzed: nadīm bhittvā nikuñjān vā sa deśaḥ naśyate
yatra oṣadhyaḥ ca virasāḥ jalam ca parihīyate
vidyāt deśam tam utsṛṣṭam

original: 380.011. matsyāḥ kūrmāśca sarpāśca mriyante yatra jāṅgalāḥ/
analyzed: matsyāḥ kūrmāḥ ca sarpāḥ ca mriyante yatra jāṅgalāḥ
dhana skandhaḥ striyāḥ tatra

original: 380.013. apūrvāḥ pakṣiṇo yatra sthale vāriṇi eva vā/
analyzed: apūrvāḥ pakṣiṇaḥ yatra sthale vāriṇi eva vā
dṛśyeyuḥ para cakreṇa
mahā pathaḥ yadā kakṣaiḥ prasṛtaiḥ apathaḥ bhavet
sa grāma karvaṭam rāṣṭram putreṇa saha
nānotpātacakranirdeśaḥ nāma adhyāyaḥ
paṭha bhoḥ triśaṅko puruṣapinyā adhyāyam
atha kim

original: 380.018. kathayatu bhagavān--atha khalu bhoḥ puṣkarasārin puruṣapinyādhyāyaṃ vyākhyāmi/
analyzed: kathayatu bhagavān atha khalu bhoḥ puṣkarasārin puruṣapinyā adhyāyam vyākhyāmi
tat śrūyatām
kathayatu bhagavān
aṣṭāviṃśatiḥ puṣkarasārin nakṣatrāṇi prakīrtitāni
yāni candra sūrya niḥsṛtāni anuvahanti

original: 380.021. tatra sukugṛṣṭyā aṣṭāṅgalapramāṇayā dvādaśākṣagṛṣṭayaḥ svaśarīraṃ dairdhyeṇa jñātavyam//
analyzed: tatra su kugṛṣṭyā aṣṭa aṅgala pramāṇayā dvādaśa akṣagṛṣṭayaḥ sva śarīram dairdhyeṇa jñātavyam
eka akṣa gṛṣṭiḥ śīrṣa mūrdhni eka pāda talam bhavet
caturdaśa ṛṣṭayaḥ nakṣatrāṇām padam yatra saṃdṛśyante
tat anyathā na bhavati

original: 380.023. nakṣatre yatra yo jātastatra tatra saṃdṛśyate//
analyzed: nakṣatre yatra yaḥ jātaḥ tatra tatra saṃdṛśyate
puruṣa pinyaḥ

original: 380.025. kṛttikāyāṃ hi jātasya mukhe vai caturaṅgalaḥ/
analyzed: kṛttikāyām hi jātasya mukhe vai catur aṅgalaḥ
pinyaḥ dakṣiṇatas yasya lomaśaḥ

original: 380.027. bhogavān yaśasā yuktaḥ piṇḍato jvalati śriyā/
analyzed: bhogavān yaśasā yuktaḥ piṇḍatas jvalati śriyā
kṛttikāsu atha jātasya bhavati etat hi

original: 380.029. dṛśyate vraṇa evāyam yasya vai caturaṅgalaḥ/
analyzed: dṛśyate vraṇaḥ eva ayam yasya vai catur aṅgalaḥ

original: 380.030. rohiṇyāṃ jātakaḥ so 'pi vidvān dharmarataḥ sadā//554//
analyzed: rohiṇyām jātakaḥ saḥ u pi vidvān dharma rataḥ
