dvitīyasyām dadhi
tat cakaṭyodanam kāñjikam ca parivṛttam
brāhmaṇaḥ saṃlakṣayati mayā hasta ucchraya śataiḥ bhogāḥ samudānītāḥ
kim kāraṇam mama puṇyāni parikṣīṇāni

original: tena tāsāmapratyakṣaṃ mahānasaṃ praviśya paryeṣamāṇena hastasaṃspatśenaikamukhe dve sthālyau labdhe/
analyzed: tena tāsām a pratyakṣam mahānasam praviśya paryeṣamāṇena hasta saṃspatśena eka mukhe dve sthālyau labdhe
tena gopāyite
tena etṣām putrāṇām āgatānām te pradarśitā ipaśyata
mama puṇyāni parikṣīṇāni

original: 435.010. gatvā paśyadhvamasmākaṃ gṛha eva ekamukhī sthālī/
analyzed: gatvā paśyadhvam asmākam gṛhe eva eka mukhī sthālī

original: 435.010. putraka, anyeṣu geheṣu na shālīdvayaṃ tvakamukhamasmākaṃ mandabhāgyānām/
analyzed: putraka anyeṣu geheṣu na shālī dvayam tvaka mukham asmākam mandabhāgyānām
taiḥ tāḥ patnyaḥ su tāḍitāḥ
tāḥ saṃlakṣayanti ayam brāhmaṇaḥ smākam anarthāya pratipannakaḥ
praghātayāmaḥ iti
tena ca pradeśena ahituṇḍikaḥ āgataḥ
tāḥ pṛcchanti asti sarpaḥ iti

original: sa kathayati--kīdṛśaṃ sarpaṃ mṛgayatha jīvantamāhosvit mṛtakamiti?
analyzed: sa kathayati kīdṛśam sarpam mṛgayatha jīvantam āhosvit mṛtakam iti
tāḥ kathayanti mṛtakam
sa saṃlakṣayati kem etāḥ mṛtakena sarpeṇa kariṣyanti
nūnam etāḥ etam vṛddham mārayitu kāmāḥ bhaviṣyanti

original: 435.015. dharmatā khalu sarpasya ruṣitasya dvayoḥ sthānayorviṣaṃ saṃkrāmati--śirasi pucche ca/
analyzed: dharmatā khalu sarpasya ruṣitasya dvayoḥ sthānayoḥ viṣam saṃkrāmati śirasi pucche ca

original: 435.016. tena roṣitvā śiraḥ pucchaṃ svayaṃ chittvā tāsāṃ madhye sarpā dattaḥ/
analyzed: tena roṣitvā śiraḥ puccham svayam chittvā tāsām madhye sarpāḥ dattaḥ
tābhiḥ jomām sādhayitvā sa brāhmaṇaḥ ukta htāta
hilimām joma pāsyasi

original: sa brāhmaṇaḥ saṃlakṣayati--kimetā me hilimāṃ jomāṃ dāsyanti?
analyzed: sa brāhmaṇaḥ saṃlakṣayati kim etāḥ me hilimām jomām dāsyanti
nūnam kiṃcid abhaiṣajyam dattam bhaviṣyati
sa saṃlakṣayati pibāmi
yathā ca tathā marāmi
tābhiḥ tasya hilimā jomā dattā
tena pītā
tasya bāṣpeṇa paṭale sphuṭite
sa draṣṭum ārabdhaḥ
sa nipatya avasthitaḥ
kathayati camarāmi marāmi iti
tāḥ kathayanti śīghram mā pātu
tāḥ kathayanti tāta
bhūyas pāsyasi
sa kathayati pāsyāmi iti
tābhiḥ tasya bhūyas hilimā jomā dattā
tena bhūyas pītā

original: 435.023. tasya tena bāṣpeṇa bhūyasyā mātrayā paṭale sphuṭite/
analyzed: tasya tena bāṣpeṇa bhūyasyā mātrayā paṭale sphuṭite
sa spaṣṭataram draṣṭum ārabdhaḥ

original: 435.024. tāḥ pūrvam yathā tasyāndhasya tato viśvastā vihṛtavantyastathaiva vihartumārabdhāḥ/
analyzed: tāḥ pūrvam yathā tasya andhasya tatas viśvastāḥ vihṛtavantyaḥ tathā eva vihartum ārabdhāḥ
sa daṇḍam gṛhītvā utthitaḥ

original: 435.025. kathayati ca--kim yūyaṃ jānītha idānīmapyahaṃ na paśyāmi?
analyzed: kathayati ca kim yūyam jānītha idānīm api aham na paśyāmi
paśyāmi aham idānīm iti
tāḥ sa lajjāḥ niṣpalāyitāḥ
kim manyadhve bhikṣavaḥ
yaḥ sau brāhmaṇaḥ

original: eṣa evāsau panthakastena kālena tena samayena/
analyzed: eṣaḥ eva asau panthakaḥ tena kālena tena samayena
yāḥ tāḥ tasya dvādaśa snuṣāḥ
etāḥ eva tāḥ dvādaśavargīyāḥ
tadā api ābhiḥ asya anartham kariṣyāmaḥ iti arthaḥ eva kṛtaḥ

original: 435.029. etarhyapi ābhirasyānarthaṃ kariṣyāma ityartham eva kṛtaḥ//
analyzed: etarhi api ābhiḥ asya anartham kariṣyāmaḥ iti artham eva kṛtaḥ

original: 435.030. bhikṣavo buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ pṛcchanti--paśya bhadanta bhagavatā āyuṣmān
analyzed: bhikṣavaḥ buddham bhagavantam pṛcchanti paśya bhadanta bhagavatā āyuṣmān

original: panthakaḥ parīttenāvavādenācodya saṃsārakāntārāduttārya atyantaniṣṭhe anuttare yogakṣeme
analyzed: panthakaḥ parīttena avavādena ācodya saṃsāra kāntārāt uttārya atyanta niṣṭhe anuttare yogakṣeme
nirvāṇe pratiṣṭāpitaḥ

original: 435.032. bhagavānāha--na bhikṣava etarhi yathā atīte 'pyadhvanyeṣo mayā parīttenāvavādenācodya mahatyaiśvaryādhipatye pratiṣṭhāpitāḥ/
analyzed: bhagavān āhana bhikṣavaḥ etarhi yathā atīte pi adhvani eṣaḥ mayā parīttena avavādena ācodya mahati aiśvarya ādhipatye pratiṣṭhāpitāḥ
tat śrayatām

original: 436.001. <436>bhūtabhūtaṃ bhikṣavo 'nyatamasmin kartavaṭake gṛhapariḥ prativasati āḍyo sahādhano mahābhogaḥ/
analyzed: bhikṣavaḥ nyatamasmin kartavaṭake gṛhapariḥ prativasati sahādhanaḥ mahā bhogaḥ
tena sadṛśāt kulāt kalatram ānītam

original: 436.002. sa tayā sārdhaṃ trīṭati ramate paticārayati/
analyzed: sa tayā sārdham ramate pati cārayati
tasya putraḥ jātaḥ
sa parnīm āmantrayate bhadre
jātaḥ smākam ṛṇa haraḥ
gacchāmi aham paṇyam ādāya mahā samudram avatarāmi
sā āha evam kuruṣva

original: 436.004. sa gṛhapatiḥ saṃlakṣayati--yadahamasyai prabhūtānaṃ kārṣāpaṇān dāsyāmi,
analyzed: sa gṛhapatiḥ saṃlakṣayati yat aham asyai prabhūtānam kārṣāpaṇān dāsyāmi
para puruṣaiḥ sārdham vihariṣyati
tena tasyāḥ kārṣāpaṇāḥ na dattāḥ

original: 436.006. tasmin karpaṭake śreṣṭhī prativasati tasya gṛhapatervayasyaḥ/
analyzed: tasmin karpaṭake śreṣṭhī prativasati tasya gṛhapateḥ vayasyaḥ

original: 436.006. tasya haste prabhūtāḥ kārṣāpaṇāḥ sthāpitāh--yadi mama patnyā bhaktācchādena yogodvahanaṃ kuryāḥ/
analyzed: tasya haste prabhūtāḥ kārṣāpaṇāḥ sthāpitāḥ ahi adi mama patnyā bhakta ācchādena yogodvahanam kuryāḥ
sa paṇyam ādāya mahā samudram avatīrṇaḥ
tarra eva anayena vyasanam āpannah

original: 436.008. tayā sa dārako jñātibakena svahastabalena vā āyāpitā(payitvā)
analyzed: tayā sa dārakaḥ jñāti bakena sva hasta balena vā āyāpita āpayitvā
pālitaḥ vardhitaḥ
sa mātaram pṛcchati amba
kim asmākam pitā pitāmahāḥ ca karma akārṣuḥ

original: sā saṃlakṣayati--yadyasya vakṣyāmi mahāsamudre potasaṃvyavahāriṇa āsann iti,
analyzed: sā saṃlakṣayati yat yasya vakṣyāmi mahā samudre pota saṃvyavahāriṇaḥ āsan iti
sthānam etat vidyate yat eṣa u pi mahā samudram avatariṣyati iti
tatra eva anayena vyasanam āpatsyate

original: 436.011. śrutamāhitastava putā ca pitāmahāśca ihaiva vāṇijyamakārṣuḥ/
analyzed: śrutamāhitaḥ tava putā ca pitāmahāḥ ca iha eva vāṇijyam akārṣuḥ
sa kathayati kārṣāpaṇān mama anuprayaccha
yaiḥ iha eva vāṇijyam kariṣyāmi
mātā kathayati kutas mama

original: tvaṃ mayā kathaṃcit jñātibalena svahastabakena āyāpitaḥ poṣitaḥ saṃvardhitaḥ/
analyzed: tvam mayā kathaṃcid jñāti balena sva hasta bakena āyāpitaḥ poṣitaḥ saṃvardhitaḥ
kutas me kārṣāpaṇānām

original: api tvayaṃ śroṣṭī tava pitṛvayasyo bhavati/
analyzed: api tu ayam śroṣṭī tava pitṛ vayasyaḥ bhavati

original: 436.015. asya sakāśāt kārṣāpaṇān gṛhītvā karma kuru/
analyzed: asya sakāśāt kārṣāpaṇān gṛhītvā karma kuru
sa tasya gṛham gataḥ
tasya anyatamena puruṣeṇa yāvat dvis api vināśitaḥ
sa tam avasādayati

original: 436.017. tasya ca gṛhāt preṣyadārikāyāḥ saṃkāratalasyopari mṛtamūṣikāṃ dṛṣṭvā prayacchati cchorayitum/
analyzed: tasya ca gṛhāt preṣya dārikāyāḥ saṃkāra talasya upari mṛta mūṣikām dṛṣṭvā prayacchati chorayitum

original: 436.018. sa śreṣṭhī tasya puruṣasya kathayati--yaḥ puruṣaḥ syāt,
analyzed: sa śreṣṭhī tasya puruṣasya kathayati yaḥ puruṣaḥ syāt
śakyate anayā mṛta mūṣikayā ātmānam uddhartum
tena dārakeṇa śrutam
sa saṃlakṣayati mahātmā eṣaḥ
na śakyam anena yat vā tat vā vaktum
nūnam śakyam anayā mṛta mūṣikayā ātmānam uddhartum
sa tasyāḥ dārikāyāḥ pṛṣṭhatas nirgataḥ
tayā dātikayā saṃkāre choritā
sa tām mṛta mūṣikām ādāya vīthīm gataḥ
tatra vāṇijakaḥ biḍākena krīḍitvā sthitaḥ
tena tasya biḍālasya mṛta mūṣikā darśitā
sa tām dṛṣṭvā utpatitum ārabdhaḥ

original: 436.023. tena vāṇijakena dāraka ucyate--anuprayaccha asya biḍālasya mṛtamūṣikām/
analyzed: tena vāṇijakena dārakaḥ ucyate anuprayaccha asya biḍālasya mṛta mūṣikām
sa kathayati kim ayam kalikayā dīyate
mūlyam anuprayaccha
tena tasya kalāyānām añjali pūraḥ oḥ dattaḥ
sa saṃlakṣayati yadi etān bhakṣayiṣyāmi
mūlam eva bbhikṣitam bhaviṣyati

original: 436.026. sa tān bhrāṣṭre bharjayitvā śītalasya pānīyasya vardhanīyasya pūrṇaṃ kṛtvā tadgṛhya tasmātsthānakānniṣkramya yasmin pradeśe kāṣṭhahārakā
analyzed: sa tān bhrāṣṭre bharjayitvā śītalasya pānīyasya vardhanīyasya pūrṇam kṛtvā tat gṛhya tasmāt sthānakāt niṣkramya yasmin pradeśe kāṣṭha hārakā
tasmin pradeśe gatvā avasthitaḥ
kāṣṭha hārakāḥ āgatāḥ
tena uktā āh mātulāḥ
arpayata kāṣṭha bhārakāḥ
muhūrtam viśrāmyatām
taiḥ kāṣṭha bhārāḥ sthipitāḥ

original: 436.029. tena teṣāṃ kalāyānāṃ stoktaṃ dattaṃ śītalaṃ ca pānīyaṃ pātam/
analyzed: tena teṣām kalāyānām stoktam dattam śītalam ca pānīyam pātam
te kathayanti bhāgineya
kva yāsyasi kāṣṭhānām

original: 436.030. bhāgineya, vayaṃ tāvat kalyamevotthāya gatvā idānīmāgacchāmaḥ/
analyzed: bhāgineya vayam tāvat kalyam eva utthāya gatvā idānīm āgacchāmaḥ
tvam idānīm gacchan kiyatā āgamiṣyasi
taiḥ tasya ekaikam kāṣṭham anupradattam
tasya kāṣṭhamūlikā saṃpannā
sa tām gṛhītvā pratinivṛttaḥ

original: 436.032. sa tāṃ vikrīya <437>kalāyānāṃ gṛhītvā bharjayitvā udakasya kumbhaṃ pūrayitvā tasminneva praveśe gatvāvasthitaḥ/
analyzed: sa tām vikrīya gṛhītvā bharjayitvā udakasya kumbham pūrayitvā tasmin eva praveśe gatvā avasthitaḥ
te kāṣṭha hārakāḥ tathā eva tena kalāyaiḥ saṃvibhaktāḥ
śītalena pānīyena saṃtarpitāḥ
te tasya kathayati bhāgineya

original: divase divase tvaṃ kalāyān pānīyaṃ ca gṛhītvā āgamya atraiva tiṣṭham/
analyzed: divase divase tvam kalāyān pānīyam ca gṛhītvā āgamya atra eva tiṣṭham
vayam tava upari kāṣṭha mūlikām ānayiṣyāmaḥ
sa divase divase tayā eva kartum ārabdhaḥ
sa teṣām kathayati mātula
mā yūyam kāṣṭha bhārān vīrthām nayatha
mama gṛhe sthāpayata
yuṣmākam evam piṇḍita mūlyam dāsyāmi
taiḥ tasya gṛhe kāṣṭha bhārakāṇi sthāpitāḥ
apareṇa samayena sapta aha vardalikāḥ jātāḥ
tena tāni kāṣṭha bhārakāṇi vikrītāni
tasya prabhūtaḥ lābhaḥ saṃpannaḥ
sa saṃlakṣayati etat pratikruṣṭataram vāṇijyānām yat uta kāṣṭha vāṇijyam
sa saṃlakṣayati api candana kāṣṭhena kāṣṭha vāṇijyam eva
yat nu aham ukkarikā paṇam prasārayeyam
tena ukkarikā paṇaḥ prasāritaḥ
sa dharmeṇa vyavaharati

original: 437.010. tasya tatprabhūto lābhaḥ sa saṃlakṣayati--etat pratikruṣṭataraṃ vāṇijyānām yaduta ukkarikāpaṇaḥ/
analyzed: tasya tad prabhūtaḥ lābhaḥ sa saṃlakṣayati etat pratikruṣṭataram vāṇijyānām yat uta ukkarikā paṇaḥ
yat nu aham gāndhika āpaṇam prasārayeyam
tena gāndhika āpaṇaḥ prasāritaḥ
tasya prabhūtaḥ lābhaḥ saṃpannaḥ

original: 437.012. sa saṃlakṣayati--etadapi pratikraṣṭataraṃ ca tadvāṇijyānāṃ pūrvavat/
analyzed: sa saṃlakṣayati etat api pratikraṣṭataram ca tat vāṇijyānām pūrvavat
tena sarve hairaṇyakāḥ abhibhūtāḥ

original: 437.013. tasya mūṣikāhairaṇyako mūṣikāhairaṇyaka iti saṃjñā saṃvṛttā/
analyzed: tasya mūṣikā hairaṇyakaḥ mūṣikā hairaṇyakaḥ iti saṃjñā saṃvṛttā
te hairaṇyakāḥ kathayanti bhavantaḥ
sarve vayam anena mūṣikāhairaṇyakena abhibhūtāḥ
vayam enam mānam prāhayāmaḥ

original: yathā mahāsamudramavataret tatraivānayena vyasanamāpatsyate tathā kariṣyāma iti/
analyzed: yathā mahā samudram avataret tatra eva anayena vyasanam āpatsyate tathā kariṣyāmaḥ iti

original: 437.016. te tasya nātidūre sthitvā svaiḥ kathāsamlāpena tiṣṭhanti--yathāpi nāma bhavantaḥ puruṣo hastigrīvāyāṃ gatvā aśvapṛṣṭhena gacchet,
analyzed: te tasya na atidūre sthitvā svaiḥ kathā samlāpena tiṣṭhanti yathā api nāma bhavantaḥ puruṣaḥ hasti grīvāyām gatvā aśva pṛṣṭhena gacchet
aśva pṛṭhena gatvā śibikāyām gacchet
śibikāyām gatvā padbhyām gacchet

original: evamevāsya mūṣkikāhairaṇyikasya pitā ca pitāmahāśca samudre potasaṃvyavahātiṇa āsan/
analyzed: evam eva asya mūṣkikāhairaṇyikasya pitā ca pitāmahāḥ ca samudre pota saṃvyavahātiṇaḥ āsan

original: 437.019. eṣa idānīṃ kuṛcchreṇa jīvikāṃ kalpayati hairaṇyikāpaṇaṃ vāhayatīti/
analyzed: eṣaḥ idānīm kuṛcchreṇa jīvikām kalpayati hairaṇyikā paṇam vāhayati iti
śrutvā sa kathayati kim kathayata

original: te kathayanti--tava pitā ca pitāmahāśca potasaṃvyavahāriṇa āsan/
analyzed: te kathayanti tava pitā ca pitāmahāḥ ca pota saṃvyavahāriṇaḥ āsan
sa tvam idānīm kṛcchreṇa jīvikām kalpayasi
hairaṇyikā paṇam vāhayasi
sa gṛham gatvā mātaram pṛcchati amba

original: satyamasmākaṃ pitā ca pitāmahāśca mahāsamudre petasaṃvyavahāriṇa āsan?
analyzed: satyam asmākam pitā ca pitāmahāḥ ca mahā samudre peta saṃvyavahāriṇaḥ āsan
sā saṃlakṣayati nūnam anena kiṃcid kutaścid śrutam syāt
tat apratirūpam syāt
yat aham mṛṣāvādena vañcayeyam
satyam putra
sa kathayati anujānīṣva
aham api mahā samudram avatariṣyāmi
sā kathayati putra
iha eva tiṣṭha
sa bhūyas bhūyas kathayati gacchāmi
tasya nirbandham jñātvā anujñātaḥ

original: 437.026. tena ghaṇṭāvadhoṣaṇaṃ kṛtam--yo yuṣmākamutsahate mūṣikāhairaṇyena sārdhamaśulkenāgulmenātarapaṇyena mahāsamudramavataritum,
analyzed: tena ghaṇṭā avadhoṣaṇam kṛtam yaḥ yuṣmākam utsahate mūṣika ahairaṇyena sārdham a śulkena a gulmena a tarapaṇyena mahā samudram avataritum
sa mahā samudra gamanīyam paṇyam samudānayatu
pañca mātraiḥ vaṇij śataiḥ mahā samudra gamanīyam paṇyam samudānītam

original: 437.028. atha mūṣilāhairaṇyikaḥ kṛtamaṅgalakaitūhalasvastyayanaḥ śakaṭairbhārairmūṭaiḥ piṭakairuṣṭrairgobhirgardabhaiḥ paṇyamāropya mahāsamudraṃ
analyzed: atha mūṣilā hairaṇyikaḥ kṛta maṅgala kaitūhala svastyayanaḥ śakaṭaiḥ bhāraiḥ mūṭaiḥ piṭakaiḥ uṣṭraiḥ gobhiḥ gardabhaiḥ paṇyam āropya mahā samudram
saḥ nupūrveṇa mahā samudram avataran anuprāptaḥ
te vaṇijaḥ mahā samudram dṛṣṭvā bhaītaḥ
na utsahante vahanam abhiroḍum

original: 437.031. sārthavāhaḥ karṇadhārasya kathayati--kathaya kathaya bhoḥ puruṣa yathābhūtaṃ mahāsamudrasya varṇam/
analyzed: sārthavāhaḥ karṇadhārasya kathayati kathaya kathaya bhoḥ puruṣa yathābhūtam mahā samudrasya varṇam
karṇadhāraḥ uddhoṣayitum ārabdhaḥ hsanti etasmin imāni evamrūpāṇi
ratnāni tat yathā maṇayaḥ muktāḥ vaiḍūrya śaṅkha śilā pravāla rajata jātarūpam aśmagarbhaḥ
musāragalvaḥ lohitakāḥ dakṣiṇa āvartaḥ

original: 438.002. yo yuṣmākamutsahate evamrūpai ratnairātmānaṃ samyaksukhena pratiṇayitum,
analyzed: yaḥ yuṣmākam utsahate evamrūpaiḥ ratnaiḥ ātmānam samyak sukhena pratiṇayitum

original: mātāpitarau putradārān dāsīdāsakarmakarapauruṣeyaṃ motrāmātyajñātisālohitaṃ kālena kālaṃ śramaṇabrāhmaṇebhyo dakṣiṇāṃ pratiṣṭhāpayitum,

analyzed: atha āyuṣmān ānando cira prakrāntam jīvakam kumāra bhūtam viditvā yena āyuṣmān pathakaḥ tena upasaṃkrāntaḥ
upasaṃkramya āyuṣmantam panthakam idam avocat yat khalu āyuṣman panthaka jānīyāt jīvakena
kumāra bhūtena buddha pramukhaḥ bhikṣu saṃghaḥ śvas ntargṛhe bhaktena upapanimantritaḥ
shāpyitvā āyuṣmantam panthakam
yathā asya bhdanta ānanda kuśalānām dharmāṇām vṛddhiḥ bhavati

original: 440.028. sa jīvakaḥ kumārabhūtastāmeva rātriṃ śuciṃ praṇītaṃ khādanīyaṃ bhojanīyaṃ
analyzed: sa jīvakaḥ kumāra bhūtaḥ tām eva rātrim śucim praṇītam khādanīyam bhojanīyam

original: samudānīya kalyamevotthāya āsanāni prajñapya udakamaṇīn pratiṣṭhāpya bhagavato dūtena
analyzed: samudānīya kalyam eva utthāya āsanāni prajñapya udaka maṇīn pratiṣṭhāpya bhagavataḥ dūtena
kālam ārocayati samaye bhadanta

original: sajjaṃ bhaktam yasyedānīṃ bhagavān kālaṃ manyate/
analyzed: sajjam bhaktam yasya idānīm bhagavān kālam manyate

original: 440.031. atha bhagavān pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaramādāya bhikṣugaṇaparivṛto bhikṣusaṃghapuraskṛto yena jīvakasya kumārabhūtasya niveśanaṃ
analyzed: atha bhagavān pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātra cīvaram ādāya bhikṣu gaṇa parivṛtaḥ bhikṣu saṃgha puraskṛtaḥ yena jīvakasya kumāra bhūtasya niveśanam
purastāt bhikṣu saṃghasya prajñapte eva āsane niṣaṇṇaḥ
niṣadya bhagavān āyuṣmantam ānandam āmantrayate panthakasya anugantī moktavyā

original: 441.002. jīvakaḥ kumārabhūtaḥ sauvarṇabhṛṅgāraṃ gṛhītvā vṛddhānte tiṣṭhati/
analyzed: jīvakaḥ kumāra bhūtaḥ sauvarṇa bhṛṅgāram gṛhītvā vṛddhānte tiṣṭhati
bhagavān vāri dhārām na pratigṛhṇāti

original: 441.003. jīvikaḥ kumārabhūtaḥ kathayati--kiṃ kāraṇaṃ bhagavan vāridhārāṃ na pratigṛhṇāti/
analyzed: jīvikaḥ kumāra bhūtaḥ kathayati kim kāraṇam bhagavan vāri dhārām na pratigṛhṇāti
bhagavān āha na tāvat bhikṣu saṃgham iti samagraḥ iti
jīvakaḥ kathayati bhagavān
kaḥ na āgataḥ iti
bhagavān āhana panthakaḥ bhikṣuḥ saṃghaḥ
jīvakaḥ kathayati bhagavan
na asau mayā nimantritaḥ iti

original: 441.006. bhagavānāha--na tvayā jīvaka buddhapramukho bhikṣusaṃgho nimantritah?
analyzed: bhagavān āha na tvayā jīvaka buddha pramukhaḥ bhikṣu saṃghaḥ nimantritaḥ
bhagavat nimantritaḥ
kim asau bhikṣu saṃghāt bahis na vā
bhagavān kathayati jīvakam gaccha tvam śabdāpaya

original: 441.008. jīvakaḥ kumārabhūtaḥ saṃlakṣayati--kiṃ cāpyahaṃ bhagavato gauraveṇa śabdāpayāmi,
analyzed: jīvakaḥ kumāra bhūtaḥ saṃlakṣayati kim ca api aham bhagavataḥ gauraveṇa śabdāpayāmi
na satkṛtya pariveṣayiṣyāmi
tena dūtaḥ nupreṣitaḥ gaccha
śabdāpayasva
āyuṣmān api panthakaḥ ca trayodaśa bhikṣu śatāni nirmāya avasthitaḥ

original: 441.010. tena dūtena gatvā panthaka iti śabdo muktaḥ/
analyzed: tena dūtena gatvā panthakaḥ iti śabdaḥ muktaḥ
anukaiḥ bhikṣubhiḥ prativacanam dattam

original: 441.011. sa dūta āgatya jīvakasya kathayati--tathaiva veṇuvanaṃ kalandakanivāpo bhikṣūṇāṃ pūrṇastiṣṭhati/
analyzed: sa dūtaḥ āgatya jīvakasya kathayati tathā eva veṇuvanam kalandakanivāpaḥ bhikṣūṇām pūrṇaḥ tiṣṭhati

original: 441.012. bhagavānāha--gaccha tvaṃ kathaya yo bhūtapanthakaḥ sa āgacchatu/
analyzed: bhagavān āha gaccha tvam kathaya yaḥ bhūta panthakaḥ saḥ āgacchatu

original: 441.013. sa gatvā kathayati--yo bhūtapanthakaḥ sa āgacchatu/
analyzed: sa gatvā kathayati yaḥ bhūta panthakaḥ saḥ āgacchatu

original: 441.014. āyuṣmān panthakastatra gatvā svasyāṃ gatyāṃ niṣaṇṇāḥ/
analyzed: āyuṣmān panthakaḥ tatra gatvā svasyām gatyām niṣaṇṇāḥ
jīvakaḥ kumāra bhūtaḥ buddha pramukham bhikṣu saṃgham pariveṣayitum ārabdhaḥ
āyuṣmantam panthakam na satkṛtya pativeṣayati

original: 441.015. bhagavān saṃlakṣayati--sumeruprakhye mahāśrāvake jīvakaḥ kumārabhūtaḥ kṣāntiṃ gṛhṇāti/
analyzed: bhagavān saṃlakṣayati sumeru prakhye mahāśrāvake jīvakaḥ kumāra bhūtaḥ kṣāntim gṛhṇāti
guṇa udbhāvanā asya kartavyā
bhagavatā āyuṣmat ānandasya pātram na anupradattam

original: 441.017. dharmatā khalu na tāvat sthabirashtavirāṇāṃ bhikṣūṇāṃ pātrāṇi pratigṛhyante,
analyzed: dharmatā khalu na tāvat sthabira shtavirāṇām bhikṣūṇām pātrāṇi pratigṛhyante
yāvat bhagavataḥ pātra pratigrahī na bhaviṣyati

original: 441.018. āyuṣmān panthakaḥ saṃlakṣayati--kiṃ kāraṇaṃ bhagavataḥ sthavirasthavirāṇāṃ bhikṣūṇāṃ pātrāṇi na gṛhyante?
analyzed: āyuṣmān panthakaḥ saṃlakṣayati kim kāraṇam bhagavataḥ sthavira sthavirāṇām bhikṣūṇām pātrāṇi na gṛhyante
mayā atra guṇa udbhāvanā kartavyā

original: 441.020. āyuṣmatā panthakenādharmāsanaṃ kṛtvā gajabhujasadṛśaṃ bāhumabhiprasārya bhagavataḥ pātraṃ gṛhītam/
analyzed: āyuṣmatā panthakena adharma āsanam kṛtvā gaja bhuja sadṛśam bāhum abhiprasārya bhagavataḥ pātram gṛhītam
kumāra bhūtena jīvakena vṛddhānte sthitena dṛṣṭham
sa saṃlakṣayati kaḥ pi ayam sthaviraḥ bhikṣuḥ
ṛddhi prātihāryam vidarśayati
sa pātra anusāreṇa gataḥ yāvat paśyati āyuṣmatam panthakam
sa dṛṣṭvā mūrchitakaḥ tiṣṭhati

original: 441.023. sa jalapariṣekapratyāgataprāṇa āyuṣmataḥ panthakasya pādayor nipatya kṣamāpayati,
analyzed: sa jala pariṣeka pratyāgata prāṇaḥ āyuṣmataḥ panthakasya pādayoḥ nipatya kṣamāpayati
gāthām ca bhāṣate

original: 441.025. nityaṃ caityaguṇo hi candanaraso nityaṃ sugandhayutpalaṃ nityaṃ bhāsati kāñcanasya vimalaṃ vaiḍūryaśuddham/
analyzed: nityam caitya guṇaḥ hi candana rasaḥ nityam sugandhayutpalam nityam bhāsati kāñcanasya vimalam vaiḍūrya śuddham

original: 441.027. nityaṃ pāpajane hi krodhamatulaṃ pāṣāṇarekhopamaṃ nityaṃ cāryajaneṣu prātirvasate kṣāntirdhruvā hyarhatām//8//
analyzed: nityam pāpa jane hi krodham atulam pāṣāṇa rekhā upamam nityam ca ārya janeṣu kṣāntiḥ dhruvā
āyuṣmān panthakaḥ kathayati kṣāntam jīvaka
bhikṣavaḥ buddham bhagavantam pṛcchanti paśya bhadanta

original: yadā jīvakaḥ kumārabhūta āyuṣmataḥ panthakasya guṇānāmanabhijñastadā asatkāraḥ prayuktaḥ,
analyzed: yadā jīvakaḥ kumāra bhūtaḥ āyuṣmataḥ panthakasya guṇānām anabhijñaḥ tadā asatkāraḥ prayuktaḥ
yadā guṇānām abhijñaḥ tadā pādayoḥ nipatya
bhagavān āha bhikṣavaḥ etarhi yathā atīte sya guṇānām anabhijñaḥ
tadā asatkāram prayuktavān
yadā guṇānām abhijñaḥ tadā pādayoḥ nipatya kṣamāpitavān
tat śrūyatām

original: 442.003. bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣava uttarāpathāt sārthavāḥ pañcaśatamaśvapaṇyamādāya madhyadeśamāgataḥ/
analyzed: bhūta pūrvam bhikṣavaḥ uttarāpathāt sārthavāh pañcaśatam aśva paṇyam ādāya madhyadeśam āgataḥ
tasya ca vaḍavāyāḥ kukṣau aśvājāneyaḥ vakra antaḥ

original: 442.004. sa yameva divasamavakrāntastameva divasamupādāya te 'śvā na bhūyo heṣante/
analyzed: sa yam eva divasam avakrāntaḥ tam eva divasam upādāya te śvā na bhūyas heṣante

original: 442.005. sārthavahaḥ saṃlakṣayati--kiṃ ca mamāśvānāṃ kaścid rogaḥ prādurbhūto bhaviṣyati yena te na heṣante?
analyzed: sārthavahaḥ saṃlakṣayati kim ca mama aśvānām kaścid rogaḥ prādurbhūtaḥ bhaviṣyati yena te na heṣante
apareṇa samayena aśvāḥ vaḍavā prasūtā
tasyāḥ kiśorakaḥ jātaḥ

original: 442.007. sa yameva divasamupādāya te 'śvāḥ saṃcartumapi nārabdhāḥ/
analyzed: sa yam eva divasam upādāya te śvās saṃcartum api na ārabdhāḥ

original: 442.007. sārthavāhaḥ saṃlakṣayati--nūnamayaṃ daurbhāgyasattvo jātah asya doṣaṇa mamāśvānāṃ rogaḥ prādurbhūtaḥ/
analyzed: sārthavāhaḥ saṃlakṣayati nūnam ayam daurbhāgya sattvaḥ asya mama aśvānām rogaḥ prādurbhūtaḥ
sa tām vaṭavām nityam eva vāhayati
tasyāḥ nava yava sampanna yogya aśanam anuprayacchati
saḥ nupūrveṇa pūjitam nāma adhiṣṭhānam anuprāptaḥ
tasya tatra vārṣāratryaḥ pratyupasthitāḥ
sa saṃlakṣayati yadi gamiṣyāmi
aśvānām khurāḥ kledam gamiṣyanti
a paṇyoḥ bhaviṣyanti
iha eva varṣām tiṣṭhāmi

original: 442.011. sa tasyaiva varṣāmuṣitasya tadvāsino yo śilpinaste svena śilpenopasthānaṃ kurvānti/
analyzed: sa tasya eva varṣā muṣitasya tad vāsinaḥ śilpinaḥ te svena śilpena upasthānam kurvānti
tasya gamana kāle śilpin upasaṃkrāntāḥ
teṣām tena saṃvibhāgaḥ kṛtaḥ
tatra ekaḥ kumbhakāraḥ prativasati
tena api tasya svena śilpena upasthānam kṛtam
sa patnyā abhihita hā ārya putra
sa sārthavāhaḥ gacchati
gaccha tvam gatvā kiṃcid yācasva
tasmāt calitasya mṛd piṇḍam gṛhītvā upasthitaḥ
sa tena sārthavāhena dṛṣṭaḥ
sa tasya kathayati bhoḥ puruṣa
aticireṇa tvam āgataḥ
mama kiṃcid dātavyam
saḥ āha sarvam gatam
tasya api sārthavāhasya tasya kiśorasya antike maṅgala buddhiḥ
sa kathayati api tu ayam ekaḥ kiśoraḥ tiṣṭhati
yadi prayaḥ si
gṛhītvā gaccha
kumbhakāraḥ kathayati śobhanam
aham bhāṇḍāni kariṣyāmi
eṣa bhetsyate
sa kiśorakaḥ tasya pādau jihvayā leḍhum ārabdhaḥ
tasya aśvasya antike nunayaḥ utpannaḥ
sa tam gṛhītvā gataḥ

original: 442.020. sa patnyā uktah--asti kiṃcittvayā tasya sakāśāllabdham? labdham/
analyzed: sa patnyā ukta hasti kiṃcid tvayā tasya sakāśāt labdham labdham
ayam kiśorakaḥ
tvam bhāṇḍāni kariṣyasi
eṣa bhetsyate
sa kiśorakaḥ syāḥ pādāni leḍhum ārabdhaḥ
tasyāḥ api tasya antike nunayaḥ utpannaḥ

original: 442.023. sa pakkamānānāṃ bhāṇḍānāṃ madhye parisarpanna kiṃcidbhāṇḍaṃ bhinatti/
analyzed: sa pakkamānānām bhāṇḍānām madhye parisarpan na kiṃcid bhāṇḍam bhinatti
sā tasya patnī kathayati śobhanam
ayam kiśorakaḥ saṃprajānan parisarpati
apareṇa samayena kumbhakāraḥ mṛttikā artham āgataḥ
sa kiśorakaḥ tasya pṛṣṭhatas nusaran anubaddhaḥ
tena kumbhakāreṇa mṛttikā prasevakaḥ pūritaḥ
tena kiśorakena pṛṣṭham avanāmitam
tena tasya mṛttikāyāḥ prasevakaḥ pṛṣṭham āropitaḥ
sa tam gṛhītvā gṛham āgataḥ
tena kumbhakāreṇa patnī uktā abhadre
śobhanaḥ kiśorakaḥ

original: 442.028. na bhūyo mayā mṛttikā voḍhavyā bhaviṣyati/
analyzed: na bhūyas mayā mṛttikā voḍhavyā bhaviṣyati
aham asya tatra āropayiṣyāmi
tvam iha avatārayiṣyasi
sa tasya tuṣān kuṭim ca anuprayacchati

original: 442.030. tena kālena tena samayena vārāṇasyāṃ brahmadatto nāma rājā rājyaṃ kārayati ṛddhaṃ ca sphītaṃ ca bahujanamanuṣyaṃ ca/
analyzed: tena kālena tena samayena vārāṇasyām brahmadattaḥ nāma rājā rājyam kārayati ṛddham ca sphītam ca bahu jana manuṣyam ca
tasya aśva ājāneyaḥ kālagataḥ
sāmanta rājyaiḥ śrutam brahmadattasya rājñaḥ śvā ājāneyaḥ kālagataḥ iti
taiḥ tasya saṃdiṣṭam kara pratyāyān vā anuprayaccha udyānam
te nirgata kaṇṭake ānayiṣyāmaḥ
sa teṣām kara pratyāyān na anuprayacchati
na api tam saḥ udyānam samāgataḥ
sārthavāhaḥ śva paṇyam ādāya vārāṇasīm anuprāpta

original: 443.002. brahmadattena rājñā śrutam--uttarāpathāt sārthavāho 'śvapaṇyamādāya vārāṇasīmanuprāpta iti/
analyzed: brahmadattena rājñā śrutam uttarāpathāt sārthavāhaḥ śva paṇyam ādāya vārāṇasīm anuprāptaḥ iti
saḥ mātyān āmantrayate sma bhavantaḥ
kiyat ciram mayā iham praviṣṭena sthātavyam
gacchata aśvājāneyam paryeṣadhvam
te sārthavāhasya sakāśam gatāḥ
taiḥ te śvāḥ
na ca atra kaścid aśva ājāneyaḥ vidyate

original: 443.006. sārthavāhaṃ dṛṣṭvā te kathayanti--bhavanto 'śvāvaḍavāyā aśvājāneyo jātaḥ/
analyzed: sārthavāham dṛṣṭvā te kathayanti bhavantaḥ śvāvaḍavāyāḥ aśvājāneyaḥ jātaḥ
sa ca na dṛśyate

original: 443.007. sārthavāhamupasaṃkramya pṛcchanti--asti kaścidaśvastvayā vikrītaḥ kasyacidvā datta iti?
analyzed: sārthavāham upasaṃkramya pṛcchanti asti kaścid aśvaḥ tvayā vikrītaḥ kasyacid vā dattaḥ iti
sa kathayati na asti kaścid vikrītaḥ

original: 443.008. api tvasti mayā pūjitake 'dhiṣṭhāne 'maṅgalakaḥ kiśorakaḥ kumbhakārasya datta iti/
analyzed: api tu asti mayā pūjitake dhiṣṭhāne maṅgalakaḥ kiśorakaḥ kumbhakārasya dattaḥ iti
te nyonyam kathayanti bhavantaḥ
mahā mūrkhaḥ yam sārthavāhaḥ
yaḥ yam maṅgalam apahāya amaṅgalān eva ādāya āgataḥ iti
te rājānam avalokya pūjitakam gatāḥ
te tam kumbhakāram upasaṃkrāntāḥ
upasaṃkramya kathayanti kim anena kiśorakena karoṣi
saḥ āha eṣa mama mṛttikām vahati
te kathayati vayam te tathā gardabham anuprayacchāmaḥ
tvam asmākam amum anuprayacchasva
kathayati eṣa me śobhanaḥ iti
caturgava yuktam śakaṭam anuprayacchāmaḥ
sa kathayati eṣa mama śobhanaḥ iti

original: 443.014. te kathayanti--evaṃ cet saṃpradhāraya vayaṃ śvo bhūya āgamiṣyāmaḥ/
analyzed: te kathayanti evam ced saṃpradhāraya vayam śvas bhūyas āgamiṣyāmaḥ
iti uktvā prakrāntāḥ
sa kiśorakaḥ kathayati kimartham na anuprayacchasi

original: kiṃ tvaṃ jānāsi mayā mṛttikā voḍhavyā tuṣāśca kuṭisakaṇṭaṃ bhakṣitavyam/
analyzed: kim tvam jānāsi mayā mṛttikā voḍhavyā tuṣāḥ ca kuṭi sakaṇṭam bhakṣitavyam
mayā rājā kṣatriyaḥ mūrdhābhiṣiktaḥ vāḍhavyaḥ
sauvarṇa sthāle madhumrākṣitakāḥ mūlakāḥ bhakṣitavyāḥ
te yadi saṃkathayanti keśorakaḥ iti
vaktavyā āhkim lajjadhvam vaktum aśvājāneyaḥ iti
śvas punar āgatvā te kathayiṣyanti mūlyena anuprayaccha iti

original: 443.020. vaktavyāh--suvarṇalakṣaṃ vānuprayacchatha yāvadvā dakṣiṇena sakthnā kariṣyati tāvadanuprayacchati/
analyzed: vaktavyā āh suvarṇa lakṣam vā anuprayacchatha yāvat vā dakṣiṇena sakthnā kariṣyati tāvat anuprayacchati
te parasmin divase upasaṃkramya pṛcchanti bhoḥ puruṣa
saṃpradhāritam tvayā
saṃpradhāritam kim lajjadhvam vaktum aśvājāneyaḥ iti
te kathayanti mūrkhaḥ saḥ eṣaḥ
kim eṣa jñāsyati
eṣaḥ aśvājāneyaḥ dhārayati
etat eva tena sārthavāhena asya ārocitam bhaviṣyati
te kathayanti aśvājāneyaḥ bhavatu
mūlyena anuprayaccha
sa kathayati suvarṇa lakṣam vā anuprayacchaḥ
yāvat vā suvarṇa lakṣam dakṣiṇena sakthnā kariṣyati
te saṃlakṣayanti balavān eṣaḥ
sthānam etat vidyate yat prabhūtataram ākarṣayati
suvarṇa lakṣam anuprayacchāmaḥ

original: 443.026. tairbrahmadattasya rājñaḥ saṃdiṣṭaṃ suvarṇalakṣeṇa aśvājāneyo labhyate/
analyzed: taiḥ brahmadattasya rājñaḥ saṃdiṣṭam suvarṇa lakṣeṇa aśvājāneyaḥ labhyate

original: 443.027. rājñāpi saṃdiṣṭam--yūyam yāvatā mūlyena tāvatā gṛhṇīta/
analyzed: rājñā api saṃdiṣṭam yūyam yāvatā mūlyena tāvatā gṛhṇīta
taiḥ suvarṇa lakṣeṇa gṛhītaḥ
te tam ādāya vāraṇasīmā gatāḥ
sa taiḥ ca mandurāyām pratiṣṭhāpitaḥ
tasya parama yogya aśanam dīyate
sa tam na paribhuṅkte
kim sa rogaḥ bhavadbhiḥ aśva ājāneyaḥ ānītaḥ
api tu samanuyuñjyāmahe tāvat enam
atha sūtaḥ gāthām bhāṣate

original: 443.032. smarasi turaga ghaṭikarasya śālāṃ kimiha vidhairya viprayukraḥ/
analyzed: smarasi turaga śālām kim iha vidhairya viprayukraḥ

original: 444.003. na carasi bahumatastadarthe māsidiha hi cara yānasahasrapūrṇayāyī/
analyzed: na carasi bahu mataḥ tad arthe māsidiha hi cara yāna sahasra pūrṇa yāyī

original: 444.005. hyavasanamidaṃ tṛṣāpanītaṃ na carasi kiṃ vada me 'dya sādhu pṛṣṭaḥ//10//

analyzed: na u ced pañca hasti śatāni pañca hastinī śatāni pañca vaḍavā śatāni pañca kumāra śatāni pañca kumārikā śatāni suvarṇasya lakṣam da tvā tam āneṣyāmi iti

yāvat anyatamaḥ pratyekabuddhaḥ janapada cārikām caran vārāṇasīm anuprāptaḥ
saḥ nyatamasmin udyāne kuṭikāyām avasthitaḥ

tasyāḥ etat abhavat mayā rudrāyaṇasya rājñaḥ pratijñātam upadarśayiṣyāmi iti

original: 471.020. atha candraprabhā devakanyā yena rājā rudrāyaṇastenopasaṃkrāntā/
analyzed: atha candraprabhā deva kanyā yena rājā rudrāyaṇaḥ tena upasaṃkrāntā

original: 471.020. tena khalu samayena rudrāyaṇo rājā ekākī gṛhasyoparitalake śayitaḥ/
analyzed: tena khalu samayena rudrāyaṇaḥ rājā ekākī gṛhasya upari talake śayitaḥ

original: 471.021. sa tayā udārāvabhāsaṃ kṛtvā acchaṭāśabdena pratibodhitaḥ/
analyzed: sa tayā udāra avabhāsam kṛtvā acchaṭā śabdena pratibodhitaḥ
sa middha avastha locanā parisphuṭaḥ vijñātaḥ kathayati kā tvam iti
sā kathayati aham candraprabhā iti
rājā kathayati āgaccha
paricārayāmaḥ iti
sā kathayati deva
cyutā aham kālagatā cāturmahārājikeṣu deveṣu upapannā
yadi icchasi mayā sārdham samāgamam
bhagavataḥ ntike pravraja
yadi tāvat dṛṣṭa dharmā sarva kleśa prahāṇāt arhat tvam sākṣātkariṣyase
saḥ eva te ntaḥ dukhasya
atha sa avaśeṣa samyojanaḥ
kālam kṛtvā ca ārturmahārājikeṣu deveṣu upapatsyase

original: 471.026. tatra te mayā sārdhaṃ samāgamo bhaviṣyati/
analyzed: tatra te mayā sārdham samāgamaḥ bhaviṣyati
iti uktvā tatra eva antarhitā

original: 471.027. rudrāyaṇo rājā kṛtsnāṃ rātriṃ pravrajyāmanuvicintayan kālyamevotthāya amātyānāmantrayate--paśyata bhavantaḥ,
analyzed: rudrāyaṇaḥ rājā kṛtsnām rātrim pravrajyām anuvicintayan kālyam eva utthāya amātyān āmantrayate paśyata bhavantaḥ
candraprabhā devī kva tiṣṭhati iti
te kathayanti deva
kālagata iti

original: 471.029. rudrāyaṇaḥ saṃlakṣayati--na mama pratirūpaṃ syādyadahaṃ devatācodito 'ham agāramadhyāvaseyam/
analyzed: rudrāyaṇaḥ saṃlakṣayati na mama pratirūpam syāt yat aham devatā coditaḥ ham agāram adhyāvaseyam
saṃnidhānī kāla paribhogena vā kāmān paribhuñjīyam

original: 471.031. yannvahaṃ śikhaṇḍinaṃ kumāraṃ rājye 'bhiṣicya keśaśmaśrūṇyavatārya kāṣāyāṇi vastrāṇyācchādya samyageva śraddhayā agārādanagārikāṃ
analyzed: yat nu aham śikhaṇḍinam kumāram rājye bhiṣicya keśa śmaśrūṇi avatārya kāṣāyāṇi vastrāṇi ācchādya samyak eva śraddhayā agārāt anagārikām
tena hiru bhirukau agra amātyau

original: yādṛśa eva mama śikhaṇḍī kumāraḥ putraḥ,
analyzed: yādṛśaḥ eva mama śikhaṇḍī kumāraḥ putraḥ
tādṛśaḥ eva yuvayoḥ

original: 472.001. sa eṣa yuvābhyāmahitānnivārayitavyo hite ca saṃniyojayitavyaḥ/
analyzed: saḥ eṣa yuvābhyām ahitāt nivārayitavyaḥ hite ca saṃniyojayitavyaḥ
aham pravrajāmi su ākhyāte dharma vinaye iti
etau sa aśru kaṇṭhau byavasthitau
śikhaṇḍī api kumāraḥ

original: yathaiva tvaṃ mama vacanaṃ śrotavyaṃ kartavyaṃ manyase,
analyzed: yathā eva tvam mama vacanam śrotavyam kartavyam manyase

original: tathā anayorapi hirubhirukayoragrāmātyayorvacanaṃ śrotavyaṃ kartavyaṃ manyathāḥ/
analyzed: tathā anayoḥ api hiru bhirukayoḥ agra amātyayoḥ vacanam śrotavyam kartavyam manyathāḥ
aham pravrajāmi su ākhyāte dharma vinaye
iti śrutvā saḥ pi sa aśru kaṇṭhaḥ vyavasthitaḥ

original: 472.005. tato rudrāyaṇena rājñā rauruke nagare ghaṇṭāvadhoṣaṇaṃ kāritam--śṛṇvantu bhavanto raurukanivāsinaḥ paurā nānādeśābhyāgataśca janakāyaḥ/
analyzed: tatas rudrāyaṇena rājñā rauruke nagare ghaṇṭā avadhoṣaṇam kāritam śṛṇvantu bhavantaḥ rauruka nivāsinaḥ paurāḥ nānā deśa abhyāgataḥ ca jana kāyaḥ

original: 472.007. ahaṃ keśaśmaśrūṇyavatārya kāṣāyāṇi vastrāṇyācchādya samyageva śraddhayā agārādanagārikāṃ pravrajiṣyāmi/
analyzed: aham keśa śmaśrūṇi avatārya kāṣāyāṇi vastrāṇi ācchādya samyak eva śraddhayā agārāt anagārikām pravrajiṣyāmi
bhūyaśas putram āha putra

original: tvayā rājyaṃ kārayatā kasyacidaparādhyaṃ na kṣantavyamiti/
analyzed: tvayā rājyam kārayatā kasyacid aparādhyam na kṣantavyam iti
anurakta paura janapadaḥ sau rājā

original: 472.009. śrutvā sarva eva raurukanivāsī janakāyo 'nyaśca nānādeśābhyāgātaḥ sāśrukaṇṭho vyavasthitaḥ/
analyzed: śrutvā sarvaḥ eva rauruka nivāsī jana kāyaḥ nyaḥ ca nānā deśa abhyāgātaḥ sa aśru kaṇṭhaḥ vyavasthitaḥ

original: 472.010. tato rudrāyaṇo rājā śikhaṇḍinaṃ kumāraṃ rājye pratiṣṭhāpya bandhujanaṃ kṣamāpayitvā
analyzed: tatas rudrāyaṇaḥ rājā śikhaṇḍinam kumāram rājye pratiṣṭhāpya bandhu janam kṣamāpayitvā

original: śramaṇabrāhmaṇakṛpaṇavanīpakebhyo dānāni datvā paṇyāni kṛtvā ekena puruṣeṇopasthāyakena
analyzed: śramaṇa brāhmaṇa kṛpaṇa vanīpakebhyaḥ dānāni da tvā paṇyāni kṛtvā ekena puruṣeṇa upasthāyakena
rājagṛha abhimukhah samprasthitah

original: 472.012. tataḥ śikhaṇḍī rājā sāntaḥpurāmātyapaurajanapado 'nyaśca nānādeśābhyāgato janakāyaḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ samanubaddhaḥ/
analyzed: tatas śikhaṇḍī rājā sa antaḥpura amātya paura janapadaḥ nyaḥ ca nānā deśa abhyāgataḥ jana kāyaḥ pṛṣṭhatas pṛṣṭhatas samanubaddhaḥ
saḥ nekaiḥ praṇi śata sahasraiḥ anugamyamānaḥ raurukāt nagarāt niṣkramya anyatamā asmin udyāne
vividha taru ṣaṇḍa maṇḍite nānā puṣpa salila sampanne haṃsa kroñca mayūra śuka sārikā kokila jīvaṃjīvaka nirghoṣite
muhūrtam āsthāya raurukam nagaram avalokya śikhaṇḍinam rājānam āmantrayate putra
mayā dharmeṇa rājyam kāritam
yena me iyanti praṇi śata sahasrāṇi pṛṣṭhatas nuvaddhāni
tat tvayā api dharmeṇa rājyam kārayitavyam iti
saḥ pi jana kāyaḥ samāśvāsya uktaḥ bhavantaḥ
eṣa yuṣmākam rājā samanuyuktaḥ mayā
nivartate sukham prativatsyatha
iti uktvā saṃprasthitaḥ

original: 472.019. rājā śikhaṇḍī sāntaḥpurakumārāmātyapaurajanapado 'śruparuyākulekṣaṇo muhūrmuhūr nivartya nirīkṣamāṇo raurukaṃ nagaraṃ pratinivṛttaḥ/
analyzed: rājā śikhaṇḍī sa antaḥpura kumāra amātya paura janapadaḥ śru paruyā ākula īkṣaṇaḥ muhūr muhūr nivartya nirīkṣamāṇaḥ raurukam nagaram pratinivṛttaḥ

original: 472.020. tato rudrāyaṇo rājā anupūrveṇa rājagṛhaṃ nagaramanuprāptaḥ/
analyzed: tatas rudrāyaṇaḥ rājā anupūrveṇa rājagṛham nagaram anuprāptaḥ

original: 472.021. tenodyāne sthitvā sa puruṣa uktah--gaccha bhoḥ puruṣa,
analyzed: tena udyāne sthitvā sa puruṣaḥ uktaḥ gaccha bhoḥ puruṣa

original: rājño bimbisārasya gatvā nivedaya--rudrāyaṇo nāma udyāne tiṣṭhatīti/
analyzed: rājñaḥ bimbisārasya gatvā nivedaya rudrāyaṇaḥ nāma udyāne tiṣṭhati iti

original: 472.022. tena puruṣeṇa gatvā rājño bimbisārasya niveditam--deva,
analyzed: tena puruṣeṇa gatvā rājñaḥ bimbisārasya niveditam deva
rudrāyaṇaḥ rājā udyāane tiṣṭhati iti
sa rājā śrutvā sahasā eva utthitaḥ pauruṣān āmantrayate bhavantaḥ
mahāsādhanaḥ rājā apratisaṃviditaḥ eva āgataḥ
na yuṣmākam kenacid vijñāt iti
sa kathayati deva
kutas sya sādhanam
ātmanā dvitīyaḥ āgataḥ iti

original: 472.025. rājā bimbisāraḥ saṃlakṣayati--na mama pratirūpaṃ syādyadahaṃ rāhānaṃ kṣatriyaṃ mūrdhnāmiṣiktamevameva praveśayeyam/
analyzed: rājā bimbisāraḥ saṃlakṣayati na mama pratirūpam syāt yat aham rāhānam kṣatriyam evam eva praveśayeyam

original: 472.027. mahatā satkāreṇa praveśayāmīti viditvā mārgaśobhāṃ bagaraśobhāṃ ca kārayitvā caturaṅgena balakāyena pratyudgataḥ/
analyzed: mahatā satkāreṇa praveśayāmi iti viditvā mārga śobhām bagara śobhām ca kārayitvā caturaṅgena balakāyena pratyudgataḥ

original: 472.028. kaṇṭhe pariṣvajya hastiskandhe āropya rājagṛhaṃ mahānagaraṃ praveśitaḥ/
analyzed: kaṇṭhe pariṣvajya hasti skandhe āropya rājagṛham mahā nagaram praveśitaḥ
nānā gandha paribhāvitena udakena snāpitaḥ
rāja arhaiḥ vastraiḥ gandha mālya vilepanaiḥ ca samalaṃkṛtya bhojitaḥ
mārga śrame prativinodite ukta hpriyavayasya

original: sphītaṃ rājyamapāsya antaḥpuraṃ kumārānāmātyān paurajanapadān kimihāgamanaprayojanam?
analyzed: sphītam rājyam apāsya antaḥpuram kumārān āmātyān paura janapadān kim iha āgamana prayojanam
mā kenacid bhūmi antareṇa rājñā rāṣṭra avamardanaḥ kṛtah
kumāreṇa vā kenacid duṣṭa amātya vigrāhitena rājya abhinandinā parākrāntam iti
sa kathayati vayasya
su ākhyāte dharma vinaye pravrajyām upasampadam bhikṣu bhāvam

original: 473.001. iti śrutvā rājā bimbisāra āttamanāḥ pūrvakāyamabhyunnamayya dakṣiṇabāhumābhiprasāryodānamudānayati--aho buddhaḥ,
analyzed: iti śrutvā rājā bimbisāraḥ ātta manāḥ pūrvakāyam abhyunnamayya dakṣiṇa bāhum ā abhiprasārya udānam udānayati aho buddhaḥ
aho dharmaḥ
aho saṃghaḥ aho dharmasya su ākhyāta tā

original: yatredānīmevaṃvidhāḥ puruṣāḥ sphītaṃ rājyamapahāya sphītamantaḥpuraṃ vistīrṇasvajanabandhuvargaṃ
analyzed: yatra idānīm evaṃvidhāḥ puruṣāḥ sphītam rājyam apahāya sphītam antaḥpuram vistīrṇa sva jana bandhu vargam

original: sphītāni ca kośakoṣṭhāgārāṇyapahāya ākāṅkṣante svākhyāte dharmavinaye pravrajyāmupasampadaṃ bhikṣubhāvam /
analyzed: sphītāni ca kośa koṣṭhāgārāṇi apahāya ākāṅkṣante su ākhyāte dharma vinaye pravrajyām upasampadam bhikṣu bhāvam

original: 473.005. ityuktvā rājānaṃ rudrāyaṇaṃ samādāya yena bhagavāṃsetnopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
analyzed: iti uktvā rājānam rudrāyaṇam samādāya yena bhagavān itnā upasaṃkrāntaḥ

original: 473.006. tena khalu samayena bhagavānanekaśatāyā bhikṣuparṣadaḥ purastānniṣaṇṇo dharmaṃ deśayati/
analyzed: tena khalu samayena bhagavān aneka śatāyāḥ bhikṣu parṣadaḥ purastāt niṣaṇṇaḥ dharmam deśayati

original: 473.007. adrākṣīdbhagavān rājānaṃ māgadhaṃ śreṇyaṃ bimbisāraṃ dūrādeva/
analyzed: adrākṣīt bhagavān rājānam māgadham śreṇyam bimbisāram dūrāt eva

original: 473.007. dṛṣṭvā ca punarbhikṣūnāmantrayate sma--eṣa bhikṣavo rājā bimbisāraḥ saprābhṛta āgacchati/
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā ca punar bhikṣūn āmantrayate sma eṣa bhikṣavaḥ rājā bimbisāraḥ sa prābhṛtaḥ āgacchati
na asti tathāgatasya evaṃvidhaḥ prābhṛtaḥ yathā vineya prābhṛtaḥ
iti uktvā tūṣṇīm avasthitaḥ

original: 473.009. rājā bimbisāro bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvaikānte niṣaṇṇaḥ/
analyzed: rājā bimbisāraḥ bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte niṣaṇṇaḥ

original: 473.010. ekāntaniṣaṇṇo rājā biṃvisāro bhagavantamidamavocat--ayaṃ bhadanta rājā rudrāyaṇa ākāṅkṣate svākhyāte dharmavinaye pravrajyāmupasampadaṃ
analyzed: ekānta niṣaṇṇaḥ rājā biṃvisāraḥ bhagavantam idam avocata ayam bhadanta rājā rudrāyaṇaḥ ākāṅkṣate su ākhyāte dharma vinaye pravrajyām upasampadam
tam bhagavān pravrājayatu
upasampādayatu anukampām upādāya iti
sa bhagavatā ehibhikṣukayā bhikṣo
cara brāhmacaryam iti

original: 473.013. sa bhagavato vācāvasāne eva muṇḍaḥ saṃvṛttaḥ saṃghāṭīprāvṛtaḥ pātrakaravyagrahasto varṣaśatopasampannasya bhikṣorīryāpathenāvasthitaḥ//
analyzed: sa bhagavataḥ vācā avasāne eva muṇḍaḥ saṃvṛttaḥ saṃghāṭī prāvṛtaḥ pātra kara vyagra hastaḥ varṣa śata upasampannasya bhikṣoḥ īryāpathena avasthitaḥ

original: 473.015. ehīti coktaḥ sa tathāgatena muṇḍaśca saṃghāṭiparivṛtadehaḥ/
analyzed: ehi iti ca uktaḥ sa tathāgatena muṇḍaḥ ca saṃghāṭi parivṛta dehaḥ

original: 473.017. sadyaḥ praśāntendraya eva tasthau evaṃ sthito buddho manorathena//8//
analyzed: sadyas praśānta indrayaḥ eva tasthau evam sthitaḥ buddhaḥ

original: 473.019. āyuṣmān rudrāyaṇaḥ pūrvāhne nivāsya pātracīvaramādāya rājagṛhaṃ piṇṭāya prāvikṣat/
analyzed: āyuṣmān rudrāyaṇaḥ pūrvāhne nivāsya pātra cīvaram ādāya rājagṛham piṇṭāya prāvikṣat
sa mahā jana kāyena dṛṣṭaḥ

original: 473.020. eṣa ca śabdo rājagṛhe nagare samantato visṛtah--rudrāyaṇo rājā bhagavatā pravrajitaḥ,
analyzed: eṣa ca śabdaḥ rājagṛhe nagare samantataḥ visṛta hrudrāyaṇaḥ rājā bhagavatā pravrajitaḥ
sa rājagṛham bhikṣā arthī praviṣṭaḥ
iti śrutvā anekāni prāṇi śata sahasrāṇi saṃnipatitāni
antar bhavana vicāriṇyaḥ pi yoṣitaḥ vātāyana gavākṣa vedikāsu avasthitāḥ nirīkṣitum ārabdhāḥ
amātyaiḥ rājñaḥ bimbisārasya niveditam deva

original: rudrāyaṇo rājā rājagṛhaṃ piṇḍāya praviṣṭo 'nekaiḥ prāṇiśatasahasraiḥ parivṛtastiṣṭhatīti/
analyzed: rudrāyaṇaḥ rājā rājagṛham piṇḍāya praviṣṭaḥ nekaiḥ prāṇi śata sahasraiḥ parivṛtaḥ tiṣṭhati iti

original: 473.024. śrutvā ca punā rājā bimbisāro yena rudrāyaṇo bhikṣustenopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
analyzed: śrutvā ca punar rājā bimbisāraḥ yena rudrāyaṇaḥ bhikṣuḥ tena upasaṃkrāntaḥ
upasaṃkramya rudrāyaṇam bhikṣum idam avocat
bhuktvā grāma sahasrāṇi raurukam ca narādhipa
utsṛṣṭam piṇḍam eṣāṇaḥ kaccit na

original: 473.028. bhuktvā śatapale pātre sauvarṇe rājate 'tha vā/
analyzed: bhuktvā śata pale pātre sauvarṇe rājate vā
bhuñjānaḥ mṛd maye pātre kaccit na
śālīnām odanam bhuktvā śuci māṃsa upasevitam
bhuñjānaḥ śuṣka kulmāṣān kaccit na
kauśeya karpāsān kṣaumam kauṭumba kāśikān
dhārayan pāṃśu kūlāni kaccit na
kūṭāgāre śāyitvā tvam nirvāte sparśita āgate
āsīnaḥ vṛkṣa mūleṣu kaccit na
paryaṅke vaśayitvā tvam mṛduke tūla saṃnibhe
tṛṇa saṃstare śayānaḥ kaccit na
bhāryām sadṛśikām gṛdyām āśravām vai priyaṃvadām
rudantīm viprahāya tvam kaccit na
yānaiḥ tvam hasti grīvābhiḥ aśvaiḥ api rathaiḥ api
padbhyām paribhraman bhūmau kaccit na

original: 474.011. koṣṭhāgārāṇi kośaṃ ca bahuvittaṃ prahāya vai/
analyzed: koṣṭhāgārāṇi kośam ca bahu vittam prahāya vai
ākiṃcanyam anuprāptaḥ kaccit naḥ iti
rudrāyaṇaḥ prāha
anṛddhiḥ damayati enam saced bhavati durdamaḥ
para bhojana bhuñjānaḥ katham damayate iti
rājā bimbisāraḥ prāha

original: 474.017. kiṃ nu tvaṃ durmanā rājan kiṃ dīna iva bhāṣase/
analyzed: kim nu tvam durmanāḥ rājan kim dīnaḥ iva bhāṣase
dadāmi upārdha rājyam te bhuṅkṣva

original: 474.019. kiṃ nu tvaṃ durmanā rāhan kiṃ dīna iva bhāṣase/
analyzed: kim nu tvam durmanāḥ rāhan kim dīnaḥ iva bhāṣase

original: 474.020. dadāmi pravarān bhogān yān kāṃścinmanasecchasi//20// iti/
analyzed: dadāmi pravarān bhogān yān iti
rudrāyaṇa prāha

original: 474.022. na rājan kṛpaṇo loke dharmakāyena saṃspṛśet/
analyzed: na rājan kṛpaṇaḥ loke dharmakāyena saṃspṛśet
deva tripatha nirāśī
dhruvam tasya
yaḥ tu dharma virāga artham adharme nirataḥ nṛpaḥ
sa rājan kṛpaṇaḥ

original: 474.026. śṛṇu me tvaṃ mahārāja dharmatā deśayāmyaham/
analyzed: śṛṇu me tvam mahā rāja dharmatāḥ deśayāmi aham

original: 474.027. śrutvā dharmaṃ tato jñeyo yadi tvaṃ prītimeṣyasi//23//
analyzed: śrutvā dharmam tatas jñeyaḥ yadi tvam
nirguṇasya śarīrasya ekaḥ eva mahā guṇaḥ
yathā yathā vidhāryam te
daśa ime varṣa daśāḥ puruṣasya āsu nirucyate

original: 474.031. trīṭā tatra ratiḥ kā vā putraparadhaneṣu vā//25//
analyzed: trīṭā tatra ratiḥ kā vā putra para dhaneṣu
kṛtiḥ ucyate

original: 475.002. śaurā dhanaṃ prārthayante rājan mukto 'smi bandhanāt//26//
analyzed: śaurāḥ dhanam prārthayante rājan muktaḥ smi

original: 475.003. na bhaiṣajyāni trāyante na dhanaṃ jñātayo na ca/
